data.heading: Zingaki izinsuku ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho uthola i-PMS?
data.title: Isikhathi se-PMS
data.body:
Izimpawu ze-PMS kanye nesikhathi I- Imbangela ngqo ye-PM ayiqondakali ngokuphelele, kepha ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal kukholakala ukuthi kudlala indima enkulu.

Izimpawu ze-PM zingahlukahluka kakhulu kumuntu nomuntu. Izimpawu ezijwayelekile zomzimba zingafaka ukuqhakaza, ubumnene bebele, ikhanda, ukukhathala, kanye nezinguquko ekudleni. Izimpawu ezingokomzwelo nezengqondo zingafaka ukushintshwa kwemizwelo, ukungacasuki, ukukhathazeka, ukudana, nobunzima ukugxila. Lezi zimpawu zingaphazamisa imisebenzi yansuku zonke futhi zibe nomthelela omkhulu enhlalakahleni yomuntu wonke. I-

isikhathi sezimpawu ze-PMS nazo zingahluka phakathi kwabantu. Ngokwesilinganiso, izimpawu ze-PMS zivame ukuvela cishe amasonto amabili kuya kwangamabili ngaphambi kokuqala kokuya esikhathini. Lesi sikhathi sokuqala siqondanisa nesigaba se-Lutual somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, okwenzeka ngemuva kwe-ovulation nangaphambi kokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ubude besikhathi nobunzima bezimpawu ze-PMS kungahluka kumuntu kuya kumuntu.

Ukuqonda kangcono isikhathi se-PMS, kuyasiza ukuba nokuqonda okuyisisekelo komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini uvame ukuqhubeka cishe ezinsukwini ezingama-28, yize ukuhlukahluka kuvamile. Umjikelezo uhlukaniswe izigaba ezimbili eziphambili: isigaba se-follicular kanye nesigaba se-luteal.

Isigaba se-Follular siqala ngosuku lokuqala lokuya esikhathini futhi luhlala kuze kube yilapho i-ovulation. Ngalesi sigaba, kancane kancane i-hormone estrogen iphakama, ivusa ukuthuthukiswa kwe-sitene lining ukulungiselela ukukhulelwa okungenzeka. Eduze komjikelezo womjikelezo, imvamisa cishe ngosuku lwe-14 emjikelezweni wezinsuku ezingama-28, okwenzeke. I-ovulation ukukhishwa kweqanda kusuka ku-ovary ku-fallopian tube, lapho kungavundiswa khona ngesidoda. I-

Ukulandela i-ovulation, isigaba seLuteal siyaqala. Ngalesi sigaba, i-hormone progesterone iba i-hormone evelele, ilungiselela i-sitene lining ukusekela ukukhulelwa okungenzeka. Uma ukukhiqizwa kwenziwa kungenzeki, amazinga e-hormone ancipha, okuholela ekuchithweni kwe-sitene lining kanye nokuqala komjikelezo omusha wokuya esikhathini. I-

Izimpawu ze-PMS kungenzeka zenzeke ngesikhathi sesigaba seLuteal, ngokuvamile lihlala cishe izinsuku eziyi-10 kuye kwezingu-14. Izimpawu zivame ukuba ngaphezulu zisezingeni eliphakeme ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini ziqala ukuya esikhathini bese zinciphisa kancane ngemuva kokuqala kokopha. Leli phethini lihambisana nezinguquko ze-hormonal ezenzeka ngalesi sigaba. I-

Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi akubona bonke abantu abathola ama-PMS, futhi ubukhulu bezimpawu bungahluka kakhulu. Abanye abantu bangaba nezimpawu eziphansi ezingathinta kakhulu izimpilo zabo zansuku zonke, kanti abanye bangathola izimpawu ezinzima kakhulu eziphazamisa inhlala-kahle yazo yonke. Uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngomjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini noma izimpawu ze-PMS, kunconywa ukuthi abonane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo abanganikeza izeluleko ezenziwe ngezifiso nokusekelwa. I-

ekuphetheni, i-PMS ibhekisa kwinhlanganisela yezimpawu zomzimba nezingokomzwelo abantu abaningi abahlangabezana nazo ngaphambi kwesikhathi sabo sokuya esikhathini. Ngenkathi isikhathi esiqondile kanye nesikhathi sezimpawu ze-PMS zingahluka, zivame ukwenzeka cishe cishe emavikini amabili ukuya esikhathini ezimbili ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini, ngesikhathi sesigaba sokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi isipiliyoni sawo wonke umuntu nge-PM singahluka, futhi uma unezinto ezikhathazayo noma imibuzo, kungcono ukufuna ukuholwa kuchwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

data.heading: Yiliphi i-hormone elibangela i-PMS?
data.title: I-PMS Hormone
data.body:
Indima yama-hormone ku-PMS I-

I-Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) ibonakala ngokuhlanganiswa kwezimpawu zomzimba nezingokomzwelo ezenzeka ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini. Ukushintshashintsha kwe-Hormonal kudlala indima enkulu ekwakhiweni kwezimpawu ze-PMS. I-hormone eyodwa, ikakhulukazi, ivelele ekuhlanganiseni kwayo nge-PMS: progesterone. I-

Progesterone yi-hormone eyenzeka ngokwemvelo edlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kanye nokulungiswa kwesibeletho sokukhulelwa. Ngesikhathi sesigaba se-Lutual somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, okwenzeka ngemuva kwe-ovulation, amazinga e-progesterone asukuma. Uma ukukhulelwa kungenzeki, amazinga e-progesterone ancipha, kubangele ukuya esikhathini. I- Kukholakala ukuthi ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal, ikakhulukazi ukwehla kanye nokwehla okulandelayo emazingeni e-progesterone, kufaka isandla ekuthuthukisweni kwezimpawu ezingokomzimba nangokomzwelo ezihambisana ne-PMS.

izindlela eziqondile lapho izimpawu ze-progesterone zithonya ngokuphelele. Kodwa-ke, kucatshangwa ukuthi i-progeresterone ithinta ama-neurotransmitters ahlukahlukene, njenge-serotonin, i-gamma-aminobutyric acid (Gaba), ne-Dopamine, edlala izindima ezibalulekile ekuqondiseni imizwa nemizwa. I-

Progesterone nayo ingaba nomthelela emazingeni akwamanye ama-hormone, kufaka phakathi i-estrogen, engaqhubeka nokuthonya izimpawu ze-PMS. Ukuphikisana phakathi kwe-estrogen ne-progesterone ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kuyinkimbinkimbi, futhi ukungalingani kwalawa ama-hormone kungasiza ekuthuthukisweni kwezimpawu ze-PMS. I- Isibonelo, i-Estrogen, ixhumene nesisa sebele kanye nezinguquko zemood. Ngokwengeziwe, i-prolactin, i-hormone ebandakanyeka ekukhiqizeni ubisi, ingathonya ubulukhuni bezimpawu ezihlobene nebele ku-PMS. I-

kufanelekile ukusho ukuthi akubona bonke abantu abanamazinga aphezulu we-progesterone ahlangabezana nezimpawu ezibalulekile ze-PMS. Ukuzwela komuntu ekuguquguqukineni kwe-hormonal kungahluka, kanye nezinto ezingezekile, njengezinto zofuzo, indlela yokuphila, kanye nezici zengqondo, kungahle kube nomthelela ekuthuthukisweni kwezimpawu ze-PMS. I-

Ukuphatha izimpawu ze-PMS kuvame ukubandakanya indlela ehlukahlukene egxile ekulingweni kwama-hormone, ukuguqulwa kwendlela yokuphila, kanye nokwelashwa okucacisiwe. Amaphilisi okulawula ukuzala, anganikezwa ukulawula ukuguquguquka kokushintshana kwama-hormonal ngokuzinza kwamazinga e-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone kuwo wonke umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Lokhu kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS kwabanye abantu. I-

Ukuguqulwa kwendlela yokuphila, njengokuvivinya umzimba njalo, ukudla okulinganiselayo, amasu okunciphisa ukucindezela, nokulala okwanele, kungahle futhi kudlale indima enkulu ekuphatheni izimpawu ze-PMS. Lezi zinyathelo zingasiza ukusekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal ephelele futhi kunciphise ubukhulu bezimpawu. I- Abathengisi bezinhlungu ezingaphezulu kwe-counter bangasiza ukunciphisa ikhanda, izinhlungu zemisipha, kanye nokungakhululeki kwesisu. Imithi ye-antidepressuresress, ikakhulukazi i-Serotonin Reaptake inhibitors (SSRIS), ingabekwa kunqunyelwe ukuphatha izimpawu ezihlobene nemizwa.

Ekuphetheni, i-hormone ngokuyinhloko ehambisana nezimpawu ze-PMS i-progesterone. Ngesikhathi sesigaba seLuteal somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, amazinga e-progesterone asukuma abekwe phansi uma ukukhulelwa kungenzeki. Lokhu kuguquguquka kwe-hormonal, kanye nezinye izinto, kufaka isandla ekuthuthukisweni kwezimpawu ezingokomzimba nezingokomzwelo ezihambisana ne-PMS. Ngenkathi i-progestesterone idlala indima ebalulekile, amanye ama-hormone, anjenge-estrogen ne-prolactin, angafaka nomthelela ekubonakalisweni kwezimpawu. Ukuqonda amathonya ama-hormonal ku-PM kungasiza ukuqondisa izindlela zokwelashwa futhi zisekele abantu ekuphatheni izimpawu zabo ngempumelelo.

data.heading: Ngingamkhulula Kanjani ama-PM ngokwemvelo?
data.title: Ukukhululeka kwe-PMS yemvelo
data.body:
amakhambi wemvelo ukudambisa izimpawu ze-PMS

I-Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) ingadala izimpawu ezahlukahlukene zomzimba nangokomzwelo ezihlukahluka ngobunzima obuvela kumuntu. Ngenkathi ukungenelela kodokotela kutholakala, abantu abaningi bafuna amakhambi emvelo ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS. Nazi ezinye izindlela zemvelo ezingasiza ukudambisa izimpawu ze-PMS:

1. Ukulungiswa kokudla

Ukuthola ukudla okulinganiselayo nokunempilo kungaba nomthelela omuhle kwizimpawu ze-PMS. Cabanga ukufaka izinguquko ezilandelayo zokudla: I-LI>

  • Sebenzisa ama-carbohydrate ama-computer: khetha okusanhlamvu, ama-leges, nemifino enesitashi ukusika izinyoka zegazi nokusekelwa kwemizwa. Anganikeza ama-amino acid abalulekile futhi asiza ukulawula amazinga we-hormone. Yehlisa ukusetshenziswa kwakho kwalezi zinto ngesikhathi se-Preminstrual.
  • Hlala i-hydrate:

    2. Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo

    ukuzibandakanya kokuzivocavoca umzimba njalo kungaba usizo ekuphatheni izimpawu ze-PMS. Ukuzivocavoca kusiza ukukhuphula amazinga e-endorphin, uthuthukise imizwa, futhi unciphise ukucindezela. Inhloso okungenani imizuzu engama-30 yokuvivinya umzimba ngokulinganisela ezinsukwini eziningi zeviki. Izinketho ezinjengokuhamba nge-brisk, ukugijima, ukubhukuda, ukuhamba ngebhayisikile, noma ukudansa kungasebenza kalula ekunciphiseni izimpawu ze-PMS.

    3. Amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela

    Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona kungalimaza izimpawu ze-PMS. Ukuqalisa ukusebenzisa amasu okunciphisa ukucindezela kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu. Cabanga ukuzama lokhu okulandelayo:

    • Amasu wokuphumula wokuphumula: amasu afana nokuphefumula okujulile, ukuzindla, i-yoga, noma ukuphumula kwemisipha okuqhubekayo kungakhuthaza ukuphumula futhi kunciphise amazinga okucindezela.
    • Thola ukulala ngokwanele : Hlela phambili uhlelo lokulala olungaguquli futhi udale inqubo yokuphumula yokuphumula ukuze uqinisekise ukuphumula okwanele. ngokwemvelo. Izithamo ze-Herbal

      Ezinye izithasiselo ze-herbal zikhombise isithembiso ekunikezeni izimpawu ze-PMS. Kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma yiluphi uhlobo lwe-herbal applement regimen. Amanye amakhambi asetshenziswa kakhulu ama-PM afaka:

      • i-cnasteberryberry (vitex agnus-castos): Lo mkhahla we-agnus): Lo mkhakha we-herbas): Lo mkhakha wokushintshana, nokuqhakaza.
      • Amafutha e-primrose kusihlwa: iqukethe i-gamma-linolenic acid (GLA), i-acid ebalulekile ye-acid engasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zebele nokucaca.
      • Isiko elimnyama lelo lisetshenziselwa ukunciphisa izimpawu ezinjengale Ukushisa okushisayo, ukushintshwa kwemizwelo, nokuphazamiseka kokulala.
      • st. I-Wort kaJohn: Kungahle kube yinzuzo ukuphatha ukucindezeleka okulinganiselayo kanye nezimpawu ezihlobene nemizwa ezihambisana ne-PMS.

        5. Izithasiselo kanye namavithamini

        Ezinye izithasiselo kanye namavithamini afundwe yinhloso yawo engaba khona ekuphatheni izimpawu ze-PMS. Lokhu kufaka phakathi:

        • calcium: I-calcium yokudla eyanele ingasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ezihlobene nemizwa. Cabanga ukudla ukudla okucebile kwe-calcium noma ukuthatha izithasiselo ngemuva kokubonisana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Kubalulekile ukulandela umthamo onconyiwe. . Ukwehla kwe-Heat Therapy

          Ukufaka ukushisa esiswini esingezansi noma emuva kunganikeza impumuzo kusuka ekunciphiseni kokuya esikhathini nokungaphatheki kahle. Sebenzisa i-Heating Pad, ibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo, noma ugeze ngokufudumele ukumane uphumule izicubu futhi unciphise izinhlungu.

          7. Ukuqwashisa okunengqondo kanye ne-pardayling

          Ukuzijwayeza ukuqwashisa ngengqondo kanye ne-journaling kungakusiza ukuthi uthole imininingwane ngemizwa yakho futhi uqonde kangcono izimpawu zakho ze-PMS. Ingasebenza futhi njengendawo yokukhipha imizwa yakho nokunciphisa ukucindezela.

          8. Imikhuba yokuphila okusekelayo

          Ukuthola imikhuba yokuphila okusekelayo kungaba nomthelela enhlalakahleni yonke futhi kusize ukuphatha izimpawu ze-PMS. Le mikhuba ifaka:

          • Gcina isheduli yokulala ejwayelekile futhi uqinisekise ukulala okujwayelekile. Wena injabulo nokuphumula.
          • Funa ukusekelwa komphakathi kusuka kubangane, umndeni, noma amaqembu okusekelana.

            Wonke umuntu uhlukile, nokuthi yini esebenza umuntu oyedwa kungenzeka angasebenzi enye. Uma uhlangabezana nezimpawu ze-PMS ezinzima noma eziwonakele kakhulu ezithinta kakhulu ikhwalithi yempilo yakho, kubalulekile ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole uhlelo lokuhlola oluphelele nokwelashwa okwenziwe ngezifiso.

            ekuphelweni, ukuguqulwa kwendlela yokudla, Amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela, kanye nezithasiselo zamakhambi zingasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS ngokwemvelo. Kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho, uvivinye izindlela ezahlukahlukene, futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuholwa nokusekelwa. Ngendlela ephelele, ungathola impumuzo futhi uthuthukise inhlala-kahle yakho yonke ngesikhathi se-Premion.

data.heading: Yikuphi ukudla okufanele ugweme i-PMS?
data.title: Gwema ukudla kwe-PMS
data.body:
Ukudla ongakugwema ngesikhathi se-PMS

syndrome (PMS) kungadala izinhlobo zezimpawu ezingathandeki, nokwenza ushintsho lokudla kungasiza ukunciphisa okuthile kokungaphatheki kahle. Ngenkathi kungekho ukudla okuqondile okubangela ubumbangi noma ukwelapha i-PMS, izinqumo ezithile zokudla zingase zibe zimbi kakhulu izimpawu. Nakhu okunye ukudla okufanele ukukubheka kugwema ngesikhathi se-PMS:

1. Ukudla okuphezulu kwe-sodium

Ukudla ngokweqile kwe-sodium kungaba nomthelela ekugcinweni kwamanzi, ukuqhakaza, nokuvuvukala, okuyizimpawu ezijwayelekile ezitholwa ngesikhathi se-PMS. Ukunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kwakho kokudla okuphezulu kwe-sodium kungasiza ukunciphisa lezi zimpawu. Gwema noma unciphise ukuphuza:

  • ukudla okulula futhi okuhlanganisiwe, ama-chip, ama-crackers
  • ama-broups ahlabelelayo
  • ukudla okusheshayo futhi icutshungulwe inyama, njenge-sausages ne-bacon
  • Ukudla okukhethwayo kanye nezikondla, njengokukhukhamba, okufana nokukhazimulayo, iminqumo, kanye no-soy sauce

    2. I-Caffeine i-caffeine

    i-caffeine ingaba nomthelela ekukhathazekeni, ukungacasuki, ububele bebele kanye nokuphazamiseka kokulala, okuyisibonakaliso esivamile esihlangabezana nazo ngesikhathi se-PMS. Cabanga ukunciphisa noma ukuqeda ukusetshenziswa kwakho kweziphuzo nokudla okuhlangene, njengokuthi:

      ul
    • Ikhofi kanye netiye >
    • eminye imishanguzo kanye nokuphindaphindwa kwaphezulu okuphikisayo

      3. Ukudla okushukela okuphezulu

      Ukudla ushukela ngokweqile kungaholela ekushayweni kwamandla, ukushintshwa kwemizwelo, nezimpawu ezikhulisiwe ze-PMS. Ukunciphisa le miphumela, khawulela ukudla kwakho kokudla okuphezulu kushukela ocwengekile, njengokuthi:

        ul>
      • iziphuzo ezinoshukela , amakhekhe, namakhekhe
      • ecubungule ibhulakufesi lasekuseni Ukudla okunamafutha nokuthosiwe

        Amafutha nokudla okuthosiwe kungaba nomthelela ekuvuvukeni nasekulahlekelweni ngesikhathi se-PMS. Ukunciphisa lezi zimpawu, zama ukukhawulela noma ukugwema:

          ul> ul> ul> ul> ul> ul I-LI>
        • Amanani okuncika kwenyama
        • Imikhiqizo enamafutha amaningi

          5. I-Alcohol

          Ukuphuza utshwala kungaphazamisa amaphethini okulala, ukushintshwa kwemizwa ye-experbate, futhi kube nomthelela ekuwohlokeni komzimba. Ngesikhathi se-PMS, kungakuhle ukukhawulela noma ukugwema utshwala, njengokuthi: ul>

        • ubhizi
        • Utshwala nama-cocktails

          6. Usawoti ngokweqile

          ngenkathi ukudla okulinganiselayo kudingekile ekusebenzeni komzimba, ukusetshenziswa usawoti ngokweqile kungaba nomthelela ekugcinweni kwe-fluid nokuqhakaza. Yiba nengqondo yenani likasawoti elisetshenziswe ekuphekeni nasekugwemeni ukwengeza usawoti owengeziwe ekudleni.

          . Ukudla okubangela

          Wonke umuntu angaba nokudla okuthize okubangela izimpawu zawo ze-PMS. Kungasiza ukukhomba nokugwema lokhu kudla. Gcina idayari yokudla ukulandelela izimpawu zakho bese unaka noma imaphi amaphethini wokungakhululeki noma izimpawu eziba zimbi ngemuva kokudla ukudla okuthile. Ukudla okuvamile okubangela kufaka phakathi:

          • Ukudla okulungiselelwe kakhulu ngezithasiselo zokufakelwa kanye nezindawo zokugcina
          • I-allergenergenergen athile kumuntu ngamunye

            8. Inyama ebomvu ngokweqile

            ngenkathi inyama ebesindayo ingaba ngumthombo obalulekile wamaprotheni nensimbi, ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwenyama ebomvu, izimpawu ezinamafutha, kungaba nezimpawu zokuvuvukala kanye nezimpawu ezibi kakhulu ze-PMS. Khetha imithombo yeprotheni ephansi njengenkukhu, inhlanzi, i-tofu, noma i-legumes njengezinye izindlela. wonke umuntu. Isipiliyoni somuntu ngamunye nge-PMS siyingqayizivele, futhi izimpendulo ngazinye ezifundweni zokudla zingahluka. Ukulalela umzimba wakho, ukukhomba ukudla okubandayo, nokwenza izinguquko ezenziwe ngezifiso kungasiza ekuphathweni kwezimpawu ze-PMS. Ukudla, ukudla okunamafutha nokuthosiwe, utshwala, usawoti ngokweqile, ukudla okubangela, nenyama ebomvu ngokweqile. Ngokwamukela ukudla okulinganiselayo nokunempilo, ehambisana nezidingo zakho ezithile, ungasekela inhlala-kahle yakho futhi kungenzeka anciphise ukungaphatheki kahle okuhambisana ne-PMS.

data.heading: Ngingayithuthukisa kanjani imizwa yami ye-PMS?
data.title: Thuthukisa i-PMS Mood
data.body:
izindlela zokwenza ngcono imizwa ngesikhathi se-PMS > Ngenkathi lezi zimpawu zingahlukahluka kuye kumuntu, kunamasu amaningana ongazama ukuthuthukisa imizwa yakho futhi uphathe izinguquko ezingokomzwelo ngesikhathi se-PMS. Nazi ezinye izindlela ezisebenzayo:

1. Gcina ukudla okulinganiselayo

Ukudla kudlala indima ebalulekile ekuqondisweni kwemizwa, futhi ukwamukela uhlelo olulinganiselayo nolunempilo kungasiza ukuthuthukisa imizwa yakho ngesikhathi se-PMS. Cabanga ukufaka izincomo zokudla ezilandelayo: > Ukukhuphuka kwezithelo nemifino: lokhu kudla kucebile ngamavithamini, amaminerali, nama-antioxidants, angasiza ekunciphiseni ukuvuvukala kanye nokuxhasa inhlala-nhlala kahle. , futhi ama-walnuts ayimithombo emihle yama-Omega-3 Fatty Acids, angasiza ukuthuthukisa imizwa futhi anciphise izimpawu zokudangala. Ukuphuza amanzi anele: / Li>

  • umkhawulo noma uvikele i-caffeine notshwala: Kokubili i-caffeine notshwala kungaphazamisa amaphethini okulala futhi kufaka isandla ekushintsheni kwemizwelo. Cabanga ukunciphisa noma ukuqeda ukusetshenziswa kwazo ngesikhathi se-Preminstrual.

    2. Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo

    Ukuzibandakanya kokuzivocavoca umzimba okujwayelekile kunezinzuzo eziningi zokuthuthuka kwemizwa ngesikhathi se-PMS. Ukuzivocavoca kusiza ukukhulula ama-endorphin, aziwa ngokuthi ama-hormone "azwakalayo", futhi kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu zokukhathazeka nokudangala. Inhloso okungenani imizuzu engama-30 yokuvivinya umzimba ngokulinganisela ezinsukwini eziningi zeviki. Imisebenzi efana nokuhamba, ukugijima, ukuhamba ngebhayisikile, ukudansa, noma i-yoga ingasebenza ekukhuliseni imizwa yakho.

    3. Thola ukulala ngokwanele

    Ukuthola ukulala okwanele kubalulekile ekuthambekeni okungokomzwelo futhi kungathinta kakhulu imizwa yakho ngesikhathi se-PMS. Ihlose amahora angama-7-9 wokulala kwekhwalithi ubusuku ngabunye. Sungula inqubo yokuphumula yokuphumula bese udala indawo enobungane ngokugcina igumbi lakho lokulala lipholile, limnyama futhi lithule. Gwema imisebenzi evuselelayo, njengokusebenzisa amadivaysi kagesi, eduze nesikhathi sokulala, njengoba kungaphazamisa ikhwalithi yokulala.

    4. Amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela

    Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona kungandisa izimpawu ze-PMS futhi kuthinte kabi imizwa yakho. Ukuqalisa ukusebenzisa amasu okunciphisa ukucindezela kungasiza ukunciphisa usizi olungokomzwelo. Cabanga ukufaka imikhuba elandelayo kwinqubo yakho yansuku zonke:

    • Ukuzindla: Ukuzivocavoca Ukuzindla kungasiza ukuzola ingqondo, ukunciphisa ukucindezela,
    • Ukuphefumula okujulile Ukuzivocavoca: Ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula kungasebenza kusebenze impendulo yokuphumula yomzimba futhi kukhuthaze umuzwa wokuzola.
    • I-yoga noma i-tai chi futhi uthuthukise imizwa. : Ukubamba iqhaza emisebenzini oyithandayo, njengokupenda, ukudlala insimbi yomculo, noma ingadi, kungasiza ukuphazamisa ingqondo yakho emiqondweni engemihle futhi kuthuthukise isimo esihle.

      5. Funa ukwesekwa kwezenhlalo

      ukuxhumana nabangane abasekelayo, amalungu omndeni, noma amaqembu okusekela anganikeza umuzwa wokududuza nokuqonda ngesikhathi se-PMS. Ukwabelana ngolwazi lwakho, imizwa, nokukhathazeka kwakho nabantu abathembekile kungasiza ukunciphisa imizwa yokuhlukaniswa futhi kuthuthukise isimo sakho somoya. Ngokwengeziwe, ukubamba iqhaza emisebenzini yezenhlalo kanye nokuzibandakanya ekuxhumaneni okuhle komphakathi kungakhulisa inhlala-kahle yakho yonke.

      6. Ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela kwe-

      ngesikhathi se-PMS, kubalulekile ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela nokuzibandakanya emisebenzini ekhuthaza ukuphumula nokuzikhulisa. Cabanga ngalezi zindlela zokuzinakekela ezilandelayo:

      • Thatha amabhavu afudumele
      • Ukuzibandakanya e-Aromatherapy: Amafutha abalulekile, anjenge-lavender noma i-chamomile, angaba nomphumela opholile kwimood. Zisebenzise nge-diffuser, noma engeza amaconsi ambalwa kumanzi akho okugeza. I-LI>
      • Ukuzibandakanya kokuzilibazisa noma imisebenzi oyithandayo: Ukuthatha isikhathi ukuthola izinto ezikulethela injabulo, noma ngabe kufundwa umculo, noma ukuzilolonga, kungakusiza ukukhulisa imizwa yakho futhi kunikeze umuzwa wokugcwaliseka.
      • Prakthiza iziqinisekiso ezinhle: Phinda iziqinisekiso ezinhle ngokwakho ukulwa nemicabango emibi futhi uhlakulele ingqondo enhle.

        Amanye amakhambi asetshenziselwa ngokwesiko ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-PMS futhi athuthukise imizwa. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuzama noma yimiphi amakhambi, ikakhulukazi uma unazo izimo zezempilo ezingaphansi noma uthathe neminye imithi. Izibonelo zamakhambi ezingasiza ukuthuthukisa imizwa ngesikhathi se-PMS zifaka phakathi: UJohn wort (hypericum perforatum): Kusetshenziselwe ukudambisa izimpawu zokudangala futhi kukhuthaze inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo.

        Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ngenkathi lezi zindlela zemvelo zingasiza kubantu abaningi, kungenzeka zingasebenzi wonke umuntu. Uma izimpawu zakho zemizwa ngesikhathi se-PM zinzima noma zithinta kakhulu ukusebenza kwakho kwansuku zonke, kubalulekile ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelapha eziqeqeshiwe. Amasu wokunciphisa, afuna ukusekelwa kwezenhlalo, ebeka phambili ukuzinakekela, futhi acubungule amakhambi, ungathuthukisa imizwa yakho ngesikhathi se-PMS. Khumbula ukuthi isipiliyoni somuntu ngamunye nge-PMS sihlukile, futhi kungathatha isikhathi nokuhlola ukuthola amasu asebenza kakhulu kuwe.

data.heading: Ngingalinganisa kanjani ama-hormone ami ama-PMS?
data.title: I-Balance Hormones ye-PMS
data.body:
izindlela zokulinganisa ama-hormone we-PMS

i-tyrensstrual syndrome (PMS) ivame ukuhlotshaniswa nokungalingani kwe-hormonal, okungaba nomthelela ezinsizini ezingathandeki ezitholwe ngalesi sikhathi. Ngenkathi ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal kuyingxenye yemvelo yomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, kunamasu amaningana ongazama ukukhuthaza ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi anciphise ubukhulu bezimpawu ze-PMS. Nazi ezinye izindlela ezisebenzayo:

1. Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo

Ukudla kudlala indima ebalulekile emthethweni we-hormone, futhi ukwamukela uhlelo lokudla olulinganiselayo kungasekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal ngesikhathi se-PMS. Cabanga ukufaka izincomo zokudla ezilandelayo:

  • Sebenzisa amaprotheni anele: Amaprotheni aqakathekile ukukhiqizwa kwe-hormone kanye nebhalansi. Faka imithombo ethambile yamaprotheni, njengezinkukhu, inhlanzi, ama-legumes, ne-tofu, ekudleni kwakho. ekudleni kwakho. Lawa mafutha ayadingeka ekuhlanganiseni kwama-hormone.
  • Faka phakathi ukudla okucebile kwe-fiber: i-fiber isiza ukuqeda ama-hormone amaningi emzimbeni. Sebenzisa izithelo eziningi, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, kanye nama-legumes ukuqinisekisa ukuthathwa kwe-fiber akwanele. Khetha ukudla okuphelele, okungavinjelwe ngangokunokwenzeka.
  • Phatha amazinga kashukela egazini: Ukungalingani kukashukela wegazi kungaba nomthelela ekuguquguqukineni kwe-hormonal. Yidla ukudla okujwayelekile kanye nokudla okulula okubandakanya inhlanganisela yamaprotheni, amafutha anempilo, nama-carbohydrate ayinkimbinkimbi ukuqinisa amazinga kashukela wegazi.

    Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwama-hormone kanye nezimpawu ze-PMS. Ukufaka amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela kungasiza ukukhuthaza ukulingana kwe-hormonal. Cabanga ngamasu alandelayo:

    • Prakthiza izindlela zokuphumula: ukuzibandakanya emisebenzini efana nokuzindla, izivivinyo zokuphefumula ezijulile, noma i-yoga ukwenza kusebenze amazinga okuphumula emzimbeni futhi anciphise amazinga okucindezela.
    • Bamba iqhaza njalo ngokomzimba: ukuzivocavoca kusiza ukunciphisa ukucindezeleka futhi kukhuthaze ukukhishwa kwama-endorphin, ezaziwa ngokuthi ama-hormone "azwakele amahle. Ukulala kahle . Ukuntuleka kokulala kungakuthinta kabi ukukhiqizwa kwe-hormone kanye nebhalansi.
    • Sungula imingcele enempilo: funda ukwenqaba ukuzibophezela ngokweqile futhi ubeke phambili ukuzinakekela ngokweqile. Ukubeka imingcele kungasiza ukunciphisa amazinga okucindezela futhi kukhuthaze ibhalansi ye-hormonal.
    • Funa ukusekelwa: Khuluma nabangane, umndeni, noma umeluleki ngezinto ezikhathazayo nezingcindezi zakho. Ukwabelana ngemizwa yakho nokuthola kwakho kungasiza ukudambisa ukucindezela nokukhuthaza inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo.

      . Sekela impilo yesibindi

      isibindi sidlala indima ebalulekile ku-hormone metabolism nokuqedwa kwe-metabolism nokuqedwa. Ukusekela impilo yesibindi kungasiza ukukhuthaza ibhalansi ye-hormonal. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

      • Hlala i-hydrate: Ukuphuza amanzi anele kusiza ukusekela ubuthi bese kuthuthukisa ukuqedwa kobuthi bomzimba kanye nokukhawulela ukunciphisa utshwala Ukudla utshwala kungaphazamisa isibindi futhi kuphazamise i-hormone metabolism. Khawula ukusetshenziswa kotshwala noma ukuqeda ngokuphelele. Li>
      • Cabanga ngezithasiselo ze-herbal: amakhambi athile, njenge-thistle yobisi kanye ne-dandelion Root, ngokwesiko asetshenziselwa ukusekela umsebenzi wesibindi. Xhumana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuthatha noma yiziphi izithasiselo ze-herbal.

        4. Sekela i-gut Health

        amathumbu nama-hormone anobuhlobo obunzima, futhi ukusekela impilo ye-gut kungasiza ngokungaqondile ekulinganiseni kwe-hormonal. Cabanga ngamasu alandelayo:

        • faka ukudla okunothile kwe-probiotic: ama-probiotic, atholakala ekudleni okunjenge-yogurt, ne-kimchi, kungasiza ukusekela i-microbiome enempilo.
        • Sebenzisa ukudla kwe-prebiotic: ukudla okunothile okucebile, okufana no-anyanisi, ugarliki, ubhanana kanye ne-asparagus, gwema noma unciphise ukudla okuzuzisayo: ukuphefumula okuphezulu ngoshukela, okusanhlamvu okucwengekileyo, futhi Amafutha angenampilo angafaka isandla ekuvuvukeni, okungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwama-hormone. Khetha ukudla okuphelele, okungafakwanga kabusha futhi kunciphise ukukhetha kokudla okuvuvukala.

          5. Cabanga ngamakhambi ama-herbal

          Amanye amakhambi asetshenziselwa ngokwesiko ukukhuthaza ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi adambise izimpawu ze-PMS. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuzama noma yimiphi amakhambi, ikakhulukazi uma unazo izimo zezempilo ezingaphansi noma uthathe neminye imithi. Izibonelo zamakhambi ezingasiza ukulinganisa ama-hormone ngesikhathi se-PMS zibandakanya:

Uma izimpawu zakho ze-hormonal nezimpawu ze-PMS zinzima noma zithinta kakhulu ukusebenza kwakho kwansuku zonke, kubalulekile ukufuna izeluleko zokwelashwa eziqeqeshiwe. Futhi uma ucubungula amakhambi amakhambi, ungakhuthaza ibhalansi ye-hormonal ye-PMS. data.heading: Yini i-PMS engajwayelekile?
data.title: I-PMS engajwayelekile
data.body:
I-

Ukuqonda okungekho emthethweni kwe-PMS: Lapho izimpawu ze-PMS ziba nzima € Ngenkathi i-PMS iyisipiliyoni esivamile kubantu abaningi ukuya esikhathini, kunezimo lapho izimpawu ze-PMS ziba zimbi kakhulu futhi zithinta kakhulu impilo yansuku zonke. Lokhu kuvame ukubizwa ngokuthi yi-PMS engajwayelekile noma ye-dysphoric disorder (PMDD). Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuthi yini eyakha ama-PMS angajwayelekile, izimpawu zayo, izimbangela ezingaba khona, nezinketho zokwelashwa ezikhona. kuyindlela enzima kakhulu ye-premenstrual syndrome ethinta iphesenti elincane labantu. I-PMDD ibonakala ngezimpawu ezijulile zemizwa nezingokomzimba ezingaphazamisa kakhulu ukusebenza kwansuku zonke, ubudlelwano, kanye nenhlala-kahle yonke. Ngenkathi imbangela eqondile ye-PMDD ayiqondakali ngokuphelele, izinguquko ze-hormonal, amazinga e-serotonin, kanye nokuthambekela komuntu ngamunye kukholelwa ukuthi kudlala indima.

h3>

I-PMS engajwayelekile noma i-PMDD iyafana naleyo ye-PMS kepha inzima kakhulu ekujuleni nasesikhathini. Izimpawu ezijwayelekile zifaka phakathi:

    izimbangela ze-PMS engajwayelekile noma i-PMDD

    Ukuxilongwa kanye nokwelashwa kwe-PMS engajwayelekile noma i-PMDD

    uma usola ukuthi ungaba ne-PMS engajwayelekile noma i-PMDD, kubalulekile ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo, ukwelashwa okufanele. Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwezempilo ngokuvamile bazohlola izimpawu zakho, umlando wezokwelapha, kanye namaphethini wokuya esikhathini ukwenza ukuxilongwa. I-

  • Ukwelashwa kwe-Talk-Berapy: Ukwelashwa okuqondayo (i-CBT), ukwelashwa okuphakathi nendawo (i-IPT), nezinye izindlela zokwelashwa ze-Talmary kungasebenza ekusizeni abantu abakhulise amasu, ukuphatha inhlala-cindezelo.
  • Enye indlela yokwelashwa: Abanye abantu bathola impumuzo kusuka ezimpawuni ngokusebenzisa ezinye izindlela zokwelapha, njenge-acupuncture, yoga, noma amakhambi. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuzama lezi zindlela. Uchwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uzosebenza nawe ukuthuthukisa uhlelo lokwelashwa oluqondene nomuntu obhekana nezimpawu zakho nokukhathazeka kwakho.

    lapho ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelapha

    uma usola ukuthi izimpawu zakho ze-PMS zinzima kakhulu kunokujwayelekile noma kunomthelela omkhulu empilweni yakho yansuku zonke, kubalulekile ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa. Kufanele uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma:

    • Izimpawu zakho zinzima futhi ziphazamisa imisebenzi yakho yansuku zonke noma ubudlelwano.

    • Izimpawu zakho azithuthukisi ngezinyathelo zokuzinakekela. . I-Abnoral PMS noma i-PMDD iyindlela enzima kakhulu ye-Preminstrual Syndrome engathinta kakhulu ukuba ngumthombo womuntu kanye nokusebenza kwansuku zonke. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela izimpawu ze-PMS engajwayelekile futhi ufune izeluleko zezokwelashwa uma zinzima noma ziphazamisa. Ngokuxilongwa kanye nokwelashwa okufanele, abantu abane-PMS engajwayelekile noma i-PMDD bangathola impumuzo futhi baphinde balawule izimpilo zabo. Khumbula, akudingeki ukuthi uhlupheke ngokuthula - kukhona ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo abangakusiza ukuphatha futhi ukunqoba izinselelo ze-PMS engajwayelekile noma i-PMDD.

data.heading: Ngabe i-PMS iguqule njalo?
data.title: Ukushintsha kwe-PMS
data.body: <H2> Ingabe izimpawu ze-PMS zingashintshana njalo? </ h2 >> Isipiliyoni se-PMS singahluka kusuka kumuntu uye kumuntu futhi ngisho nomjikelezo owodwa wokuya esikhathini komunye. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuthi izimpawu ze-PM zingashintsha nesikhathi ngasinye, izici ezingaba nomthelela kulokhu kuhlukahluka, nokuthi ungakuphatha kanjani ukuguquguquka kwezimpawu ze-PMS. <H3> < I-P> Akujwayelekile ukuthi izimpawu ze-PMS ziguqukele kumjikelezo owodwa wokuya esikhathini komunye. Abanye abantu bangathola izimpawu ezingaguquki ngesikhathi ngasinye, kanti abanye bangase babone ukuhlukahluka ngobukhulu, ubude besikhathi, noma izinhlobo zezimpawu abazithola. Lokhu kuguquguquka kungathonywa yizici eziningana, kufaka phakathi: </ p> <ul> <li> Izimpawu ze-hormonal: Izimpawu ze-PMS zihlotshaniswa ngokuyinhloko nezinguquko ze-hormonal ezenzeka ngesikhathi somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Amazinga we-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone akhuphuke futhi awe kuwo wonke umjikelezo, futhi lokhu kuguquguquka kungathinta ubukhulu kanye nemvelo yezimpawu ze-PMS. Amazinga wokuxineka: Ukuxineka kungaba nethonya elibalulekile emthethweni we-hormone kanye nenhlala-kahle . Amazinga okuxineka aphezulu angabeka izimpawu ze-PMS, kuyilapho amazinga aphansi okucindezelwa angahle aholele ezimpawuni ezimbi noma ngisho nokukhululeka kwezimpawu. Izinto ezifana nokudla, izici, amaphethini okulala, futhi impilo yonke ingathinta ibhalansi ye-hormone futhi ukubonakaliswa kwezimpawu ze-PMS. Izinguquko kulezi zici zokuphila ezivela kumjikelezo owodwa wokuya esikhathini ziye komunye umuntu zingafaka isandla ekuhlukahlukani kwezimpawu ze-PMS Hurity. </ Li> <li> Umehluko ngamunye: Umzimba womuntu ngamunye ne-hormonal ahlukile. Abanye abantu bangazwela kakhulu ekushintshashintsheni kwe-hormonal, kanti abanye bangathola izimpawu ze-PMS ezingaguquki. Izici zofuzo, izimo zezempilo ezingaphansi, futhi ibhalansi ye-hormonal yonke ingaba negalelo lokungezwani ngakunye ezintweni ze-PMS. </ Li> </ ul> <h3 Izimpawu ze-PMS, kungasiza ukulandelela umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi uqophe noma yiziphi izimpawu ezihambisanayo. Ukugcina i-realry yedayari noma usebenzisa izinhlelo zokusebenza ze-smartphone ezenzelwe ukulandelela umjikelezo kungasiza ekuboneni amaphethini nezitayela ezikuphawu. Ngokulandela izimpawu zakho ngemijikelezo eminingana, ungabona izingqikithi ezijwayelekile noma amaphethini aphindaphindekayo angakusiza ukuthi ulindele futhi uphathe izimpawu zakho ze-PMS ngempumelelo. </ P> komunye, kanti abanye bangabona ukwehluka okukhulu. Kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi okuhlangenwe nakho kokubili kuyasebenza, futhi kunobubanzi obujwayelekile bokujwayelekile uma kukhulunywa ngokushintshashintshashintshashintsha kwezimpawu ze-PMS. </ P> <h3> Ukuphatha ukuguquguquka okuguqukayo Kuzimpawu zakho ze-PMS kusuka esikhathini esisodwa kuya kwesinye, kunamasu amaningana ongazama ukuphatha nokunciphisa izindlela zokuphila: Ukutholwa kwendlela yokuphila enempilo kungaba nomthelela omuhle emthonjeni wakho wonke -Bea futhi kungasiza ukulawula amazinga we-hormone. Gxila ekulondolozeni ukudla okulinganiselayo, ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni ngokomzimba njalo, nokuqinisekisa ukulala okwanele. </ Li> <li> ukubekezelela imisebenzi yokuzinakekela -Ukugcina. Bamba iqhaza emisebenzini efana nokugeza okufudumele, ukwenza ukucabanga noma ukuzindla, ukuphepha, noma ukubamba iqhaza kokuzilibazisa okukulethela injabulo. </ Li> , i-calcium, i-magnesium, noma amakhambi amakhambi afana namafutha e-primrose kusihlwa. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma yiziphi izithasiselo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ziphephile futhi zilungele izidingo zakho zomuntu ngamunye. Uma izimpawu zakho ze-PMS zithinta kakhulu ikhwalithi yempilo yakho Noma uma unobunzima bokuziphatha ngokwakho, kungakuhle ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Banganikeza eminye imihlahlandlela, batuse izinketho ezifanele zokwelashwa, noma bahlole izinto ezingaphansi ezingaba nomthelela ekuhlukahlukani kwezimpawu zakho. umjikelezo komunye. Ukushintshashintsha kwezimpawu ze-PMS kuthonywa ushintsho lwe-hormonal, amazinga okuxineka, izici zendlela yokuphila, kanye nokwehluka komuntu ngamunye. Ukulandelela izimpawu zakho futhi uqaphele amaphethini kungakusiza ulindele futhi uphathe izimpawu zakho ze-PMS ngempumelelo. Khumbula ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela, gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo, futhi ufune izeluleko zezokwelashwa uma izimpawu zakho zithinta kakhulu impilo yakho yansuku zonke noma uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngezimpawu zakho ze-PMS. Ngamasu afanele kanye nokusekelwa, ungazulazula ekuhlukani kwezimpawu ze-PMS futhi uthole izindlela zokudambisa ukungaphatheki kahle futhi uthuthukise inhlala-kahle yakho yonke. </ P>

data.heading: Kungani i-PMS yami ingaphezu kwesikhathi?
data.title: Pms ngaphandle kwesikhathi
data.body:
I-

Ukuqonda i-PMS kanye nokubambezeleka kokuya esikhathini

I-Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) isho inhlanganisela yezimpawu zezimpawu zomzimba, ezingokomzwelo, nokuziphatha ezenzeka ezinsukwini noma emavikini aholela esikhathini. Ngenkathi i-PM iyisimo esivamile sokuba abantu abaningi esikhathini esithile, kunezimo lapho izimpawu ze-PMS zincipha, kepha ukuya esikhathini akuqali njengoba bekulindelekile. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola izizathu ezingaba khona kungani kungenzeka ukuthi ziphele izimpawu ze-PMS, kepha isikhathi sakho asikaqali.

Izizathu zokubambezeleka kokuya esikhathini

Isikhathi sekwephuzile, kungaba nezimbangela eziyisisekelo ezahlukahlukene. Ezinye zezizathu ezingaba khona kungani isikhathi sakho sibambezelekile yize ukuphela kwezimpawu zakho ze-PMS kufaka phakathi: Ukukhulelwa: Uma usebenza ngocansi futhi ithuba lokukhulelwa, isikhathi esiphuthumayo singaba uphawu lokuqala. Ukukhulelwa kubangela ukuthi izinguquko ze-hormonal ezingaholela ekungabikho kokuya esikhathini. . >

  • Imithi noma imigomo yezokwelapha: Imithi ethile, njengezindlela zokuvimbela inzalo ze-hormonal noma izinhlobo ezithile ze-antidepressants, zingathinta umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Ngokwengeziwe, izimo ezithile zezokwelapha, njenge-endometriosis noma i-uterine fibroids, nazo zingadala izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni. ukuya esikhathini. Ngalesi sikhathi, amazinga we-hormone aguquguquka, aholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni. ukunciphisa uma kuqala ukuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi izimpawu ze-PMS kanye nokuqala kokuya esikhathini akuhlali kuqondaniswe kahle. Ukushintshashintsha kwama-hormonal okubhekele izimpawu ze-PM ngesinye isikhathi kungavela ngaphandle kokuqala kokuqala kokuya esikhathini ngokushesha.

    kwezinye izimo, izinguquko ze-hormonal ezibangela izimpawu ze-PMS zinganciphisa okwesikhashana. Kodwa-ke, ukuya esikhathini kungenzeka kungaqala ngokushesha ngenxa yezici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi lezo ezishiwo ngenhla. Akujwayelekile ukuthi ukubambezeleka kwezinsuku ezimbalwa noma isonto okufanele kwenziwe phakathi kwesisombululo sezimpawu ze-PMS kanye nokuqala kokuya esikhathini. Uma ubonile ukuphela kwezimpawu zakho ze-PMS, kepha isikhathi sakho asiqali njengoba bekulindelekile, nazi ezinye izinyathelo ongazithatha:

      ul>
    • Thatha isivivinyo sokukhulelwa: Uma kukhona ithuba lokukhulelwa , Ukuthatha ukuhlolwa kokukhulelwa kungasiza ekuboneni ukuthi imbangela yesikhathi sakho esibambezelekile. Uma ubona noma yiluphi oluphathelene nezimpawu noma isikhathi sakho siqhubeka sibambezeleka, kungcono ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela. Ukuzibandakanya amasu okuphumula, ukuzivocavoca njalo, ukudla ukudla okulinganiselayo, nokuqinisekisa ukulala okwanele kungasekela ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal nokuvama ukuya esikhathini. Unokukhathazeka ngomjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, kunconyelwa ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa. Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bangahlola isimo sakho esithile, benze izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi bahlinzeke ukuholwa okufanele nokwelashwa uma kudingeka.

      Isiphetho

      Ukuqala kokuya esikhathini kungaba ukwenzeka okuvamile kwabanye abantu. Ngenkathi izimpawu ze-PMS zivame ukuhlotshaniswa nokuholwa esikhathini, isikhathi sokuya esikhathini singathonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ukungalingani kwama-hormonal, ukucindezelwa, izici zendlela yokuphila, nemithi yezokwelapha. Uma isikhathi sakho sibambezeleka naphezu kwesisombululo sezimpawu ze-PMS, kubalulekile ukucabanga ngezizathu ezingaphansi ezinjengokukhulelwa, ukungalingani kwama-hormonal, noma ezinye izinto. Ukuqapha izimpawu zakho, ukuphatha izingcindezi nezici zendlela yokuphila, futhi ufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa uma kudingeka kungakusiza uzulazule noma yikuphi ukukhathazeka maqondana nokuya esikhathini. Khumbula, umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ngamunye ungahluka, futhi kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma unezinkinga eziqhubekayo noma imibuzo.

data.heading: Uyini unyaka ofanele wokuqala ukuya ocansini?
data.title: Ubudala bobulili
data.body:
iminyaka efanelekile ukuqala ukuya ocansini

Ukunquma iminyaka efanelekile yokusebenza ngokocansi kuyinkinga eyinkimbinkimbi ehlukahluka emasikweni ahlukene, imiphakathi kanye nezinhlaka zezomthetho. Kubalulekile ukucubungula izinto eziningi, kufaka phakathi ukulungela ngokomzimba nangokomzwelo, imvume engokomthetho, kanye nokufinyelela olwazini olunembile mayelana nempilo yezocansi kanye nokuvimbela inzalo.

1. Izici zemvelo nezomzimba

Ukuqala kokuthomba kuphawula ushintsho olubalulekile ekukhuleni ngokomzimba komuntu. Ukuthomba kuyinqubo lapho izitho zobulili ezivuthiwe, kanye nezimpawu zobulili zesibili. Kodwa-ke, iminyaka yokuthomba ingahluka phakathi kwabantu, kwenzeka phakathi kweminyaka engu-8 no-14 yamantombazane nangu-9 no-15 kubafana. Ukuvuthwa okungokoqobo kuphela akubonisi ukulungela okungokomzwelo noma amandla okubandakanya ebudlelwaneni bezocansi obuphilile novumelanayo.

2. Ukulungela ngokomzwelo nangokwengqondo

Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni kwezocansi kudinga ukuvuthwa okungokomzwelo, amakhono okuxhumana, kanye nekhono lokwenza izinqumo ezinolwazi. Ukulungela okungokomzwelo kuyahlukahluka kubantu ngamunye futhi kuthonywe yizinto ezifana nokuzazi, ukuzithemba, ukuqonda kwemingcele, kanye nekhono lokuphatha imiphumela engaba khona yezenzo zocansi. Kubalulekile ukuba nezingxoxo ezivulekile ngemizwa, ubudlelwano, kanye nezibopho eziza nokusebenza ngokocansi.

3. Iminyaka yezomthetho yemvume

Imithetho ephathelene nobudala bemvume ehlukile emhlabeni jikelele, futhi kubalulekile ukuqonda nokulandela imithetho yombuso wakho othile. Iminyaka yemvume iyiminyaka yobudala obuncane umuntu obhekwa ngayo ekwazi ukuhlinzeka ngemvume enolwazi yokuzibandakanya ecansini. Yenzelwe ukuvikela abantu ngakunye ekuxhashazweni noma ekulimaleni futhi bayehluka kakhulu emhlabeni jikelele. Kwamanye amazwe, iminyaka yemvume iphansi njenge-14, kanti kwezinye, ingaba ngo-16, 18, noma ngaphezulu. Zijwayeze ngemithetho nemithethonqubo endaweni yangakini ukuze uqinisekise ukuhambisana.

4. Ukutholakala kolwazi nezinsizakusebenza

Ngaphambi kokusebenza ngokocansi, kubalulekile ukuze uthole imininingwane efanelekile ngempilo yezocansi, ukuvimbela inzalo, izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI), kanye nemvume. Imfundo ephelele yocansi, enikezwe ezikoleni, izinhlelo zomphakathi, noma ngochwepheshe bezempilo, ingahlomisa abantu ngolwazi namakhono adingekayo ukwenza izinqumo ezinolwazi ngempilo yabo yezocansi. Ukuqonda izingozi ezingaba khona nokuthi ungazingcolisa kanjani kubalulekile ukuze ulondoloze inhlala-kahle emzimbeni nengokomzwelo.

5. Amanani akho kanye namasiko amasiko

Amanani womuntu siqu, izinkolelo, izinkambiso zamasiko adlala indima enkulu ekutholeni lapho umuntu noma umphakathi ebona kufanelekile ukwenza umsebenzi wezocansi. Amasiko ahlukene nemiphakathi inokubukwa okuhlukahlukene ngocansi ngaphambi komshado kanye nobudala obuhle bokuqala ubudlelwano bezocansi. Le mibono ingathonya inqubo yokwenza izinqumo yomuntu ngamunye futhi ilolonge ukuqonda kwabo izinkambiso zobulili. Kubalulekile ukuhlonipha izinqumo zomuntu siqu ngenkathi ucubungula izinkambiso zenhlalo kanye nokulindelwe.

Ngamafuphi, kunqunywa iminyaka efanelekile sokuqala ukuya ocansini yinto eyinkimbinkimbi ethonywe yizici eziningi. I-biological, engokomzwelo, ezomthetho, yezemfundo, kanye nezici zamasiko zonke zidlala indima. Kubalulekile ukucubungula ukulungela komuntu ngokomzimba nangokomzwelo, imvume engokomthetho, ukufinyelela imininingwane efanele, namanani akho. Ukuzibandakanya ezingxoxweni ezivulekile nezithembekile ngocansi, ubudlelwano

data.heading: Ngazi kanjani ukuthi ngikulungele ukuya ocansini?
data.title: Ilungele ukuya ocansini
data.body:
Unganquma kanjani ukuthi usukulungele yini ukuya ocansini

Ukwenza isinqumo sokubandakanyeka kwezocansi kungokomuntu siqu futhi kufanele kususelwe ekucabangeni ngokucophelela kwezinto ezahlukahlukene. Nazi ezinye izici ezibalulekile zokuhlola ukuze unqume ukuthi usukulungele yini ukuya ocansini:

1. Ukulungela ngokomzwelo

Ukulungela okungokomzwelo kudlala indima ebalulekile ekunqumeni uma ulungele ubuhlobo bocansi. Zibuze imibuzo elandelayo:

  • ingabe ukhululekile ngomzimba wakho kanye nezocansi?
  • Ngabe uzizwa ulungele ukuxhumana nezidingo zakho, izifiso, nemingcele kumlingani wakho?
  • Ngabe uzimisele ukuphatha imiphumela engaba khona engokomzwelo engavela ebudlelwaneni bezocansi?
  • Ngabe uyamethemba umlingani wakho futhi uzizwe unezinga elijulile lokuxhumana okungokomzwelo?

    Ukucabanga ngale mibuzo nokuhlola isimo sakho semizwa kungasiza ukukala ukulungela kwakho ngocansi.

    2. Ulwazi nolwazi

    Ukuba nemininingwane enembile mayelana nempilo yezocansi, ukuvimbela inzalo kanye nezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) kubalulekile. Cabanga ngokulandelayo:

    • Ngabe unakho ukuqonda okuhle kokuthi ungazivikela kanjani wena nomlingani wakho ekukhulelweni okungahlosiwe kanye nama-STI?
    • Ngabe uthole imfundo ephelele yocansi noma wafuna imininingwane ethembekile evela emithonjeni edumile?
    • Uyazi izindlela zokuvimbela inzalo ezitholakalayo nokusetshenziswa kwazo?

      Njengoba unolwazi oluhle ngempilo yezocansi eqinisekisa ukuthi ungenza izinqumo ezinomthwalo wemfanelo futhi ezinolwazi mayelana nokusebenza kwakho ngocansi.

      3. Imvume nezokuxhumana

      Imvume iyisisekelo esiyisisekelo sanoma ibuphi ubudlelwano bezocansi. Kubalulekile ukuqonda nokuzijwayeza kukho konke ukusebenzisana ngokocansi. Cabanga ngokulandelayo:

      • Ngabe uyakuqonda ngokugcwele ukuthi ithini imvume nokuthi uyithola kanjani?
      • Ingabe ukhululekile ukukhulumisana nemingcele yakho nokuhlonipha imingcele yomlingani wakho?
      • Ngabe uzizwa uqiniseka ngekhono lakho lokusho ukuthi "cha" uma ungakulungele noma ukhululekile?
      • Ngabe uzimisele ukucela imvume futhi uqinisekise ukuxhumana okuqhubekayo kuyo yonke indawo yakho yocansi?

        Kubalulekile ukubeka phambili imvume nokuxhumana okuvulekile kunoma yibuphi ubudlelwano bezocansi.

        4. Ubuhlobo Buhlobo Dynamics

        Ukuhlola amandla wobudlelwano bakho kunganikeza ukuqonda ukuthi usukulungele yini ubuhlobo bocansi nomlingani wakho. Cabanga ngokulandelayo:

        • Ngabe uzizwa uvikelekile ngokomzwelo futhi uhlonishwa ebudlelwaneni bakho?
        • Uke wazakhela isisekelo sokwethembana, ukwethembeka, kanye nokuxhumana okuvulekile nomlingani wakho?
        • ngabe nobabili ekhasini elifanayo maqondana nokulindelwe nezifiso zobudlelwano?
        • uke waxoxa futhi wavumelana ngobunye lapho uhlanganyela ebudlelwaneni bezocansi?

          Amandla wobudlelwano obuhle anamandla abalulekile ukuthola okuhlangenwe nakho okuhle nokugcwalisa ngokobulili.

          5. Amanani nezinkolelo zomuntu siqu

          Cabanga ngamanani akho nezinkolelo zakho ezizungeze ubulili nobudlelwano. Zibuze okulandelayo:

          • Yenza amanani akho avumelana nesinqumo sakho sokuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni kwezocansi?
          • ingabe ukhululekile ngemiphumela engaba khona kanye nemiphumela yezocansi?
          • Ngabe ucabangele noma yiziphi izinkolelo zamasiko noma zenkolo ezingathonya isinqumo sakho?

            Ukuqonda amanani nezinkolelo zakho kunganikeza ukuholwa ekunqumeni uma usukulungele ubuhlobo bocansi.

            Ekuphetheni, ukunquma ukuthi usukulungele yini ukuya ocansini kuyinqubo yomuntu siqu ejulile. Ukuhlola ukulungela kwakho ngokomzwelo, ulwazi kanye nolwazi, amakhono okuxhumana, amandla obuhlobo, namanani akho angakusiza wenze isinqumo esinolwazi. Khumbula, kubalulekile ukubeka phambili inhlala-kahle yakho yomzimba nengokomzwelo futhi uhlanganyele kuphela ekusebenzeni kwezocansi lapho uzizwa usukulungele, ukhululekile futhi unolwazi ngokuphelele.

data.heading: Ngingayigcina kanjani impilo enhle yowesifazane
data.title: Impilo yowesifazane wangasese
data.body:
I-

Ukugcina impilo enhle yangasese

Ukunakekela impilo yakho yangasese kubalulekile enhlalakahleni yonke. Nawa amanye amathiphu abalulekile ukusiza ukugcina impilo enhle yowesifazane:

1. Prakthiza Ukuhlanzeka Okufanele

Ukugcina ukuhlanzeka okufanele kubalulekile empilweni yabesifazane. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

  • Geza indawo yangasese yangaphandle ngobumnene ngensipho emnene, engafakwanga amanzi namanzi afudumele. I-
  • Gwema ukusebenzisa insipho enokhahlo, imikhiqizo, noma imikhiqizo ephukile endaweni yesitho sangasese sowesifazane, ngoba ingaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwemvelo kwamagciwane.
  • Ngemuva kokusebenzisa indlu yangasese, sula njalo kusuka emuva ukuze uvimbele ukuvimba ukusakazeka kwamagciwane kusuka ku-anus kuya esithweni sangasese.
  • Gwema ukugeza ngokweqile noma ukugeza ngokweqile, ngoba kungakhipha isitho sangasese samagciwane alo okuvikela emvelo.

    2. Gqoka ngaphansi kwengubo engaphansi

    Uhlobo lwengubo yangaphansi okhethayo lungathinta impilo yowesifazane wangasese. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

    • Khetha ukuphefumula, ingubo yangaphansi yekotoni evumela ukusakazwa komoya futhi kusiza ukuvikela ukwakheka komswakama. I-
    • Gwema ingubo yangaphansi noma ibhulukwe elifanelekile elifanelekile elingabamba umswakama bese udala indawo enhle yamagciwane noma ukukhula kwemvubelo.
    • shintsha ukuphuma kwezingubo ezimanzi noma ze-sweaty ngaphansi ngokushesha ukugcina indawo yowesifazane yomile.

      3. Prakthiza umsebenzi ophephile wezocansi

      Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni kwezocansi okuphephile kubalulekile ukuze kugcinwe impilo yangasese. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

      • Sebenzisa izindlela zesithiyo sokuvimbela inzalo, ezinjengamakhondomu, ukuvikela ezifweni ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) futhi zivikele ukwethulwa kwamagciwane ayingozi.
      • Ukuxhumana ngokuvulekeke nomlingani wakho mayelana nempilo yezocansi nanoma yikuphi ukukhathazeka okungenzeka ukuthi ube nakho. I-
      • uchama ngaphambi nangemva kokusebenza ngocansi ukusiza noma iyiphi i-bacterium futhi unciphise ubungozi bokutheleleka kwezifo zomchamo (UTI).
      • Qinisekisa ukuthi noma yimaphi amathoyizi ocansi asetshenzisiwe ahlanzwa kahle futhi ahlanzeke ngaphambi nangemva kokusetshenziswa.

        4. Gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo

        Ukuthola indlela yokuphila enempilo kungaba nomthelela omuhle empilweni yowesifazane wangasese. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

        • Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo okugcwele izithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, kanye namaprotheni ancike ukusekela impilo yonke nokuzivikela komzimba.
        • Hlala u-hydrate ngokuphuza inani elanele lamanzi nsuku zonke ukusiza ukugcina umswakama wangasese.
        • Bandakanya umsebenzi ojwayelekile womzimba ukuze uthuthukise ukusakazwa kanye nenhlala-kahle.
        • Gwema ukubhema, ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwezidakamizwa, kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa okungekho emthethweni, ngoba kungathinta impilo yama-vaginal futhi kwandise ubungozi bokutheleleka.

          5. Hlela ukuhlolwa okujwayelekile

          Ukuhlolwa okujwayelekile kwe-gynecological kubalulekile ekuqapheleni nasekulondolozeni impilo yabesifazane. Cabanga ngemihlahlandlela elandelayo:

          • Isheduli evamile ukuvakasha nomhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwempilo obheka impilo yabesifazane.
          • Xoxa noma yiziphi izinkathazo noma izinguquko empilweni yakho yangasese ngalezi zivakashi.
          • Ukuhlolwa okunconyiwe, okufana nama-PAP Smears kanye nokuhlolwa kwe-STI, njengoba kwelulekwe ngumhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

            Ngokufundwa, ukulondolozwa kwezempilo enhle yangasese kuhlanganisa ukwenza inhlanzeko efanelekile, egqoke izingubo zangaphansi eziphefumulelwe, ukuzibandakanya ezenzweni eziphephile zocansi, ukulondolozela indlela yokuphila enempilo, nokuhlela ukubheka okujwayelekile nomhlinzeki wezempilo. Ngokulandela lezi zihlahlandlela, ungasekela inhlala-kahle ye-vagina yakho ephelele futhi ugqugquzele impilo yowesifazane ofanele.

data.body:
Ungayigcina kanjani i-vagina yakho ehlanzekile >

Ukugcina ukuhlanzeka okufanele kubalulekile ukuze ugcine i-vagina yakho ihlanzekile futhi inempilo. Nazi ezinye izinkombandlela zokukusiza ekugcineni inhlanzeko yangasese yangasese:

1. Prakthiza ukuhlanzeka kwangaphandle kwangaphandle

Ukuhlanza indawo yangaphandle yesitho sangasese sowesifazane wakho, owaziwa njenge-pulva, kuyingxenye ebalulekile yenhlanzeko yangasese sowesifazane. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

  • Geza i-vulva ngobumnene ngamanzi afudumele nensipho emnene, engalawulwa. I-
  • Gwema ukusebenzisa insipho enokhahlo, imikhiqizo, noma imikhiqizo ephukile endaweni yesitho sangasese sowesifazane, ngoba ingaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwemvelo kwamagciwane.
  • Qinisekisa ukugeza kahle futhi pat womile ngethawula elihlanzekile.
  • Gwema ukugeza ngokweqile noma ukuklwebheka, ngoba kungacasula isikhumba esintekenteke se-veva.

    2. Sebenzisa amanzi wokuhlanza kwangaphakathi

    Isitho sangasese sowesifazane siyisitho sokuzihlanza futhi ngokuvamile asidingi ukuhlanzwa kwangaphakathi. Eqinisweni, kusetshenziswa imikhiqizo efana nezindawo zokudla noma ukuhlanza okusondelene kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwemvelo kwamagciwane futhi kwandise ubungozi bokutheleleka. Ngokuvamile kunconywa kuphela ukusebenzisa kuphela amanzi wokuhlanzwa kwangaphakathi. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

    • ngesikhathi sokugeza noma ukugeza, vumela amanzi afudumele ukugeleza endaweni yangasese yangaphandle ngaphandle kokwethula amanzi esithweni sangasese sowesifazane.
    • gwema ukusebenzisa insipho noma amanye ama-ejenti wokuhlanza ngaphakathi esithweni sangasese sowesifazane, ngoba angaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-PH entekenteke kanye ne-flora yemvelo.

      3. Khetha i-underwear ephefumula uphansi

      Uhlobo lwengubo ongaphansi olugqokayo lungathinta inhlanzeko yangasese. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

      • Khetha izingubo ezingaphansi eziphefumulelwe ezenziwe ngezemvelo ezenziwe ngezemvelo ezinjengokotini, ngoba zivumela ukusakazwa komoya okungcono futhi kusiza ukuvikela ukwakheka komswakama.
      • Gwema i-wanger engaphansi efanelekile noma izinto zokwenziwa ezingabamba umswakama futhi udale indawo enhle yamagciwane noma ukukhula kwemvubelo.
      • shintsha ukuphuma kwezingubo ezimanzi noma ze-sweaty ngaphansi ngokushesha ukugcina indawo yowesifazane yomile.

        4. Prakthiza umsebenzi ophephile wezocansi

        Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni kwezocansi okuphephile kubalulekile ukuze kugcinwe inhlanzeko yangasese. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

        • Sebenzisa izindlela zesithiyo sokuvimbela inzalo, ezinjengamakhondomu, ukuvikela ezifweni ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) futhi zivikele ukwethulwa kwamagciwane ayingozi. I-
        • uchama ngaphambi nangemva kokusebenza ngocansi ukusiza noma iyiphi i-bacterium futhi unciphise ubungozi bokutheleleka kwezifo zomchamo (UTI).
        • Qinisekisa ukuthi noma yimaphi amathoyizi ocansi asetshenzisiwe ahlanzwa kahle futhi ahlanzeke ngaphambi nangemva kokusetshenziswa.

          5. Gwema Imikhiqizo Enephunga Namakhemikhali Anokhahlo

          Amakha, imikhiqizo enephunga, namakhemikhali anokhahlo angacasula indawo ethambile yangasese sowesifazane futhi aphazamise ukulinganisela kwawo kwemvelo. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

          • Gwema ukusebenzisa amaphakethe anephunga elinamaphupho, ama-tampon, noma ama-panty liners, ngoba angadala ukucasuka futhi andise ubungozi bokutheleleka.
          • Khetha okokuhlanza okungakhohliwe kanye ne-hypoallergenic yokuhlanza izingubo ezingekho ngaphansi futhi uvikele ukusebenzisa amathambi endwangu noma amashidi owomile angaqukatha amakhemikhali anokhahlo. I-
          • lapho usebenzisa iphepha lasendlini yangasese, khetha izinhlobo ezingakhonjwanga ezingekho emthethweni ukuze zinciphise ingozi yokucasuka.

            6. Hlela ukuhlolwa okujwayelekile

            Ukuhlolwa okujwayelekile kwe-gynecological kubalulekile ekuqapheleni impilo yakho yangasese. Cabanga ngemihlahlandlela elandelayo:

            • Isheduli evamile ukuvakasha nomhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwempilo obheka impilo yabesifazane.
            • Xoxa noma yiziphi izinkathazo noma izinguquko empilweni yakho yangasese ngalezi zivakashi.
            • Ukuhlolwa okunconyiwe, okufana nama-PAP Smears kanye nokuhlolwa kwe-STI, njengoba kwelulekwe ngumhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

              Ngamafuphi, ukulondolozwa kwangasese okuhlanzekile nokunempilo kubandakanya ukwenza inhlanzeko yangaphandle yangaphandle, kugqoke amanzi angaphakathi, ukucubungula imisebenzi ephephile, ukugwema ukubhekelwa kwamakhemikhali anephupho kanye nokuhlola okujwayelekile nomhlinzeki wezempilo. Ngokulandela le mihlahlandlela, ungakhuthaza inhlanzeko yangasese sowesifazane futhi usekele impilo yakho yangasese yowesifazane jikelele.

data.heading: Ukuhogela Kanjani Kuhle Endaweni Ye-Virtunal
data.title: Unuka okuhle
data.body:
Ungakuhogela kanjani kahle endaweni yakwaVaginal

Ukuthola iphunga elimnandi endaweni yakwaVaginal kufaka ukugcina inhlanzeko enhle nokunakekela umzimba wakho. Nawa amanye amathiphu wokukusiza ukugcina indawo entsha eyintombi futhi emnandi yokuhoxa:

1. Prakthiza Ukuhlanzeka Okufanele

Ukugcina ukuhlanzeka okufanele kubalulekile ngephunga elimnandi endaweni yakwaVaginal. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

  • Geza indawo yangaphandle yangaphandle, eyaziwa njenge-pulva, njalo ngamanzi afudumele nensipho emnene, engakhohlisiwe.
  • Hlanza kahle le ndawo, uqiniseke ukuthi uhlanze wonke amafolda nokuqalwa. I-
  • Gwema ukusebenzisa insipho enokhahlo, imikhiqizo, noma imikhiqizo ephukile endaweni yesitho sangasese sowesifazane, ngoba ingaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwemvelo kwamagciwane futhi kubangele ukucasuka.
  • Pat indawo yomile ngethawula elihlanzekile ngemuva kokugeza ukuvikela ukwakheka komswakama.

    2. Gqoka ngaphansi kwengubo engaphansi

    Uhlobo lwengubo yangaphansi oyigqokayo ingathinta iphunga endaweni yangasese sowesifazane. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

    • Khetha izingubo zangaphansi eziphefumulelwe ezenziwe ngezindwangu zemvelo ezinjengokotini. Ukotini kuvumela ukusakazwa komoya okungcono futhi kunciphise ukwakhiwa komswakama. I-
    • Gwema i-wanger engaphansi efanelekile noma izinto zokwenziwa ezingabamba ukushisa kanye nomswakama, ukudala indawo evumelana nokukhula kwamagciwane kanye nephunga elingathandeki.
    • Shintsha izingubo zakho zangaphansi nsuku zonke futhi ngokushesha ngemuva kokuzibandakanya emisebenzini yomzimba ebangela ukujuluka.

      3. Sebenzisa imikhiqizo yamakha-mahhala ne-hypoallenic

      Ukugcina iphunga elimnandi, kubalulekile ukugwema ukusebenzisa imikhiqizo equkethe amakha noma amakhemikhali anokhahlo. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

      • Gwema ukusebenzisa amaphakethe anephunga elinamaphupho, ama-tampon, noma ama-panty liners, ngoba angadala ukucasuka futhi aphazamise ukulinganisela kwemvelo yendawo yendawo yowesifazane. I-
      • Khetha okokuhlanza amathonela wethonelayo ne-hypoallergenic yokuwasha izingubo zakho zangaphansi nezingubo ukunciphisa ingozi yokucasuka.

        4. Hlala u-hydrate

        Ukuphuza inani elanele lamanzi nsuku zonke kubalulekile ukuze ulondoloze imvelo enempilo yesitho sangasese sowesifazane. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

        • hlala u-hydrate ngokuphuza amanzi anele usuku lonke. I-hydration efanele isiza ukugcina imisebenzi enempilo emzimbeni, kufaka phakathi amazinga okuthambeko okuthambekela kanye nomswakama endaweni yakwaVaginal.

          5. Prakthiza umsebenzi ophephile wezocansi

          Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni kwezocansi okuphephile kubalulekile ukuze kugcinwe iphunga elimnandi endaweni yakwaVaginal. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

          • Sebenzisa izindlela zesithiyo sokuvimbela inzalo, ezinjengamakhondomu, ukuvikela ezifweni ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) futhi zilondoloze indawo enempilo yesitho sangasese sowesifazane. I-
          • uchama ngaphambi nangemva kokusebenza ngocansi ukusiza noma iyiphi i-bacterium futhi unciphise ubungozi bokutheleleka kwezifo zomchamo (UTI).
          • Qinisekisa ukuthi noma yimaphi amathoyizi ocansi asetshenzisiwe ahlanzwa kahle futhi ahlanzeke ngaphambi nangemva kokusetshenziswa.

            6. Naka Ukudla

            Ukudla kwakho kungadlala neqhaza ephulweni lendawo yakho yesitho sangasese sowesifazane. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

            • Sebenzisa ukudla okulinganiselayo nokunempilo okubandakanya izithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, kanye namaprotheni aphansi ukusekela imisebenzi efanele umzimba.
            • khawulela ukuthathwa kokudla okusetshenzwe okucutshunguliwe, ushukela ocwengekile, nokudla okunephunga elinamandla okungathinta iphunga lomzimba.

              7. Shintsha njalo imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini

              Uma usebenzisa ama-tampon noma ama-pads okuya esikhathini ngesikhathi sakho, kubalulekile ukubashintsha njalo. Landela le mihlahlandlela:

              • Shintsha ama-tampons akho noma ama-pads akho njalo ukuvikela ukwakhiwa kwamagciwane anephunga elibangela iphunga.
              • Ukushiya i-tampon isikhathi eside kungadala indawo yokukhula kwamagciwane kanye nephunga elingajabulisi.

                8. Gwema ukugeza ngokweqile noma ukuhlanza imali

                Ngenkathi kubalulekile ukugcina inhlanzeko, ukugeza ngokweqile noma ukuhlalisa imali kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwemvelo kwamagciwane endaweni yangasese sowesifazane futhi kuholele ekucasukeni. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

                • isitho sangasese sangasese sizihlanza futhi asidingi ukuhlanza okwengeziwe noma okuhlanzwa ngokweqile.

                  9. Cabanga ngezinkinga zezempilo ezingaphansi kwe-

                  Uma ubona iphunga eliphakeme elinamandla noma izinguquko ephulweni lakho langasese elihambisana nezinye izimpawu ezifana nokuluma, ukukhipha, noma ukungakhululeki, kungcono ukuthi abonane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

                    I-
                  • thintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma uhlangabezana nephunga eliqinile noma elingathandeki.
                  • Lezi zimpawu lezi kungaba yizimpawu zokutheleleka noma ezinye izindaba zezempilo ezingase zidinge ukunakwa kwezokwelashwa.

Ungayiphatha Kanjani Ukukhishwa Kwama-Vaginal Daily

Ukukhishwa kwangasese kwangasese kuyinto eyenzeka ngokwemvelo nejwayelekile ohlelweni lokuzala lwabesifazane. Ngenkathi ungakwazi ukumisa ngokuphelele ukuphuma kwangasese, kunamathiphu ambalwa angasiza ukukusiza:

1. Prakthiza inhlanzeko enhle

Ukuzijwayeza inhlanzeko enhle kubalulekile ekuphatheni ukuphuma kwangasese. Cabanga ngemihlahlandlela elandelayo:

  • Gcina indawo yangasese yangasese ihlanzekile ngokugeza ngamanzi afudumele nensipho emnene, engakhohlisiwe.
  • Gwema ukusebenzisa insipho enokhahlo, izithombo zemikhiqizo, noma imikhiqizo ephukile, ngoba ingaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwemvelo kwamagciwane esithweni sangasese sowesifazane.
  • Ngemuva kokugeza, ubheke kahle indawo yomile ngethawula elihlanzekile.

    2. Gqoka ngaphansi kwengubo engaphansi

    Uhlobo lwengubo yangaphansi oyigqokayo lungathinta ukuphuma kwangaphansi. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

    • Khetha izingubo zangaphansi ezenziwe ngezindwangu eziphefumulelwe, njengokotini, ezivumela ukujikeleza komoya okungcono.
    • Gwema ingubo yangaphansi efanelekile nezinto zokwenziwa, ngoba zingabamba umswakama futhi zinikele ekukhulisweni okwengeziwe.

      3. Gwema I-IRRECAntnts

      Ukunciphisa ukuvezwa kwabacasuli abangahle kungasiza ukuphatha ukuphuma kwangaphansi. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

      • Gwema imikhiqizo enephupho, amakha, namakhemikhali anokhahlo emikhiqizweni yokunakekelwa komuntu siqu.
      • sebenzisa ama-detegegents wethamba elinamakha ne-hypoallergenic lokugeza izingubo zakho zangaphansi nezingubo.

        4. Prakthiza umsebenzi ophephile wezocansi

        Ukuzibandakanya ekuziphatheni kwezocansi okuphephile kubalulekile ekuphatheni ukuphuma kwangasese. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

        • Sebenzisa izindlela zesithiyo sokuvimbela inzalo, njengamakhondomu, ukunciphisa ubungozi bezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI).
        • Qinisekisa ukuthi noma yimaphi amathoyizi ocansi asetshenzisiwe ahlanzwa kahle futhi ahlanzeke ngaphambi nangemva kokusetshenziswa.

          5. Gcina ukudla okulinganiselayo

          Ukudla ukudla okunempilo nokulinganiselayo kungaba nomthelela empilweni yabesifazane. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

          • Hlala u-hydrate ngokuphuza amanzi amaningi ukusekela izinqubo zemvelo zomzimba.

            6. Gwema Ukucindezela

            Izinga eliphakeme lokucindezelwa lingathinta ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kungenzeka ukuthi liholele ezinguquko ekukhipheni kwangasese. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

            • Amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela, njengokuvivinya umzimba njalo, amasu wokuphumula, nokulala ngokwanele.

              7. Sebenzisa ama-panty liners noma ama-pads

              Uma inani lokukhululwa liyahlupha, ungacabanga ngokusebenzisa ama-panty liners noma amaphilisi ukusiza ukumunca nokuphatha ukukhipha usuku lonke. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

              • Shintsha ama-liners noma ama-pads njalo ukuze ulondoloze inhlanzeko futhi uvikele ukwakhiwa komswakama.

                8. Funa izeluleko zezokwelashwa

                Uma uhlangabezana nokukhishwa ngokweqile noma okungajwayelekile kuhambisana nokulunywa, iphunga, ukungakhululeki, noma okunye okuphathelene nezimpawu, kubalulekile ukubonana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

                • bangahlola isimo sakho esithile, benze izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi banikeze ukwelashwa okufanele uma kudingekile.

                  Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi inani elithile lokukhipha lofuba lijwayelekile futhi lidlala indima ebalulekile ekugcineni impilo yabesifazane. Kodwa-ke, uma ukhathazekile ngenani, ukuvumelana, noma yiziphi izimpawu ezihambisanayo, kungcono kakhulu ukufuna ukuholwa kuchwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukutholakala okunembile nokuphathwa okufanele.

data.heading: Yiziphi izimpawu zokukhishwa okuningi?
data.title: Ukukhishwa ngokweqile
data.body:
izimpawu zokukhishwa ngokweqile kowesifazane zangasese

Ukukhishwa kwangasese kwangasese kuyinto eyenzeka ngokwemvelo nejwayelekile ohlelweni lokuzala lwabesifazane. Kodwa-ke, uma ubona noma yiziphi zalezi zimpawu ezilandelayo kanye nokuphuma kwakho kwesitho sangasese sowesifazane, kungakhombisa ukukhipha ngokweqile noma inkinga eyisisekelo edinga ukunakwa:

1. Inani elikhulayo

Uma ubona ukwanda okukhulu kwenani lokukhishwa kwangaphansi, ikakhulukazi ephuzwini lapho kuzwakala khona ngokweqile futhi kudinga ukuguqulwa kwama-panty ama-panty noma amaphilisi, kungahle kube uphawu lokukhishwa ngokweqile.

2. Izinguquko ngokuhambisana noma umbala

Naka noma yiziphi izinguquko ekuvumelaneni noma ngombala wokukhishwa kwakho kwangasese. Ukuhlukumezeka kungafaka:

    I-
  • obukhulu, obukhulu, noma noma i-cottage ushizi-njengokukhipha ushizi.
  • ophuzi, oluhlaza okotshani, noma olumpunga.
  • Iphunga elimnandi noma le-fishy.
  • ukukhipha igazi ngaphandle kwesikhathi sakho sokuya esikhathini.

    Lezi zinguquko ekuguquguqukeni noma ngombala zingakhombisa ukutheleleka noma enye inkinga eyisisekelo okufanele ihlolwe nguchwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

    3. Ukulunywa noma ukucasuka

    Ukukhishwa ngokweqile kowesifazane kwangasese okuhambisana nokulunywa okuphikelelayo, ukubomvu, noma ukucasuka endaweni yesitho sangasese sowesifazane kungakhombisa ukungalingani noma ukutheleleka, njengokutheleleka kwemvubelo noma i-bacterial vaginosis.

    4. Ukungaphatheki kahle noma izinhlungu

    Uma uhlangabezana nokungaphatheki kahle noma izinhlungu, njengezinzwa ezivuthayo, ngesikhathi sokuchazwa noma ukuwohloka ngokocansi, kanye nokuphuma kwesitho sangasese sowesifazane, kungahle kusikisela ukutheleleka noma enye into eyisisekelo edinga ukwelashwa.

    5. Imvamisa noma ukuphindaphinda

    Uma uhlala uhlangabezana nokukhululwa ngokweqile kowesifazane kwangasese okungathuthuki noma okugcina kuvela okuphindaphindwayo ngemuva kokwelashwa okufanele, kuyalulekwa ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Lokhu kungakhombisa isimo esiyisisekelo esidinga ukuhlolwa okwengeziwe kanye nokuphatha.

    6. Ukuba khona kwegazi

    Ngenkathi ukubonwa okubonakalayo noma ukopha okukhanyayo phakathi kwezikhathi kungaba okujwayelekile kwabanye abantu, uma ubona ukukhululwa ngokweqile kowesifazane ngamanani abalulekile egazi, kunconyelwa ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa. Lokhu kungaba uphawu lwenkinga eyisisekelo edinga ukubhekelwa kuyo.

    7. Izimpawu ezihlelekile

    Kwezinye izimo, ukuphuma kwesitho sangasese ngokweqile okuhambisana nezimpawu zohlelo kungakhombisa isimo esibi kakhulu. Naka ezinye izimpawu ezengeziwe, ezinjengomkhuhlane, ubuhlungu besisu, noma ukunciphisa isisindo esingachazwanga, futhi bafuna ukunakekelwa kwezokwelapha okusheshayo uma lezi zimpawu zikhona.

    Uma uhlangabezana nanoma yiziphi zalezi zimpawu zokukhishwa kwangasese ngokweqile, kubalulekile ukubonana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukutholakala okunembile nokwelashwa okufanele. Bangakwazi ukuhlola isimo sakho esithile, bahlole izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi banikeze umhlahlandlela ekuphatheni ukukhishwa ngokweqile ngempumelelo.

data.heading: Yisiphi isikhathi esijwayelekile sowesifazane?

Isikhathi Esijwayelekile Sokukhipha Kwabesifazane

Ukukhishwa kwesitho sangasese sowesifazane kuyinto evamile futhi enempilo kwabesifazane. Idlala indima ebalulekile ekugcinweni kwempilo yendawo yangasese ngokunikeza ukuthambisa nokugcina izicubu zangasese zihlanzekile. Imvamisa kanye nenani lokukhishwa kwemali lingahlukahluka kusuka kowesifazane kuya kowesifazane, kanye nazo zonke izigaba ezahlukahlukene zomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Nakhu okudingeka ukwazi mayelana nesikhathi esijwayelekile sokuphuma kwabesifazane:

1. Ukukhishwa okujwayelekile kowesifazane

Ezimweni eziningi, abesifazane bazothola uhlobo oluthile lokukhishwa kwangasese kwabesifazane kuyo yonke iminyaka yabo yokuzala. Ngokuvamile kunguketshezi olucacile noma olubi olungabonakala lunamathele kancane noma lushelelezi. Ukukhishwa kwesitho sangasese okujwayelekile kusebenza imisebenzi eminingana ebalulekile, kufaka phakathi:

  • lubrical i-vagina ukwenza lula ukuthokozela ukuya ocansini.
  • Ukuqothula amaseli afile namagciwane ukuze alondoloze imvelo enempilo yesitho sangasese sowesifazane.
  • Ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa ezifweni ngokugcina izinga le-PH elilinganiselayo.

    2. Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kanye nokukhipha

    Inani kanye nokuvumelana kokukhishwa kwangasese kowesifazane kungahluka kuwo wonke umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ngenxa yokushintshashintsha kwe-hormonal. Nakhu ukwehla okujwayelekile koshintsho lokukhipha ngezigaba ezahlukahlukene zomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini:

    • Isigaba seLuteal: Ukulandela i-ovulation, ukukhululwa kungenzeka kube mkhulu futhi kube yilapho umzimba ulungiselela ukukhulelwa okungenzeka. I-
    • Isigaba sangaphambi kokuya esikhathini: Njengoba isikhathi sakho esilandelayo, ukukhululwa kungenzeka kube mkhulu futhi kunamathele, futhi umthamo wawo ungancipha.

      3. Ukuthonya izici

      Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi isikhathi esijwayelekile sokuphuma singathonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi:

        I-

        4. Ungafuna Nini Ukunakekelwa Kwezokwelapha

        Ngenkathi ukukhululwa kowesifazane kuthathwa njengokujwayelekile, kunezimo lapho kungakhombisa khona inkinga eyisisekelo. Kungcono ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma uhlangabezana nalokhu okulandelayo:

        • ushintsho olubalulekile kwisamba, ukuvumelana, umbala, noma iphunga lokuphuma kwangaphansi.
        • ukulunywa okuphikelelayo, okuvuthayo, ukubomvu, noma ukungaphatheki kahle endaweni yesitho sangasese sowesifazane.
        • ukukhala kuhambisana nobuhlungu, umkhuhlane, noma okunye okuphathelene nezimpawu.

          Khumbula, kubalulekile ukunaka okujwayelekile emzimbeni wakho futhi ufune izeluleko zezokwelashwa uma kukhona okukukhathazayo ngokuphuma kwakho kowesifazane. Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bangahlola isimo sakho esithile, basebenzise izivivinyo ezidingekayo uma kudingeka, futhi banikeze ukuholwa noma ukwelashwa okufanele.

data.heading: Ngabe i-PMS iguqule njalo?

data.body: <H2> Ingabe izimpawu ze-PMS zingashintshana njalo? </ h2 >> Isipiliyoni se-PMS singahluka kusuka kumuntu uye kumuntu futhi ngisho nomjikelezo owodwa wokuya esikhathini komunye. Abanye abantu bangathola izimpawu ezingaguquki ngesikhathi ngasinye, kanti abanye bangase babone ukuhlukahluka ngobukhulu, ubude besikhathi, noma izinhlobo zezimpawu abazithola. Lokhu kuguquguquka kungathonywa yizici eziningana, kufaka phakathi: </ p> <ul> <li> Izimpawu ze-hormonal: Izimpawu ze-PMS zihlotshaniswa ngokuyinhloko nezinguquko ze-hormonal ezenzeka ngesikhathi somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Amazinga we-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone akhuphuke futhi awe kuwo wonke umjikelezo, futhi lokhu kuguquguquka kungathinta ubukhulu kanye nemvelo yezimpawu ze-PMS. Amazinga wokuxineka: Ukuxineka kungaba nethonya elibalulekile emthethweni we-hormone kanye nenhlala-kahle . Izinto ezifana nokudla, izici, amaphethini okulala, futhi impilo yonke ingathinta ibhalansi ye-hormone futhi ukubonakaliswa kwezimpawu ze-PMS. Izinguquko kulezi zici zokuphila ezivela kumjikelezo owodwa wokuya esikhathini ziye komunye umuntu zingafaka isandla ekuhlukahlukani kwezimpawu ze-PMS Hurity. </ Li> <li> Umehluko ngamunye: Umzimba womuntu ngamunye ne-hormonal ahlukile. Bamba iqhaza emisebenzini efana nokugeza okufudumele, ukwenza ukucabanga noma ukuzindla, ukuphepha, noma ukubamba iqhaza kokuzilibazisa okukulethela injabulo. </ Li> , i-calcium, i-magnesium, noma amakhambi amakhambi afana namafutha e-primrose kusihlwa. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma yiziphi izithasiselo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ziphephile futhi zilungele izidingo zakho zomuntu ngamunye.
