data.heading: Kungani i-PMS yami ingaphezu kwesikhathi?
data.title: Pms ngaphandle kwesikhathi
data.body:
I-

Ukuqonda i-PMS kanye nokubambezeleka kokuya esikhathini

I-Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) isho inhlanganisela yezimpawu zezimpawu zomzimba, ezingokomzwelo, nokuziphatha ezenzeka ezinsukwini noma emavikini aholela esikhathini. Ngenkathi i-PM iyisimo esivamile sokuba abantu abaningi esikhathini esithile, kunezimo lapho izimpawu ze-PMS zincipha, kepha ukuya esikhathini akuqali njengoba bekulindelekile. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola izizathu ezingaba khona kungani kungenzeka ukuthi ziphele izimpawu ze-PMS, kepha isikhathi sakho asikaqali.

Izizathu zokubambezeleka kokuya esikhathini

Isikhathi sekwephuzile, kungaba nezimbangela eziyisisekelo ezahlukahlukene. Ezinye zezizathu ezingaba khona kungani isikhathi sakho sibambezelekile yize ukuphela kwezimpawu zakho ze-PMS kufaka phakathi: Ukukhulelwa: Uma usebenza ngocansi futhi ithuba lokukhulelwa, isikhathi esiphuthumayo singaba uphawu lokuqala. Ukukhulelwa kubangela ukuthi izinguquko ze-hormonal ezingaholela ekungabikho kokuya esikhathini. . >

  • Imithi noma imigomo yezokwelapha: Imithi ethile, njengezindlela zokuvimbela inzalo ze-hormonal noma izinhlobo ezithile ze-antidepressants, zingathinta umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Ngokwengeziwe, izimo ezithile zezokwelapha, njenge-endometriosis noma i-uterine fibroids, nazo zingadala izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni. ukuya esikhathini. Ngalesi sikhathi, amazinga we-hormone aguquguquka, aholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni. ukunciphisa uma kuqala ukuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi izimpawu ze-PMS kanye nokuqala kokuya esikhathini akuhlali kuqondaniswe kahle. Ukushintshashintsha kwama-hormonal okubhekele izimpawu ze-PM ngesinye isikhathi kungavela ngaphandle kokuqala kokuqala kokuya esikhathini ngokushesha.

    kwezinye izimo, izinguquko ze-hormonal ezibangela izimpawu ze-PMS zinganciphisa okwesikhashana. Kodwa-ke, ukuya esikhathini kungenzeka kungaqala ngokushesha ngenxa yezici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi lezo ezishiwo ngenhla. Akujwayelekile ukuthi ukubambezeleka kwezinsuku ezimbalwa noma isonto okufanele kwenziwe phakathi kwesisombululo sezimpawu ze-PMS kanye nokuqala kokuya esikhathini. Uma ubonile ukuphela kwezimpawu zakho ze-PMS, kepha isikhathi sakho asiqali njengoba bekulindelekile, nazi ezinye izinyathelo ongazithatha:

      ul>
    • Thatha isivivinyo sokukhulelwa: Uma kukhona ithuba lokukhulelwa , Ukuthatha ukuhlolwa kokukhulelwa kungasiza ekuboneni ukuthi imbangela yesikhathi sakho esibambezelekile. Uma ubona noma yiluphi oluphathelene nezimpawu noma isikhathi sakho siqhubeka sibambezeleka, kungcono ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela. Ukuzibandakanya amasu okuphumula, ukuzivocavoca njalo, ukudla ukudla okulinganiselayo, nokuqinisekisa ukulala okwanele kungasekela ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal nokuvama ukuya esikhathini. Unokukhathazeka ngomjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, kunconyelwa ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa. Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bangahlola isimo sakho esithile, benze izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi bahlinzeke ukuholwa okufanele nokwelashwa uma kudingeka.

      Isiphetho

      Ukuqala kokuya esikhathini kungaba ukwenzeka okuvamile kwabanye abantu. Ngenkathi izimpawu ze-PMS zivame ukuhlotshaniswa nokuholwa esikhathini, isikhathi sokuya esikhathini singathonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ukungalingani kwama-hormonal, ukucindezelwa, izici zendlela yokuphila, nemithi yezokwelapha. Uma isikhathi sakho sibambezeleka naphezu kwesisombululo sezimpawu ze-PMS, kubalulekile ukucabanga ngezizathu ezingaphansi ezinjengokukhulelwa, ukungalingani kwama-hormonal, noma ezinye izinto. Ukuqapha izimpawu zakho, ukuphatha izingcindezi nezici zendlela yokuphila, futhi ufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa uma kudingeka kungakusiza uzulazule noma yikuphi ukukhathazeka maqondana nokuya esikhathini. Khumbula, umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ngamunye ungahluka, futhi kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma unezinkinga eziqhubekayo noma imibuzo.

data.heading: Ngingawenza kanjani isidoda sami sibe siqine futhi siqine?
data.title: Isidoda esinamandla futhi esiqinile
data.body:
Amathiphu wokuthuthukisa ubukhulu besidoda namandla

Ngenkathi kungekho zindlela eziqinisekisiwe zokungenza ikakhulukazi isidoda sakho noma siqine, kunezinguquko ezimbalwa zokuphila ongazicabanga ukusekela impilo yesidoda yonke. Nawa amanye amathiphu angasiza ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yesidoda kanye ne-motility:

1. Gcina impilo enempilo:
  • Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo: Qinisekisa ukuthi ukudla kwakho kufaka izithelo ezahlukahlukene, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni anciphile kanye namafutha anempilo. Cabanga ngokufaka ukudla okugcwele e-antioxidants, njengamajikijolo, isipinashi, utamatisi namantongomane. I-
  • Hlala i-hydrate: phuza amanzi amaningi usuku lonke ukusekela impilo yonke ne-hydration.
  • Gwema ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kotshwala: Khawulela ukuphuza kwakho kotshwala njengoba ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kotshwala kungathinta kabi ikhwalithi yesidoda.
  • Yeka ukubhema: Ukubhema kuxhumene nokunciphisa ukubalwa kwesidoda, motility, kanye nokwakheka kwesidoda okungajwayelekile. Ukuyeka ukubhema kungathuthukisa impilo yesidoda yonke.

    2. Vivinya umzimba njalo:
    • Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni njalo ngokomzimba kungasiza ukugcina isisindo esinempilo futhi sithuthukise impilo yokuzala yonke. Ihlose okungenani imizuzu engama-30 yokuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo izinsuku eziningi zeviki.

      3. Phatha ukucindezela:
      • ukucindezelwa okungamahlalakhona kungathinta amazinga we-hormone futhi kungathonya ikhwalithi yesidoda. Amasu wokuphatha ukucindezelwa okufana nokuzivocavoca, ukuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, noma ukuzibandakanya kokuzilibazisa nemisebenzi oyithandayo.

        4. Gcina isisindo esinempilo:
          I-
        • Ukukhuluphala ngokweqile noma ukugcwala ngokweqile kungathinta amazinga we-hormone kanye nokukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Hlela isisindo somzimba esinempilo ngokudla okulinganiselayo nokuzivocavoca njalo.

          5. Gwema ukushisa ngokweqile:
          • Ukuchayeka isikhathi eside kokushisa ngokweqile kungathinta kabi ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Gwema amashubhu ashisayo, ama-saunas, futhi ugqoke izingubo ezingaphansi eziqinile noma amabhulukwe ngezikhathi ezengeziwe.

            6. Ukubekezelela ukuvezwa kobuthi bemvelo:
            • Amakhemikhali athile futhi ubuthi bungathinta impilo yesidoda. Nciphisa ukuvezwa kokubulala izinambuzane, izinsimbi ezisindayo, amakhemikhali, kanye nobuthi endaweni yakho.

              7. Prakthiza ucansi oluphephile:
              • Zivikele wena kanye nomlingani wakho ezifweni ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) ngokwenza ucansi oluphephile. Amanye ama-STI angadala ukuzala noma athinte ikhwalithi yesidoda.

                8. Gwema ukubhema ngokweqile:
                • I-ejaculation njalo inganciphisa ukugxilwa kwesidoda okwesikhashana. Ukwenza kahle ikhwalithi yesidoda, kuvame ukunconyelwa ukuvumela isikhathi sokungazibizi kwezinsuku ezimbili kuya kwezinhlanu phakathi kwama-ejacances.

                  9. Cabanga izithasiselo ngesiqondisi sezokwelapha:
                  • izithako ezithile, ezifana nama-antioxidants afana nevithamini C, Vitamin E, Zinc, kanye Coenzyme Q10, zingaba nomthelela omuhle empilweni yesidoda. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuxhumana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma yiziphi izithasiselo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ziphephile futhi zilungele izimo zakho ezithile.

                    Kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi impilo yesidoda ithonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi izakhi zofuzo, izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi komhlaba, kanye nempilo yonke. Uma unezinto ezikhathazayo ngekhwalithi yakho yesidoda noma inzalo, kunconywa ukuthi abonane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo noma uchwepheshe wokuzala onganikeza izeluleko neziqondiso ezenzelwe umuntu uqobo.

                    Uyacelwa uqaphele ukuthi ngenkathi lezi zinguquko zendlela yokuphila zingasekela impilo yesidoda, aziqinisekisi izinguquko ezinkulu kubukhulu besidoda noma ngamandla. Imiphumela yomuntu ngamunye ingahluka, futhi kubalulekile ukuba nokulindelwe okungokoqobo.

data.heading: Yikuphi ukudla okwandisa ukuzala kwabesilisa?
data.title: Ukudla okuzalayo
data.body:
Ukudla okukhuphula ukuzala kwabesilisa

Ukudla kudlala indima ebalulekile empilweni yonke, kufaka phakathi ukuzala. Ngenkathi kungekho ukudla kwemilingo ukuqinisekisa ukwanda kokuzala, izakhamzimba ezithile nokudla zingaba nezinzuzo ezingaba khona zempilo yokuzala kwabesilisa. Nazi ezinye zokudla okukholelwayo ukukhuthaza ukuzala kwabesilisa:

1. Imifino eluhlaza enamaqabunga

Imifino eluhlaza enamaqabunga enjengesipinashi, uKale, no-broccoli bacebile kuma-antioxidants kanye nethambekele. Lezi zakhi zomzimba zingasiza ukuvikela isidoda ekulimaleni nasekuthuthukiseni ikhwalithi yesidoda.

2. Inhlanzi enamafutha

Izinhlanzi ezinamafutha njenge-salmon, i-mackerel, kanye nama-sardines yimithombo emihle kakhulu yama-omega-3 fatty acids. Ama-Omega-3 Ama-Acids ahlotshaniswe nekhwalithi yesidoda ethuthukisiwe kanye ne-motility.

3. Ama-walnuts

Ama-walnuts angumthombo omuhle wamafutha anempilo, kufaka phakathi ama-omega-3 fatty acids nama-polyphenols. Bangasiza ukuthuthukisa amandla wesidoda, motility, kanye ne-morphology.

4. Izithelo zeCitrus

Izithelo zeCitrus ezinjengamawolintshi, amagilebhisi, kanye nolamula bacebile ku-Vitamin C. Vitamin C yi-antioxidant engasiza ukuvikela ukulimala kwesidoda okubangelwa ukucindezela kwe-oxidative.

5. I-Pomegranate

I-Pomegranate igcwele ama-antioxidants futhi ikhonjisiwe ukuthuthukisa ukugxilwa kwesidoda, motility, kanye ne-morphology. Ukuphuza ujusi wamapomegranate noma ukuqeda izithelo ngokwalo kungaba nezinzuzo ezingaba khona.

6. Ushokoledi omnyama

Ushokoledi omnyama onokuqukethwe okuphezulu cocoa uqukethe ama-flavonoroids, okuyi-antioxidants engasiza ukukhulisa ukuhamba kwegazi futhi kuthuthukise ikhwalithi yesidoda.

7. Amantongomane eBrazil

Amantongomane eBrazil angumthombo omuhle weSelenium, amaminerali adlala indima ebalulekile ekukhiqizweni kwesidoda nasekuthandeni. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuthi ungasebenzisi amanani aphezulu we-selenium, ngoba kungaba yingozi. Amantongomane ambalwa eBrazil ngosuku anganikeza ukudla okunconyiwe nsuku zonke.

8. Amajikijolo

Amajikijolo, anjenge-blueberries, ama-sitrobheli, nama-raspberries, acebile kuma-antioxidants naku-Vitamin C. Lezi zilungelokazi zingasiza ukuvikela isidoda ekulimaleni nasekuthuthukiseni impilo yesidoda.

9. Imbewu yethanga

Imbewu yethanga ingumthombo omuhle wama-antioxidants, i-zinc, nezinye izakhi ezibalulekile. I-zinc idlala indima ebalulekile ekukhiqizweni kwe-testosterone kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwesidoda.

10. Utamatisi

Utamatisi ucebile eLycopene, i-antioxidant exhumene nokwenza ngcono isidoda, motility, kanye ne-morphology. Utamatisi wokupheka ungakhulisa ukumuncwa kweLycopene.

Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ngenkathi lokhu kudla kungazuzisa ukuzala kwabesilisa, kufanele babe yingxenye yokudla okulinganiselayo okubandakanya izakhamzimba ezahlukahlukene. Ngokwengeziwe, imiphumela yomuntu ngamunye ingahluka, futhi kunconywe ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo noma uchwepheshe wokuzala ngezeluleko ezenzelwe wena kanye nesiqondiso.

data.heading: Ngingahlola kanjani ukubalwa kwami ​​kwesidoda esiphansi ekhaya?
data.title: Isheke lokubala isidoda sekhaya
data.body:
Ukuhlola ukubalwa kwesidoda okuphansi ekhaya

Akunakwenzeka ukuthi uhlole ngokunembile ukubalwa kwesidoda sakho ekhaya ngaphandle kwemishini yokusebenza yaselebhu kanye nokuhlaziywa. Ukuhlaziywa okubanzi kwesisu okwenziwa nguchwepheshe wezempilo ofanelekayo esimweni selebhu kubalulekile ukuze kuhlolwe ngokunembile ukubalwa kwesidoda namanye amapharamitha abalulekile wempilo yesidoda.

Ukuhlaziywa kwesidoda, owaziwa nangokuthi isivivinyo sokubala isidoda, kuvame ukwenziwa ngokuqoqa isampula le-mones nge-ejaculation esitsheni esiyinyumba. Isampula bese ithunyelwa elabhoratri lapho lihlaziywa ngaphansi kwemishini ekhethekile. Ukuhlaziywa kuhlola izici ezahlukahlukene ze-seanes, kufaka phakathi ukubalwa kwesidoda, ukuhamba kwesidoda (ukunyakaza), i-sperm morphology (ukwakheka), nezinye izinto ezingathinta ukuzala.

Kodwa-ke, kunezimpawu ezithile nezimpawu ezingakhombisa udaba olungaba khona ngokubala isidoda noma ikhwalithi. Uma ukhathazekile ngokubala kwesidoda sakho noma ukuzala, kunconyelwa ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo noma uchwepheshe wokuzala ongenza izivivinyo ezidingekayo futhi anikeze ukuholwa okufanele. Bangahle bahlele ukuhlaziywa kwesidoda ukuhlola ukubala kwakho kwesidoda namanye amapharamitha afanele.

Kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi ukubalwa kwesidoda okuphansi kungaba nezimbangela ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, izici zofuzo, izici zendlela yokuphila, imishanguzo ethile, kanye nemithi yezokwelapha ephansi. Uchwepheshe wezempilo kuphela ongahlinzeka ngokuxilongwa okunembile nezinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele zokwelashwa ezisuselwa esimweni sakho esithile.

Uyacelwa ukuthi uqaphele ukuthi uzama ukuhlola ukubalwa kwesidoda noma ukuzala ekhaya ngaphandle kokuholwa okufanele kwezokwelapha nokuhlaziywa kungaholela emiphumeleni engafanele futhi kungenzeka ukubambezela ukungenelela okudingekayo. Kungcono njalo ukufuna izeluleko zokwelashwa eziqeqeshiwe zokuhlola okuphelele.

Isingeniso

Amandla ocansi noma i-stamina yocansi isho amandla okugcina izinga eligculisayo lezenzo zocansi esikhathini esinqunyelwe. Kubandakanya izici ezahlukahlukene, kubandakanya nezici zomzimba, zengqondo nezokuphila. Ngenkathi asikho isixazululo somlingo sokuqinisa amandla ocansi ngokushesha, kunamasu amaningana ongawamukela ukuze athuthukise amandla akho nokusebenza kwakho. Le ndatshana izokunikeza ngokuqonda namathiphu wokuthi ungawathuthukisa kanjani amandla akho ocansi ngokushintsha kwendlela yokuphila, ukuzivocavoca, ukuxhumana, ukuphathwa kwengcindezi, futhi ufuna usizo lochwepheshe lapho kunesidingo.

i. Ukuqonda amandla ezocansi

Ngaphambi kokuthola amasu, kubalulekile ukuqonda umqondo wamandla ocansi. Amandla ocansi athonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi impilo yomzimba, inhlala-kahle yengqondo, ibhalansi ye-hormonal, kanye nekhwalithi yobudlelwano obusondelene. Kubandakanya amandla okuqinisa umsebenzi wezocansi, gcina ukwakheka (endabeni yabesilisa), ukubambezela ukubulawa komhlaba, futhi uthole ukuhlangana kwezocansi okujabulisayo nokwanelisayo. Amandla ocansi angahlukahluka kuye kumuntu nomuntu futhi angahle aguqukayo ngenxa yezici ezahlukahlukene ezinjengobudala, amazinga okuxineka, kanye nempilo yonke.

    • Ukuzivocavoca njalo
      • Ukubandakanya umsebenzi ojwayelekile womzimba ukuthuthukisa impilo ye-cardiovascular, wandise amandla, futhi uqinise amazinga Energy.

      • Ukuphathwa kwengcindezi
        • ukucindezelwa okungamahlalakhona kungathinta kabi amandla ocansi. Amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela okufana nokuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, ukuzindla, i-yoga, noma ukuhlanganyela ekuzilipheleni kwemisebenzi nemisebenzi ekusiza ukuthi uphumule.

        • isisindo esinempilo

          • Ukukhuluphala okungaba nomthelela ezinkingeni ezahlukahlukene zezempilo zezocansi, kufaka phakathi ukudonsa okuqediwe kanye nokuncipha kwesifiso sobulili.

            iii. Ukuxhumana nokusondelana ngokomzwelo

            1. Vula ukuxhumana
              • Ukuxhumana okusebenzayo nomlingani wakho mayelana nezifiso zobulili, okuthandwayo, nokukhathazeka kungathuthukisa ukusondelana nokunciphisa ukukhathazeka okuhlobene nokusebenza okuhlobene. I-

              • ukusondelana ngokomzwelo

                • Ukwakha ukwethenjwa, ukugcina ukuxhumana okungokomzwelo, futhi ukubhekana nanoma yiziphi izingqinamba zobudlelwano kungaba namandla okusebenza ngocansi.

                  IV. Ifuna usizo lochwepheshe

                    • Uma ubhekene nobunzima obuphikelelayo bobulili noma ukhathazekile ngamandla akho ocansi, cabanga ngokufuna ukuholwa kubuchwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo okubhekele ezempilo yezocansi.
