Wonke umuntu uhlukile, ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukukhomba ukuthi yikuphi okusebenzela wena ngokufanelekela ukunakekelwa kwezocansi kwangemva kocansi. Ukuzinakekela kuqala nokugcina ubuhlobo obunempilo ngokobulili kungaba nomthelela ekwanelisekeni kwezocansi kanye nenhlala-kahle.

data.heading: Ukuphuma kopha okuphezulu kungavinjelwa kanjani?
data.title: Ukuvimbela ukopha okuphezulu
data.body:
Ukuvimbela ukopha okuphezulu: amasu asebenzayo I-P> I-ExEding ingenzeka ngenxa yokulimala okuhlukahlukene noma kwezimo zezokwelapha. Kwezinye izimo, ukopha kungaba nzima futhi kudinge ukunakwa ngokushesha. Kodwa-ke, kunezindlela zokuvimbela ezingathathwa ukuze zinciphise ubungozi bokuphuma okuphezulu. Le ndatshana izodingida amasu amaningana okusiza ukuvikela ukopha ngokweqile.

1. Prakthiza ukunakekelwa kwesilonda efanele I-

Enye yezinyathelo ezibaluleke kakhulu ekuvikeleni ukopha okuphezulu ukwenza ukunakekelwa kwesilonda esifanele. Nawa amathiphu abalulekile:

  • Hlanza isilonda ngobumnene ngensipho emnene namanzi ukususa noma yikuphi ukungcola noma imfucumfucu.
  • Faka isisombululo se-antiseptic noma amafutha okunciphisa ubungozi bokutheleleka.
  • amboze isilonda nge-bandage eyinyumba noma ukugqoka ukuze uyivikele kusuka kumonakalo owengeziwe.
  • shintsha ukugqoka njalo ukuze ulondoloze inhlanzeko futhi ukhuthaze ukuphulukiswa.

    2. Sebenzisa ingcindezi nokuphakama I-

    Uma ukopha kwenzeka, ukusebenzisa ingcindezi eqondile esilondeni kungasiza ukuyilawula. Landela lezi zinyathelo:

    1. Sebenzisa indwangu ehlanzekile noma i-gauze pad ukufaka ingcindezi eqinile ngqo esilondeni.
    2. Gcina ingcindezi okungenani imizuzu eyi-10-15 noma kuze kube yilapho ukopha kuyema.
    3. uma kungenzeka, phakamisa ingxenye yomzimba elimele ngaphezulu kwezinga lezinhliziyo ukuze uqhubeke nokunciphisa ukopha.

      3. Qaphela ngezinto ezibukhali I-

      izingozi ezibandakanya izinto ezibukhali zingaholela egwini elinzima. Ukuvimbela izehlakalo ezinjalo:

      • baphathe izinto ezibukhali, njengemimese noma isikhafu, ngokuqapha kanye nokubamba okufanele. I-
      • ihlala inquma emzimbeni wakho futhi igcine iminwe kude ne-blade.
      • Gcina izinto ezibukhali endaweni ephephile, ngaphandle kwezingane.

        4. Gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo I-

        Indlela yokuphila enempilo ingaba nesandla empilweni yonke futhi inciphise ingozi yokuphazamiseka kokopha. Cabanga ngokulandelayo:

        • yamukele ukudla okulinganiselayo okunothile izakhi zomzimba ezibalulekile, kufaka phakathi i-Vitamin K, edlala indima egazini igazi.
        • Ukubandakanya umsebenzi ojwayelekile womzimba ukuthuthukisa impilo ye-cardiovascular. I-
        • Gwema ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kotshwala, ngoba kungalimaza izindlela zokubopha igazi.
        • Yeka ukubhema, njengoba ukubhema kuthinta ukujikeleza kwegazi futhi kungabambezela ukwelashwa ngamanxeba.

          5. Funa izeluleko zezokwelashwa

          Uma unesimo sezokwelapha esandisa ubungozi bokopha, kubalulekile ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa futhi ulandele uhlelo olubekiwe lokwelashwa. Ezinye izimo ezingadinga ukunakwa zibandakanya:

          • hemophilia noma ezinye izinkinga zokuphamba
          • isifo sesibindi
          • isifo sozinso esingamahlalakhona
          • ukuphazamiseka kwe-platelet
          • Ukusetshenziswa kwemithi yokunciphisa igazi I-

            khumbula, le ndatshana inikezela ngeziqondiso ezijwayelekile ekuvimbeleni ukopha okuphezulu. Uma kwenzeka ukopha kakhulu, kubalulekile ukufuna usizo lwezokwelashwa oluseduze. I-

            Ngokulandela lezi zindlela zokuvimbela, unganciphisa ubungozi bokopha ngokweqile futhi ukhuthaze impilo engcono yonke.

data.heading: Ingabe ukopha kakhulu okujwayelekile?
data.title: Ukopha okunzima okujwayelekile
data.body:
Ukuqonda ukopha okusindayo: izimbangela, izimpawu, kanye nokwelashwa

ukopha kakhulu, owaziwa nangokuthi amaMenorrhagia, kuyisimo esibonakaliswa ukopha ngokweqile noma isikhathi eside kokuya esikhathini. Ngenkathi konke ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini kowesifazane kungahluka, ukopha kakhulu kungabonakala ngathi futhi kungakhombisa inkinga yezempilo engaphansi. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola izimbangela, izimpawu, kanye nezinketho zokwelashwa zokopha kakhulu.

izimbangela zokopha kakhulu

Izici eziningana zingaba negalelo ekujuleni kwegazi okusindayo kokuya esikhathini:

  • Hormonal Imbance: ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, njengokungalingani phakathi kwe-estrogen ne-progesterone, kungaphazamisa ukopha okujwayelekile.
  • Uterine Fibroids: Ukukhula okungewona umdlavuza esibelethweni esibizwa nge-Fibroids kungadala ukopha okusindayo noma isikhathi eside kokuya esikhathini.
  • Ama-polyps: Ama-polyps a-Uterine amancane, ukukhula okuphezulu ku-uterine lining okungaholela ekutholeni ukopha kanzima.
  • Endometriosis:
  • i-adenomyosis:
  • Izimo zokwelashwa:
  • Ukusetshenziswa kwemithi ethile: Imithi ethile, efana negeyimu yegazi, ingakhulisa ubungozi bokopha osindayo.

    Izimpawu zokopha kakhulu

    abesifazane ababhekene nokopha okukhulu bangase babone lezi zimpawu ezilandelayo:

    • isikhathi sokuya esikhathini esihlala isikhathi eside kunezinsuku eziyisikhombisa
    • edlula ama-cloots amakhulu wegazi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini
    • kudingeka uguqule ama-sanitary pads noma ama-tampons njalo (njalo ngehora noma amabili)
    • Ukuthola ukukhathala, ubuthakathaka, noma ukufushane komoya ngenxa yokulahleka kwegazi ngokweqile
    • Izimpawu ze-anemia, ezinjengesiyezi, esikhawini, nesikhumba esiphuzi I-
    • ukuphazamiseka kwemisebenzi yansuku zonke ngenxa yokopha okunamandla nokudideka okuhambisana nakho

      Izinketho zokwelashwa zokopha kakhulu I-
      • Emishadekile: Izidakamizwa ezilwa nokuvuvukala (ama-NSAIDS) njenge-ibuprofen kungasiza ukunciphisa ukopha kanzima futhi kudambise izinhlungu. Izindlela zokuvimbela inzalo ze-Hormonal, njengamaphilisi okulawula ukuzalwa noma amadivaysi e-intrauterine (iUDs), angabekwa ukuhambisa ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi anciphise ukopha ngokweqile.
      • Endometrial Ablation: Le nqubo enokuhlasela okuncane ihlose ukususa noma ukucekela phansi ukukhishwa kwesibeletho ukuze kuncishiswe ukopha kanzima. Ngokuvamile kubhekwa kwabesifazane abangasafisi ukuba nezingane.
      • Uterine Fibroid eboldization: Le nqubo ifaka ukuvimba imithambo yegazi enikeza ama-fibroids anikezela ngama-fibroids, okuholela ekunciphiseni kwawo kanye nokwehla kokopha okunamandla.
      • Ukungenelela okuqinile: Kwezinye izimo, ukungenelela okuhlinzayo okufana ne-hysterectomy (ukususwa kwesibeletho) kunganconywa uma kunezimo ezithile zihluleka ukuphathwa kokuhlinzwa. I-
      • Izindlela zokwelapha ezinamandla: Izinguquko ezithile zokuphila, kufaka phakathi ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, izindlela zokunciphisa ukucindezela, nokudla okunempilo, kungasiza ukuphatha ukopha kanzima. Abanye abantu futhi bathola impumuzo ngezindlela zokwelapha ezihambisanayo njenge-acupuncture noma amakhambi amakhambi, kepha lezi kufanele zixoxwe nomhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

        lapho ukufuna ukunakekelwa kwezokwelashwa

        Ngenkathi ukopha kakhulu kungaba yinkinga ejwayelekile, kubalulekile ukubonana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo kulezi zimo ezilandelayo:

        • ukulahleka kwegazi ngokweqile okudinga ukuguqulwa kaningi kwama-pads noma ama-tampon
        • edlula izingcezu ezinkulu zegazi ngokungaguquki
        • Ubuhlungu obukhulu noma ukungaphatheki kahle ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini I-
        • Ukuzizwa unesikhumba, esidabukisayo, noma ukubhekana nokuphefumula ngenxa yokopha kakhulu
        • ukopha okunamandla okuphazamisa imisebenzi yansuku zonke kanye nekhwalithi yempilo I-

          Umhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwezempilo angahlola imbangela eyisisekelo yokopha osindayo futhi ancome izinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele. I-

          Ekuphetheni, ukopha okusindayo ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kungabangelwa yizici ezahlukahlukene, futhi kubalulekile ukukhomba imbangela eyisisekelo futhi ufune ukwelashwa okufanele. Uma uhlangabezana nezimpawu zokopha kakhulu noma unezinto ezikhathazayo, finyelela kumhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuxilongwa okufanele nohlelo lokuphatha olwenzelwe umuntu.

data.heading: Nginganciphisa kanjani ukopha okunamandla ngesikhathi sami?
data.title: Yehlisa ukopha okunamandla
data.body:
I-

yehlisa ukopha kakhulu ngesikhathi sakho: amasu asebenzayo I-

Ukuthola ukopha kakhulu ngesikhathi sakho kungaba nzima ngokomzimba nangokomzwelo. Ngenhlanhla, kunamasu owamukele ukunciphisa ukopha kokuya esikhathini okusindayo futhi uphathe izimpawu zakho ngempumelelo. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola izindlela ezahlukahlukene ukukusiza ukunciphisa ukopha kakhulu ngesikhathi sakho.

1. Bheka umhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo I-

Uma uhlangabezana nokuhlale ukopha kokuya esikhathini, kubalulekile ukubonana nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Bangakwazi ukuhlola isimo sakho, banqume imbangela eyisisekelo, futhi bancome izinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele. Umhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo angaphakamisa okulandelayo:

  • ukwenza izivivinyo zokuxilonga ukukhomba noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi noma ama-abnormalities
  • Ukunquma imishanguzo, njengezidakamizwa zokuvimbela inzalo ze-hormonal noma izidakamizwa zokulwa nokuvuvukala (ama-NSAIDS), ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi wehlise ukopha
  • ekudlulisela kuchwepheshe wokuhlola okwengeziwe noma izinqubo zokuhlaziya, njengokuhlaziywa kwe-endometrial noma ukubonwa kwe-sibroid, uma kunesidingo

    2. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal

    Sebenzisa izindlela zokulawula ukuzalwa kwama-hormonal kungasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi kunciphise ukopha kakhulu. Ezinye izinketho zifaka:

      I-
    • ehlanganisiwe yokuvimbela inzalo ngomlomo: I-
    • Amaphilisi weProgestin-kuphela: eyaziwa nangokuthi amaphilisi ama-mini, lokhu kuqukethe kuphela i-progestin futhi kungalungele abantu abangakwazi ukuthatha i-estrogen.
    • I-WeveroRegelrelrelrel Intrauterine device (IUD): Le Hormonal IUD ikhipha progestin futhi inganciphisa kakhulu ukopha kokuya esikhathini ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
    • izimila kanye nemijovo: izimilo noma umjovo okhipha iprogestin nazo zingasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini futhi sinciphise ukopha kanzima.

      3. Izidakamizwa ze-Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory (NSAIDS) I- Le mithi isebenza ngokuvimbela ukukhiqizwa kwama-prostaglandins, abhekele ukudala izivumelwano zokuvuvukala kanye nokukhuthaza ukuvuvukala. Thintana nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ukuthola imiyalo efanelekile nemiyalo yokusebenzisa.

      4. I-Tranexamic acid I- Ngokuvamile kuthathwa ngesikhathi sakho futhi kunganciphisa ngempumelelo isikhathi kanye nevolumu yokopha. Kodwa-ke, thintana nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala lo muthi, ikakhulukazi uma unomlando wokuqhekeka kwegazi noma ezinye izimo zezokwelapha.

      5. Izithako ze-Iron I-P> I-SWINGEDING enamandla ingaholela ekulahlekelweni kwensimbi i-anemia ngenxa yokulahleka kwamangqamuzana abomvu egazi. Umhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwezempilo angancoma izithasiselo zensimbi ukusiza ukubuyisa izitolo zakho zensimbi nokuvimbela i-anemia. Qiniseka ukuthi ulandela umthamo onconyiwe bese uxoxa ngemiphumela emibi enokwenzeka nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

      6. Indlela yokuphila kanye nokuzinakekela izinto zokuzinakekela I-
      • Ukudla okunempilo: Sebenzisa ukudla okulinganiselayo okune-iron, amavithamini kanye namaminerali ukusekela impilo yakho yonke futhi kunciphise ingozi ye-anemia.
      • Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo:
      • Phatha ukucindezela: amazinga aphezulu okucindezela angabizi izimpawu zokuya esikhathini. Amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela, njengokuzindla, izivivinyo zokuphefumula ezijulile, noma ukuzibandakanya emisebenzini oyithandayo.
      • Ukwelashwa okushisa: Ukufaka i-heating pad noma ukuthatha okugeza okufudumele kungasiza ukuqeda ukopha kokuya esikhathini futhi kunciphise ukopha kanzima.
      • Landelela umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini: Sebenzisa ikhalenda lokuya esikhathini noma uhlelo lokusebenza lokulandela umkhondo ukuqapha umjikelezo wakho. Lokhu kungakusiza ukuthi ulindele izinsuku ezinamandla ukopha futhi ulungiselele ngokufanele.

        7. Izinketho Zokuhlobisa

        Uma izindlela zokulondolozwa zingasebenzi ekuphatheni ukopha kwakho okusindayo, umhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo angaxoxa ngezinketho zokuhlinza nawe. Lokhu kungafaka:

        • Endometrial Ablation: Le nqubo ifaka ukukhipha i-sinine lining ukuze unciphise ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini.
        • Ukuvumba kabusha kwe-artery I-
        • Hysterectomy: I-hysterectomy, ehilela ukususwa kwesibeletho, kungabhekwa njengendlela yokugcina yabantu abangasakwazi ukufisa ukuba nezingane futhi abangazange baphendule kwezinye izinketho zokwelashwa. I-

          khumbula, wonke umuntu uhlukile, nokuthi yini esebenza umuntu oyedwa kungenzeka angasebenzisi enye. Kubalulekile ukubheka umhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ukuthola indlela efanelekile yesimo sakho esithile. I-

          Ngokusebenzisa la masu futhi isebenzisana kakhulu nomhlinzeki wakho wezempilo, unganciphisa ngempumelelo ukopha okusindayo ngesikhathi sakho futhi uthuthukise impilo yakho yonke.

data.heading: Ingabe ukopha okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kuvamile?
data.title: Ukopha okuphezulu ekukhulelweni
data.body:
ukopha okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa: izimbangela, ubungozi, nokuthi ungakufuna nini ukwelashwa I-

ukopha ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kungaba imbangela yokukhathazeka, ikakhulukazi lapho kunzima noma kuhambisana nezinye izimpawu. Ngenkathi ezinye izehlakalo zokopha zingase zibe yingozi, kubalulekile ukuqonda izimbangela ezingaba khona, ubungozi, nokuthi ufuna ukwelashwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukopha okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa futhi sinikeze imininingwane ebalulekile komama abakhulelwe.

izimbangela zokopha okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa

Kunezimbangela eziningana ezingenzeka zokopha okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa:

  • Ukungena kokopha: Ezigabeni zokuqala ukukhulelwa, ukubonwa okukhanyayo noma ukopha kungenzeka lapho iqanda elivundisiwe linamathela ku-sitene lining. Lokhu ngokujwayelekile kukhanya futhi kube mfushane ngesikhathi kuqhathaniswa nokopha kokuya esikhathini.
  • Placenta Preventaria:
  • Ukuphuphuma kwesisu: ukopha kakhulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kungaba uphawu lokuphuphuma kwesisu, ikakhulukazi uma kuhambisana nobuhlungu besisu nokudlula kwezicubu.
  • Ukukhulelwa Ukukhulelwa: Kwezinye izimo, iqanda elikhulisiwe ngaphandle kwesibeletho, elivame kwi-Fallopian Tube, okuholela ekujuleni okukhulu, nobuhlungu obungenzeke.
  • Ukuphazamiseka kwe-Placental>
  • izifo zomlomo wesibeletho noma ukucasuka: ukutheleleka noma ukucasuka kwesibeletho, njenge-cervical polyps, kungadala ukopha ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa.
  • Uterine Fibroids: Ukukhula okungelona umdlavuza esibelethweni esibizwa nge-Fibroids kungaholela ekukhuleleni ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa, ikakhulukazi uma zikhulu noma ziseduzane nePlacenta.

    ubungozi obuhambisana nokuphuma okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa

    Ngenkathi ezinye izimbangela zokopha ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa zingaba yingozi, abanye bangabeka ubungozi kubo bobabili umama kanye nengane:

    • Abasebenzi abaqinile: Imibandela ethile, njengokuphashka kwe-Placental noma ukuthethelelwa kwezifo, kungakhuphula ubungozi bokusebenza kanye nokulethwa. I-
    • Izingqinamba ze-Fetal:
    • i-anemia yomama: ukopha ngokweqile ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kungaholela empilweni kamama, okungathinta impilo kamama jikelele kanye nenhlala-kahle.
    • Ukutheleleka: Kwezinye izimo, ukopha kungahlotshaniswa nokutheleleka, okudinga ukwelashwa okusheshayo ukuvikela izinkinga.

      lapho ukufuna ukunakekelwa kwezokwelashwa I-

      Kubalulekile ukubheka umhlinzeki wakho wezempilo ngokushesha uma uzwa ukopha okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa noma okukhathazayo. Funa Ukunakekelwa Kwezokwelashwa Kwasemuva Ezimweni Ezilandelayo:

      • ukopha kakhulu, okufana nesikhathi esindayo noma ngaphezulu
      • edlula ama-cloots egazi
      • Ubuhlungu besisu obunzima noma obuqine
      • isiyezi, esikhawini, noma ukuhlukunyezwa
      • Yehlile ukunyakaza kwe-fetus I-

        khumbula, konke ukukhulelwa kuyingqayizivele, futhi kungcono ukwenza iphutha ngasohlangothini lokuqapha uma kukhulunywa ngokopha. Umhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo angahlola isimo sakho, enza izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi anikeze ukuqondiswa okufanele ngokusekelwe esimweni sakho esithile.

        Isiphetho I-

        ukopha okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokukhulelwa kungaba imbangela yokukhathazeka, futhi kubalulekile ukuqonda izimbangela ezingaba khona, ubungozi, nokuthi ufuna ukunakekelwa kwezokwelashwa. Ngokuhlala unolwazi, ufuna ukunakekelwa kwezokwelashwa okusheshayo, futhi ulondoloze ukuxhumana okuvulekile nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo, ungaqinisekisa inhlala-kahle yomabili wena nengane yakho.

data.heading: Ungakuyeka kanjani ukopha?
data.title: Ukumisa ukopha
data.body:
Ungakuyeka kanjani ukopha ngezikhathi: amasu asebenzayo

Ukuthola ukopha okusindayo noma okuhlala isikhathi eside ngesikhathi sokufika kwakho kungaba yinto engaphazanyiswa futhi kungakhululeki. Ngenhlanhla, kunamasu amaningana ongawamukela ukusiza ukuyeka ukopha futhi uphathe ukuhamba kwakho kokuya esikhathini ngokuphumelelayo. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola izindlela eziphumelelayo zokuyeka ukopha ngezikhathi ezithile.

1. Sebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini

Sebenzisa imikhiqizo efanele yokuya esikhathini ingasiza ukuphatha futhi yehlise ukopha ngesikhathi sakho:

  • Amaphakethe wokuhlanza Shintsha ama-pads njalo ukuze ulondoloze inhlanzeko futhi uvikele ukungaphatheki kahle.
  • ama-tampons: uma ukhetha ama-tampon, sebenzisa izinga elifanele lokuthola ukugeleza kwakho. Khumbula ukushintsha ama-tampon njalo emahoreni ambalwa ukuvikela ingozi yokutheleleka. I-
  • izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini: Bangakwazi ukubamba igazi eliningi liqhathaniswa namaphilisi noma ama-tampon futhi lingakhishwa futhi lihlanzwe njalo ngamahora angama-8-12.

    2. Izidakamizwa ze-Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory (NSAIDS)

    NSAIDS efana ne-ibuprofen noma i-naproxen sodium ingasiza ukunciphisa ukopha kokuya esikhathini futhi kudambise. Le mithi isebenza ngokuvimbela ukukhiqizwa kwama-prostaglandins, abhekele ukudala izivumelwano zokuvuvukala kanye nokukhuthaza ukuvuvukala. Landela umthamo onconyiwe onikezwe umhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo noma imiyalo ekuphaketheni.

    3. Faka isicelo sokushisa

    Ukufaka ukushisa esiswini sakho esingezansi kungasiza ukuphumula izicubu futhi kunciphise ukuhlasela kokuya esikhathini nokopha:

    • Ukushisa Pad: Sebenzisa i-heating pad noma ibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo bese ulisebenzisa esiswini sakho esingezansi imizuzu engu-15 ukuya kwe-15 ngasikhathi. Phinda njengoba kunesidingo usuku lonke ukusiza ukudambisa ama-cramps futhi unciphise ukopha.
    • Ukugeza okufudumele: Ukuthatha okugeza okufudumele kunganikeza ukuphumula okuphelele futhi kusize ukudambisa ukuncipha kokuya esikhathini futhi kunciphise ukopha.

      4. Gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo

      Ukuthola indlela yokuphila enempilo kungaba nomthelela emazingeni alinganiselayo ama-hormone futhi kungenzeka anciphise ukopha kanzima ngezikhathi:

      • Ukuzivocavoca okujwayelekile: Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni njalo ngokomzimba, njengokuhamba, ukugijima, noma i-yoga, ukwenza ngcono ukujikeleza kwegazi nokukhuthaza ibhalansi ye-hormonal.
      • Ukudla okunempilo: Sebenzisa ukudla okulinganiselayo kahle ezinothile ngezithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okugcwele kanye namaprotheni anciphile ukusekela impilo jikelele. Faka ukudla okunothile kwensimbi ukuvikela i-anemia. I-
      • Hydration: Phuza inani elanele lamanzi ukuze uhlale u-hydrate futhi uxhase imisebenzi efanelekile yomzimba. I-
      • Ukuphathwa kwengcindezi: amazinga aphezulu okucindezela angabi kakhulu ezimpawu zokuya esikhathini. Amasu okunciphisa ukucindezela okufana nokuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, noma ukuhlanganyela emisebenzini okusiza uphumule futhi ungasebenzi.

        5. Funa izeluleko zezokwelashwa I- Bangakwazi ukuhlola isimo sakho, banqume imbangela eyisisekelo, futhi bancome izinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele.

        Isiphetho I- Ngokusebenzisa imikhiqizo efanelekile yokuya esikhathini, ukuthatha ama-NSAIDS, Ukufaka Ukushisa, Ukugcina Indlela Yokuphila Enempilo, Futhi Ukufuna Ukuphila Kwezokwelapha Lapho Kudingeka Ngempumelelo Ukugeleza Kwakho kokuya esikhathini futhi unciphise ukungahambi kahle kwakho.

data.heading: Ngabe ukucindezela kubangela izikhathi ezinzima?
data.title: Ukucindezela kanye nezikhathi ezinzima
data.body:
ingakwazi ukucindezela kubangela izikhathi ezinzima? Ukuqonda ukuxhumana I-

Ukuxineka kungukuhlangenwe nakho okuvamile emhlabeni wanamuhla ohamba ngezinyawo, futhi umthelela wawo empilweni yethu ubhalwe phansi kahle. Ngenkathi ukucindezelwa kungathinta izici ezahlukahlukene zenhlala-kahle yethu, kufaka phakathi impilo yengqondo nengokomzwelo, kungahle kube nethonya kumjikelezo wethu wokuya esikhathini. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuxhumana okungaba khona phakathi kwezingcindezi nezikhathi ezinzima.

Ukuqonda umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini I-

ngaphambi kokuphuza ebudlelwaneni phakathi kwezingcindezi nezikhathi ezinzima, kubalulekile ukuqonda umjikelezo ojwayelekile wokuya esikhathini. Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ngokuvamile uthatha izinsuku ezingama-28 futhi ufaka izinguquko eziningana ze-hormonal ezilungiselela umzimba ukuze ukhulelwe. Ukuchithwa kwe-sibene lining, okuholela ekujuleni kokuya esikhathini, kwenzeka lapho ukukhulelwa kungenzeki.

umthelela wengcindezi kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini

Ukucindezela kungathinta umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ngezindlela ezahlukahlukene, okuholela ekushintsheni kwamaphethini okuphapha:

    I-
  • I-Hormonal Imbance: Ukucindezela kungaphazamisa ukulingana okubucayi kwamahomoni abandakanyeka ekulawuleni umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, njenge-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone. Ama-Imbabal ama-Hormonal angaholela ekungathembeki ngesikhathi sokuhamba kwesikhathi nobude bomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, kungenzeka ukuthi kuholele ezikhathini ezinzima.
  • I-ovulation enamandla I-ovulation ebambezelekile ingahle iholele ekulweni kwesibeletho esibanzi futhi, ngenxa yalokho, izikhathi ezinzima lapho kwenzeka khona ukuya esikhathini. I-
  • ukukhuphula ukukhiqizwa kwe-prostaglandin: Ukucindezela kungavusa ukukhiqizwa kwama-prostaglandins, ama-hormone-efana nezinto ezikhuthaza izivumelwano zokuvuvukala kanye nezivumelwano zesibeletho. Izinga eliphakeme lama-prostaglandins lingaholela ekuqineni okunamandla futhi okuningana okuphambene nezivumelwano zokuya esikhathini ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, ngokunokwenzeka okubangela ukopha okunzima.
  • Izinguquko ekuhambeni kwegazi: Ukucindezela kungathinta ukugeleza kwegazi ngemithambo yegazi nokusakazwa kwegazi. Ukugeleza kwegazi okuguquliwe kusibeletho kungasiza ngezikhathi ezinzima.
  • umthelela ezicini zokuphila: Uma ungaphansi kwengcindezi, abantu bangase bathambekele emikhubeni yokuphila engenampilo, njengokudla okungekuhle, nokulala okunganele, noma ukuntuleka kokuzivocavoca. Lezi zinto zingafaka ngokungaqondile ekungalingani kwama-hormonal nezikhathi ezinzima. I-

    Ukuphatha ukucindezela komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini okunempilo I-
    • Amasu wokunciphisa ukuncipha>
    • Ukuzivocavoca okujwayelekile: Ukuzivocavoca umzimba kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezeleka nokukhuthaza inhlala-kahle ephelele. Ihlose okungenani imizuzu engama-30 yokuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo izinsuku eziningi zeviki. I-
    • Indlela yokuphila enempilo: Ukuzinakekela kuqala ngokudla okunempilo, ukulala ngokwanele, nokugwema i-caffeine ngokweqile kanye nokuphuza ngokweqile.
    • Isikhathi ukuphathwa kwesikhathi: Hlela uhlelo lwakho ukuze uqinisekise isikhathi esanele sokuphumula, ukuphumula, kanye nemisebenzi oyithandayo. imisebenzi
    • Funa Ukusekelwa: Khuluma nabangane, umndeni, noma umeluleki mayelana nezingcindezi zakho. Ukwabelana ngezinto ezikukhathazayo kunganikeza impumuzo futhi kukusize uthole imibono emisha.

      lapho ukufuna izeluleko zokwelashwa I- Bangakwazi ukuhlola izimpawu zakho, bahlole noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi, bese zinikeza ukuholwa okufanele kanye nezinketho zokwelashwa.

      Isiphetho

      Ngenkathi ukucindezela kungenzeka kungabingeli ngokuqondile izikhathi ezinzima, kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal futhi kufaka isandla ekushintsheni kwamaphethini okuya esikhathini. Ukuqonda ukuxhumana okungaba khona phakathi kwengcindezi kanye nezikhathi ezinzima kubalulekile ukuphatha impilo yempilo yokuya esikhathini ngokuphumelelayo. Ngokwamukela amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela futhi ulondoloze indlela yokuphila enempilo, ungagqugquzela umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini olinganiselayo kanye nenhlala-kahle.

data.heading: Ingabe ukopha okuphezulu kungaba uphawu lokungalingani kwe-hormonal?
data.title: Ukopha okuphezulu nokungalingani kwe-hormonal
data.body:
ukopha okuphezulu njengophawu lwe-hormonal ukungalingani: ukuqonda ukuxhumana

Ukuthola ukopha okuphezulu, eyaziwa nangokuthi amaMenorrhagia, kungacindezela nokuphazamisa impilo yakho yansuku zonke. Ngenkathi kungaba nezimbangela ezahlukahlukene zokopha kokuya esikhathini ezinzima, isici esisodwa esingase sibe yi-hormonal ukungalingani. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuxhumana phakathi kokopha okuphezulu nokungalingani kwe-hormonal ukukusiza uqonde kangcono lokhu kukhathazeka okuvamile. I-

Ukuqonda Hormonal Imbance I-

ama-hormone adlala indima ebalulekile ekulawuleni umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ukungalingani emazingeni e-hormone kungaphazamisa isigqi semvelo somjikelezo futhi kuholele ekungalweni, kufaka phakathi ukopha okuphezulu. Ama-hormone ayisisekelo abandakanyeka kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ngu:

  • I-estrogen: I-estrogen ibhekele ukukhula kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwe-sitene lining.
  • Prlogesterone: Progesterone kusiza ukugcina ukufakwa kwesibeletho futhi kukulungiselele ukukhulelwa okungenzeka. I-

    Indima yokungalingani kwe-hormonal ekwehliseni okuphezulu

    ukungalingani kwe-hormonal kungaba nomthelela ekwehlisweni okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini ngalezi zindlela ezilandelayo:

      I-
    • Ubungqabavu be-estrogen: Lokhu kungaholela egcekeni elisindayo lapho kukhala phakathi kokuya esikhathini. I-
    • Anovotion: ukungalingani kwe-hormonal kungaphazamisa inqubo ye-ovulation, lapho kukhululwa khona iqanda kwi-ovary. I-ANOVAND ingaholela ekuntuthulweni kokukhiqizwa kwe-progesterone, okwenza ukungalingani phakathi kwe-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone futhi kuholele empondweni aphezulu ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. I-
    • Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS): PCOS ukuphazamiseka kwe-hormonal kubonakaliswa yi-arlogen ephakeme (ama-hormone) amazinga e-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone. Abesifazane abanama-PCOs bavame ukuzwa izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni kanye nokopha okunzima.
    • Ukuphazamiseka kwe-thyroid: Ama-hormone e-thyroid abalulekile ekugcineni ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal emzimbeni. Ukungalingani kwama-hormone e-thyroid, njenge-hypothyroidism noma i-hyperthyroidism, kungathinta ukwenziwa njalo kokuya esikhathini futhi kufaka isandla ekwehlisweni okuphezulu.
    • perimenopause kanye nokuya esikhathini Ngokufanayo, ekunqabeni kokuya esikhathini, ukunqunyelwa kwemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini kuhambisana nezinguquko ze-hormonal ezingadala iziqephu zokopha okuphezulu.

      Ezinye izinto ezifaka isandla ekwehliseni okuphezulu I-
      • Uterine Fibroids: Lokhu kukhula okungelona iqiniso esibelethweni kungadala ukopha okusindayo noma isikhathi eside.
      • Endometriosis: Endometriosis yisimo lapho izicubu ezifana nezicubu ze-Uterine zikhula ngaphandle kwesibeletho. Kungaholela ezinkathini ezisindayo nezinhlungu.
      • Ama-polyps: Ama-polyps ukukhula kwezicubu ezingejwayelekile kwi-sitene lining engadala ukopha okusindayo noma okungajwayelekile.
      • Imithi: Imithi ethile, efana nezingcezu zokuphefumula kwegazi noma izindlela zokuvimbela inzalo ze-hormonal, ingaba nomthelela ekuphepheni okuphezulu njengomphumela oseceleni.
      • Izimo zokwelashwa:

        Ukuphatha ukopha okuphezulu ngenxa yokungalingani kwe-hormonal I- Kuya ngembangela eyisisekelo, izinketho zokwelashwa ezingaba khona zingafaka:
        • I-Hormonal Therapy: Umhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo angancoma ukwelashwa kwama-hormonal, anjengamaphilisi okulawula ukuzalwa noma izithasiselo zokuya esikhathini, ukusiza ukopha okuphezulu.
        • Izidakamizwa ezilwa nokuvuvukala (ama-NSAIDS): Ama-NSAIDS angasiza ukunciphisa ukopha kokuya esikhathini futhi adambise izinhlungu ezihlotshaniswa nokopha okuphezulu. I-
        • Izindlela ezihlaselayo eziqinile: Ezimweni ezithile, izinqubo ezihlaselayo, ezinjengezimbozo ze-endometrial noma i-Uterine Artery, zingenziwa ukwelapha ukopha kanzima.
        • Ukuhlinzwa: Ezimweni ezinzima noma lapho ezinye izindlela zokwelapha zingasebenzi, izinketho zokuhlinza ezinjengeHysterectomy (ukususwa kwesibeletho).

          Isiphetho I-

          ukopha okuphezulu ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kungaba uphawu lokungalingani kwe-hormonal. Ukuqonda ukuxhumana phakathi kokungalingani kwe-hormonal nokuphuma okuphezulu kungakusiza ukuthi ufune ukuholwa kwezokwelapha okufanele futhi uhlole izinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele. Khumbula ukuthi ubonane nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuxilongwa okunembile nohlelo lokuphatha okwenziwe ngezifiso.

data.heading: Ingabe imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini iphephile?
data.title: Ukuphepha Komkhiqizo Wokuya esikhathini
data.body:
Ingabe imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini iphephile? Ukuhlola Izici Zokuphepha I-

Imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ibalulekile ekuphatheni kokuya esikhathini nokugcina inhlanzeko ngalesi sikhathi. Ngezinhlobonhlobo zezinketho ezitholakalayo, kungokwemvelo ukuzibuza ngokuphepha kwazo. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuphepha kwemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ukukusiza wenze izinqumo ezinolwazi ngokunakekelwa kwakho kokuya esikhathini.

Izinhlobo zemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini I-

Ngaphambi kokuphuza ekuphepheni kwazo, ake sibukeke kafushane izinhlobo ezahlukene zemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini esetshenziswa kakhulu:

    I-
  • Amaphakethe okuya esikhathini: Lawa mapadi amunca agqokwa ngaphansi kwengubo ukuze aqoqe ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini.
  • ama-tampons: Ama-tampon afakwa esithweni sangasese ukuze amukele ukugeleza kokuya esikhathini ngaphakathi.
  • izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini: Lezi zindebe eziguquguqukayo zifakwa esithweni sangasese ukuze ziqoqe igazi lokuya esikhathini.
  • okulahlwe ngaphansi kwangaphansi: Ingubo elahlekile yenzelwe ukunikeza inketho ekhululekile futhi evuzayo yokufaka ngokulawula ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini. I-
  • Amaphakethe wendwangu kanye nendwangu yangaphansi yokuya esikhathini:

    Imithetho kanye namazinga okuphepha

    Imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ingaphansi kwemithetho ehlukahlukene kanye namazinga okuphepha ukuqinisekisa ikhwalithi nokuphepha kwabo:

    • Imithethonqubo kaHulumeni: Imizimba yokulawula emazweni ahlukene isetha imihlahlandlela nemigomo yemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ukuze iqinisekise ukuphepha nokuphepha kwabo. I-
    • Izindlela zokulawula ezisezingeni eliphakeme: Abakhiqizi balandela izinqubo zokulawula ezisezingeni elifanele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imikhiqizo yabo ihlangabezana namazinga okuphepha futhi akhululekile ekungcolisweni. I-
    • Ukuhlola kanye nesitifiketi: Imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ithola izinqubo ezinzima zokuhlola kanye nezinsizakalo zokuqinisekisa ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha nokusebenza kwazo.
    • Ukulebula izidingo: Imikhiqizo iyadingeka ukuhlinzeka ngemininingwane enembile ngokupakisha, kufaka phakathi imiyalo yokusebenzisa, izinto ezisetshenzisiwe, kanye nezingozi ezingaba khona.

      Izici zokuphepha okufanele ubheke

      Lapho uhlola ukuphepha kwemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini, kufanele kubhekwe izici eziningana:

        I-
      • Elensivishini: Imikhiqizo yokungaya esikhathini imvamisa yenziwa ngezinto ezifana nokotini, i-rayon, noma imicu yokwenziwa. Lezi zinto zokwenziwa zibhekwa njengephephile ekusetshenzisweni kwazo okuhlosiwe, kepha abantu abanezinzwa ezithile noma i-allergies kufanele bafunde ngokucophelela amalebula womkhiqizo bese ukhetha ngokufanele.
      • Amakhemikhali Angezelelo: Ukuya esikhathini kungaqukatha izithasiselo zamakhemikhali, ezinjengamakha noma amadayi, okungabangela ukucasuka noma ukusabela komzimba kwabanye abantu. Kubalulekile ukukhetha imikhiqizo ebhalwe njengethonde lamacebo ne-hypoallenic uma une-sensitivities. I-
      • I-Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS): TSS yisimo esingajwayelekile kodwa esibucayi esihambisana nokusetshenziswa kwe-tampon. Kubangelwa ukukhishwa kobuthi obukhiqizwa amagciwane athile. Ukunciphisa ubungozi, kubalulekile ukulandela imihlahlandlela yokusetshenziswa kweTampon efanelekile, kufaka phakathi ukuguqula ama-tampons njalo futhi usebenzisa ukuncishiswa okuphansi okudingekayo. I-
      • Ubuqotho> Imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini kufanele ibe yinhle futhi ingenamanye amaphutha noma ukulimala okungabeka engcupheni ukusebenza kwawo noma ukuphepha kwabo. I-
      • Ukusetshenziswa okufanele kanye nenhlanzeko: Ukulandela imihlahlandlela yokusebenzisa efanele, njengokushintsha amaphakethe noma ama-tampons njalo, nokugcina imikhiqizo emihle yokuhlanzeka, kubalulekile ukuphepha. I-

        Ukuqinisekisa ukusetshenziswa okuphephile

        Ukuqinisekisa ukusetshenziswa okuphephile kwemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini, cabanga ngezeluleko ezilandelayo:

        • Funda futhi ulandele imiyalo: Funda ngokucophelela bese ulandela imiyalo enikezwe ngumenzi wohlobo ngalunye lomkhiqizo ngamunye. I-
        • Khetha ukungamukeli okulungile: Khetha imikhiqizo ngokungena okufanele kokugeleza kwakho ukuvikela ukuvuza futhi unciphise ubungozi be-TSS. I-
        • Shintsha njalo: Shintsha amaphilisi, ama-tampon, noma izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini kaninginingi njengoba kunconywe nguMkhiqizi ukuze alondoloze inhlanzeko futhi anciphise ingozi yokutheleleka.
        • Ukuzijwayeza inhlanzeko enhle: Geza izandla zakho ngaphambi nangemva kokuphatha imikhiqizo yokuhlelwa ukuze unciphise ubungozi bokungcola. I-
        • Ukuqapha izimpawu zokucasuka noma ukutheleleka: Naka noma yiziphi izimpawu zokucasuka, ukungajabuli, noma ukutheleleka. Uma uhlangabezana nezinkinga eziphikelelayo, thintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

          Isiphetho

          Imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ngokuvamile ibhekwa iphephile ukuze isetshenziswe, inqobo nje uma isetshenziswa kahle futhi ngokuya ngemiyalo enikeziwe. Kubalulekile ukukhetha imikhiqizo evela kubakhiqizi abadumile, landela imihlahlandlela yokusetshenziswa efanele, bese ubeka phambili inhlanzeko yakho ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Uma unezinto ezikukhathazayo noma izinzwa ezithile, thintana nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngezeluleko ezenzelwe umuntu.

data.heading: Ngikukhetha kanjani umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini?
data.title: Ukukhetha umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini esifanele
data.body:
Ukukhetha umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini olungile: umhlahlandlela wokuthola i-Fit Fit yakho ephelele I-

Ukukhetha umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini okulungile kubalulekile ukuze uthole induduzo yakho, lula, kanye nenhlala-kahle ngesikhathi sakho. Ngezinhlobonhlobo zezinketho ezitholakalayo, zingaba nzima ukuthola ukuthi iyiphi elungele kangcono izidingo zakho. Kulesi sihloko, sizokuqondisa ngenqubo yokukhetha umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini, uma ucabanga ngezinto ezifana nokugeleza kwakho, indlela yokuphila, kanye nezinto ozithandayo.

Ukuqonda ukugeleza kwakho

Isinyathelo sokuqala ekukhetheni umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini oqonda ukugeleza kwakho. Cabanga ngezinto ezilandelayo:

    I-
  • Ukuqina kokugeleza Lokhu kuzokusiza ekutholeni izinga lokuzithoba okudingayo kumkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini. I-
  • Isikhathi sokugeleza: Qaphela ukuthi isikhathi sakho sihlala isikhathi esingakanani. Eminye imikhiqizo, njengokuya esikhathini izinkomishi, ingagqokwa isikhathi eside ngaphandle kokudinga ukuguqulwa. I-
  • flow ukungaguquguquki: Cabanga ngokuvumelana kokugeleza kwakho. Uma kungukuthi ngaphezulu koketshezi, ungahle ukhethe ama-tampon noma izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini. Uma kukhulu, amaphakethe noma isikhathi sengubo yangaphansi kungenzeka kufanelekile.

    Izinhlobo zemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini

    Okulandelayo, jwayezane nezinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini etholakalayo:

      I-
    • Amaphakethe okuya esikhathini: Amaphakethe agqokwa ngaphandle futhi afike ngobude obuhlukahlukene nobukhulu. Zilungele abantu abathanda inketho engahlaseli.
    • ama-tampons: Ama-tampon afakwa esithweni sangasese ukuze amukele ukugeleza kokuya esikhathini ngaphakathi. Baza ngamazinga ahlukene wokungena futhi balungele abantu abanempilo esebenzayo.
    • izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini: izinkomishi zifakwa esithweni sangasese ukuze ziqoqe ukuya esikhathini. Basebenza kabusha, benobungane, futhi belungele labo abafuna inketho ehlala isikhathi eside nezemvelo. I-
    • Ukulahlwa kwengubo yangaphansi: Ingubo elahlekile yenzelwe ukuhlinzeka inketho ekhululekile futhi evule-ubufakazi bokuphatha ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini. Zilungele abantu abafuna isisombululo sonke. I-
    • Amaphakethe endwangu kanye nengubo yangaphansi yokuya esikhathini: Zilungele abantu ababeka phambili ukuzinza futhi bafuna inketho ekhululekile futhi ephefumula.

      cabanga indlela yakho yokuphila

      Lapho ukhetha umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini, cabanga indlela yakho yokuphila nemisebenzi yansuku zonke:

      • Umsebenzi Womzimba: Uma uhola indlela yokuphila esebenzayo noma ubambe iqhaza kwezemidlalo, ama-tampon noma ama-rests wokuya esikhathini angasebenza ngokwengeziwe njengoba enikeza inkululeko ethe xaxa yokunyakaza.
      • Umsebenzi: Obunye ubuchwepheshe noma izindawo zokusebenzela zingaba nezidingo ezithile noma ukulinganiselwa okuphathelene nokusetshenziswa komkhiqizo kokuya esikhathini. Cabanga nganoma iyiphi imikhawulo noma izintandokazi ezingasebenza.
      • Induduzo: Abantu abahlukahlukene banezinketho ezihlukile zenduduzo. Abanye bangathola amaphakethe akhululekile ngokwengeziwe, kanti abanye bakhetha izinketho zangaphakathi ezifana nama-tampon noma izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini.
      • lula: Cabanga ngezinto ozithandayo ukuze kube lula. Imikhiqizo elahlekile efana nama-pads nama-tampons ilungele ukusetshenziswa kokuya ekuhambeni, ngenkathi imikhiqizo evulekayo idinga ukuhlanza nokulungisa.

        okuthandwa nguwe kanye nokucatshangelwa

        Okokugcina, cabanga ngezintandokazi zakho kanye nanoma yikuphi ukucatshangelwa okuthile:

        • Umthelela wezemvelo: Uma ubeka phambili ukuqina futhi unciphise imfucuza, izinketho ezisebenzisekayo njengokuthi izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini noma amaphakethe wendwangu kanye nezingubo zangaphansi zinobungane ngokwengeziwe.
        • Ezempilo nokuphepha: Uma une-sensitivities noma i-allergies, cabanga ngemikhiqizo enethanga le-hypoallenic.
        • Induduzo futhi kufanelekile: Ukuhlola imikhiqizo ehlukene ukuthola eyodwa ekulungele kakhulu futhi inikeza induduzo enkulu ngesikhathi sakho.
        • Izindleko: Hlaziya ukusebenza kwezindleko zezinketho ezahlukene, cabanga ngezinto ezifana nezindleko eziphambili, ukusetshenziswa kwesikhathi eside, kanye nezidingo zokulungiswa.

          Imicabango yokugcina I-

          Ukukhetha umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini okulungile yisinqumo somuntu siqu ngokuya ngezidingo zakho, okuthandayo nangendlela yokuphila. Cabanga ngezinto ezifana nokugeleza kwakho, indlela yokuphila, nenduduzo yomuntu siqu ukuze ukhethe umkhiqizo ovumelana kahle nawe. Unganqikazi ukuzama izinketho ezihlukile uze uthole eyodwa eyenza uzizwe ukhululekile futhi uzethemba ngesikhathi sakho.

data.heading: Kusebenza kanjani ama-pads okuya esikhathini?
data.title: Kusebenza ekulaleni amaphilisi okuya esikhathini
data.body:
Kusebenza kanjani ama-pads okuya esikhathini? Ukuqonda umsebenzi wabo kanye nokusebenzisa I- Banikeza indlela ethembekile futhi elula yokuphatha ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuthi amaphilisi okuya esikhathini, izingxenye zawo, kanye nemihlahlandlela yokusetshenziswa efanele ukuqinisekisa induduzo nokwenza kahle.

Ukuqonda ama-pads okuya esikhathini I- Ziqukethe izinto ezimbalwa ezibalulekile:
  • Ishidi eliphakeme: Isendlalelo esiphezulu se-pad senziwe ngento ethambile futhi enethezekile okuza ukuxhumana ngqo nesikhumba. Yakhelwe ukuhlinzeka ngomuzwa owomile nonethezekile. I-
  • I-Core Core: I-Core emsulwa iyingxenye ephakathi yePad ebhekele ukudonsa nokugcina ukugeleza kokuya esikhathini. Imvamisa yenziwe ngokhuni lwezinkuni, ama-polymers ase-superabsorbent, noma inhlanganisela yazo zombili. I-
  • Ishidi elinamandla
  • Imichilo noma amaphiko: Amanye ama-pads eza nemichilo enamathela emhlane ukuze azisize zibekele endaweni engaphansi. Abanye banamaphiko, okuyi-flaps egoqa phezu kwezinhlangothi zengubo yangaphansi ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa okwengeziwe ekuvuzeni.

    Kusebenza kanjani ama-pads okuya esikhathini? I- Nakhu ukuthi basebenza kanjani:
      I-
    1. Ukulungiselela: Ngaphambi kokusebenzisa i-mustst pad, qiniseka ukuthi izandla zakho zihlanzekile futhi zingaphumeleli pad kusuka emaphaketheni awo. I-
    2. Positing: li> I-
    3. I-Absorption: Njengoba ukuphuma kokuya esikhathini kukhishwa, umnyombo wokumunca wePad washeshe umube uketshezi bese uluguqula ubungozi bokuvuza nokukugcina uyomile futhi ukhululekile. I-
    4. Ukugcinwa: I-Pad Amuncunt Core egcina uketshezi, ukuyivimbela ukugeleza emuva esikhunjeni noma ezingutsheni zakho.
    5. Ukulahlwa: Uma i-pad isifinyelele umkhawulo wayo wokuthola amandla noma lapho udinga ukushintsha, usike ephepheni lasendlini yangaphansi bese ulisonga ephepheni lasendlini yangasese noma lisonge. Lahla ku-in a officed imfucuza.

      Imihlahlandlela Efanele Yokusebenzisa I- I-

      ukuqinisekisa induduzo enkulu kanye nokusebenza kahle lapho usebenzisa ama-pads okuya esikhathini, cabanga ngemihlahlandlela yokusebenzisa elandelayo:

      • Shintsha njalo: Kunconywa ukuguqula i-pad yakho njalo emahoreni ama-4 kuya kwayi-6, noma ngaphezulu uma kuthambisa noma uzwa ukuvuza.
      • Khetha ukungamukeli okulungile: Khetha ama-pads anenqanaba lokungenisa elifanele ukuqina kokugeleza kwakho ukuze uqinisekise ukufudumala kwakho ngaphandle kokungaphatheki kahle ngaphandle kokungathandeki. I-
      • Gcina uhlanzekile futhi omile I-
      • Ukulahlwa: lahla kahle amaphakethe asetshenzisiwe emigqonyeni ekhethiwe yokungcola. Gwema ukugcwala amaphakethe phansi kwendlu yangasese, ngoba kungadala izingqinamba zamapayipi.
      • Cabanga ukuvikelwa kobusuku: Ukusetshenziswa ubusuku bonke, cabanga ukusebenzisa ama-pads enzelwe ngokukhethekile isikhathi sasebusuku, njengoba beba isikhathi eside futhi bamukele. I-
      • Khetha izitayela ezintofontofo

        Isiphetho I-

        Ama-pads okuya esikhathini ayindlela esebenzayo futhi elula yokulawula ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini. Basebenza ngokuthatha futhi baqukethe uketshezi lokuya esikhathini, ukuhlinzeka induduzo nokuvikelwa ekuvuzeni. Ngokulandela imihlahlandlela yokusebenzisa efanele yokusebenzisa kanye nokukhetha ama-pads ahambisana nokugeleza kwakho nokuncamelayo, ungaqinisekisa isipiliyoni sesikhathi esinethezekile nesikhathazayo.

data.heading: Ingabe izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini ziphephile ukuyisebenzisa?
data.title: Ukuphepha kwezinkomishi zokuya esikhathini
data.body:
Ingabe izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini ziphephile ukuyisebenzisa? Ukuhlola ukuphepha nezinzuzo I- Njenganoma imuphi umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini, kubalulekile ukucubungula ukuphepha kwabo kanye nezinzuzo ezingaba khona. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuphepha kwezinkomishi zokuya esikhathini, ukubhekana nezinkinga ezifanayo futhi kugqagqase izinzuzo zazo.

Ukuqonda izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini I- Bafakwa esithweni sangasese ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini futhi bangadedelwa, bagezwe, baphinde basebenzise iminyaka eminingana. Nawa amanye amaphuzu asemqoka ukuze uqonde mayelana Nezinkomishi Zokuya esikhathini:
    I-
  • Izinto ezibonakalayo: Ezinye izinkomishi zenziwa nge-latex noma ngerabha, kepha lezi zingaze zilungele abantu abane-latex allergies. I-
  • usayizi futhi kufanelekile Ukukhetha usayizi ofanele futhi uzuze okufanelekile kubalulekile ukuze uthole induduzo nokusebenza kahle. I-
  • umthamo kanye nesikhathi
  • Reusable and Eco-Friendly: Enye yezinzuzo ezibalulekile zezinkomishi zokuya esikhathini. Ngokusebenzisa inkomishi, unganciphisa kakhulu inani lemfucuza elethwe yimikhiqizo yokulahla yokuya esikhathini.

    ukuphepha kwezinkomishi zokuya esikhathini I-

    Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zithathwa njengephephile kubantu abaningi uma zisetshenziswa kahle. Nayi eminye imininingwane yokuphepha ebalulekile:

      I-
    • i-hypoallergenic izinto: i-silicone yezokwelapha esetshenziswe ku-Custs Cups yi-Hypoallergenic, ehlisa ubungozi bokusabela komzimba. Kodwa-ke, abantu abane-latex allergies kufanele bakhethe izinkomishi ezenziwe nge-silicone noma ezinye izinto zamahhala ze-latex.
    • Ukuhlanza okufanele nokuhlanzeka: Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini kufanele zihlanzwe futhi zihlanzwa phakathi kwemijikelezo ukuze zilondoloze inhlanzeko. Landela imiyalo yomenzi yezindlela zokuhlanza, njengokubilisa noma ukusebenzisa izixazululo zokuhlanza. I-
    • Ukuvimbela ukutheleleka: uma isetshenziswa futhi ihlanzwe kahle, izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini kungenzeka ukuthi zibangele ukutheleleka. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukwenza inhlanzeko enhle, kufaka phakathi ukugeza izandla ngaphambi kokufaka noma ukususa inkomishi, nokugwema ukuxhumana nezindawo ezingcolile. I-
    • Ukugwema ubuthi se-Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS): Ngokungafani nama-tampons, ahlotshaniswe ne-TSS, okuhlangene nengozi ephansi yokudala lesi simo esingajwayelekile kodwa esibi. Ingozi ye-TSS ihlobene ngokuyinhloko ukusetshenziswa kwe-tampon kanye nenhlanzeko engafanele.

      izinzuzo zokusebenzisa izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini I-

      Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zinikeza izinzuzo eziningana ezidlula ukuphepha:

      • eco-friendly: Ngokukhetha indebe evuselelwe kabusha yenkomishi, unganciphisa kakhulu inani lokungcola okukhiqizwe ngesikhathi sokujikeleza kwakho kokuya esikhathini,
      • I-Actival-esebenzayo: Ngenkathi izindleko zangaphambili zenkomishi yokuya esikhathini zingase zibe ngaphezulu kwemikhiqizo elahlekayo, isikhathi sazo eside kusho ukuthi wonga imali ngokuthenga isikhathi eside ngokungafanele uthenge amaphakethe noma ama-tampon njalo ngenyanga ngayinye .
      • lula: Amandla okuya esikhathini anamandla aphezulu kanye nokugqoka isikhathi eside uma kuqhathaniswa nama-pads nama-tampons, kubenze bakwazi ukusetshenziselwa usuku lonke kanye nokuvikelwa kobusuku bonke.
      • Induduzo nenkululeko: Uma kufakwe kahle, izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zivame ukungabonakali futhi zinganikeza umuzwa okhululekile futhi ongavinjelwe ngokuqhathaniswa nemikhiqizo yendabuko yokuya esikhathini.

        Isiphetho I- Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukukhetha inkomishi esezingeni eliphakeme, yenza inhlanzeko efanelekile, bese ulandela imiyalo yomenzi yokufaka, ukususwa, nokuhlanza. Uma kukhona okukhathazayo noma izimo ezithile zezempilo, thintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuthola ukuthi inkomishi iya esikhathini ikulungele yini. Ngokusetshenziswa okufanele, izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zinganikeza inketho ephephile, ekhululekile, ne-eco-enobungane yokuphatha ukuhamba kwakho kokuya esikhathini.

data.heading: Ngingakwazi ukusebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ubusuku bonke?
data.title: Ukusetshenziswa kobusuku nemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini
data.body:
Ngingakwazi ukusebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ubusuku bonke? Ukuhlola Izinketho Zokuvikelwa Kwebusuku >

Ukuphatha ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini phakathi kobusuku kungukucatshangelwa okubalulekile kwabantu phakathi nemijikelezo yabo yokuya esikhathini. Kunemikhiqizo ehlukahlukene yokuya esikhathini etholakalayo eklanyelwe ukusetshenziswa kobusuku obubodwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola izinketho zokuvikelwa ebusuku futhi sinikeze umhlahlandlela ngokusebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ubusuku bonke.

Ukubaluleka kokuvikelwa ebusuku I-

Ukuvikelwa okwanele ngesikhathi sokulala kubalulekile ukuvikela ukuvuza, gcina inhlanzeko, futhi uqinisekise ukuphumula kobusuku obukhululekile. Imikhiqizo ebusuku yokuya esikhathini inikela ngokungenisa okuphezulu kanye nokuvuselelwa okuthuthukile ukuze kuhlaliswe ukugeleza okunzima okuhlangenwe nakho ngesikhathi sokulala.

Izinketho zokuvikelwa ubusuku bonke

Uma kukhulunywa ngokukhetha imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ukuze isetshenziswe ubusuku bonke, izinketho eziningi ziyatholakala:

  • 1. Amaphaphu Ebusuku Obusuku Zinde futhi zibanzi kunamaphilisi ajwayelekile, ngokuthola ukwanda kokusingatha ukuhamba okusindayo. Lawa ma-pads ajwayele ukuba nezici ezengeziwe ezifana namaphiko noma ukunamathela okwengeziwe ukuze uwavikele endaweni.
  • 2. Ama-tampons angejwayelekile angenayo: Uma ukhetha ukusebenzisa ama-tampons, cabanga ukusebenzisa izinhlobo ezahlukene zokusebenzisa ubusuku bonke. Lawa ma-tampon anesikhundla esiphakeme futhi angashiywa endaweni isikhathi eside, ukuhlinzeka ukuvikelwa kokuvuza ngesikhathi sokulala.
  • 3. Izinkomishi Zokuya esikhathini: Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini ziyindlela enhle yokusebenzisa ubusuku bonke. Banesisindo esiphakeme kunamaphakethe noma ama-tampon, avumela amahora afinyelela kwayi-12 wokugqoka okuqhubekayo. Lapho kufakwe kahle, izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zihlinzeka ngokuvikelwa okungenakuvuza futhi zingathola ukuhamba okusindayo phakathi nobusuku.
  • 4. I-wanderwear yangaphansi ye-underward yangaphansi ebusuku Lezi zingubo zangaphansi zenziwa ngezinto zokuzivikela futhi zinikeze ngokuvikelwa okuzungezile, okufana namaphilisi, kodwa ngokulula kwengubo yangaphansi.

    Amathiphu wokusebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ubusuku bonke

    Ukuqinisekisa induduzo enkulu nokusebenza kahle lapho usebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ubusuku bonke, landela lezi zeluleko:

      I-
    • Khetha ukudonsa okulungile: Khetha umkhiqizo onezinga eliphakeme lokuthola ukwamukela ukuhamba okuthe xaxa okuhlangenwe nakho ngesikhathi sokulala. Lokhu kuzosiza ukuvikela ukuvuza nokuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa okwanele ubusuku bonke. I-
    • Shintsha ngaphambi kokulala: Uma usebenzisa ama-pads noma ama-tampon, qiniseka ukuthi ushintshela kumkhiqizo omusha ngaphambi kokulala. Lokhu kuzohlinzeka ngesiqalo esihlanzekile futhi kunciphise ubungozi bokuvuza phakathi namahora okuqala okulala.
    • ukuma kahle: Ukuqinisekisa ukuma kahle kwamaphakethe, ama-tampon, noma izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini ukuvikela ukuguquka phakathi kobusuku. Lokhu kuzosiza ukugcina okulondekile okuphelele nokuvimbela ukuvuza.
    • Landela imiyalo yomenzi: Funda bese ulandela imiyalo yomenzi yomkhiqizo ngamunye wokuya esikhathini ukuze uqinisekise ukusetshenziswa okufanele nokuvikelwa okuphezulu. Lokhu kufaka imihlahlandlela ekufakweni, ekususweni, kanye nesikhathi esinconyiwe sokugqoka.
    • Cabanga ukuvikelwa kwesipele:

      Isiphetho I- Kunezindlela eziningi ezitholakalayo, kufaka phakathi ama-pads abusuku, ama-tampons angejwayelekile, izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini, nezingubo zangaphansi ezilahlwayo. Ngokukhetha umkhiqizo ofanele futhi ulandele imihlahlandlela yokusebenzisa efanele, ungaphatha ngokuqiniseka ukugeleza kwakho kokuya esikhathini ubusuku bonke futhi uvuke uzizwe umunwe futhi uvikelwe.

data.heading: Ingabe imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ingabangela ukungezwani komzimba noma ukucasuka?
data.title: I-allergies nokucasulwa kusuka emikhiqizweni yokuya esikhathini
data.body:
ingabe imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ingabangela ukungezwani komzimba noma ukucasuka? Ukuqonda ubungozi nokuvimbela

Imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini idlala indima ebalulekile ekuphatheni ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini, kepha kubalulekile ukucubungula izingozi ezingaba khona zokungezwani komzimba noma ukucasuka okuhambisana nokusetshenziswa kwazo. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola amathuba okubalwa komzimba noma ukucasuka okubangelwa yimikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini futhi sinikeze ukuholwa ekuvinjelweni nasekuphatheni. I-

Ama-Allergenergenergen kanye ne-IRRITAntnts I- Nawa amanye ama-allergener angenzeka kanye nezinto ezicasulayo ezihambisana nemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini:
  • Amakha: Imikhiqizo ethile yokuya esikhathini, efana namaphakethe anephupho noma ama-tampons, aqukethe amakha angenza ukucasuka noma ukusabela komzimba kwabanye abantu.
  • I-latex: i-latex isetshenziswa emikhiqizweni ethile yokuya esikhathini, njengamakhondomu we-latex noma izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zenjoloba. Abantu abane-latex allergies bangathola ukusabela komzimba noma ukucasuka lapho besebenzisa le mikhiqizo.
  • Amakhemikhali: Amakhemikhali athile, njengamadayi, chlorine, noma angezelisi, angaba khona emikhiqizweni yokuya esikhathini. Lokhu kungadala ukucasuka kwesikhumba noma ukusabela komzimba kubantu ababucayi. I-
  • Adhesives kanye ne-glues: Izinto ezinamathela ezinama-pads noma ama-panty ama-liners, futhi ngezinye izikhathi ezisetshenziselwa ukucasuka kwesikhumba noma ukusabela komzimba kwabanye abantu. I-

    ukuvikela kanye nokuphathwa I- Nawa amanye amathiphu wokunciphisa amathuba okulalela noma ukucasuka:
    • Khetha imikhiqizo engakhohliwe: Khetha imikhiqizo engakhokhwanga engabonakali ukugwema ukubonwa okungaba khona kumakha angenza ukucasuka noma ukusabela komzimba.
    • Bheka amalebula ama-latex-free:
    • Cabanga ngezinketho eziphilayo noma zemvelo I-
    • Funda amalebula nemininingwane yomkhiqizo:
    • qapha impendulo yomzimba wakho: Naka ukusabela komzimba wakho lapho usebenzisa umkhiqizo omusha wokuya esikhathini. Uma uhlangabezana nanoma yiziphi izimpawu ezingejwayelekile ezinjengokuluma, ubomvu, noma ukungaphatheki kahle, uyeke ukusebenzisa futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma kunesidingo.
    • Ukuzijwayeza inhlanzeko enhle: Gcina imikhuba emihle yokuhlanzeka ngokushintsha imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini njalo, ukugeza izandla ngaphambi nangemva kokuphatha imikhiqizo efanelekile.

      Ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa I- Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bangasiza ekuboneni imbangela yezimpawu zakho futhi banikeze izincomo ezifanele noma ezinye izindlela zokuya esikhathini.

      Isiphetho I-

      ngenkathi i-allergies noma ukucasuka kusuka emikhiqizweni yokuya esikhathini akujwayelekile, kungenzeka kwabanye abantu. Ngokwazi ama-allergen angaba khona kanye nokuhanjiswa, ukukhetha imikhiqizo efanelekile, futhi enze inhlanzeko enhle, unganciphisa ubungozi bokuthola ukusabela komzimba noma ukucasuka. Uma unezinto ezikhathazayo noma uhlangabezana nezimpawu eziphikelelayo, thintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuholwa nezinye izinketho ezihambisana kangcono nezidingo zakho.

data.heading: Ngisebenzisa kanjani ama-tampon kahle?
data.title: Ukusetshenziswa kahle kwama-tampons
data.body:
Ungawasebenzisa kanjani ama-tampon ngokufanele: umhlahlandlela wesinyathelo ngesinyathelo senduduzo nokuphepha I-

ama-tampon ayikhetho elithandwayo lokulawula ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini ngenxa yokusebenziseka kalula nangokuqonda. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukubasebenzisa kahle ukuqinisekisa induduzo, ukusebenza ngempumelelo, futhi unciphise ubungozi banoma yiziphi izinkinga ezingaba khona. Kulesi sihloko, sinikeza umhlahlandlela wesinyathelo ngesinyathelo sendlela yokusebenzisa ama-tampon kahle. I-

Isinyathelo 1: Khetha i-Tampon Consorbecy I-

Qala ngokukhetha ukutholwa okufanele kwe-tampon kokugeleza kwakho kokuya esikhathini. Ama-tampon atholakala emazingeni ahlukahlukene wokungena, ngokujwayelekile akhonjiswa ngokukhanya, okujwayelekile, okuphezulu, noma okuphezulu kakhulu. Khetha ukudonsa okufana nokugeleza kwakho ukuvikela ukuvuza futhi uqinisekise induduzo.

Isinyathelo 2: Geza izandla zakho I-

ngaphambi kokufaka i-tampon, geza izandla zakho kahle ngensipho nangamanzi. Lokhu kusiza ukunciphisa ingozi yokwethula noma yimaphi amagciwane esithweni sakho sangasese sangasese, ukunciphisa amathuba okutheleleka. I-

Isinyathelo 3: Ngena esimweni esihle I-

Thola isikhundla esihle esivumela ukufinyelela okulula ku-vagina yakho. Lokhu kungahle kube nonyawo olulodwa oluphakanyisiwe esihlalweni noma esihlalweni endlini yangasese ngamadolo akho ahlukane. Khulula umzimba wakho ukwenza inqubo yokufaka ibe ntofontofo kakhudlwana.

Isinyathelo 4: Lungiselela i-tampon

Susa i-tampon kusuka emaphaketheni ayo. Zijwayeze ngezakhi ze-tampon, ezihlanganisa nomfakisicelo kanye ne-tampon emuhle uqobo. Qinisekisa ukuthi intambo yeTampon ilenga ngokukhululeka kusuka esisekelweni se-tampon.

Isinyathelo 5: Faka i-tampon I-

bamba umfakisicelo ngokuqinile ngesithupha sakho nomunwe ophakathi, ukugcina umunwe wakho we-index endaweni yokufaka umfakisicelo. Ngesinye isandla sakho, hlukanisa kahle amafolda esikhunjeni azungeze ukuvulwa kwakho sangasese. I-

Okulandelayo, beka ithiphu eliyindilinga lesicelo se-tampon ngokuvulwa kwakho kowesifazane. Ihlose kancane phezulu ibheke emuva komhlane wakho ophansi. Ngengcindezi emnene, eqinile, cindezela umfakisicelo esithweni sakho sangasese kuze kube yilapho iminwe yakho ithinta umzimba wakho. I-

Isinyathelo 6: Susa umfakisicelo I- Ngenkathi ubambe umfakisile, ngokushesha futhi uhoxise umfakisicelo ngokushesha esithweni sakho sangasese sowesifazane, eshiya i-tampon ngaphakathi. I-

Isinyathelo 7: Bheka ukubekwa nenduduzo I-

iqinisekise ukuthi i-tampon ifakwa kahle ngaphakathi kwabesifazane. Intambo kufanele ilenga ngaphandle kokuvulwa kowesifazane ukuze isuswe kalula. Uma uzwa noma yikuphi ukungaphatheki kahle noma i-tampon izizwa iphansi kakhulu, ungasebenzisa umunwe wakho ukuze uguqule isikhundla sawo ngobumnene. I-

Isinyathelo 8: Shintsha i-tampon njalo I-

Kubalulekile ukushintsha i-tampon yakho njalo ukuze ulondoloze inhlanzeko futhi uvikele ingozi ye-toxic shock syndrome (TSS). Landela imiyalo ekufakweni kweTampon yesikhathi sokunqatshwa okunconyiwe, kepha ngokuvamile, kungakuhle ukuthi ushintshe i-tampon njalo emahoreni amane kuya kwayisishiyagalombili.

Isinyathelo 9: Ukususa i-tampon

Ukususa i-tampon, geza izandla zakho futhi uthole isikhundla esihle. Donsela ngesineke intambo ye-tampon phansi kancane. Qhubeka nokudonsa kuze kube yilapho i-tampon ingaphandle ngokuphelele kwangasese. Lahla i-tampon esetshenzisiwe emgqonyeni kadoti, njengoba ama-tampon akufanele adonswe phansi endlini yangasese.

Amathiphu angeziwe nezindlela zokuphepha

Nazi izeluleko ezimbalwa ezengeziwe kanye nezinyathelo zokugcina ukukhumbula lapho usebenzisa ama-tampons:

  • Qala ngokushisa okulula: Uma umusha ngokusebenzisa ama-tampon noma unakho ukugeleza okulula, cabanga ukuqala ngenhlamvu okukhanyayo ukuze uqinisekise ukunethezeka nokuvimbela ukoma.
  • Musa ukugqoka ama-tampons ubusuku bonke:
  • Ungalokothi usebenzise ama-tampon aphelelwe yisikhathi: Ama-tampons aphelelwe yisikhathi angalahlekelwa ukusebenza kwawo noma abeke engcupheni enkulu yokutheleleka.
  • Funa izeluleko zezokwelashwa uma kudingeka: Uma uhlangabezana nokungaphatheki kahle, ubuhlungu bezempilo ngenkathi usebenzisa ama-tampons, bhekana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuholwa kanye nokuhlola.

    Isiphetho

    Sebenzisa ama-tampon kahle kungenza ukubhekana nokuya esikhathini kwakho kukhululeke kakhudlwana futhi kungakhathazeki. Ngokulandela le miyalo yezinyathelo ngezinyathelo, ukukhetha ukudonsa okulungile, futhi uzijwayeze kahle inhlanzeko, ungasebenzisa ngokuqiniseka ukuthi asebenzise ama-tampon futhi aphathe ukuhamba kwakho kokuya esikhathini kalula.

data.heading: Ingabe izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini ziphephile entsheni?
data.title: Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zentsha
data.body:
Ingabe izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini ziphephile entsheni? Ukuhlola Izinzuzo Nokucatshangelwa I- Kodwa-ke, intsha eningi ingahle ibuze ukuthi ngabe ukuphephelwa kokuya esikhathini kuphephile eqenjini lakubo iminyaka. Kulesi sihloko, sihlola ukuphepha kwezinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zentsha futhi sinikeze imininingwane ebalulekile ukuze ubasize benze isinqumo esinolwazi.

Ukuqonda izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini I- Zenzelwe ukufakwa esithweni sangasese ukuqoqa uketshezi lokuya esikhathini kunokuba likuthole njengamaphaphu noma ama-tampon. Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zisebenza kabusha, i-eco-friendly, futhi zinikeza izinzuzo eziningi zabantu bayo yonke iminyaka.

ukuphepha kwezinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zentsha I- Kodwa-ke, kunezinto ezimbalwa ezibalulekile okufanele zicatshangelwe:

1. Iminyaka yobudala kanye ne-COMMENT NEVEL I-

Intsha eye yaqala ukuya esikhathini futhi ikhululekile ngemizimba yazo ingabheka ukusebenzisa izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukuba intsha ibe nokuqonda okuyisisekelo komjikelezo wazo we-anatomy nokuya esikhathini ngaphambi kokusebenzisa ama-Confs Okuya esikhathini.

2. Ukufakwa okufanele nokususwa okufanele I-

Ukufakwa okufanele nokufakwa okufanele kubalulekile ukusebenzisa ama-Cups okuya esikhathini ngokuphepha. Intsha kufanele ilandele ngokucophelela imiyalo enikezwe ngumenzi we-Cup ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukufakwa okulungile, okulondekile, nokususwa ngomusa ngaphandle kokubanga ukungaphatheki kahle noma ukulimala.

3. Ukuhlanzeka nokuhlanza I-

Ukugcina ukuhlanzeka okuhle kubalulekile lapho usebenzisa ama-Confs Okuya esikhathini. Intsha kufanele igeze izandla zabo kahle ngaphambi kokufaka noma isuse inkomishi. Ngokwengeziwe, izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zidinga ukukhishwa, zivuthwe, futhi zihlanzwe kahle phakathi kokusetshenziswa. Kubalulekile ukuba intsha iqonde futhi ilandele izindlela zokuhlanza ezinconyelwe zokuhlanzwa izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini.

4. Ukuqapha ukugeleza kokuya esikhathini I-

Intsha esebenzisa izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini kufanele ibe ntofontofo ngokubheka ukuhamba kwayo kokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukuthi ukhiphe inkomishi njalo ukuze ugweme ukuvuza nokungakhululeki okungaba khona. Intsha kufanele futhi yazi nganoma yiluphi ushintsho kuphethini labo lokugeleza noma yiziphi izimpawu ezingajwayelekile ezingadinga ukunakekelwa kwezokwelashwa.

izinzuzo zezinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zentsha

Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zinikeza izinzuzo eziningi zentsha:

    I-
  • Isikhathi eside sokugqoka: Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zingagqokwa kuze kube amahora angu-12, ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa okunde ngokuqhathaniswa namaphilisi noma ama-tampons. Lokhu kungazuzisa kakhulu ngentsha enamashejuli amatasa noma ukufinyelela okulinganiselwe ezindaweni zokuphumula.
  • Ukusebenza kwezindleko: Izindebe zokuya esikhathini zisebenza kabusha futhi zingahlala iminyaka eminingana ngokunakekelwa okufanele. Lokhu kubenza inketho engabizi kakhulu ngokuqhathaniswa namaphakethe alahlekile noma ama-tampons. I-
  • Ukusimama
  • Induduzo nenkululeko yokunyakaza: Uma ifakwe kahle, kuvunyelwe ukunyakaza okungavinjelwe, kufaka phakathi imisebenzi efana nokubhukuda, ezemidlalo, noma ukusetshenziselwa ubusuku bonke. I-

    Ukubonisana nokusekelwa I-

    Intsha ecabanga ukusebenzisa izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini kufanele zibonisane nomuntu omdala omethembayo noma ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Banganikeza umhlahlandlela, baphendule imibuzo, futhi baqinisekise ukuthi osemusha ulungele le ndlela yokuya esikhathini. Ngaphezu kwalokho, izinsizakusebenza eziku-inthanethi, izinkundla, namaqembu okusekela anganikeza ukuqonda okubalulekile kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwabanye abasebenzisi.

    Isiphetho I-

    izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zingaba ukukhetha okuphephile futhi okusebenzayo kwentsha. Ngemfundo efanelekile, ukuholwa, kanye nokubambelela ezinhlwini zokuhlanzeka, intsha ingakwazi ukunethezeka futhi ngokuqiniseka sebenzisa inkomishi yokuya esikhathini njengenye indlela eqhubekayo futhi elula emikhiqizweni yokuya esikhathini yendabuko.

data.heading: Yimiphi imikhiqizo emihle yokuya esikhathini yezikhathi ezinzima?
data.title: Imikhiqizo emihle yokuya esikhathini yezikhathi ezinzima
data.body:
I-

Ukuphatha Izikhathi Ezisindayo: Imikhiqizo Ehamba Phambili Yokuya esikhathini yokugeleza okusindayo

Izikhathi ezinzima, ezaziwa nangokuthi amaMenorrhagia, kungaba inselele ukuphatha. Ngenhlanhla, kunemikhiqizo ehlukahlukene yokuya esikhathini eyenzelwe ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa okuphelele kanye nenduduzo yabantu abanokugeleza okusindayo. Kulesi sihloko, sihlola imikhiqizo emihle yokuya esikhathini yezikhathi ezinzima ukukusiza ekutholeni inketho efanelekile yezidingo zakho.

1. Amaphakethe Okuya esikhathini anokungena okuphezulu

Amaphakethe okuya esikhathini angukukhetha okuvamile kubantu abanezikhathi ezinzima. Funa ama-pads enzelwe ngokukhethekile ukugeleza okusindayo noma ukusetshenziswa kobusuku bonke. Lawa ma-pads avame ukucacisa ukumbozwa okuyisisekelo okuphezulu okubanzi nokuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa okuphezulu ekuvuza. Khetha ama-pads anamazinga aphezulu wokungenisa, njengaleyo ebizelwe "Super" noma "Super Plus." Ngokwengeziwe, cabanga ngamaphaphu anamaphiko okuphepha okungeziwe.

2. Ama-tampon anokutholwa okuphezulu I-

ama-tampon nayo ingasebenza ngokulawula isikhathi esindayo. Khetha ama-tampon anamazinga aphezulu wokungenisa, njenge "Super" noma "Super Plus." Kubalulekile ukushintsha ama-tampon njalo ukuvikela ukuvuza nokunciphisa ubungozi be-toxic shock syndrome (TSS). Cabanga ama-tampon abhangqa ngama-panty liners noma ama-pads wokuvikelwa okungeziwe, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi sokuhamba esindayo.

3. Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini I-

izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini ziyindlela ethandwa kakhulu yabantu abanezikhathi ezinzima. Lezi zinkomishi ze-silicone ezakhiwe ngocingo zifakwa esithweni sangasese ukuze ziqoqe igazi lokuya esikhathini. Izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini zinesilinganiso esiphakeme kunama-tampon nama-pads, avumela isikhathi sokugqoka isikhathi eside futhi anciphise isidingo sezinguquko ezivame njalo. Bheka izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini eziklanyelwe ngokukhethekile ukugeleza okusindayo, okuvame ukuba namasayizi amakhulu noma umthamo ophakeme.

4. Isikhathi sanderwear I-

isikhathi sanderwear ngumkhiqizo omusha wokuya esikhathini othole ukuthandwa ngempahla yawo ephezulu yokuthola nokubumbana. Lezi zingubo zangaphansi eziklanywe ngokukhethekile zinezendlalelo eziningi, kufaka phakathi ungqimba olunomswakama-olingene nomgogodla omunca, ukuhlinzeka ukuvikelwa okuthembekile ekuhambeni okusindayo. Isikhathi esingaphansi kwengubo singasetshenziswa sodwa ngezinsuku ezilula noma njengesendlalelo esingeziwe sokuvikelwa ngama-tampon noma izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini ngezinsuku ezinzima.

5. Ama-Underpads achithekayo I-

I-Underpads elahlekile, esetshenziselwa ukwelashwa ngezinjongo zokwelashwa, ingaba inketho enhle kakhulu yokulawula izikhathi ezinzima. Lawa ma-pads amakhulu amunca angabekwa embhedeni wakho noma ifenisha ukuvikela ekuvuzeni ngesikhathi sokulala noma ukuphumula. Ama-underpads alahlekile asiza kakhulu kubantu abathola ukugeleza okusindayo ebusuku noma bakhathazeke ngamashidi abo noma ifenisha yabo.

6. Inhlanganisela yemikhiqizo I-

yomuntu ngamunye ngezikhathi ezinzima kakhulu, ukuhlanganisa imikhiqizo eyehlukene yokuya esikhathini kunganikeza ukuvikela okuhle. Isibonelo, usebenzisa inkomishi yenkomishi yenkomishi noma i-tampon ene-pad emuncwana ephezulu noma isikhathi sangaphansi sangaphansi kunganikeza indlela ebekelwe amanani okuphatha ukuhamba okusindayo futhi unciphise ubungozi bokuvuza.

Ukucatshangelwa kokukhetha umkhiqizo ofanele

Lapho ukhetha imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ngezikhathi ezinzima, cabanga ngalezi zinto ezilandelayo:

    I-
  • Ukuqina kokugeleza: Hlola ubukhulu bokugeleza kwakho ukuze unqume izinga elifanelekile noma umthamo odingekayo.
  • Induduzo: Khetha imikhiqizo enikeza induduzo kanye ne-fit ephephile. Cabanga ngezinketho, usayizi Izinketho, nanoma yiziphi izici ezithile ezithuthukisa induduzo.
  • Isikhathi sokuvikelwa: Hlaziya isikhathi sokuvikelwa okunikezwa ngumkhiqizo ngamunye. Khetha imikhiqizo enezikhathi ezinde zokugqoka ukuze unciphise isidingo sezinguquko ezivame njalo. I-
  • Ukuvimbela Ukuvimbela: Bheka imikhiqizo enezici ezihlinzeka ngempumelelo okuvuthayo, njengamaphiko amaphakethe noma uphawu oluphephile lokuya esikhathini izinkomishi.
  • Ukuthandwa ngumuntu: Cabanga ngezintandokazi zakho, indlela yokuphila, kanye nokukhathazeka kwemvelo lapho ukhetha umkhiqizo wokuya esikhathini.

    Isiphetho I-

    Ukuphatha isikhathi esindayo kubalulekile ukuze induduzo yakho nokuthula kwengqondo. Ngokukhetha imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini, efana namaphakethe angenayo, ama-tamples, ama-tamples ukuya esikhathini, noma inhlanganisela yemikhiqizo, ungakwazi ukuphatha ngempumelelo ukugeleza okusindayo futhi ungenza ngokuzethemba yimisebenzi yakho yansuku zonke ngaphandle kokukhathazeka.

data.heading: Ngingakwazi kanjani ukukhulula izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini ngokwemvelo?
data.title: Ukukhululeka Kwemvelo Kwezinhlungu Zokuya esikhathini
data.body:
Izindlela zemvelo zokususa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini: amakhambi asebenzayo wesikhathi sokucindezela wesikhathi I-

izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini, ezaziwa nangokuthi i-dysmenorrhea, ingahle ingakhululeki futhi iphazamise inqubo yakho yansuku zonke. Ngenkathi imithi yobuhlungu obungaphezulu kwe-counter isetshenziswa kakhulu, kunamakhambi ambalwa wemvelo angasiza ukudambisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Kulesi sihloko, sihlola izindlela zemvelo eziphumelelayo zokudambisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini futhi sikunikeze imininingwane oyidingayo ukuthola impumuzo ngaphandle kokuncika kwemithi kuphela.

1. Faka isicelo sokushisa I-

Ukufaka ukushisa esiswini sakho esingezansi kunganikeza impumuzo enkulu evela ekunciphisweni kokuya esikhathini. Ungasebenzisa i-Heating Pad, ibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo, noma ugeze ngokufudumele noma ukugeza. Ukushisa kusiza ukuphumula izicubu futhi kuthuthukise ukujikeleza kwegazi, ukunciphisa izinhlungu nokungaphatheki kahle.

2. Ukuzivocavoca ngomusa I-

yokuzibandakanya emlonyeni, njengokuhamba, i-yoga, noma ukwelula, kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Ukuzivocavoca kukhipha ama-endorphins, okungokwemvelo ama-painkiller kanye nama-mood. Iphinde ikhuthaze ukugeleza kwegazi futhi inciphise ukungezwani kwemisipha, ukunciphisa ukuncipha nokungaphatheki kahle.

3. Itiye le-herbal I-

Ukuphuza i-herbal tea kungaba nomthelela opholile futhi uphule izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Amakhambi athile, anjenge-chamomile, i-ginger, kanye ne-peppermint, anezakhiwo ezilwa nokuvuvukala kanye nama-antispasmodic ezingasiza ukuphumula izicubu zesibeletho futhi zinciphise ama-cramp. Sip enkomishini efudumele yetiye le-herbal ukuthola impumuzo.

4. Amafutha abalulekile I-OPS EBUCHWEPHESHE IMALI ingasetshenziswa ngokwezibalo noma nge-aromatherapy ukukhulula izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Amanye amafutha abalulekile, njenge-lavender, i-sage yekharary, ne-rosemary, abe nezakhiwo ze-analgesic nezolile. Faka amaconsi ambalwa wamafutha abalulekile kumafutha ophethe futhi uwucwilisa ngobumnene esiswini sakho esingezansi noma usebenzise i-diffuser kawoyela ukuze ujabulele izinzuzo ze-aromatic.

5. Ukulungiswa kokudla I-

Ukushintsha Ukudla Kwakho kungasiza futhi ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Khulisa ukudla kwakho kokudla okune-Omega-3 Fatty Acids, njengezinhlanzi ezinamafutha, amafilakisi, nama-walnuts, njengoba benezakhiwo zokulwa nokuvuvukala. Yehlisa ukusetshenziswa kwakho kwe-caffeine, utshwala, kanye nokudla okusetshenzwe, ngoba kungaba nomthelela ekuvuvukeni nasezifanekisweni zokuya esikhathini ezandayo.

6. Ukuncishiswa kwengcindezi I-

ingcindezi ingandisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini, ngakho-ke ukuthola izindlela zokunciphisa ukucindezela zingaba usizo. Bamba iqhaza emisebenzini okusiza ukuthi uphumule futhi ungakhethi, njengokuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, ukuzindla, noma ukuzikhumbula. Ukunakekela inhlala-kahle yakho yengqondo kungadambisa ngokungaqondile izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini.

7. I-Acupuncture I-

Acupuncture, inqubo yendabuko yamaShayina yaseChinese, ifaka ukufakwa kwezinaliti ezincanyana ezindaweni ezithile emzimbeni. Kukhonjiswe ukususa ngempumelelo izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini ngokukhuthaza ukukhishwa kwama-endorphin kanye nokulawula ukugeleza kwe-Qi (amandla). Cabanga ukufuna i-acupuncturist enelayisense ekwelashweni okuphephile futhi okuhambisana ne-.

8. Ukuphumula okwanele nokulala I-

Ukuphumula ngokwanele nokulala kubalulekile ekuphatheni izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Ukukhathala kungabikwa izimpawu futhi kwandise ukungaphatheki kahle. Ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi unesheduli yokulala ejwayelekile futhi uzivumele isikhathi sokuphumula futhi uphinde ungene ngesikhathi sakho.

9. I-Magnesium Supplementation I-

Magnesium iyiminerali edlala indima ekuphumuleni kwemisipha nokuphathwa kwezinhlungu. Ezinye izifundo zibonisa ukuthi ukungenisa kwe-magnesium kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Xhumana nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwezempilo ukuthola ukuthi ngabe ukusekelwa kwe-magnesium kufanelekile kuwe futhi kunqume umthamo ofanele.

Isiphetho I-

Ubuhlungu bokuya esikhathini bungakhululeka ngempumelelo kusetshenziswa amakhambi emvelo. Ngokufaka ukwelashwa okushisa, ukuzivocavoca okumnene, itiye le-herbal, amafutha abalulekile, izindlela zokunciphisa ukuncishiswa, ukuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula, nokuphumula kwe-magnesium, ungathola impumuzo kusuka ekunciphiseni kokuya esikhathini ngaphandle kokuncika kwemithi ngaphandle kwemithi. Zama la makhambi emvelo ukuthola okusebenzayo kuwe futhi amukele isipiliyoni sokuya esikhathini esinethezekile futhi esijabulisayo.

data.heading: Ingabe izikhathi ezibuhlungu ziwuphawu lokuzala kahle?
data.title: Izikhathi ezibuhlungu nokuzala
data.body:
yizikhathi zobuhlungu uphawu lokuzala kahle?

abesifazane abaningi bathola izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini noma ukuqina ngesikhathi somjikelezo wabo wanyanga zonke. Yinto evamile engasukela ekuphambukeni okumnene nobuhlungu obukhulu. Abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuthi izikhathi ezibuhlungu ziyinkomba yokuzala kahle, kanti abanye bangabaza lo mbono. Kulesi sihloko, singena esihlokweni ukuthola ukuthi kukhona ukuxhumana phakathi kwezikhathi zobuhlungu nokuzala.

Ukuxhumeka phakathi kwezikhathi zobuhlungu nokuzala

Izikhathi zobuhlungu, ezaziwa nangokuthi i-dysmenorrhea, ngokuyinhloko zibangelwa ukukhishwa kwemisipha ye-Uterine. Ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, izinkontileka ze-Uterus zokuchitha i-lining yayo, futhi le nkontileka ingadala ubuhlungu nokungaphatheki kahle. Ngenkathi izikhathi ezibuhlungu ziyinto ejwayelekile kwabesifazane abaningi, akusona isibonakaliso sokuzala okuhle. I- Ubuhlungu bokuya esikhathini, ngakolunye uhlangothi, buhlobene nezinqubo zomzimba okwenzeka ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini futhi akubonisi isimo sokuzala. I-

i-Dysmenorrhea eyinhloko neyesibili nesekondari>

Kunezinhlobo ezimbili ze-dysmenorrhea: Ibanga lokuqala nelisekondari. I-Dysmenorrhea eyisisekelo isho izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini ezenzeka ngaphandle kwesimo sezokwelapha esingaphansi. Ngokuvamile kubangelwa ukukhishwa kwemvelo kwama-prostaglandins, ama-hormone-efana nezinto ezibangela izivumelwano zesibeletho. Lolu hlobo lobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini aluhambelani ngqo nokuzala.

I-Dysmenorrhea yesibili, nokho, ihlotshaniswa nesimo sezokwelapha esingaphansi, njenge-endometriosis, ama-fibroids, isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic, noma i-adenomyosis. Lezi zimo zingathinta inzalo futhi zingadala izinhlungu ezengeziwe zokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukuhlukanisa phakathi kwe-Dysmenorrhea eyinhloko neyesibili bese ufuna ukuhlolwa okufanele kokwelashwa kanye nokwelashwa uma kunesidingo.

ezinye izinkomba zokuzala I-

Ngenkathi izikhathi ezibuhlungu zodwa zingahle zingabi yinkomba enembile yokuzala, kunezinye izimpawu nezimpawu ezinganikeza imininingwane ngempilo yokuzala. Lokhu kufaka phakathi:

  • Imijikelezo ejwayelekile yokuya esikhathini: Imijikelezo yokungaqondakaliyo futhi ebikezela ukuya esikhathini ngokuvamile ikhombisa i-ovulation ejwayelekile futhi ingaba uphawu oluhle lokuzala. I-
  • Isilinganiso sokushisa somzimba
  • Card> CORVIAL MUCUS Ushintsho: Ukubuka izinguquko ku-marvical mucus kulo lonke umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ungakhombisa izikhathi ezivundile.
  • Ukuhlolwa kwe-ovulation okunamandla: Amakhithi wokuqagela we-ovulation angasiza ekutholeni ubukhona bokutholwa kwe-hormone (LH), okudlula ngaphambi kwe-ovulation. I-
  • Impilo eqinile: Izici ezifana nokuhlolwa okujwayelekile kwe-gynecological, amazinga we-hormone, kanye nempilo ephelele yokuzala kunganikeza ukuhlolwa okuphelele kokuzala. I-

    Ukuphatha Izikhathi Ezibuhlungu

    Uma uhlangabezana nezikhathi zobuhlungu, kunezindlela ezahlukahlukene zokuphatha ezitholakalayo, kungakhathalekile ukuthi zihlangana kanjani nokuzala. Lokhu kufaka phakathi:

    • I-Over-the-Counter Heath Medication: Izidakamizwa ezilwa nokuvuvukala (ama-NSAIDS), njenge-ibuprofen, ingasiza ekuphuliseni izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. I-
    • Ukwelashwa okushisa: Ukufaka i-heating pad noma ukuthatha ukugeza okufudumele kungasiza ukuphumula izicubu zesibeletho futhi kudambise izinhlungu.
    • Ukuzivocavoca nokuphumula: Ukuzibandakanya ngokuzivocavoca okungomusa, njengokuhamba noma amasu okuphumula kunganciphisa ukungaphatheki kahle. I-
    • Ukuguqulwa kokudla: Abanye besifazane bathola lokho kunciphisa i-caffeine, usawoti, nokukhulisa ukudla kwezithelo, imifino, kanye ne-omega-3 fatty acids kungadambisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini.
    • Izindlela zokwelapha ezinamandla:

      Ukubonisana nomhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwempilo I- Bangakwazi ukuhlola isimo sakho esithile, babhekane nanoma yiziphi izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi, futhi banikeze umhlahlandlela owenzelwe wena ngokususelwa kwizidingo zakho.

      Isiphetho

      Izikhathi zobuhlungu, yize zivamile, azikho inkomba yokuzala kahle. Ukuzala kuyindaba eyinkimbinkimbi ethonywe yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi imvamisa yemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini, i-ovulation, amazinga e-hormone, kanye nempilo ephelele. Uma uhlangabezana nobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini obunzima noma ukhathazekile ngokuzala kwakho, kunconywa ukubonana nomhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwempilo onganikeza ukuhlolwa okuphelele futhi anikeze ukuholwa kanye nokwelashwa okufanele.

data.heading: Ngingakunciphisa kanjani izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini?
data.title: Kunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini
data.body:
Unganciphisa kanjani izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini: amasu asebenzayo wokukhululeka kokuya esikhathini

1. Sebenzisa ukwelashwa kokushisa I- Ungasebenzisa i-Heating Pad, ibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo, noma ugeze ngokufudumele noma ukugeza. Zama ngemithombo ehlukene yokushisa futhi uthole okusebenzayo kuwe.

2. Thatha imishanguzo yezinhlungu ephikisayo I- Landela imiyalo yemithamo yemithamo enconyiwe futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma kukhona okukukhathazayo.

3. Prakthiza amasu wokuphumula I-

Ukuhlanganyela kumasu wokuphumula kungasiza ukudambisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, ukuzindla, i-yoga, kanye nokwelula okumnene kungasiza ukuphumula umzimba futhi kunciphise ukungezwani kwemisipha. Faka le mikhuba enkambisweni yakho yansuku zonke, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi sokujikeleza kwakho kokuya esikhathini.

4. Vivinya umzimba njalo I-

yokuzibandakanya ekuzivocavoca njalo, njengokuhamba, ukugijima, noma ukubhukuda, kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Ukuzivocavoca kukhipha ama-endorphin, okungokwemvelo izinhlungu zemvelo kanye nezikhungi zemood. Inhloso okungenani imizuzu engama-30 yokuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo izinsuku eziningi zeviki.

5. Zama amakhambi amakhambi

Amanye amakhambi amakhambi abikwe ukuthi asiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Isibonelo, i-ginger, chamomile, nesinamoni inezakhiwo zokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi ingasiza ekunciphiseni ama-cramps. Phuza itiye le-herbal noma faka la makhambi ekudleni kwakho ukuze uthole impumuzo engaba khona.

6. Gcina ukudla okunempilo
