Ukudla ukudla okunempilo nokunokulinganisela kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Gxila ekudleni okunothile okunothile, njengezithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele kanye namaprotheni angenayo. Gwema noma unciphise ukusetshenziswa kokudla okucutshungulwe, ukudla okulula okunoshukela, kanye ne-caffeine, njengoba kungaba nomthelela ekuvuvukeni nasekukhuleni kobuhlungu.

7. Sebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini ngokunakekela I-

Ukukhetha imikhiqizo yelungelo lokuya esikhathini kungenza umehluko ekunciphiseni izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Sebenzisa ama-pads noma ama-tampons avumelane nezinga lakho lokududuza futhi uqinisekise ukuthi ashintshiwe njalo. Abanye abantu bathola impumuzo ngokusebenzisa izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini noma ingubo yangaphansi yesikhathi. Thola okusebenzayo kuwe.

8. Funa ezinye izindlela zokwelapha I- Lezi zindlela zokwelapha zisebenza ngokuvuselela amaphuzu athile emzimbeni noma ukuhlinzeka ukukhuthaza kagesi kobuhlungu. Xhumana nodokotela ofanelekile ukuze uhlole lezi zinketho.

9. Zinakekele I-

Ukuzinakekela kubalulekile ngesikhathi sokujikeleza kwakho kokuya esikhathini. Thola ukuphumula okuningi, sebenza amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela, ulalele izidingo zomzimba wakho. Ukubeka phambili imisebenzi yokuzinakekela, njengokuthatha okufudumele, ukujabulela ukubhula okuphumuzayo, noma ukuzibandakanya emisebenzini ekulethela injabulo nokuphumula.

lapho ukufuna izeluleko zokwelashwa

Ngenkathi izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini zivamile, izinhlungu ezinzima noma eziphikelelayo zingakhombisa isimo sezokwelapha esingaphansi. Uma izinhlungu zakho zokuya esikhathini ziphazamisa impilo yakho yansuku zonke, zikhulisa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, noma zihambisana nezinye mayelana nezimpawu, kubalulekile ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa. Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bangasiza ekuboneni noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi futhi zinikeze ukwelashwa okufanele.

Isiphetho I-

Ubuhlungu bokuya esikhathini bungaphathwa ngempumelelo ngamasu ahlukahlukene kanye nokuguqulwa kwendlela yokuphila. Faka ukwelashwa kokushisa, umuthi wobuhlungu obungaphezulu, amasu wokuphumula, ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, amakhambi amakhambi, ukudla okunempilo, nokuzinakekela ngendlela yakho ukuze unciphise izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Uma izinhlungu zakho zinzima noma ziphikelela, zibonisana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze alawule noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi. Khumbula, wonke umuzwa wowesifazane uhlukile, ngakho-ke kungathatha isivivinyo nephutha lokuthola izindlela eziphumelela kakhulu zokunciphisa izinhlungu zakho zokuya esikhathini.

data.heading: Ngabe izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini zihlala isikhathi esingakanani?
data.title: Isikhathi sobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini
data.body:
Ngabe izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini zihlala isikhathi esingakanani? Ukuqonda isikhathi sokuya esikhathini I-

Ubuhlungu bokuya esikhathini, owaziwa nangokuthi i-dysmenorrhea, kwenzeka okuvamile kwabesifazane abaningi ngesikhathi somjikelezo wabo wokuya esikhathini. Ingahluka kusuka ekungaphathekiseni okuthambile kuma-cramps amakhulu athinta imisebenzi yansuku zonke. Umbuzo othile ngabesifazane abajwayelekile, "kusho isikhathi esingakanani izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini?" Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ubude bezinhlungu zokuya esikhathini futhi sinikeze ukuqonda kulokho okubhekwa njengokujwayelekile. I-

Isikhathi sokuba izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini

Isikhathi sobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini singahlukahluka kusuka kowesifazane kuya kowesifazane. Imvamisa, izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini zihlala noma kuphi kusuka ezinsukwini ezithile kuya kwezintathu, ngokuqina okuphezulu kwenzeka ngosuku lokuqala noma amabili omjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, isikhathi nobunzima bobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini kungathonywa izici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi:

    Primary vs. Dysmenorrhea I-
    • I-Dysmenorrhea eyinhloko: Lokhu kubuhlungu bokuya esikhathini okwenzeka ngaphandle kwezimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi. Ngokuvamile kubhekwa njengengxenye evamile yokuya esikhathini futhi imvamisa ihlala izinsuku ezimbalwa.
    • I-Dysmenorrhea yesibili: Isikhathi sobuhlungu esihambisana ne-Dysmenorrhea yesibili kungenzeka kube isikhathi eside futhi sibi kakhulu, sivame ukunwebeka ngaphezu kwesikhathi esijwayelekile sokuya esikhathini.

      Ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa

      Uma izinhlungu zakho zokuya esikhathini zihlala isikhathi eside kunezinsuku ezimbalwa noma zithinta kakhulu ikhwalithi yempilo yakho, kungakuhle ukuthi kufune izeluleko zezokwelashwa. Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bangahlola izimpawu zakho, benze ukuhlolwa ngokomzimba, futhi bancome izivivinyo ezifanele zokuthola ukuxilonga uma kunesidingo. Bangakwazi ukubona noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi ezingase zibe nomthelela esikhathini eside sokuya esikhathini futhi unikeze ukwelashwa okufanele.

      Ukuphatha Izinhlungu Zokuya esikhathini

      Ngenkathi izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini zingenzeka okuvamile, kunamasu amaningana okusiza ukuphatha futhi adambise ukungaphatheki kahle:

      • I-Over-the-Counter Pain Fouel: Izidakamizwa ezilwa nokuvuvukala (NSAIDS), njenge-Ibuprofen noma i-Naproxen Sodium, zinganikeza impumuzo ebuhlungu bokuya esikhathini. Landela imiyalo yemithamo yemithamo enconyiwe futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma kudingeka.
      • Ukwelashwa okushisa: Ukufaka ukushisa esiswini esingezansi kungasiza ukuphumula izicubu zesibeletho futhi kudambise izinhlungu. Sebenzisa i-Heating Pad noma ugeze okufudumele ukuzwa izinzuzo.
      • Ukuzivocavoca nokuphumula: Ukuzibandakanya kokuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, ukwenza izindlela zokuphumula, nokulawula ukucindezela kunganciphisa ubukhulu nobude besikhathi sokuya esikhathini.
      • Indlela yokuphila enempilo: Ukugcina ukulala okunempilo, ukuthola ukulala ngokwanele, nokuphatha amazinga okucindezela kungaba nomthelela ekubukeni kwezempilo nokuya esikhathini.

        Isiphetho

        Isikhathi sobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini singahluka phakathi kwabesifazane. Ezimweni eziningi, izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini zihlala isikhathi esisodwa kuya kwezintathu, ngamandla aphezulu kakhulu okwenzeka ngosuku lokuqala noma amabili omjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Izici ezinjengokwehluka komuntu ngamunye, izinto ze-hormonal, izimo ezingaphansi, kanye nezinto zendlela yokuphila zingathonya ubude besikhathi nobunzima bobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini. Uma uhlangabezana nobuhlungu obude noma obukhulu bokuya esikhathini, kungakuhle ukuthi bafune izeluleko zezokwelashwa ukuze balawule noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi. Khumbula, kunamasu ahlukahlukene okuphatha atholakalayo okusiza ukudambisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini futhi athuthukise inhlala-kahle yakho ngesikhathi somjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini.

data.heading: Ingabe ukucindezela noma ukukhathazeka kubi kakhulu izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini?
