data.heading: Ngikukhulisa kanjani ukuzala kwami ​​ngokwemvelo?
data.title: Khuthaza ukuzala ngokwemvelo
data.body:
ukukhulisa ukuzala ngokwemvelo: Amathiphu wokuthuthukisa impilo yakho yokuzala I-

yomuntu ngamunye kanye nemibhangqwana ezama ukukhulelwa, ukuthuthukisa inzalo ngokwemvelo kungaba yindlela esebenzayo yokuxhasa impilo yokuzala. Ngenkathi ukuzala kuthonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi izakhi zofuzo kanye nezimo zezokwelapha, kunezinyathelo ongazithatha ukuze ukhulelwe amathuba akho okukhulelwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola amathiphu amaningana namasu okuthuthukisa ukuzala ngokwemvelo.

1. Gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo

Ukuthola indlela yokuphila enempilo kungaba nomthelela ekuzalweni. Nazi ezinye izici ezibalulekile ukugxila ku:

  • Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo: Sebenzisa ukudla okunempilo okunothile ngezithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni anciphile namafutha anempilo. Faka nokudla okukhulisa ukuzala okufana nemifino enamaqabunga, amajikijolo, ukwatapheya, amantongomane nembewu. I-
  • Hlala i-hydrate: phuza inani elanele lamanzi nsuku zonke ukusekela umsebenzi wezempilo onke kanye nokuzala.
  • Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo: ukuzivocavoca umzimba ngokulinganisela, njengokuhamba ngejubane, ukubhukuda, noma i-yoga, ukuze ulondoloze isisindo esinempilo futhi uthuthukise ukujikeleza kwegazi.
  • Gwema izinto eziyingozi: nciphisa noma ugweme utshwala, ugwayi, izidakamizwa zokuzijabulisa, kanye nokusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwe-caffeine, ngoba kungathinta kabi ukuzala.
  • Phatha izingcindezi: Sebenzisa amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezelwa njengokuzindla, izivivinyo zokuphefumula ezijulile, noma ukuzibandakanya kokuzilibazisa ukuphatha amazinga okucindezela, njengoba ukucindezela okuphezulu kungathinta inzalo.

    2. Qondisisa umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini

    Ukwazi umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini kungakusiza ekuboneni ukuthi ukhombe iwindi lakho elivundile, wandisa amathuba okukhulelwa:

    • Landelela umjikelezo wakho: gcina umkhondo wobude bakho bokujikeleza kokuya esikhathini futhi ukhombe isikhathi se-ovulation. I-ovulation ivame ukwenzeka ngokuzungeza okuphakathi komjikelezo. I-
    • qapha izinga lokushisa lomzimba we-basal: ukukala izinga lokushisa lomzimba wakho njalo ekuseni ngaphambi kokuphuma embhedeni. Ukwanda okuncane kokushisa kukhombisa i-ovulation.
    • Sebenzisa amakhithi wokubikezela we-ovulation I-
    • i-intercourse ejwayelekile: Hlela ukuba nokwazi ukuya ocansini ngesikhathi sewindows evundile, ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ngaphambi nangemva kwe-ovulation, ukukhulisa amathuba okukhulelwa.

      3. Gcina isisindo esinempilo I- Ukuthola nokugcina isisindo esinempilo kungathuthukisa amathuba akho okukhulelwa:
        I-
      • thintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo
      • Ibhalansi yokudla kwe-caloric: Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo okunikezela amakhalori anele ukusekela izidingo zomzimba wakho, ngaphandle kokuvinjelwa ngokweqile noma ukudla ngokweqile.
      • Bandakanya ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo: faka umsebenzi ojwayelekile womzimba kwinqubo yakho ukusekela ukuphathwa kwesisindo kanye nenhlala-kahle.

        4. Ibeka phambili impilo yezocansi I-

        impilo efanelekile yezocansi ibalulekile ukuze uzala. Cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

        • Qinisekisa ukuthi i-Intercourse ejwayelekile: Ukulala njalo komjikelezo wakho kuwo wonke umjikelezo wakho, kunokuba ugxile kuphela efasiteleni elivundile, ukuze ulondoloze ikhwalithi yesidoda nenani.
        • Prakthiza inhlanzeko enhle: gcina inhlanzeko enhle yangasese ukuvikela ukutheleleka okungaphazamisa ukuzala.
        • Sebenzisa ama-lubricunts ngokuhlakanipha: Uma kudingeka, khetha izinto zokuthambisa zokuzala ezingaphazamisi ukunyakaza kwesidoda noma ukusebenza.
        • Cabanga ngesikhathi sezocansi: ngemuva kokuya ocansini, hlala ulele phansi isikhashana ukuze uvumele isidoda ukuba sikwazi ukuya esibelethweni.

          5. Funa ukusekelwa kanye nokuholwa nguchwepheshe

          Uma ubhekene nobunzima ukukhulelwa, unganqikazi ukufuna ukusekelwa:

            I-
          • Thinta uchwepheshe wokuzala: Uma ngabe uzama ukukhulelwa ngenxa yokukhulelwa ngaphandle kwempumelelo, uthintana nochwepheshe wokuzala okwazi ukuhlola impilo yakho yokuzala futhi unikeze umhlahlandlela.
          • Joyina amaqembu okusekelana: Xhuma nabanye ababhekene nakho okufanayo ukuze babelane ngolwazi, okuhlangenwe nakho, nokusekelwa okungokomzwelo.
          • Cabanga ukwelashwa: Uma uhambo luba yinselele ngokomzwelo, cabanga ukwelashwa noma ukwelulekwa ukusiza ukubhekana nokuxineka kanye nemizwelo.

            Isiphetho I- Khumbula, uhambo lokuzala komuntu ngamunye luhlukile, futhi ukubekezela kubalulekile. Uma ukhathazekile ngokuzala kwakho noma ubhekene nobunzima obude lapho ukhulelwa, uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngezeluleko eziqondene nomuntu kanye nokuholwa.

data.heading: Imiphumela Yobudala Isebenza kanjani ukuzala?
data.title: Ubudala nokuzala
data.body:
umthelela weminyaka ekuthathweni: Ukuqonda ubudlelwano I-

yobudala iyinto ebalulekile ethinta ukuzala kwabesilisa nabesifazane. Njengabantu ngabanye ubudala, amandla abo okuzala ancipha kancane kancane, okwenza kube yinselele ngokwengeziwe ukukhulelwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukuthi iminyaka yobudala ibithinta kanjani inzalo nokuthi yini okudingeka uyazi ngokuzala ngezigaba ezihlukile zokuphila.

ukuzala kwabesifazane I- Nawa amaphuzu asemqoka ukuze uqonde ngokuzala kwabesifazane nobudala:

1. I-Peak Ukuzala

Ukuvundwa okuphezulu kowesifazane kwenzeka eminyakeni yakhe engama-20s nasekuqaleni kwama-30. Ngalesi sikhathi, amathuba okukhulelwa ngokuvamile aphakeme, futhi ubungozi bezinkinga ezinjengokuphuphuma kwesisu kanye nokulimala kofuzo kuphansi.

2. Ukwehla kokuzala

Ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35, inzalo yowesifazane iqala ukwehla ngokushesha okukhulu. Lokhu kwehla kubaluleke kakhulu ngemuva kweminyaka yobudala engama-40. Izizathu ezingemuva kwalokhu kwehla zibandakanya ukwehla kwenombolo nekhwalithi yamaqanda, ubungozi obukhulu bokuphazamiseka kwezempilo okuphansi.

3. Umthelela ekhulelweyo

njenge-Women Age, kungathatha isikhathi eside ukukhulelwa. Amathuba okukhulelwa njalo ngenyanga ancipha, kanye nengozi yokuzala inzalo kanye nezinkinga zokukhulelwa, njengokukhulelwa kwe-ectopic kanye nesifo sikashukela sokukhulelwa, ukwenyuka.

4. Ubuchwepheshe bokuzala (ubuciko) I-

ngenkathi ukuzala kuncipha ngobudala, ubuchwepheshe bokusiza abanjengobuvuli be-vitro (IVF) bungasiza abesifazane ukukhulelwa. Kodwa-ke, amanani empumelelo walezi zindlela zokwelapha futhi ancipha ngeminyaka.

Ukuzala kwabesilisa I- Nakhu okudingeka ukwazi ngokuzala kwabesilisa kanye nobudala:

1. Ikhwalithi yesidoda I-

njenge-Men Age, ikhwalithi nobungako besidoda bungakwehla. Ukubala isidoda, motility (ukunyakaza), kanye ne-morphology (ukwakheka) kungathinteka, kunganciphisa amathuba wokuvundiswa okuphumelelayo.

2. Ukuhlukumezeka kwezakhi zofuzo I-

iminyaka yobudala ethuthukile ihlotshaniswa nengozi eyandayo yokuhlukunyezwa kofuzo kwinzalo. Izimo ezifana ne-autism, i-schizophrenia, kanye nokuphazamiseka ngofuzo ngofuzo kuvame kakhulu ezinganeni ezizelwe obaba abadala.

Isiphetho I-

yobudala iyisici esibalulekile esithinta ukuzala kwabesilisa nabesifazane. Ngenkathi abesifazane bezwa ukwehla okubaluleke kakhulu ekungeneni kobudala, amandla okuzala kwabesilisa nawo ayathinteka. Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu kanye nemibhangqwana bazi ngoshintsho oluhlobene nobudala ngokuzala futhi bacabangele lezi zinto lapho uhlela ukukhulelwa. Uma ukhathazekile ngokuzala kwakho noma ubhekene nobunzima bokukhulelwa, ukubonisana nochwepheshe wokuzala kunganikeza umhlahlandlela owenziwe ngezifiso nezinketho zokuthola ukukhulelwa.

data.heading: Ingabe ukucindezela nempilo yengqondo kungathinta ukuzala?
data.title: Ukucindezelwa, impilo yengqondo, kanye nokuzala
data.body:
umthelela wokuxineka kanye nempilo yengqondo ekuthandeni I-

Ukuzala kuyinqubo eyinkimbinkimbi engathonywa yizinto ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi izinto zomzimba, zezemvelo kanye nezingokomzwelo. Ukucindezela nempilo yengqondo kunezici ezimbili ezibalulekile ezingathinta kakhulu ukuzala kwabesilisa nabesifazane. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ubudlelwano phakathi kwengcindezi, impilo yengqondo, kanye nokuzala, nokuthi ukuphatha lezi zinto kungathuthukisa kanjani amathuba akho okukhulelwa. I-

Ukuqonda ukucindezela kanye nokuzala I-

ingcindezi ukusabela komzimba kwezimo ezifunwayo, futhi kungathinta imisebenzi ehlukahlukene yomzimba, kufaka phakathi impilo yokuzala. Nakhu ukuthi ukucindezela kungathinta kanjani ukuzala:

1. I-Hormonal Imbabance I-

ingcindezi ibangela ukukhishwa kwama-hormone okucindezela njenge-cortisol, engaphazamisa ukulinganisela okubucayi kwama-hormone okuzala. Lokhu kungalingani kwe-hormonal kungathinta i-ovulation kwabesifazane nabesifazane be-sperm emadodeni, kunciphisa amathuba okukhulelwa.

2. I-Irrategurities Yekuya esikhathini I-

Ukucindezelwa okungamahlalakhona kungaholela ekulweni okungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini, kufaka phakathi imijikelezo engajwayelekile, izikhathi ezingekho (i-amenorrhea), noma izinguquko esikhathini nobungako bokuphuma kokuya esikhathini. Lokhu kungahambi kahle kungenza kube yinselele ngokwengeziwe ukubikezela i-ovulation kanye nesikhathi sokwelana kahle.

3. Ukuphazamiseka Umsebenzi wezocansi I-

Ukuxineka kungathinta i-Libido kanye nomsebenzi wezocansi, okuholela ekunciphiseni isifiso sokwenza ucansi nobunzima ekufezeni nasekugcinweni kwe-erection noma i-orgasm. Lezi zinkinga zingaphazamisa ubudlelwano obujwayelekile futhi zinciphise amathuba okukhulelwa.

Imiphumela yempilo yengqondo ekuthandeni

Izimo zempilo yezengqondo, njengokukhathazeka nokucindezeleka, nazo zingadlala indima ethandweni. Nakhu ukuthi impilo yezengqondo ingaba nomthelela yini inzalo:

1. I-Hormonal Regulation

Izimo zempilo yezengqondo zingaphazamisa ukulawulwa kwama-hormone abandakanyeka kumjikelezo wokuzala. Ukungalingani ngama-hormone anjenge-serotonin, i-dopamine, ne-cortisol kungathinta i-ovulation, ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda, kanye nokufakwa.

2. Umthelela omubi emsebenzini wezocansi I- Izinkinga zempilo yengqondo zingaba nomthelela ekucindezelekeni kobudlelwano, ukuzala okunomthelela ophakeme.

3. Izici zendlela yokuphila I- Lezi zinto zokuphila zingaba nomthelela ongemuhle ekuvundeni. I-

Ukuphatha Ukucindezela Nempilo Yengqondo Yokuzala Okuthuthukisiwe I-

Ukuphatha ukucindezelwa nokubeka phambili impilo yengqondo kubalulekile kubantu kanye nemibhangqwana ezama ukukhulelwa. Nawa amanye amasu okufanele acubungule:

1. Amasu wokuphathwa kwengcindezi

Hlola amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela okufana nokuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, i-yoga, noma ukwenza izinto zokuzilibazisa ezikulethela injabulo nokuphumula. Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo nangokulala okwanele kungasiza futhi ukuphatha amazinga okucindezela.

2. Funa ukwesekwa

Finyelela kuchwepheshe wezempilo yezengqondo noma umeluleki ukubhekana nanoma yiziphi izimo zempilo yezengqondo. Ukwelashwa kungakusiza ukukhulisa amasu wokukopisha, ukuthuthukisa ukuxhumana, nokuphatha ukucindezela ngempumelelo.

3. Enza kube ngcono Ukuzinakekela I-

Zinike isikhathi semisebenzi yokuzinakekela ekhuthaza inhlala-kahle ephelele. Lokhu kungafaka ukuzijwayeza ukucabanga, ukuzibandakanya ekuzilisheni okujabulisayo, ukuchitha isikhathi esisezingeni eliphakeme nabathandekayo, futhi kugcinwe ibhalansi yokuphila enempilo.

4. Ukuxhumana nokusekelwa ngaphakathi kobudlelwano I-

Ukuxhumana okuvulekile nokuthembekile nomlingani wakho kubalulekile. Yabelana ngemizwa yakho, ukukhathazeka, kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwakho okuhlobene nokuzala futhi ufune ukusekelwa komunye nomunye. Cabanga ukuya ekwelulekeni ezithandaneni nokwelulekwa noma amaqembu okusekelana ukuzulazula ohambweni olungokomzwelo ndawonye.

Isiphetho I-

ingcindezi nempilo yengqondo ibe nomthelela omkhulu ekuvumeni. Ukuqonda ubudlelwano phakathi kwalezi zinto nokuzala kunganika amandla abantu kanye nemibhangqwana ohambweni lwabo lokuba ngumzali. Ngokulawula ukucindezela, ukubhekana nezinkinga zempilo yezengqondo, futhi ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela, kungenzeka ukuthuthukisa imiphumela yokuzala futhi kwandise amathuba okukhulelwa okuphumelelayo.

data.heading: Ngingayithuthukisa kanjani ikhwalithi yeqanda lami ukuze ngifaneleke kangcono?
data.title: Ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yeqanda ukuze kuzalanwe kangcono
data.body:
Ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yeqanda yokuzala okuthuthukisiwe: Amathiphu namasu I-

yabesifazane abazama ukukhulelwa, ukwenza kahle ikhwalithi yeqanda kubalulekile ukuze kufezeke ukukhulelwa ngempumelelo. Izinga lamaqanda lidlala indima enkulu ekuvundiseni nasemathuneni okukhulelwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola amathiphu amaningana namasu okuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yeqanda futhi sithuthukise ukuzala.

1. Amukele indlela yokuphila enempilo

Indlela yokuphila enempilo ingaba nomthelela wekhwalithi yeqanda. Cabanga ngezinto ezilandelayo:

  • Yidla ukudla okunothile okunothile: Sebenzisa ukudla okulinganiselayo okubandakanya izithelo ezahlukahlukene, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni anciphile namafutha anempilo. Faka nokudla okugcwele kuma-antioxidants, njengamajikijolo, imifino enamaqabunga namantongomane, angasiza ukuvikela amaqanda ekucindezelekeni kwe-oxidative.
  • Hlala i-hydrate: phuza inani elanele lamanzi nsuku zonke ukusekela impilo ephelele futhi ulondoloze umsebenzi ophelele weqanda.
  • Phatha isisindo: gcina isisindo esinempilo ngokuzivocavoca njalo nokudla okulinganiselayo. Zombili zokuba ngokweqile futhi zikhuluphele kungathinta ikhwalithi yeqanda.
  • Gwema izinto eziyingozi: nciphisa noma uqede ukusetshenziswa kukagwayi, utshwala nezidakamizwa zokuzijabulisa, ngoba kungathinta kabi ikhwalithi yeqanda.

    2. Ukubeka phambili izithasiselo zokudla okunempilo I-

    Izithasiselo zingasekela ikhwalithi yeqanda ngokunikeza izakhi ezibalulekile. Xhumana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma yiziphi izithasiselo, kepha cabanga ngokulandelayo:

      I-
    • Folic acid: I-Folic acid ibalulekile ngokuhlanganiswa kwe-DNA kanye nempilo yokuzala. Ingatholakala emifino enamaqabunga, izithelo ze-citrus, kanye nezinhlamvu eziqinile.
    • Ama-acid ama-omega-ama-omega-ama-acidi angu-Omega-3 Ama-acid anezakhiwo zokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi angazuzisa impilo yokuzala. Zitholakala ezinhlathini ezinamafutha, imbewu ye-chia, nama-flaxseeds.
    • Coenzyme Q10: CoQ10 yi-antioxidant engathuthukisa ikhwalithi yeqanda kanye nomsebenzi we-mitochondrial. Iyatholakala njengesengezo futhi ingatholakala nasezitholweni zenyama, ama-sardine, kanye ne-broccoli. I-
    • Vitamin D: Amazinga e-Vitamin D abalulekile empilweni yokuzala. Thola ukuvezwa kwelanga ejwayelekile noma ubheke isengezo se-vithamini d uma kunesidingo.

      3. Phatha amazinga okucindezela I-P> Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona kungathinta impilo yokuzala nekhwalithi yeqanda. Sebenzisa amasu okunciphisa ukucindezela okufana nokuzindla, i-yoga, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, noma ukwenza imisebenzi ekulethela injabulo nokuphumula.

      4. Thola ukulala ngokwanele I-

      Ukulala okufanele kubalulekile empilweni yonke nekhwalithi yeqanda. Ihlose amahora angama-7-9 okulala kwekhwalithi ubusuku ngabunye ukusekela ibhalansi ephezulu ye-hormonal kanye nomsebenzi wokuzala.

      5. Cabanga nge-acupuncture I-

      Acupuncture, therapy yasendulo yamaShayina, ikhonjiswe ukuthuthukisa imiphumela yokuzala kanye nekhwalithi yeqanda. Thintana nodokotela ofanelekile ukuze axoxe ngezinzuzo ezingaba khona ze-acupuncture ngesimo sakho esithile.

      6. Nciphisa Ukuvezwa Kwezemvelo

      Gwema ukuvezwa ubuthi namakhemikhali ayingozi endaweni yakho. Khetha ukudla okuphathekayo lapho kungenzeka, kunciphisa ukuvezwa kuma-pesticides, bese ukhetha imikhiqizo yokunakekelwa komuntu siqu ngaphandle kwezithako eziyingozi.

      7. Thintana nochwepheshe wokuzala I-

      Uma ulwa nokuzala noma okhathazekile ngekhwalithi yeqanda, bonisana nochwepheshe wokuzala. Bangakwazi ukuhlola isimo sakho esithile, bahlinzeke ngezeluleko ezenzelwe umuntu uqobo, futhi bahlole izinketho zokwelashwa ezingaba khona.

      Isiphetho

      Ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yeqanda kuyisici esibalulekile sokwenza ngcono ukuzala. Ngokwamukela indlela yokuphila enempilo, okufaka ukucindezelwa okunempilo, ukuphatha ukucindezela, ukubeka phambili ukulala, ukucubungula ezinye izindlela zokwelapha, futhi kunciphise ukuvezwa kwemvelo, ungakha amathuba akho okukhulelwa. Khumbula, uhambo lokuzala komuntu ngamunye luhlukile, futhi ngifuna ukuholwa kuchwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo kubalulekile ngeseluleko nokusekelwa komuntu uqobo.

data.heading: Ngingakwazi kanjani ukukhulisa ukuzala kwabesilisa kanye nokubala isidoda?
data.title: Ukuqinisa Ukuzala Kwabesilisa kanye nokubala isidoda
data.body:
I-

Ukuqinisa ukuzala kwabesilisa kanye nokubala isidoda: Amathiphu namasu I-

Ukuvundwa kwabesilisa kuthonywa yizinto ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ukubalwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi. Kwabesilisa abazama ukukhulelwa, ukuthuthukisa ukubalwa kwesidoda nokwenza ngcono ukuzala kubalulekile. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola amathiphu amaningana namasu okuthuthukisa ukuzala kwabesilisa futhi sithuthukise ukubalwa kwesidoda.

1. Gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo I-

Indlela yokuphila enempilo ingaba nomthelela ngokuzala kwabesilisa. Cabanga ngezinto ezilandelayo:

    I-
  • Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo: Sebenzisa ukudla okunothile okunothile okubandakanya izithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni anciphile kanye namafutha anempilo. Faka ukudla okune-antioxidants, njengamajikijolo, imifino enamaqabunga, namantongomane, ukusekela impilo yesidoda.
  • Vivinya umzimba njalo: Bamba iqhaza ekuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo njalo ukuze ulondoloze isisindo esinempilo futhi ukhuthaze inhlala-kahle yonke. Gwema ukuqeqeshwa kokukhuthazela ngokweqile, okungaba nomthelela omubi ekukhiqizeni isidoda. I-
  • Gwema Ukusetshenziswa Kogwayi kanye Nezidakamizwa: Ukubhema kanye nokuzijabulisa kwezidakamizwa kunganciphisa ukubala kwesidoda nokuphazamisa ikhwalithi yesidoda. Nciphisa noma ususe ugwayi kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa ukuthola imiphumela yokuzala engcono. I-
  • umkhawulo wokuphuza utshwala: Ukuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kungathinta kabi ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Khawulela ukuphuza utshwala kumazinga alinganiselayo noma ukugwema ngokuphelele.

    2. Lungiselela impilo yezocansi

    Ukuqinisekisa impilo efanele ngokocansi kubalulekile ukuzala kwabesilisa. Cabanga ngamasu alandelayo:

      I-
    • Gcina umsebenzi ojwayelekile wezocansi: I-ejaculation ejwayelekile ingasiza ukuthuthukisa ikhwalithi yesidoda. Ihlose ukuba nomsebenzi ojwayelekile wezocansi kuyo yonke inyanga.
    • Prakthiza ukuya ocansini waphephile: Vikela ezifweni ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) ngokwenza ucansi oluphephile. Amanye ama-STI, uma ashiywe angalashwa, angaholela ezindabeni zokuzala.
    • bhekisisa izinto zokugcoba: Uma kudingeka, khetha izinto zokuthambisa zokuzala ezingenakuvimbela ukunyakaza kwesidoda noma ukusebenza.
    • Phatha izinga lokushisa langasese

      3. Phatha amazinga okucindezela I-P> Ukucindezela okungamahlalakhona kungaba nomthelela ongemuhle ekuthathweni. Sebenzisa amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela njengokuzindla, i-yoga, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, noma ukuzibandakanya emisebenzini ekusiza ukuthi uphumule futhi ungakhethi.

      4. Thola ukulala ngokwanele I-

      ukulala okwanele kubalulekile empilweni yonke nokuzala. Ihlose amahora angama-7-9 okulala kwekhwalithi ubusuku ngabunye ukusekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nokukhiqizwa kwesidoda.

      5. Gwema Ukuchayeka Ezintweni Ezilimazayo I-

      yehlisa ukuvezwa kobuthi bemvelo kanye nezinto eziyingozi ezingathinta ikhwalithi yesidoda. Nciphisa ukuvezwa kwezibulala-zinambuzane, izinsimbi ezisindayo, imisebe, kanye namakhemikhali atholakala ezindaweni ezithile zomsebenzi.

      6. Cabanga ngezithasiselo zokudla okunempilo I-

      Ezinye izithasiselo zikhombise amandla ekwenzeni ngcono ukubalwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi. Xhumana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuqala noma yiziphi izithasiselo, kepha cabanga ngokulandelayo:

      • zinc: I-zinc ibalulekile ekukhiqizeni isidoda kanye nempilo yokuzala. Ingatholakala ezindaweni zokudla zasolwandle, inyama ebuthaka, amantongomane nembewu.
      • selenium: Selenium yi-antioxidant esekela ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Ingatholakala eBrazil amantongomane, inhlanzi namaqanda. I-
      • Coenzyme Q10: CoQ10 yi-antioxidant engathuthukisa ukubalwa kwesidoda nokuhamba kwesikhathi. Ingatholakala ekudleni kwezitho, ama-sardine, kanye ne-broccoli.
      • Vitamin C ne-E: Lawa mavithamini anezakhiwo ze-antioxidant futhi angasiza ukuvikela isidoda ekucindezelekeni okuyi-oxidative. Izithelo zeCitrus, amajikijolo, nemifino enamaqabunga yimithombo emihle.

        7. Thintana nochwepheshe wokuzala I- Bangakwazi ukuhlola isimo sakho esithile, benze izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi bancome ukwelashwa noma ukungenelela okufanele.

        Isiphetho I- Ngokusebenzisa la masu, ungangezelela amathuba akho okuthola ukukhulelwa okuphumelelayo kanye nokwenza ngcono ukuzala okuphelele.

data.heading: Ukuzala kwabesilisa kufaka kanjani isandla kumathuba okukhulelwa?
data.title: Ukuzala kwabesilisa kanye nokukhulelwa
data.body:
Ukuzala kwabesilisa kanye nomthelela wawo ekhulelwe I-

Ukuzala kwabesilisa kudlala indima ebalulekile emanandleni yokukhulelwa nokuzala kabusha. Ukuqonda izici ezibangela ukuzala kwabesilisa nokuthi ziyithonya kanjani inqubo yokukhulelwa zibalulekile ukuthi imibhangqwana izama ukukhulelwa. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ukubaluleka kokuzala kwabesilisa ekukhulelweni nasezintweni ezahlukahlukene ezingakuthinta.

izisekelo zokuzala kwabesilisa I- Kunqunywa ngokuyinhloko ngempilo nokusebenza kwamaseli wesidoda. Ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda, motility (ukunyakaza), i-morphology (ukwakheka kanye nokwakheka), futhi ikhwalithi yesidoda ephelele iyizici ezibalulekile ekuvuthweni kwabesilisa.

Ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda kanye nekhwalithi I-

Ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda esinempilo kubalulekile ekukhulelweni okuphumelelayo. Amaseli wesidoda akhiqizwa kuma-testicles ngenqubo ebizwa ngokuthi i-spermatogeneis. Kuthatha cishe izinsuku ezingama-64-72 zeseli lesidoda ukuthuthukisa ngokuphelele nokuvuthwa. Ngalesi sikhathi, izinto ezahlukahlukene zingathonya ikhwalithi yesidoda:

  • I-Hormonal Balance: Amazinga anele ama-hormone, ikakhulukazi i-testosterone, ayadingeka ukuze ukhiqize kahle isidoda.
  • Izici zofuzo: Ukufakelwa kofuzo kungathinta ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi.
  • Indlela yokuphila kanye nezici zezemvelo: Izici ezinjengokubhema, ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwezidakamizwa, ukusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa, ukuvezwa ubuthi, ukushisa, nemisebe yonke ingaba nomthelela ongemuhle kwikhwalithi yesidoda.
  • Izimo zezokwelapha: Izimo ezithile zezokwelapha, njenge-VaricoCele (imithambo ekhulisiwe kuma-testicles), ukutheleleka, ukuphazamiseka kwe-hormonal, kanye nokuphazamiseka kwegazi, kungathinta ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda kanye nekhwalithi.

    Iqhaza lesidoda eConcept I-

    Ukukhulelwa kwenzeka lapho iseli lesidoda lifaka iqanda. Amaseli wesidoda kumele abhekane nochungechunge lwezinqubo eziyinkimbinkimbi ukufinyelela nokulungisa iqanda. Lokhu kufaka phakathi:

    • ukubhukuda: Amaseli wesidoda adinga ukubhukuda ngepheshana lokuzala labesifazane ukufinyelela iqanda. Isisusa sidlala indima ebalulekile emandleni abo okuhamba loluhambo. I-
    • ukungena: uma isidoda sifinyelela eqanda, kufanele ungene engxenyeni yangaphandle yeqanda ukuze uyivuselele. Ikhanda lesidoda liqukethe ama-enzyme asiza ukudiliza isithiyo seqanda. I-
    • fusion: Lapho isidoda singena eqanda, sincipha nge-nucleus yeqanda, sihlanganisa izinto zaso zofuzo kanye nokuqalisa inqubo yokuthuthukisa umbungu.

      Izici ezithinta ukuzala kwabesilisa kanye nokukhulelwa

      Izici eziningana zingathonya ukuzala kwabesilisa futhi zithinte amathuba okukhulelwa okuphumelelayo:

        I-
      • isidoda ukubalwa: Inani lamaseli wesidoda esisesidoda esisesizini laziwa ngokuthi ukubala kwesidoda. Ukubala kwesidoda okuphansi kunganciphisa amathuba okukhulelwa. I-
      • isidoda motility: amandla amaseli wesidoda ukubhukuda nokuhamba ngempumelelo kubalulekile ekufinyeleleni nasekuvuseleleni iqanda. Ukuhamba nge-spenm
      • isidoda i-morphology: ukwakheka nokwakheka kwesidoda kungathinta amandla abo okungena kwiqanda. Isidoda esingajwayelekile se-morphology singanciphisa amathuba okuvundiswa okuphumelelayo.
      • I-Erectile Dysfunction: Ubunzima ekufezeni noma ukugcina ukwakheka kungavimba ukuya ocansini futhi, kamuva, amathuba okukhulelwa.
      • izindaba ze-ejaculatory: Izinkinga nge-ejaculation, ezinjenge-ejaculation ngaphambi kwesikhathi noma i-retrograde ejaculation, kungathinta ukulethwa kwesidoda esikhwameni sokuzala.
      • Izimo zezempilo ezingaphansi kwazo: Izimo ezithile zezokwelapha, ezifana nesifo sikashukela, ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, ukutheleleka, nokuhlukunyezwa kwesakhiwo, kungathinta ukuzala kwabesilisa.
      • Izici zendlela yokuphila: Ukukhetha okungenampilo kwendlela yokuphila, okubandakanya ukubhema, ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwezidakamizwa, ukusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa, ukungasebenzi kahle, kungathinta kabi ukuzala kwabesilisa. I-

        Ukwenza ngcono ukuzala kwabesilisa kwe-Conction ephumelelayo

        ngenhlanhla, kunezinyathelo amadoda angathatha ukuthuthukisa inzalo yawo futhi andise amathuba okukhulelwa:

        • Ukwamukela impilo enempilo: Ukugcina ukudla okulinganiselayo, ukukwenza ngokuzikhandla, ukuphatha amazinga okucindezela, nokugwema imikhuba elimazayo njengokubhema nokudla ngokweqile kungathuthukisa impilo yonke nokuzala.
        • Ukuqinisekisa ukutholwa okufanele: Ukudla ukudla okunothile kuma-antioxidants, amavithamini, kanye namaminerali kungasekela impilo yesidoda. Kubandakanya ukudla okufana nezithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni ancikile, amantongomane, kanye nembewu kuyazuzisa.
        • Ukuphatha izimo zokwelashwa eziphansi
        • Ukugwema ukuvezwa kwezinto eziyingozi: ukunciphisa ukuvezwa ubuthi, ukungcola, nokushisa ngokweqile kungasiza ukuvikela ikhwalithi yesidoda.
        • Ukugcina isisindo esinempilo: ukukhuluphala futhi ukuba mkhulu ngokweqile kungawuthinta kabi ukuzala. Ukugcina isisindo esinempilo ngokudla okulinganiselayo nokuzivocavoca njalo kubalulekile.
        • esebenzisa ubulili obuphephile nokugwema ukutheleleka okuthathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI): Ama-STI angathinta inzalo. Kusetshenziswa ukuvikelwa nokuhlolwa njalo kungasiza ukuvikela nokuphatha ama-STI.
        • Ukuqapha njalo ukuzala: ukulandelela i-ovulation kanye nokuzibandakanya ekuvuneni okujwayelekile kocansi ngesikhathi sokuvundile kungakhulisa amathuba okukhulelwa.

          Ukubonisana nochwepheshe wokuzala I- Bangakwazi ukuhlola isimo sakho esithile, bahlole izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi banikeze umhlahlandlela wokwelashwa noma ekungeneleleni okungathuthukisa amathuba okukhulelwa.

          Isiphetho I-

          Ukuzala kwabesilisa kuthinta kakhulu amathuba okukhulelwa nokuzala kabusha. Ukuqonda izici ezithonya ukuzala kwabesilisa nokuthatha izinyathelo ezisebenzayo zokuthuthukisa ukuzala kungakhulisa amathuba okuthola ukukhulelwa. Ngokwamukela indlela yokuphila enempilo, ekhuluma nanoma yiziphi izimo zezempilo ezingaphansi, futhi ufuna ukuholwa kobungcweti lapho kudingeka, amadoda angakhulisa ukuzala kwawo futhi afake isandla ohambweni lokukhulelwa.

data.heading: Ingabe ukudla noma ukudla okuthile kungathuthukisa ukuzala kwabesifazane?
data.title: Ukudla kokuzala kwabesifazane
data.body:
Ukwenza ngcono ukuzala kwabesifazane: Indima yokudla nokudla I-

Ukuzala kwabesifazane kuthonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi iminyaka yobudala, ibhalansi ye-hormonal, impilo yokuzala, nokukhetha kwendlela yokuphila. Ngenkathi ukudla kukodwa ngeke kuqinisekiswe ukukhulelwa, ukudla okuthile kanye namaphethini okudla kungasekela impilo yokuzala futhi kuthuthukise ukuzala. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola umthelela wokudla okunempilo ngokuzala kwabesifazane futhi sixoxe ngokudla nokudla okungahle kube ngcono amathuba okukhulelwa.

Ukubaluleka kokudla okulinganiselayo kokuzala I-

Ukudla okulinganiselayo okuhlinzeka izakhamzimba ezibalulekile kubalulekile empilweni yonke, kufaka phakathi impilo yokuzala. Ukudla okuyindilinga kahle kungasiza ukulawula ibhalansi ye-hormonal, ukusekela umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, ukukhuthaza ovulation, futhi kwakha indawo efanelekile yokukhulelwa. Nazi ezinye izakhamzimba ezibalulekile nezinto zokudla okufanele zicatshangelwe:

Usizi I- Ukudla okunempilo ezanele kuhlotshaniswa nengozi ephansi yokuzala inzalo kanye nezinkinga ezithile zokuzalwa. Imithombo emihle yokoti ifaka imifino enamahlamvu, ama-legumes, izithelo ze-citrus, kanye nezinhlamvu ezivinjelwe.

Ama-Omega-3 Ama-Acids acid I-

ama-acid e-omega-3 ama-acid axhumene nempilo ethuthukisiwe kanye nempilo yokuzala. Bangasiza ukulawula ama-hormone, banciphise ukuvuvukala, futhi bathuthukise ukugeleza kwegazi ezithweni zokuzala. Imithombo yama-acid ama-omega-3 Amafutha afaka inhlanzi enamafutha (njenge-salmon nama-sardines), ama-flaxseeds, ama-chia imbewu, kanye nama-walnuts.

ama-antioxidants I-

ama-antioxidants asiza ukuvikela umzimba ekucindezelekeni oxidative futhi angazuza ukuzala. Basiza ukungathathi hlangothi okulimazayo kwamahhala okungalimaza amaseli okuzala. Izithelo nemifino enemibala, efana namajikijolo, isipinashi, i-kale kanye ne-peppers yensimbi, yimithombo emihle kakhulu yama-antioxidants.

konke okusanhlamvu I-

okusanhlamvu okugcwele kunikeza ama-carbohydrate ayinkimbinkimbi kanye ne-fiber, esiza ukuthi alawule amazinga kashukela wegazi futhi asekele ibhalansi ye-hormonal. Khetha izinketho eziphelele zokusanhlamvu njengerayisi elinsundu, i-quinoa, isinkwa sikakolweni sonke kanye nama-oats.

Amaprotheni asuselwa kuzitshalo

Amaprotheni asuselwa ekususelwa kwezitshalo, njenge-legumes, i-tofu, i-tempeh kanye nama-lentils, ziyizindlela ezinempilo kumaprotheni asuselwa ezilwaneni. Bahlinzeka izakhamzimba ezibalulekile ngenkathi bephansi emafutheni agcwele. Ukudla okususelwa ekudleni kuhlotshaniswe nemiphumela yokuzala ethuthukisiwe.

Amafutha anempilo

Ukufaka amafutha anempilo ekudleni kwakho kubalulekile ekukhiqizweni kwe-hormone kanye nempilo yokuzala. Imithombo yamafutha anempilo ifaka ama-avocados, amafutha omnqumo, amantongomane nembewu. Ihlose ukulinganisela bese ukhetha amafutha angafakwanga ngaphezulu kwamafutha agcwele futhi athumele.

Ukudla okuthile nokuzala I-

Ukudla kweMedithera I- Kugcizelela ukudla okuphelele futhi kunciphise ukudla okucutshungulwe noshukela ocwengekile. I-

I-Dlycemic Index (GI) Ukudla (i-H3> I-

Ukudla okuphansi kwe-glycemic inkomba kugxile ekudleni okudlayo okunomthelela omncane kumazinga kashukela wegazi. Kukhuthaza ezinzile Amazinga we-insulin futhi angasiza ukulawula i-ovulation futhi athuthukise ukuzala. Ukudla okunezinkomba eziphansi ze-glycemic kufaka phakathi okusanhlamvu, ama-legumes, imifino engeyona eyonazo, namaprotheni anciphile.

Ukudla okulwa nokuvuvukala I-

ukuvuvukala okungamahlalakhona kungathinta kabi inzalo. Ukudla okulwa nokuvuvukala kugcizelela ukudla okunciphisa ukuvuvukala, njengezithelo, imifino, inhlanzi enamafutha, amantongomane nembewu. Inciphisa ukudla okusetshenzwe okusetshenzwe, iziphuzo ezinoshukela, kanye namafutha e-trans.

Okunye ukucatshangelwa

Ngaphezu kokudla okunempilo, ukulondolozela isisindo esinempilo, ukuhileleka kokusebenza okujwayelekile komzimba, ukuphatha amazinga okucindezela, nokugwema ukubhema nokuphuza ngokweqile kungukuphuza ngokweqile kuyizinto ezibalulekile zokwenza kahle ukuzala. Kunconywa futhi ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo noma yokudla okubhalisiwe kwezeluleko ezenziwe ngezifiso ezenzelwe izidingo zakho ezithile nomlando wezokwelapha.

Isiphetho I- Kubandakanya ukudla okuthe xaxa, ama-omega-3 fatty acids, ama-antioxidants, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, kanye namaprotheni asuselwa ekufuyweni kwezitshalo angasekela impilo yokuzala. Ngaphezu kwalokho, kulandela izindlela zokudla ezifana nokudla kwaseMedithera, ukudla okuphansi kwe-glycemic inkomba, noma ukudla okulwa nokuvuvukala kungasiza ngemiphumela yokuzala. Kubalulekile ukubeka phambili impilo yonke, gcina isisindo esinempilo, futhi ufune ukuholwa ngochwepheshe lapho kudingeka ukukhulisa amandla wokuzala.

data.heading: Ngingakuthuthukisa kanjani ukuzala kwabesilisa kanye nempilo yesidoda?
data.title: Ukwenza ngcono ukuzala kwabesilisa kanye nempilo yesidoda

Ukwenza ngcono ukuzala kwabesilisa kanye nempilo yesidoda I-

Ukuzala kwabesilisa kuthonywa yizinto ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ikhwalithi yesidoda, ubungako, kanye nempilo yokuzala. Ngenkathi ukuzala kuyinkinga eyinkimbinkimbi, kunezinyathelo amadoda angathatha ukuthuthukisa inzalo awo futhi athuthukise ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda okunempilo. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola amasu okuthuthukisa ukuzala kwabesilisa futhi silondoloze impilo ephezulu yesidoda.

1. Gcina indlela yokuphila enempilo

Indlela yokuphila enempilo idlala indima ebalulekile ekuvuleni kwabesilisa. Nazi ezinye izinto zokuphila ezibalulekile okufanele ubheke: I-

Phatha isisindo

Ukugcina isisindo esinempilo kubalulekile ukuze kuzalaniswe. Ukukhuluphala kuhlotshaniswe nekhwalithi yesidoda encishisiwe nokungalingani kwe-hormonal. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ukuba mncane ngokweqile kungathinta ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Ihlose ukudliwa okulinganiselayo nokuzivocavoca njalo ukuze kugcinwe isisindo esinempilo.

Gwema ukubhema kanye nokusebenzisa izidakamizwa I-

Ukubhema nokuzijabulisa kwezidakamizwa kungathinta kabi impilo yesidoda nokuzala. Lezi zinto zingaholela ekulimaleni kwe-DNA, zinciphise ukubalwa kwesidoda, kanye ne-delity yesidoda esikhubazekile. Ukuyeka ukubhema nokugwema ukusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa kungathuthukisa kakhulu imiphumela yokuzala. I-

KHETHA UKUSETYENZISWA KO-Alcohol I-

Ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kotshwala kuxhumene nokunciphisa ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi. Kungcono ukukhawulela ukunciphisa ukudla noma ukugwema ngokuphelele ukukhuthaza impilo enkulu yesidoda. I-

Yehlisa ukucindezela I-P> Ukucindezela okungamahlalakhona kungathinta ama-hormone okuzala kanye nokukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Ukuzibandakanya ekunciphiseni kwengcindezi okufana nokuvivinya umzimba, ukuzindla, noma ukwelulekwa kungasiza ukuphatha amazinga okucindezela futhi kuthuthukise ukuzala.

2. Landela ukudla okunothile okucebile kwezakhi I-

Ukudla kudlala indima ebalulekile empilweni yesidoda nasekuthweni. Nazi izakhi zomzimba okufanele zigxile ku:

antioxidants anele I- Faka nokudla okune-antioxidants ezinjengezithelo, imifino, amantongomane nembewu ekudleni kwakho.

3. Gwema ukuvezwa kokushisa I-

Ukuchayeka isikhathi eside kumazinga okushisa aphezulu kungathinta kabi ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda. Gwema imisebenzi eholela ekushiseni ngokweqile endaweni yangasese, njengokusebenzisa amashubhu ashisayo, ama-saunas, noma ukugqoka izingubo zangaphansi eziqinile zezikhathi ezinde.

4. Prakthiza ubulili obuphephile I-

izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) angaba nomthelela olimazayo ngokuzala. Kubalulekile ukwenza ucansi oluphephile, sebenzisa amakhondomu, bese uhlolelwa ama-STI njalo ukuvikela impilo yokuzala.

5. Funa ukuhlolwa kwezokwelapha

Isiphetho I- Ngemuva kokudla okunothile okunothile okubandakanya ama-antioxidants, ama-acid asker acid, i-zinc, kanye ne-selenium nawo angafaka isandla ekukhiqizweni kwesidoda esifanele kanye nomsebenzi. Uma ukukhathazeka kokuzala kuyaqhubeka, kungakuhle ukuthi ufune usizo lwezokwelashwa ukuze uthole ukucophelela kokuhlola nokuqondisa komuntu uqobo.

data.heading: Singakwazi ukwenza i-yoga nokuzivocavoca ngezikhathi ezithile?
data.title: I-yoga nokuzivocavoca ngezikhathi ezithile
data.body:
yoga nokuzivocavoca ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini: izinzuzo kanye nokucatshangelwa

abesifazane abaningi bayazibuza ukuthi ngabe kuphephile yini futhi kuyazuzisa ukwenza i-yoga futhi uzivocavoce ukuzivocavoca ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola imiphumela ye-yoga kanye nokuzivocavoca ngokwezempilo zokuya esikhathini futhi sinikeze umhlahlandlela wokuthi ungayifinyelela kanjani imisebenzi yomzimba ngalesi sikhathi.

Izinzuzo ze-yoga nokuzivocavoca

yoga nokuzivocavoca kunikeza izinzuzo eziningi zempilo yonke kanye nenhlala-kahle, kufaka phakathi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini:

data.heading: Ingabe ukuzivocavoca kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini futhi kuthuthukise imizwa ngezikhathi ezithile?

data.body:
Indima yokuzivocavoca ekwehliseni izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini kanye nokwenza ngcono isimo se-mood I- Ngaphezu kwezimpawu zomzimba, ezinjengemilobi kanye nokuqhakaza, ukuya esikhathini kungathinta futhi inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo. Ukuzivocavoca Nokuzivocavoca Ukukhululeka Kwezinhlungu Zokuya esikhathini I-

Ukuzivocavoca njalo kukhonjisiwe ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini futhi kunciphise ubulukhuni bemigodi. Nakhu ukuzivocavoca kungasiza kanjani:

1. Ukwanda kwegazi kwegazi I-

yokuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni komzimba, njengokuzivocavoca kwe-aerobic, kukhuthaza ukukhuphuka kwegazi emzimbeni wonke, kufaka phakathi indawo ye-pelvic. Lokhu kujikeleza okuthuthukile kungasiza ukuphumula izicubu zesibeletho futhi kunciphise ukuqina.

2. Ukukhishwa kwama-endorphins I-

Ukuzivocavoca kubangela ukukhishwa kwamakhemikhali e-endorphin, okungamakhemikhali ancishisiwe wemvelo akhiqizwa umzimba. Lawa ma-endorphin angasiza ukudambisa ukungaphatheki kahle kokuya esikhathini futhi athuthukise imizwa.

3. Ukuncishiswa kwama-prostaglandins I-

Prostaglandins iyizinto ezinjenge-hormone-efana nendima ezinkontileka ze-Uterine nokuvuvukala. Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo kutholakele ukwehlisa amazinga e-prostaglandins emzimbeni, okuholela ekunciphiseni izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini.

Ukukhetha izivivinyo ezifanele

Uma kukhulunywa ngokunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini, akuzona zonke izivivinyo ezisebenza ngokulinganayo. Nazi ezinye izinhlobo zokuzivocavoca ezingase zizuze:

1. Ukuzivocavoca kwe-Aerobic I- Inhloso okungenani imizuzu engama-30 yokuzivocavoca okulinganiselwe kokuqina kwe-aerobic ezinsukwini eziningi zeviki.

2. I-Yoga I-

Yoga ingasiza ukudambisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini ngokwelula futhi iphumule izicubu zomzimba. I-yoga emnene ibeka esiswini esingezansi, njenge-pose yengane, inkomo yekati, kanye nokusonteka, kunganikeza impumuzo. Gwema imikhuba emikhulu noma enzima ye-yoga ngesikhathi sakho.

3. I-Pilates I-

Pilates igxile emandleni ayisisekelo, ukuguquguquka nokuqwashisa ngomzimba. Kungasiza ukuthuthukisa ukuma, ukudambisa ukungezwani kwemisipha, futhi kunciphise izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Faka izivivinyo ze-Pilates ezihlose indawo yesisu ne-pelvic yezinzuzo ezinhle. I-

Ukuzivocavoca nokuthuthukiswa kwemizwa I- Ukuzivocavoca kungaba nomthelela omuhle kwimood ngezikhathi ngezikhathi ezilandelayo:

1. Ukukhishwa kwe-Endorphin I- Lawa ma-endorphin angasiza ukunciphisa imizwa yokudabuka, ukukhathazeka, noma ukungahambi kahle okuvame ukutholakala ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

2. Ukuncishiswa kwengcindezi I-

Ukuzivocavoca njalo kuyithuluzi elisebenzayo lokuphatha ukucindezela. Kuyasiza ukunciphisa amazinga okuxineka futhi kukhuthaza umuzwa wokuphila kahle -Ukugcina. Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni ngokomzimba ngezikhathi kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ezihlobene nokucindezela futhi uthuthukise imizwa ebanzi.

3. Ukuphazamiseka kanye Nokunika amandla I-

Ukubamba iqhaza ekuzivocavoca umzimba noma imisebenzi yenyama ingasebenza njengokuphazamiseka okuhle kusuka ekungabiweni kokuya esikhathini. Inika amandla abantu ngokubheka ukunaka kwabo okwamanje kanye nemizwa ebonakalayo ehlotshaniswa nokuzivocavoca, kunokuba ihlala ebuhlungwini bokuya esikhathini noma izinguquko zemood.

Izindlela zokuqapha namathiphu I-

ngenkathi ukuvivinya umzimba kungazuzisa ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi wenze izinguquko njengoba kudingeka. Nazi ezinye izinyathelo zokuphepha namathiphu wokugcina engqondweni:

1. Naka amazinga akho wamandla

Ukuya esikhathini kungaholela emazingeni anciphile abanye abantu. Qaphela amazinga akho wamandla bese ukhetha ukuzivocavoca okuvumelanisa namandla akho omzimba akhona. Uma kudingeka, khetha amandla okukhanya okukhanyayo noma ukugxila ekuzivocavoca okulula nokuphumula.

2. Hlala u-hydrate I-

I-hydration efanele ibalulekile ngesikhathi sokuzivocavoca, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini lapho umzimba ungalahlekelwa amanzi amaningi. Phuza amanzi amaningi ngaphambili, ngesikhathi, nangemva kokusebenza kwakho ukuze uhlale u-hydrate.

3. Sebenzisa ukwelashwa kokushisa I-

Uma uhlangabezana nobudlova noma ukudabuka kwemisipha ngesikhathi sokuzivocavoca, cabanga ukusebenzisa ukwelashwa okushisa. Ukusebenzisa i-Heating Pad noma ukuthatha ukugeza okufudumele ngaphambi noma ngemuva kokuvivinya umzimba kungasiza ukuphumula izicubu futhi kudambise ukungakhululeki.

4. Lalela umzimba wakho I-

umzimba wawo wonke umuntu uhlukile, nokuthi yini esebenza umuntu oyedwa kungenzeka angasebenzi enye. Naka ukuthi umzimba wakho uphendula kanjani ukuzivocavoca ngesikhathi sakho. Uma ukunyakaza okuthile noma ukuzivocavoca kwenza ubuhlungu noma ukungaphatheki kahle, shintsha noma ubagweme.

Isiphetho I-

Ukuzibandakanya kokuzivocavoca njalo ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kungasiza ekunciphiseni izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini futhi uthuthukise imizwa. Ngokwandisa ukugeleza kwegazi, ukukhulula ama-endorphin, kanye nokunciphisa amazinga e-Prostaglandin, ukuzivocavoca kunikeza indlela yemvelo nephumelelayo yokulawula ukungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini. Khumbula ukukhetha ukuzivocavoca okuhambisana namazinga akho wamandla nezintandokazi zakho, futhi ngaso sonke isikhathi ulalele amasiginali omzimba wakho. Ngokulinganisela okulungile kokuzivocavoca, ukuphumula, nokuzinakekela, ungathola umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi uthuthukise inhlala-kahle.

data.heading: Ngingawagcina kanjani amazinga wamandla futhi ngihlale ngisebenza ngesikhathi sami?
data.title: Ukugcina amandla nomsebenzi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini
data.body:
Ukugcina amazinga wamandla nokuhlala usebenza ngesikhathi sakho

Ukuya esikhathini kuyingxenye yemvelo yomjikelezo wowesifazane wokuzala, kodwa kwesinye isikhathi kungafika ngokukhathala, amandla aphansi, nokungakhululeki. Kodwa-ke, ukuhlala usebenza ngesikhathi sakho kungasiza ekuthuthukiseni amazinga akho wamandla futhi kudambise ezinye zezimpawu ezihambisana nokuya esikhathini. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola amasu ahlukahlukene okugcina amazinga wamandla futhi sihlale sisebenza ngesikhathi sakho.

Ukuqonda umjikelezo wamandla I-

kulo lonke umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, amazinga akho endla ngokwemvelo eshintshashintsha. Ukuqonda lokhu kuguquguquka kungakusiza uhlele imisebenzi yakho futhi wenze ushintsho ngokufanele:

1. Isigaba sokuya esikhathini

Ngesikhathi sezinsuku ezimbalwa zokuqala zesikhathi sakho, amazinga endla angaba ngaphansi ngenxa yezinguquko ze-hormonal kanye nezimfuno ezibonakalayo zokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi uzinike imvume yokuphumula nokuvuselela.

2. Isigaba se-Follucular

Njengoba isikhathi sakho siphela futhi ufaka isigaba se-Follular, amazinga endla avame ukwanda. Lesi isikhathi esihle sokuzibandakanya emisebenzini enamandla ngokwengeziwe futhi usebenzise ngokunenzuzo ukuhlinzwa ngamandla.

3. Isigaba se-ovulation

ukuzungeza i-ovulation, amazinga endla ngokuvamile asezingeni eliphakeme. Lesi isikhathi esifanele sokuzibandakanya ekuzivocavoca okuphezulu nemisebenzi edinga amandla amaningi.

4. Isigaba seLuteal

Esigabeni se-Lutual, esenzeka ngemuva kwe-ovulation, amazinga endla angaqala ukwehla futhi. Kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi wenze izinguquko ezingeni lomsebenzi wakho njengoba kudingeka.

Amathiphu wokugcina amazinga wamandla

Ngenkathi kujwayelekile ukuzwa ukukhathala okuthile ngesikhathi sakho, kunamasu amaningana ongawafaka enkambisweni yakho ukusiza ukugcina amazinga wamandla:

1. Ukubeka phambili ukuphumula nokulala I-

Ukuthola ukuphumula okwanele nokulala kwekhwalithi kubalulekile ekugcineni kwamazinga wamandla. Ihlose amahora angama-7-9 okulala ngobusuku ngabunye bese ubheka ukuthatha izikhala ezimfishane phakathi nosuku uma kudingeka.

2. Yidla ukudla okulinganiselayo I-

Yokunika umzimba wakho ngokudla okulinganiselayo kunganikeza amandla nezakhi zomzimba ezidingwayo. Faka phakathi ukudla okuhlukahlukene okufana nezithelo, imifino, amaprotheni ancikile, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, namafutha anempilo ekudleni kwakho. Hlala u-hydrate ngokuphuza amanzi amaningi usuku lonke.

3. Phatha ukucindezela I-P> Ukuxineka kungaqeda amazinga akho wamandla. Faka amasu wokuphatha ukucindezelwa enkambisweni yakho yansuku zonke, njengokuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, ukuzindla, i-yoga, noma ukuhileleka imisebenzi oyithandayo.

4. Vivinya umzimba njalo I-

Ukuzivocavoca njalo kusiza ukukhuphula amazinga wamandla futhi kuthuthukise inhlala-kahle yonke. Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni ngokomzimba ngesikhathi sakho kungasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu, kuthuthukise imizwa, futhi kwandise ukugeleza kwegazi. Khetha imisebenzi oyithandayo futhi uguqule ubukhulu obususelwa kumazinga akho obuningi.

5. Lalela umzimba wakho

Nakisisa ukuthi umzimba wakho uzizwa kanjani futhi uguqule imisebenzi yakho ngokufanele. Uma uzizwa ugcwele ikakhulukazi, khetha izivivinyo ezimnene njengokuhamba, ukwelula, noma i-yoga. Ngezinsuku lapho unokwengeziwe Amandla, ziphonsele inselelo ngokusebenza okuphezulu okuphezulu. I-

naphezu kwezinselelo eza esikhathini, kusenokwenzeka ukuhlala zisebenza futhi zilondoloze inqubo yakho yokuqina. Nawa amanye amathiphu wokuhlala usebenza ngesikhathi sakho:

1. Khetha i-Fat Attire ekhululekile

Gqoka izembatho ezintofontofo neziphefumula ezivumela inkululeko yokunyakaza. Khetha izindwangu zomswakama-uwina ukusiza ukuphatha izithukuthuku futhi kukugcine ukhululekile ngesikhathi sokuzivocavoca kwakho.

2. Sebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini elungele ukuvivinya umzimba I-

Khetha imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini efanelekile ukwenza umsebenzi womzimba, njengezinkomishi zokuya esikhathini noma ama-tampons. Banikeza ukuguquguquka okuningi kanye nenduduzo uma kuqhathaniswa namaphilisi, ukuvumela ukuthi uhambe ngokukhululeka ngesikhathi sakho sokusebenza.

3. Ukufudumala futhi kupholile I- Lokhu kungasiza ukuvikela ukulimala futhi kunciphise usizi lwemisipha.

4. Shintsha ukusebenzisa kwakho I-

shintsha ukusebenzisa kwakho njengoba kudingeka ukwamukela amazinga akho wamandla nanoma yikuphi ukungaphatheki kahle okungenzeka Uma ukusebenzisa ubukhulu bokuqina kuzizwa kuyinselele enkulu, cabanga ngokufaka izivivinyo ezinomthelela ophansi noma ukugxila ekuqeqesheni amandla nokuzivocavoca okuguqukayo.

5. Lalela amasiginali omzimba wakho

Nakisisa noma yiziphi izimpawu zobuhlungu noma ukukhathala ngokweqile ngesikhathi sakho. Kubalulekile ukuhlonipha amasiginali omzimba wakho futhi uthathe ikhefu noma uguqule ubukhulu bakho njengoba kunesidingo.

Isiphetho I-

Ukuhlala i-active futhi ukugcina amazinga wamandla ngesikhathi sakho kungenzeka ngamasu afanele kanye ne-mindset. Ngokuqonda umjikelezo wamandla omzimba wakho, ubeka phambili ukuphumula, ukondla umzimba wakho ngokudla okulinganiselayo, ukuphatha izingcindezi, nokulalela amasiginali omzimba wakho, ungahlala usebenza futhi ukhuthaze inhlala-kahle ephelele ngayo yonke imijikelezo yakho yokuya esikhathini. Khumbula ukuba nomusa kuwe, wamukela ukuzinakekela, futhi wenze izinguquko njengoba kudingeka ukusekela amazinga akho kanye induduzo ngalesi sikhathi.

data.heading: Ingabe i-yoga nokuzivocavoca kungathinta isikhathi noma ukuhamba kwesikhathi sami?

2. Isigaba se-Follucular I-

Ngalesi sigaba, i-pituitary gland ikhipha i-hormone evuselelayo ye-follicle (Fsh), evuselela ama-ovari akhulisa ama-follicle. Omunye wale follicles uzovuthwa futhi akhulule iqanda ukulungiselela i-ovulation.

3. Isigaba se-ovulation I- Lesi sigaba sivame ukwenzeka maphakathi nomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini.

4. Isigaba seLuteal

Isigaba seLuteal siqala ngemuva kwe-ovulation futhi siqhubeke kuze kube sekupheleni kwesikhathi sokuya esikhathini esilandelayo. Ngalesi sigaba, i-follicle engenalutho iguqula ibe yi-corpus luteum, ekhipha i-progesterone ukulungiselela isibeletho sokukhulelwa. Uma ukukhiqizwa kungenzeka, amazinga e-hormone ehla, kanti i-sibene lining iyachithwa, okuholela ekuqaleni komjikelezo omusha wokuya esikhathini.

Ezimweni ezinjalo, ukunikela nge-yoga emnene noma izivivinyo zomthelela ophansi kungahle kube khona kahle. I-
