ngesikhathi sokujikeleza kokuya esikhathini, i-lining yesibeletho (endometrium) iyachithwa, okuholela ekujuleni kokuya esikhathini. Inani kanye nesikhathi sokopha kokuya esikhathini kungahluka phakathi kwabantu. Ngokuvamile, kujwayelekile ukuthi abesifazane babone amazinga ahlukene wokugeleza kwegazi ngesikhathi sabo.

umthelela we-yoga ngokugeleza kwegazi I-

ngenkathi i-yoga yaziwa ngamandla ayo ukuthuthukisa ukujikeleza kwegazi nokugeleza kwegazi emzimbeni wonke, abukho ubufakazi besayensi bokuphakamisa ukuthi i-yoga yandisa ukugeleza kwegazi ngezikhathi ezithile. Ukuqina nobude besikhathi sokugeleza kwegazi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kunqunywa ngokuyinhloko yizinto ze-hormonal kanye nomzimba walowo ohlukile.

Izinzuzo ze-yoga ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini I-

ngenkathi i-yoga ingahle ingathobi ngokuqondile ukugeleza kwegazi ngezikhathi ezithile, inganikeza izinzuzo eziningi zabesifazane ngalesi sikhathi:

1. Ukuphumula kanye nokunciphisa ukucindezela I-

Izenzo ze-Yoga, njengokunwebeka okuthambile, ukuphefumula okujulile nokuzindla, kungasiza ukunciphisa amazinga okucindezela futhi kukhuthaze ukuphumula. Lokhu kungazuzisa ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini lapho abanye besifazane bengathola ukungaphatheki kahle noma ukuguquguquka kwemizwa.

2. Ukukhululeka kobuhlungu I- Lezi zivela kancane zelulela izicubu futhi zithuthukise ukujikeleza kwendawo ye-pelvic, zinikeza usizo ekuphakushelini kokuya esikhathini.

3. Ukwenza ngcono imizwa kanye nokuphila kahle okungokomzwelo I-

Ukuhlanganyela ku-yoga ngezikhathi kungaba nomthelela omuhle kwimimo nenhlala-kahle engokomzwelo. Inhlanganisela yokunyakaza, ukuphefumula, kanye nokucabanga ngezindlela ze-yoga kungasiza ukulinganisa imizwa nokukhuthaza umuzwa wokuzola nokuqina.

4. Ukwanda kokuqwashisa ngomzimba I-

I-Yoga ikhuthaza ukuqwashisa ngomzimba kanye nokuxhumana okujulile ngokwakho. Lokhu kuqwashiswa okukhulayo kungasiza abesifazane ukuthi bangene emizimbeni yabo, baqonde izidingo zabo ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, futhi benze izinqumo ezisekela inhlala-kahle yabo.

Amathiphu wokwenza i-yoga ngezikhathi

Uma uthatha isinqumo sokuzijwayeza i-yoga ngesikhathi sakho, cabanga ngamathiphu alandelayo:

1. Lalela umzimba wakho

Nakisisa ukuthi umzimba wakho uzizwa kanjani futhi uhloniphe izidingo zawo. Shintsha noma yeqa ama-poses azizwa ungakhululekile noma akhulise noma yiziphi izimpawu zokuya esikhathini okungenzeka ukuthi uhlangabezana nazo.

2. Khetha izindlela ezimnene nezibuyiseli I-

Khetha izindlela ze-yoga ezimnene nezibuyiseli ezigxile ekuphumuleni nasekunikezelweni. Faka okukhuthaza ukwelula okulula, ukuphefumula okujulile, nokuphumula.

3. Sebenzisa ama-props okusekelwa I- Zisebenzise njengoba kudingeka ukuthuthukisa umkhuba wakho futhi ukwenze kutholakale kalula.

4. Hlala Hlela I-Drated

Ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uphuza amanzi anele ngaphambi, ngesikhathi, nangemva kokusebenza kwakho kwe-yoga, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi sakho. Ukuhlala u-hydrate kusekelwa inhlala-kahle yonke futhi kungasiza ukudambisa izimpawu ezinjengokuqhakaza nokukhathala.

Isiphetho I- Ngokulalela umzimba wakho, ukhetha imikhuba emnene nebubuyimi, futhi uzijwayeze ukuzinakekela, ungajabulela imiphumela emihle ye-yoga ngenkathi uhlonipha umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini.

data.heading: Yini okufanele ngiyigweme phakathi kwe-ovulation?
data.title: Ukugwema ukuphazamiseka kwe-ovulation
data.body:
izinto okufanele uzigweme ngesikhathi se-ovulation I-

i-ovulation iyisikhathi esibalulekile emjikelezweni wokuya esikhathini sowesifazane lapho i-ovary ikhipha iqanda ukuze libe khona umanyolo. Uma uzama ukukhulelwa noma ukumane ufuna ukukhumbula impilo yakho yokuzala, kunezinto ezithile ongafuna ukuzigwema ngesikhathi sovulation. Lezi zincomo zingasiza ukukhulisa amathuba akho okukhulelwa noma ukulondolozela inhlala-kahle yokuzala.

1. Ukucindezela ngokweqile

Amazinga aphezulu okucindezelwa angathinta ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone futhi aphazamise ukulinganisela okubucayi okudingekayo ukuze uphumelele. Nge-ovulation, zama ukugwema izimo ezicindezelayo ngangokunokwenzeka. Ukuzibandakanya amasu okuphumula njengokuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, noma i-yoga kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela nokukhuthaza ibhalansi ye-hormonal.

2. Ukudla okungenampilo I-

Ukudla ukudla okulinganiselayo nokunempilo kubalulekile ngempilo yokuzala. Nge-ovulation, kubalulekile ukugwema ukudla okusetshenzwe okwenziwe ngokweqile, ushukela owedlulele namafutha angenampilo. Esikhundleni salokho, gxila ekudleni izithelo ezahlukahlukene, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni anciphile, namafutha anempilo afana nalawa amantongomane nama-avocados. Lokhu kudla okunothile okunothile kungasekela ukukhiqizwa okuhle kwama-hormone futhi kuthuthukise ukuzala.

3. Ukubhema notshwala I-

Ukubhema kanye nokuphuza ngokweqile ngokweqile kuhlotshaniswe nokuncipha kwabesilisa nabesifazane. Uma uzama ukukhulelwa, kungcono ukugwema ukubhema ngokuphelele. Ngokuqondene notshwala, kungakuhle ukunciphisa amandla akho noma ukugwema ngokuphelele phakathi kwe-ovulation ukwenza amathuba akho okukhulelwa.

4. Ukuzivocavoca okukhulu I-

Ngenkathi ukuvivinya umzimba njalo kuzuzisa impilo yonke, ukusebenzisa ngokweqile kanye nokusebenza okukhulu ngesikhathi sokuwohloka kungenzeka kube nomthelela ongemuhle ekuvuthweni. Ukuzivocavoca okukhulu kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kuvimbela i-ovulation. Kunconywa ukuba uhlanganyele ekuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo ngalesi sikhathi, njengokuhamba nge-brisk, ukubhukuda, noma i-yoga emnene.

5. Ukuchayeka kubuthi bemvelo I-

Ukuchayeka kubuthi obuthile bezemvelo kungaphazamisa impilo yokuzala nokunciphisa ukuzala. Kubalulekile ukugwema izinto ezifana nezibulala-zinambuzane, ama-herbicides, izinsimbi ezisindayo, namakhemikhali atholakala emikhiqizweni ethile yokuhlanza noma izinto zokunakekela komuntu. Noma nini lapho kungenzeka, khetha umkhiqizo we-organic, khetha ezinye izindlela zokuhlanza imvelo, futhi ukhumbule imikhiqizo oyisebenzisa emzimbeni wakho.

6. Ukuya ocansini okungavikelekile nabalingani abaningi I- Ukuzibandakanya kokuya ocansini okungavikelekile nabalingani abaningi kungakhulisa ubungozi bezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) angaba nomthelela omubi ukuzala. Ukuzijwayeza ukuya ocansini okuphephile nokugcina ubudlelwano obunombuso kunganciphisa ubungozi be-STI nokusekela inqubo yokucabanga enempilo.

7. Imikhuba yokulala engeyinhle I-

ukulala kudlala indima ebalulekile ekugcineni ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nenhlala-kahle. Nge-ovulation, ebeka phambili ukulala ngokwanele futhi usungule inqubo ejwayelekile yokulala. Gwema ukuvezwa kumadivayisi we-elekthronikhi ngaphambi kombhede, dala imvelo yokulala entofontofo, futhi uhlose amahora angama-7-9 okulala okungaphazamiseki ubusuku ngabunye.

8. Ukusetshenziswa kwe-caffeine I-

Ukuthathwa ngokweqile kwe-caffeine kuhlotshaniswe nezinkinga zokuzala. Ngenkathi ukusetshenziswa kwe-caffeine okulinganiselayo kuvame ukubhekwa njengokuphephile, kungakuhle ukunciphisa umkhawulo wakho ngesikhathi sokubopha. Khetha ezinye izindlela ezinempilo ezinjenge-heas enamakhambi noma iziphuzo ezifakiwe, futhi ukhumbule imithombo efihliwe ye-caffeine ekudleni okuthile neziphuzo.

9. Ukubambezela I-Intercourse I-

uma uzama ukukhulelwa ukukhulelwa, kubalulekile ukuze uqaphele iwindi lakho le-ovulation futhi uhlele ngokufanele. Ukubambezela ukuya ocansini kuze kube sekupheleni kwesikhathi sokuvutha kunganciphisa kakhulu amathuba okukhulelwa. Ukuqonda umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini kanye nokusebenzisa izindlela zokubikezela ze-ovulation, njengokulandela umkhondo wokushisa komzimba we-basal noma usebenzisa ama-ovulation Kits, kungakusiza ekuboneni izinsuku ezivundile kakhulu zokulala.

10. Imithi engadingekile I-

Ngesikhathi se-ovulation, kungakuhle ukugwema umuthi ongadingekile noma izidakamizwa ezingaphezu kwe-counter ezingabalulekile enhlalakahleni yakho. Ngenkathi eminye imishanguzo ingahle iphephe ngalesi sikhathi, ihlala ihamba phambili ukubonisana nomhlinzeki wakho wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuthatha noma yimiphi imishanguzo emisha noma izithasiselo.

Ekuphetheni, ngokugwema ukucindezela ngokweqile, ukugcina ukudla okunempilo, ukugwema ukubhema nokuphuza ngokweqile, ukunciphisa ukubonwa kobuthi bezemvelo, ukunciphisa ubuthongo obuphephile, ukunciphisa ubuthongo, ukukhawulela kokuhlangana kwe-caffeine, futhi Ukuqapha ngemithi, ungakhulisa amathuba akho okukhulelwa nokusekela impilo yakho yokuzala yonke ngesikhathi sokuzala.

data.heading: Yisiphi isithelo esihle kakhulu e-ovulation?
data.title: Izithelo ezikhulisa ukuzala
data.body:
Izithelo ezinhle kakhulu ze-ovulation I-

Uma kukhulunywa ngokuxhasa i-ovulation yakho yezempilo yokuzala kanye nokwenza kahle, okufaka izithelo ezahlukahlukene ekudleni kwakho kungazuzisa. Izithelo zicebile ngamavithamini abalulekile, amaminerali, ama-antioxidants, kanye ne-fiber ekhuthaza ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nenhlala-kahle. Nazi ezinye zezithelo ezinhle kakhulu zokufaka ekudleni kwakho ngesikhathi sokudla:

1. Amajikijolo

amajikijolo, njengama-sitrobheli, ama-blueberries, ama-raspberries, nama-amajikijolo, awagcini nje ngokumnandi kodwa futhi agcwele nama-antioxidants. Ama-antioxidants asiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela okuxakile nokuvuvukala, okungathinta ukuzala. Amajikijolo nawo acebile ngo-Vitamin C, odlala indima ebalulekile ekukhiqizeni ama-hormone futhi asekela ukuthuthukiswa kwamaqanda aphilile.

2. Izithelo zeCitrus I-

izithelo ze-citrus ezinjengamawolintshi, amagilebhisi, ulamula, nemilenze imithombo emihle kakhulu yamavithamini C nezinye izakhi ezibalulekile. I-Vitamin C isiza ukuthuthukisa amazinga we-hormone futhi ithuthukise ukumuncwa kwensimbi, okubalulekile kwi-ovulation enempilo. Izithelo zeCitrus nazo zicebile ngokotele, i-b-vitamin exhasa impilo yezempilo yokuzala nokukhula kwengane uma kwenzeka kukhulelwa.

3. Ukwatapheya I- Iphinde iqukethe i-Vitamin E, i-antioxidant esekela ukuzala futhi isize ukugcina impilo yezicubu zokuzala. Ukungeza ukwatapheya ekudleni kwakho ngesikhathi sokudla ngesikhathi sokuvulwa kwe-ovulation kungaba nomthelela ekulinganiseni okuphezulu kwe-hormonal kanye nomsebenzi wokuzala.

4. I-Pomegranate I-

Pomegranate isithelo esaziwa ngezakhiwo zayo ezinamandla ze-antioxidant. Inokuqoqwa okuphezulu kwama-polyphenols, okungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela okuxakile nokuvuvukala emzimbeni. I-Pomegranate ibuye iqukethe umngane we-FLATE ne-Vitamin K, edlala izindima ezibalulekile empilweni yokuzala. Ukudla ipomegranate noma ujusi wayo ngesikhathi sokuvulwa kwe-ovulation kunganikeza inzuzo yokuthuthukisa inzalo.

5. I-Kiwi I-

kiwi yisithelo esishisayo esilayishwe izakhi zomzimba ezibalulekile zempilo yokuzala. Kungumthombo omuhle kakhulu ka-Vitamin C, uvithamini e, ungokoti, ne-potassium. I-Vitamin C isekela ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone, kuyilapho uvithamini e enikeza ukuvikela ama-antioxidant ezicubu zokuzala. I-Foote ibalulekile ekuthuthukisweni kwamaqanda afanelekile, futhi i-potassium isiza ukulawula umfutho wegazi futhi ilondoloze ibhalansi ye-electrolyte.

6. Ubhanana

Ubhanana uyisithelo esinempilo esingazuzisa phakathi kwe-ovulation. Bacebile kuVitamin B6, edlala indima ebalulekile emthethweni we-hormone kanye nokukhiqizwa kwe-neurotransmitters. I-Vitamin B6 ingasiza ukuxhasa umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini njalo futhi uthuthukise ukuzala. Ubhanana futhi ungumthombo omuhle we-potassium ne-magnesium, okunomthelela empilweni yokuzala.

7. Mango I-

Mango yisithelo esishisayo esishisayo esinikeza izinzuzo ezahlukahlukene zezempilo. Kungumthombo ocebile we-Vitamin C, osiza ukusekela ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone futhi uthuthukise ukuzala. UMango ubuye aqukethe i-beta-carotene, isandulelo se-Vitamin A, esibalulekile izicubu ezinempilo zokuzala. Ngokwengeziwe, okuqukethwe kwe-fiber eMango kugqugquzela impilo yokugaya ukudla, okunomthelela ngokungaqondile kubhalansi ye-hormonal.

8. Uphayinaphu I-

uphayinaphu yisithelo esishisayo esingavuseli kuphela kepha futhi sinikeza izinzuzo ezingaba khona zokuzala. Ine-enzyme ebizwa nge-bromelain, ephakanyisiwe ukuthi ibe nezakhiwo zokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi ingasiza ukuthuthukisa ukugeleza kwegazi esibelethweni. Ngenkathi kudingeka ucwaningo oluthe xaxa, abanye besifazane bakholelwa ukuthi udla umgogodla wephayinaphu ngesikhathi sokuvulwa kwe-ovulation kungasekela ukufakwa kanye nokukhulelwa.

9. Ama-apula I-Apps ye-

ama-apula atholakala kabanzi izithelo ezinikeza uhla lwezinzuzo zezempilo. Bangumthombo omuhle wama-antioxidants kanye ne-fiber yokudla, engasiza ukulawula amazinga kashukela wegazi nokusekelwa kwebhalansi ye-hormonal ephelele. Ama-apula aqukethe i-quercetin, i-flavonoid exhumene nokuzala okuthuthukile kanye nengozi encishisiwe yokuphazamiseka okuthile kokuzala.

10. Amagilebhisi

Amagilebhisi, izinhlobo ezibomvu neziluhlaza, azigcini nje ngokumnandi kodwa futhi zizuzisa impilo yokuzala. Bacebile kuma-antioxidants, kufaka phakathi i-resveratrol, ehlotshaniswe nokuzala okuthuthukile. Amagilebhisi nawo aqukethe i-Vitamin C, Vitamin K, kanye namaminerali amaningana asekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nenhlala kahle ngesikhathi se-ovulation. I- Khumbula ukusebenzisa izithelo ezahlukahlukene kanye nokudla okulinganiselayo ukuthola izakhi zomzimba ezizuzisa i-ovulation kanye nenhlala kahle.

data.heading: Yikuphi ukudla okungcono isikhathi?
data.title: Ukudla okusekelwa isikhathi
data.body:
Ukudla okungcono kwezikhathi I-

Ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, umzimba ushintshana ngezinguquko ezahlukahlukene ze-hormonal, futhi abanye besifazane bangathola ukungaphatheki kahle nezimpawu ezifana nama-cramp, ukukhathala, ukuqhakaza kanye nokushintshana kwemizwelo. Ngenkathi kungekho "umlingo" oqondile ozokwelapha zonke izingqinamba ezihlobene nenkathi, udle ukudla okulinganiselayo okufaka ukudla okuthile okunothile kwezakhi zomzimba kungasekela impilo yezokuya esikhathini futhi kudambise ezinye izimpawu. Nazi ezinye zokudla ezinhle kakhulu zokufaka ekudleni kwakho ngezikhathi:

1. Ama-greens anamaqabunga amnyama I- I-Iron isiza igcwalise ukulahleka kwegazi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini futhi kungavimbela i-anemia yokuntuleka kwe-iron, okungadala ukukhathala. I-calcium ne-magnesium kusiza izicubu zokuphumula futhi unciphise ama-cramps. Kubandakanya le mifino ekudleni kwakho noma ama-smoothie anganikeza lezi zezakhi ezibalulekile ngesikhathi sakho.

2. Inhlanzi enamafutha

inhlanzi enamafutha, enjenge-salmon, i-mackerel, kanye nama-sardines, yimithombo emihle kakhulu yama-omega-amafutha acid. Ama-Omega-3 Ama-Acids anezakhiwo zokulwa nokuvuvukala ezingasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini kanye nokuvuvukala. Lawa mafutha anempilo abuye axhase umsebenzi wobuchopho kanye nokuqondiswa kwemizwa, okungazuzisa ngesikhathi sokushintshashintsha kwe-hormonal. Ihlose ukufaka izinhlanzi ezinamafutha ekudleni kwakho izikhathi ezimbalwa ngesonto ngesikhathi sakho.

3. Okusanhlamvu okuphelele

okusanhlamvu okugcwele, njengerayisi nsundu, i-quinoa, ama-oats, nesinkwa sikakolweni esiphelele, kucebile ngama-fiber kanye nama-carbohydrate ayinkimbinkimbi. I-fiber isiza ukulawula ukunyakaza kwamathumbu futhi kunciphise ukuqhakaza nokuqunjelwa, izimpawu ezijwayelekile ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Ama-carbohydrate ayinkimbinkimbi anikeza ukukhishwa okuqinile kwamandla futhi angasiza ekuqiniseni ukushintshwa kwemizwelo. Kufaka phakathi okusanhlamvu ekudleni kwakho kunganikeza ukwesekwa okunamandla nokugaya.

4. Ama-legumes I-

ama-legumes, kufaka phakathi ama-lentils, ama-chickpeas, kanye nobhontshisi, yimithombo emihle kakhulu yamaprotheni asuselwa kwizitshalo nensimbi. Amaprotheni aqakathekile ukulungiswa kwezicubu kanye nokukhiqizwa kwama-hormone, kanti i-iron isiza igcwalise izitolo zensimbi futhi ivikele i-anemia. Kubandakanya ama-legumes ekudleni kwakho, njengamasaladi, amasobho, noma ama-stews, anganikeza le misebenzi ebalulekile ngesikhathi sakho.

5. Amajikijolo

amajikijolo, njengama-sitrobheli, ama-blueberries, nama-raspberries, agcwele ama-antioxidants, amavithamini kanye namaminerali. Bacebile ikakhulukazi ku-Vitamin C, esiza ukuthuthukisa ukumunculwa kwensimbi futhi isekela amasosha omzimba anempilo. Amajikijolo aqukethe ne-fiber, esiza ukugaya futhi angadambisa ukuqunjelwa. Ukungeza amajikijolo ambalwa esidlweni sakho sasekuseni noma ukuwajabulele njenge-snack kunganikeza okuvuselelayo nokunempilo kokudla kwakho kwesikhathi sakho.

6. Amantongomane nembewu

amantongomane nembewu, kufaka phakathi ama-alimondi, ama-walnuts, ama-flaxseeds, ne-chia imbewu, kukhona ukudla okuminyene okunikeza izinzuzo ezahlukahlukene ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Banikeza amafutha anempilo, amaprotheni, kanye ne-fiber, engasiza ukulawula amazinga kashukela wegazi futhi akwenze uzizwe unakwe. Ngokwengeziwe, amantongomane nembewu aqukethe ama-magnesium, angasiza ukunciphisa ukunciphisa ama-cramps okuya esikhathini futhi akhuthaze ukuphumula. Zifake ekudleni kwakho noma uzijabulele njenge-snack elula futhi enempilo.

7. I-Yogurt I-

iyogathi, ikakhulukazi izinhlobo eziqukethe amasiko bukhoma njenge-probiotic, kungazuzisa ngezikhathi ezithile. Ama-Proshootic asiza ukulondolozela amathumbu anempilo futhi akwazi ukusekela isimo sokugaya ukudla. Ngokwengeziwe, i-yogurt ngumthombo omuhle we-calcium, ongasiza ekunciphiseni ukuqhekeka kokuya esikhathini. Khetha i-yogurt ethafeni noma yamaGrikhi bese ufaka izithelo zakho namantongomane okudla okunempilo nokunelisa noma ukudla kwasekuseni.

8. Ushokoledi omnyama I-

ushokoledi omnyama onamaphesenti aphezulu e-cocoa (70% noma ngaphezulu) kungaba ukwandisa imizwa nokungabi nalutho ngesikhathi sakho. Ine-magnesium, engasiza ukunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwemizwelo futhi kunciphise ukuqina kokuya esikhathini. Ushokoledi omnyama uqukethe ama-antioxidants ahlotshaniswe nezinzuzo ezahlukahlukene zezempilo. Jabulela ucezu oluncane lweshokolethi emnyama njengokwenelisa nokwenelisa ukwelapha.

9. Ginger I-

Ginger sekuyisikhathi eside isetshenziselwe izakhiwo zayo zokwelapha, kufaka phakathi amandla ayo okususa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini kanye nausea. Inemiphumela yokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi ingasiza ukuphumula izicubu zesibeletho. I-ginger ingadliwa njengetiye, ingezwe kuma-smoothie, noma ifakwe ezitsheni ezithandekayo zokunambitheka kwayo okuhlukile nezinzuzo ezingaba khona ngezikhathi.

10. Ukudla okunothile ngamanzi I-

Ukuhlala i-hydrate kubalulekile ngesikhathi sakho ukusiza ukunciphisa ukuqhakaza nokugcinwa kwamanzi. Ukudla ukudla okunothile ngamanzi, njengamakhukhamba, ikhabe, isilimo esidliwayo esinamagatsha anamanzi, kanye nezithelo ze-citrus, kungaba nomthelela ku-hydration yakho ebanzi. Lokhu kudla kuyaqabula futhi kunikeze amavithamini namaminerali angeziwe asekela inhlala-kahle yakho ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. I-

Ngenkathi lokhu kudla kungazuzisa ngezikhathi, kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi udle ngokuya ngokuthanda kwakho nezidingo zakho. Khumbula ukugcina ukudla okulinganiselayo futhi ufake izinhlobo ezahlukene zokudla okunothile ukuze usekele impilo yakho yonke yokuya esikhathini yonke.

data.heading: Yini iphuze elihle isikhathi?
data.title: Ukusondla Ukuya esikhathini
data.body:
iziphuzo ezinhle kakhulu zezikhathi

Ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, ukuhlala ama-hydrate kubalulekile ukusekela inhlala-kahle yakho futhi kusiza ukudambisa ezinye izimpawu ezifana nokuqhakaza, ukukhathala, kanye nekhanda. Ngenkathi amanzi ephuza ukugcinwa kwe-hydration, kunezinye iziphuzo eziningana ezinganikeza ezinye izinzuzo ngesikhathi sakho. Nazi ezinye zeziphuzo ezinhle kakhulu zokufaka ekudleni kwakho ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini:

1. I-Herbal Teas I-

itiye lamakhambi linganikeza izinzuzo ezahlukahlukene ngezikhathi ezithile. Amathiphu athile we-herbal, anjenge-chamomile, peppermint, kanye ne-ginger, anezakhiwo ezolile ezingasiza ekuphuliseni ukuqeda amandla okuya esikhathini futhi akhuthaze ukuphumula. I-raspberry leaf tea ivame ukunconyelwa ngempilo yempilo yokuya esikhathini njengoba kukholakala ukuthi i-Uterus futhi isekele umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini enempilo. Ngokwengeziwe, ama-herbal teas angu-hydrating futhi angaba inketho ethokozisayo futhi eduduzayo ngesikhathi sakho.

2. Amanzi afudumele nge-lemon I-

Ukuqala usuku lwakho ngengilazi efudumele yamanzi efakwe ngejusi kalamula kungaba ukukhetha okuqabulayo nokuxoshwa. Amanzi kalamula anikezela ngovithamini C, ongasekela ukumunculwa kwensimbi futhi athuthukise amasosha akho omzimba. Iphinde ibe nezakhiwo ezi-Alkalizing ezingasiza ukulinganisa amazinga we-PH omzimba. Ukunambitheka kwemfudumalo nokudlalwa kwalesi siphuzo kungathambisa ikakhulukazi ngezikhathi ezithile.

3. Itiye eliluhlaza I-P> itiye eluhlaza yaziwa ngezakhiwo zayo ze-antioxidant kanye nezinzuzo ezingaba khona zezempilo. Inamakhompiyutha abizwa ngokuthi ama-catechins, anemiphumela yokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi angasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini kanye nokuvuvukala. I-Green Tea futhi iqukethe inani elithile le-caffeine elinesizotha, elinganikeza amandla amhlophe okukhuphula amandla. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukusebenzisa itiye eliluhlaza ngokulinganisela, njengokudla ngokweqile kwe-caffeine kungaba nemiphumela emibi kwabanye abantu.

4. Izithelo ezintsha Smoothies I-

ama-smoothies enziwe ngezithelo ezintsha angaba inketho enempilo futhi emnandi ngezikhathi. Banikeza i-hydration, i-fiber, amavithamini, kanye namaminerali asekela inhlala-kahle yakho. Khetha izithelo ezicebile ku-Vitamin C, njengamajikijolo, izithelo ze-citrus, kanye ne-kiwi, ngoba zingasiza ukuthuthukisa ukumuncwa kwensimbi. Ungangeza futhi izithako ezinjengesipinashi noma i-kale yokukhulisa okwengeziwe kwezakhi zomzimba. Yenza ngokwezifiso ama-smoothies akho ngokuya ngokuthanda kwakho ukunambitheka futhi uwajabulele njengesiphuzo esiqabulayo nesinempilo.

5. Amanzi kakhukhunathi I-

Amanzi kakhukhunathi yisiphuzo semvelo neyase-hydrating esingazuzisa ngezikhathi ezithile. Kucebile ngama-electrolyte afana ne-potassium, i-magnesium, ne-calcium, engasiza ukubuyisa izakhi ezilahlekile ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Amanzi kakhukhunathi nawo aphansi kilojoule futhi anokunambitheka okumnandi okuncane, okwenza kube yindlela evuselelayo yokuphuza iziphuzo ezinoshukela.

6. I-Peppermint Tea I-Persopmint Tea yaziwa ngezakhiwo zayo ezipholisayo nezolile. Kungasiza izicubu zokuphumula, kufaka phakathi izicubu zesibeletho, futhi kungasiza ukunciphisa amandla okuya esikhathini. I-Peppermint Tea iyi-caffeine-free futhi ingathokozela okushisayo noma ukubanda, kuya ngokuthanda kwakho. Ukuhlangezwa endebeni yetiye ye-peppermint ngesikhathi sakho kunganikeza okuhlangenwe nakho okududuzayo nokuqabulayo.

7. Ubisi lwegolide I- I-Turmeric iqukethe i-compact ebizwa nge-curcumin, enezindawo zokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi ingasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini kanye nokuvuvukala. Ubisi lweGolide luvame ukulungiswa nezinye izinongo ezifana ne-ginger, isinamoni, kanye nopelepele omnyama, ongeza ukunambitheka kanye nezinzuzo ezengeziwe zezempilo. Ukujabulela inkomishi yobisi lwegolide kunganikeza okuhlangenwe nakho okududuzayo nokondlayo ngesikhathi sakho.

8. I-Watermelon Juice I-puice ye-watermelon ayigcini nje nge-hydrating kodwa futhi ihlinzeka izakhamzimba ezahlukahlukene ezingasekela inhlala-kahle yakho ngezikhathi ezithile. I-Watermelon icebile kokuqukethwe kwamanzi, ama-electrolyte, namavithamini afana nevithamini C ne-Vitamin A. Kungasiza ukubuyisa uketshezi, ukunciphisa ukuqhakaza, nokusekela amasosha omzimba anempilo. Jabulela ingilazi yejusi ye-watermelon entsha ethambile yenketho yokuphuza okuqabulayo neyokuvuselela.

9. I-Farimer herbal infusions I-

I-herbal infusions efudumele, efana nesinamoni, i-fennel, noma i-nettle infusions, ingazuzisa ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. La makhambi ngokwesiko asetshenziselwa ukusekela impilo yokuya esikhathini futhi ahlinzeke ngemiphumela epholisayo. I-infusions yenziwa ngamakhambi anamathela emanzini ashisayo isikhathi eside kuneziphuzo ezijwayelekile ze-herbal, zivumela isiphuzo esigxile kakhulu futhi esinempilo. Sip ekufakweni kwamakhambi okufudumele ukukhuthaza ukuphumula kanye nenhlala-kahle yokuya esikhathini.

10. Iziphuzo ezenziwe nge-electrolyte ezenziwe ekhaya zasekhaya I- Ungenza owakho isiphuzo se-electrolyte ngokuhlanganisa amanzi, ingcosana kasawoti wasolwandle, isipuni soju noma isiraphu ye-maple, kanye nesiraphu kalamula noma ulamula. Lesi siphuzo esenziwe ekhaya singasiza ukubuyisela i-electrolyte Balance futhi sinikeze nge-hydration ngezikhathi zokulahleka koketshezi. I-

ngenkathi lezi ziphuzo zingazuzisa ngezikhathi ezithile, kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho futhi kudle iziphuzo ezihambisana nezintandokazi zakho nezidingo zakho. Khumbula ukuhlala u-hydrate kuyo yonke inkathi yakho futhi ulondoloze ukudla okulinganiselayo ukusekela impilo yakho yonke yokuya esikhathini.

data.heading: Yini okufanele uyidle ngaphambi kwesikhathi?
data.title: Ukudla kwangaphambi kokuya esikhathini
data.body:
ukuthi yini okufanele uyidle ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho I-

Njengombana umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini uthuthuka, ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal kungaholela ekushintsheni okuhlukahlukene ngokomzimba nangokomzwelo. Abesifazane abaningi bathola izimpawu ze-Preminstrual (PMS) ezinsukwini eziholela esikhathini sabo, kufaka phakathi ukuqhakaza, ukushintshwa kwemizwelo, ukukhathala, kanye nezifiso zokudla. Ngenkathi kungekho usayizi owodwa ofanele - konke ukudla wonke umuntu, ukwenza izinqumo zokudla ezihlakaniphile kungasiza ukusekela inhlala-kahle yakho futhi kudambise ezinye zalezi zimpawu. Nakhu ukudla okunempilo okunempilo ukufaka ekudleni kwakho ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho:

1. I-carbohydrate eyinkimbinkimbi I- Khetha okusanhlamvu okufana nelayisi elinsundu, i-quinoa, i-oats, nesinkwa sikakolweni esiphelele. Lokhu kudla kucebile ku-fiber, okusiza ukugaya futhi kungadambisa ukuqhakaza nokuqunjelwa. Kubandakanya ama-carbohydrate ama-carbohydrate akho ekudleni kwakho kungasiza ukukugcina uzizwa unelisekile futhi wanika amandla ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho.

2. Imifino eluhlaza enamaqabunga

Imifino eluhlaza eluhlaza, efana nesipinashi, i-kale, ne-swiss chard, igcwele izakhi zomzimba ezibalulekile njengensimbi, i-calcium, kanye ne-magnesium. I-Iron isiza igcwalise ukulahleka kwegazi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini futhi kungavimbela i-anemia yokuntuleka kwe-iron, okungadala ukukhathala. I-calcium ne-magnesium ukweseka ukuphumula kwemisipha futhi kungasiza ukunciphisa ukuncipha kokuya esikhathini. Faka ama-greens amaqabunga ekudleni kwakho noma ubajabulele kumasaladi nama-smoothie ukuze uthuthukise ukudla kwakho kwe-nutho ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho.

3. I-Lean Protein

imithombo yamaprotheni alean, njengenkukhu, eTurkey, inhlanzi, i-tofu, kanye ne-legumes, ahlinzeke ngama-amino acid abalulekile adingekayo ukuze kulungiswe izicubu nokukhiqizwa kwama-hormone. Amaprotheni angasiza ekuqiniseni amazinga kashukela wegazi futhi akwenze uzizwa unakwe. Kubandakanya amaprotheni okudla kwakho ekudleni kwakho angasekela amazinga wamandla futhi avikele indlala nezinkanuko ngokweqile ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho.

4. Amafutha anempilo

Ukufaka amafutha anempilo ekudleni kwakho ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho kungasiza ukulawula ukukhiqizwa kwe-hormone nokusekelwa kwenhlala-kahle. Faka nokudla okufana nama-avocados, amantongomane, imbewu namafutha omnqumo. Lawa mafutha ahlinzeka ngama-acid we-Omega-3 Amafutha, anezakhiwo zokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi angasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-perenstrual. Amafutha anempilo nawo anikela ngemizwa ye-satiety futhi angasiza izifiso zokunciphisa izifiso.

5. Izithelo nemifino I-

Ukudla izithelo nemifino ehlukahlukene kubalulekile empilweni yonke futhi kunganikeza amavithamini abalulekile, amaminerali kanye nama-antioxidants. Khetha izinketho ezimibalabala Njengamajikijolo, izithelo ze-citrus, upelepele wensimbi, i-broccoli, namazambane amnandi. Lokhu kudla kucebile ku-Vitamin C, okusekela umsebenzi wokuvikelwa komzimba kanye nengculazi ukumunca iron. Izithelo nemifino nazo zinikeza i-fiber, ekhuthaza ukugaya okunempilo futhi kungasiza ukunciphisa ukuqhakaza nokuqunjelwa.

6. Ukudla okubilisiwe

Ukudla okubilisiwe okufana ne-yogurt, kefir, i-sauerkraut, futhi i-kimchi iqukethe ama-probiotic azuzisayo asekela ama-microbiome anempilo. Ama-probiotics angasiza ukulahla ukugayeka futhi akhuthaze ukumuncwa kwezakhi okuphelele. Kufaka phakathi ukudla okubilisiwe ekudleni kwakho ngaphambi kokuthi isikhathi sakho singasiza ekunciphiseni ukuqhakaza nokugaya ukudla.

7. Ushokoledi omnyama I-

ushokoledi omnyama onamaphesenti aphezulu kaCocoa (70% noma ngaphezulu) kungaba ukwelashwa okugculisayo nokwanelisa ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho. Inama-antioxidants kanye ne-magnesium, engasiza ukunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwemizwelo, ukunciphisa ukungezwani kwemisipha nokusekelwa kokuphumula. Jabulela ucezu oluncane lweshokolethi emnyama njengengxenye yokudla kwakho okulinganiselayo ukwanelisa izinkanuko zakho ezimnandi.

8. I-Herbal Teas

itiye le-herbal, njenge-chamomile, peppermint, kanye ne-ginger, kunganikeza ukuphumula futhi kuthambisa izimpawu ze-perenstrual. I-Chamomile Tea inezakhiwo ezolile futhi ingasiza ukunciphisa ukukhathazeka nokukhuthaza ukulala okungcono. I-Peppermint Tea ingasiza ukugaya futhi idambise ukuqhakaza. I-ginger tea inemiphumela yokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi ingasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Ukuphucwa Teas Teas kungaba ukukhetha okududuzayo nokuxoshwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho.

9. Iziphuzo Zamanzi Neziphuzo Zamanzi I-

Ukuhlala i-hydrate kubalulekile kulo lonke umjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, kufaka phakathi isikhathi sakho. Ukuphuza inani elanele lamanzi kungasiza ukunciphisa ukuqhakaza nokugcinwa kwamanzi. Ungafaka futhi iziphuzo ezinama-hydrative njenge-coconut amanzi, amakhambi we-herbal, kanye namanzi afakiwe ngezithelo noma amakhambi. Gwema ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kweziphuzo ezihlanganisiwe kanye neziphuzo ezinoshukela, ngoba zingaba nezimpawu zokuba zibize kakhulu.

10. Ukudla okunengqondo nokulalela umzimba wakho

Ngenkathi ukudla okungenhla kungazuzisa ngaphambi kwesikhathi sakho, kubalulekile ukulalela izidingo zomzimba wakho futhi uzijwayeze ukudla okunengqondo. Naka imidwebo yendlala kanye nokugcwala, udla ukudla okulinganiselayo, ukhethe ukudla okukwenza uzizwe undlewa futhi waneliseke. Wonke umuntu uhlukile, futhi kubalulekile ukuthola indlela yokudla esebenza kangcono ngalesi sikhathi. I-

data.heading: Yikuphi ukudla okuhle kwezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni?
data.title: Ukudla kwezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni
data.body:
Ukudla kwezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni

Izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni, ezaziwa nangokuthi njenge-Oligomenorrhea, zingenzeka ngenxa yezici ezahlukahlukene ezinjengokungalingani kwe-hormonal, ukucindezela, izimo ezithile zezokwelapha, noma izimo zendlela yokuphila. Ngenkathi kubalulekile ukubhekana nembangela eyisisekelo yezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni, okwenza ukulungiswa okuthile kokudla kungasekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nempilo yokuzala. Nazi ezinye zokudla ezingazuzisa isikhathi esingajwayelekile:

1. Okusanhlamvu okuphelele I-

ifaka okusanhlamvu okuphelele ekudleni kwakho kunganikeza izakhamzimba ezibalulekile futhi kukhuthaze ibhalansi ye-hormonal. Okusanhlamvu okugcwele njengerayisi nsundu, i-quinoa, ama-oats, kanye nokolweni ophelele kuqukethe i-fiber, amavithamini kanye namaminerali asekela impilo yonke. I-Fibreint AIDS ekugayayo futhi isiza ukulawula amazinga kashukela egazini, angaba nomthelela omuhle ekulingweni kwama-hormonal kanye nokuya esikhathini.

2. Inhlanzi enamafutha I-

FUNT Fat Fish efana ne-salmon, i-mackerel, kanye nama-sardines yimithombo emihle kakhulu yama-omega-3 fatty acids. Ama-Omega-3 Ama-Acids anezakhiwo zokulwa nokuvuvukala futhi angasiza ukulawula ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone futhi anciphise ukuvuvukala emzimbeni. Kubandakanya izinhlanzi ezinamafutha ekudleni kwakho zingasekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kungenzeka ukuthi zithuthukise isikhathi esingajwayelekile.

3. Imifino eluhlaza enamaqabunga

Imifino eluhlaza eluhlaza efana nesipinashi, i-kale, ne-swiss chard inothile izakhi zomzimba ezibalulekile njengensimbi, i-calcium, kanye ne-magnesium. I-iron ibalulekile ekuhambeni kwegazi okunempilo futhi ingasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu ze-anemia yokuntuleka kwe-iron, ezingaba nomthelela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni. I-calcium ne-magnesium ukweseka ukuphumula kwemisipha futhi kungasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ukungeza imifino enamaqabunga ekudleni kwakho kunganikeza izakhi ezidingekayo zempilo yezempilo yokuya esikhathini.

4. Imbewu I-

imbewu efana ne-flaxseeds, imbewu yethanga, nembewu ye-sunflower icebe ngama-acid acids abalulekile, i-fiber, nama-antioxidants. I-Flaxseeds, ikakhulukazi, iqukethe ama-Lignans, anezindawo ze-estrogenic ezingasiza ukulawula ibhalansi ye-hormonal. Kubandakanya imbewu ehlukahlukene ekudleni kwakho kunganikeza izakhi ezibalulekile kanye nokusekelwa kwempilo ephelele yokuzala.

5. Ama-legumes I-

ama-legumes anjengelenti, ama-chickpeas, kanye nobhontshisi omnyama yimithombo emihle kakhulu yamaprotheni asuselwa kwizitshalo, i-fiber, kanye namaminerali. Futhi banenkomba ephansi ye-glycemic, okusho ukuthi banomthelela omncane kumazinga kashukela wegazi. Amazinga kashukela wegazi aqinile angasekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi asiza ukulawula imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Kubandakanya ama-legumes ekudleni kwakho anganikeza ukondliwa kanye nokuxhasa impilo yokuzala.

6. Izithelo ezinemibala nemifino I-

Izithelo nemifino enemifino efana namajikijolo, izithelo ze-citrus, upelepele wensimbi, namazambane amnandi acebile kuma-antioxidants, amavithamini, kanye namaminerali. Ama-antioxidants asiza ukunciphisa ukucindezelwa kwe-oxidative emzimbeni, okungasekela impilo yonke, kufaka phakathi ibhalansi ye-hormonal. Ukudla izithelo nemifino ehlukahlukene kunganikeza izakhamzimba ezibalulekile futhi kukhuthaze imijikelezo ejwayelekile yokuya esikhathini.

7. Ukudla okubilisiwe

Ukudla okubilisiwe okufana ne-yogurt, kefir, i-sauerkraut, futhi i-kimchi iqukethe ama-probiotic azuzisayo asekela ama-microbiome anempilo. I-microbiome yempilo enempilo idlala indima ebhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nempilo yonke. Kubandakanya ukudla okubilisiwe ekudleni kwakho kungathuthukisa impilo yokugaya futhi kungathuthukisa izikhathi ezingajwayelekile.

8. Amafutha anempilo

Ukufaka amafutha anempilo ekudleni kwakho kubalulekile ukuze ilinganise i-hormonal. Faka nokudla okufana nama-avocados, amantongomane, imbewu namafutha omnqumo. Lawa mafutha anempilo anikeza ama-acid amafutha adingekayo asekela ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone futhi anciphise ukuvuvukala emzimbeni. Kubandakanya amanani alinganiselwe amafutha anempilo ekudleni kwakho angafaka isandla emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini ejwayelekile.

9. I-Herbal Teas I- I-Spearmint Tea ikhonjiswe ukusiza ukunciphisa amazinga we-androgen, angafaka isandla ekulimaleni kwama-hormonal. Itiye le-raspberry leaf livame ukusetshenziselwa ukusekela impilo yempilo nokuya esikhathini. I-Chamomile Tea inezakhiwo ezolile ezingasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela nokukhuthaza ukuphumula. Ukujabulela ama-herbal teas kungaba ukwengeza okupholile ekudleni kwakho kokusekela isikhathi esijwayelekile.

10. Amanzi ne-hydration I-

Ukuhlala ama-hydrate kubalulekile empilweni yonke, kufaka phakathi impilo yokuya esikhathini. Ukuphuza inani elanele lamanzi kungasiza ukusekela ukuhamba kwegazi okunempilo futhi kugcinwe imisebenzi efanele umzimba. I-hydration efanele ibalulekile kwi-hormonal ibhalansi futhi ingathuthukisa izikhathi ezingajwayelekile. Qiniseka ukuthi uphuza amanzi anele usuku lonke ulalele izidingo zomzimba wakho we-hydration. I-

Ngenkathi lokhu kudla kungazuzisa isikhathi esingajwayelekile, kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi izidingo zomuntu ngamunye kanye nezimbangela ezingaphansi zingahluka. Kunconywa ukuthi abonane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo noma udokotela wokudla obhalisiwe wezeluleko ezenziwe ngezifiso nesiqondiso esekwe esimweni sakho esithile kanye nezimo zempilo.

data.heading: Yini isikhathi sokuxineka?
data.title: Ukubuka Isikhathi Sokucindezela
data.body:
I-

Ukuqonda Ukucindezela Izikhathi Izikhathi ze-

izingcindezi, ezaziwa nangokuthi izikhathi ezibangelwa ukucindezelwa noma izinguquko zokuya esikhathini ezihlobene nokuya esikhathini, bheka izinguquko kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini othonywe amazinga okucindezela kanye nokuphendula komzimba engcebweni. Ukucindezela kungaba nomthelela omkhulu ezicini ezahlukahlukene zezempilo, kufaka phakathi impilo yokuzala. Nakhu ukubuka konke okuningiliziwe kwezikhathi zokucindezela:

Kuyini ukucindezela? I-

ingcindezi ukuphendula okungokwemvelo komzimba kwezimo ezifuna noma ezisongela. Kubangela impendulo eyinkimbinkimbi yokuphendula ngokomzimba kanye nengqondo elungisa umzimba ukubhekana nezinselele. Ngenkathi ukucindezelwa kwesikhashana esifushane kungaba yinzuzo, ukucindezela okungapheli noma ngokweqile kungaba nemiphumela emibi empilweni yonke, kufaka phakathi impilo yokuya esikhathini.

Yeka ukuthi ukucindezela kuthinta kanjani umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini Ingcindezi ye-

ingaphazamisa ukulingana okubucayi kwama-hormone abhekele ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. I-axis ye-hypothalamus-pituitary-adrenal (HPA), ebandakanyeka ekuphenduleni kwengcindezi yomzimba, ixhumana ne-axis ye-hypothalamic-pituitary-gonadal (HPG), ebhekele ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone okuzala. I-

Ukucindezelwa okungamahlalakhona kungaholela ekudalweni kwe-axis ye-HPA, kubangele ukungalingani ekukhiqizeni i-cortisol, i-hormone eyinhloko yokucindezela. Amazinga aphakeme e-cortisol angaphazamisa ukukhiqizwa kanye nokulawulwa kwama-hormone okuzala anjenge-estrogen, progesterone, ukufundela ama-hormone (LH), ne-Follicle-evusa ama-hormone (Fsh).

Lokhu ukungalingani kwama-hormonal kungaholela ekushintsheni kokuya esikhathini, kufaka phakathi:

  1. Izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni: Ukuxineka kungaphazamisa ukuvama kwemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini, okubangela ukuhlukahluka ngobude bomjikelezo, izikhathi ezedlule, noma imijikelezo ende.
  2. Amenorrhea: Ukucindezela ngokweqile noma ukucindezela okungamahlalakhona kungaholela ekungabikho kokuya esikhathini, okwaziwa ngokuthi i-amenorrhea. Lokhu kungenzeka ngenxa ye-ovulation ecindezelwe noma ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone okuphazamisekile.
  3. Izikhathi ezisindayo noma ezinde: kwezinye izikhathi, izingcindezi zingaholela ekukhuphukeni kokugeleza kokuya esikhathini kanye nezikhathi ezihlala isikhathi eside. Lokhu kungabikwa ngokungalingani kwe-hormonal kanye nezinguquko ekulweni kwe-endometrial.
  4. isikhathi esibuhlungu: ukucindezelwa kungandisa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini nokungaphatheki kahle. Kungaqinisa izimpawu zokuphakama, njengokuqhakaza, ubumnene bebele kanye nokushintshwa kwemizwelo. I-

    Ukuphatha Ukuxineka Nokuthuthukisa Impilo Yezokuya esikhathini I-

    Ukuphatha ukucindezela ngempumelelo kubalulekile ekuthuthukiseni inhlala-kahle kanye nokusekela impilo yokuya esikhathini. Nawa amanye amasu angasiza ekunciphiseni ukucindezela futhi athuthukise impilo yakho yokuya esikhathini:

    1. Amasu wokuphathwa kwengcindezi I-

    yenza imisebenzi enciphisa ukucindezelwa efana ne-yoga, ukuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, nemikhuba yokucabanga. Lawa masu angasiza aphumule ingqondo nomzimba, anciphise amazinga we-hormone wokucindezela, futhi ubuyisele ibhalansi ye-hormonal.

    2. Ukuzivocavoca njalo I-

    Ukusebenza ngokomzimba okujwayelekile kukhonjisiwe ukunciphisa amazinga okucindezela futhi kuthuthukise imizwa. Thola inqubo yokuzivocavoca oyithandayo, noma ngabe ukuhamba, ukudansa, ukuhamba ngamabhayisekili, noma ukwenza umdlalo. Inhloso okungenani imizuzu eyi-150 yokulinganisela kokuqina komsebenzi we-aerobic ngeviki.

    3. Ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela I-

    Zinike isikhathi semisebenzi yokuzinakekela oyithola ijabulisa futhi uyiphumule. Lokhu kungafaka imisebenzi efana nokugeza, ukufunda incwadi, ukulalela umculo, ukuchitha isikhathi emvelweni, noma ukuheha izinto zokuzilibazisa. Ukuzinakekela kuqala kusiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela futhi kukhuthaza inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo.

    4. Ukudla okulinganiselayo I-

    idle ukudla okulinganiselayo okuhlanganisa ukudla okuhlukahlukene okumsulwa. Qinisekisa ukuthi uthola ama-vithamini anele, amaminerali, nama-antioxidants. Gwema ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwe-caffeine, ukudla okunoshukela, nokudla okucutshunguliwe, njengoba kungaba nomthelela ekungalinganisweni kwama-hormonal nezimpawu zokucindezela ezimbi kakhulu.

    5. Ukulala ngokwanele I-

    yabeka phambili ukulala kwekhwalithi ukusekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nenhlala-kahle. Ihlose amahora angama-7-9 wokulala okungaphazamiseki ubusuku ngabunye. Sungula inqubo ejwayelekile yokulala, dala imvelo yokulala enethezekile, futhi uzijwayeze amasu wokuphumula ngaphambi kokulala.

    6. Ukuxhaswa Komphakathi I-

    funa ukwesekwa okuvela kubangani, umndeni, noma iqembu lokusekelwa. Ukwabelana ngemizwa yakho kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwakho kunganikeza impumuzo engokomzwelo futhi kusiza ukudambisa ukucindezela. Ukwakha inethiwekhi yokusekelwa eqinile kunganikeza nomqondo wokuba yilungu nokuxhumeka.

    7. Usizo Lobungcweti

    uma ingcindezi iqhubeka noma iba nzima, cabanga ukufuna usizo lochwepheshe ku-Therapist noma komeluleki. Banganikeza ukuholwa, ukusekela, namasu okuphatha ukucindezela ngempumelelo.

    Isiphetho Izikhathi ze-

    izingcindezi zengcindezi zibhekisela ekushintsheni kokuya esikhathini okuthonywe amazinga okucindezela kanye nokuphendula komzimba ekucindezelekeni. Ukucindezela okungapheli noma ngokweqile kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal, okuholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni, i-amenorrhea, izikhathi ezinzima, noma ukukhuphula izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Ukulawula ukucindezela ngezinsu zokunciphisa ukucindezela, ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, ukudla okulinganiselayo, ukulala okwanele, ukusekelwa komphakathi, nosizo lobuchwepheshe lapho kudingeka ukuthuthukisa impilo yempilo kanye nenhlala-kahle. I-

    Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ngenkathi ukucindezela kungasiza ekushintsheni kokuya esikhathini, ezinye izinto ezingaphansi zingabandakanyeka. Uma uhlangabezana nokungaqondani okuqhubekayo noma okuqinile kokuya esikhathini, kunconywa ukubonisana nobuchwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze kuhlaziyelwe futhi ukuphathwa okufanele.

data.heading: Yiziphi izigaba ezi-5 zomjikelezo wokucindezela?
data.title: Umjikelezo wokucindezela nokuya esikhathini
data.body:
izigaba ezinhlanu zomjikelezo wokucindezela I-

Ukuxineka kuyindlela yemvelo ethola izidumbu zethu lapho ebhekene nezimo eziyinselele noma ezifunwayo. Umjikelezo wokucindezela uyinqubo ehilela izigaba ezihlukile, ngayinye inezimpawu zayo nemiphumela enhlalakahleni yethu yomzimba nakwezengqondo. Ngokuqonda izigaba ezinhlanu zomjikelezo wokuxineka, singakwazi ukubona kangcono nokuphatha ingcindezi ezimpilweni zethu. Ake sihlole isigaba ngasinye ngokuningiliziwe:

Isigaba 1: I-Alarm

Isiteji se-alamu siyisigaba sokuqala somjikelezo wokucindezela. Kwenzeka lapho sihlangana nengcindezelo, efana nomnqamulajuqu, ukungqubuzana, noma usongo. Ngalesi sigaba, imizimba yethu isebenze impendulo "yokulwa noma-indiza", okubangelwa ukukhishwa kwama-hormone okucindezela afana ne-adrenaline kanye ne-cortisol. Isigaba se-alamu sibonakaliswa:

  • ukushaya kwenhliziyo okusheshayo nokwenyuka kwengcindezi yegazi
  • izinzwa ezikhulisiwe nokuqwashisa
  • Ukuvuselelwa kohlelo lwezinzwa onozwela
  • ukukhuphuka kwamandla nokugxila I-

    Isigaba 2: Ukumelana I-

    uma impendulo yokuqala ye-alamu ibekezelela, umzimba ungena esigabeni sokumelana. Kulesi sigaba, umzimba uzama ukuzivumelanisa nezimo futhi ubhekane nengcindezelo eqhubekayo. Isiteji sokumelana sibonakala:

    • Ukukhishwa okuqhubekayo kwama-hormone wokucindezela
    • Ukuqiniswa kwemisebenzi yemvelo
    • imizamo yokubuyisela ibhalansi kanye nokusebenza okujwayelekile

      ngesikhathi sokumelana, umzimba uzama ukugcina ukulingana kwawo yize eqhubekayo. Kodwa-ke, uma ingcindezi iqhubeka noma iyaqina, izinsizakusebenza zomzimba zingaphela, ziholele esigabeni esilandelayo somjikelezo wokucindezela.

      Isigaba 3: / H2> I-

      Isigaba sokukhathala senzeka lapho izinsiza zomzimba zokubhekana nengcindezi zichithwa. Ukucindezelwa isikhathi eside noma okungamahlalakhona kunganciphisa amandla omzimba okugcina ukulinganisela, okuholele ekukhathazekeni ngokomzimba, ngokwengqondo nangokomzwelo. Isigaba sokukhathala sibonakaliswa:

      • ukukhulisa ubungozi ekuguleni kanye nezifo
      • amasosha omzimba abuthakathaka
      • Yehlise amandla kanye nogqozi
      • Ukukhathala okungokomzwelo kanye nokushiswa kwe-burnout I-

        esiteji sokukhathala, abantu abangathola ukukhathala, kufaka phakathi ukukhathala, ukuqwasha, ukungacasuli, ubunzima bokugxila, futhi kwehlise ukusebenza, futhi kwehlise ukusebenza. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela izimpawu zokukhathala futhi zithathe izinyathelo zokubhekana nokuphatha izingcindezi eziyisisekelo.

        Isigaba 4: Ukubuyisa I-

        Isigaba sokutakula yisigaba esibalulekile emjikelezweni wokuxineka, ngoba ivumela umzimba ukuthi uphumule, ulungise, futhi ugcwalise izinsiza zawo. Ngalesi sigaba, abantu bahlanganyela ngenkuthalo emisebenzini ekhuthaza ukuphumula, ukubuyiselwa, nokuzinakekela. Isiteji sokutakula sibonakaliswa:

        • Phumula futhi ulale
        • ukuzibandakanya emisebenzini ejabulisayo
        • izindlela zokukopisha ezinempilo, njengokuphefumula okujulile, ukuzindla, noma ukuzivocavoca
        • gxila ekuziphatheni kokuzinakekela kanye nokuncishiswa kwengcindezi I-

          Ngokuvuselela ibeka phambili, abantu abathile bangabuyisela amazinga abo bamandla, banciphise umthelela wokuxineka enhlalakahleni yabo, futhi bazilungiselele izinselelo ezizayo. I-

          Isigaba 5: Ukuguqulwa I-

          Isigaba sokugcina somjikelezo wokuxineka ukuguqulwa. Kulesi sigaba, abantu bayihambise ngempumelelo i-Gestoms futhi bathuthukise amasu okuvumelanisa ukubhekana nokucindezela okuzayo ngempumelelo. Isigaba sokuguqulwa sibonakaliswa ngu:

          • ukuqina okuthuthukisiwe kanye namakhono okubhekana nawo
          • ukukhulisa ukuzimela nokuzilawula
          • amandla athuthukisiwe okuphatha ukucindezela
          • Ukulondolozwa kwenhlala-kahle ngokomzimba nangokwengqondo

            Ngokufunda kusuka kokuhlangenwe nakho kwangaphambilini kwengcindezi kanye nokusebenzisa izindlela zokukopisha ezisebenzayo, abantu bangabavumelanise nezingcindezi ngendlela enempilo nezinzile. Isigaba sokuguqulwa sibonisa umphumela omuhle womjikelezo wokucindezela.

            Isiphetho I- Ngokubona lezi zigaba, singabona ngokwengeziwe izimpendulo zethu zokucindezela futhi sithathe izinyathelo ezisebenzayo zokuphatha ukucindezela ngempumelelo. I- Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukucindezela okungapheli noma ngokweqile kungaholela ezikhathini ezinde kakhulu esiteji sokuphelelwa amandla, okwenza kube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lube lusizo ukuthi bafune usizo lochwepheshe uma ukucindezela kuba yisikhathi eside noma kuqhubeka isikhathi eside.

data.heading: Ingabe ukucindezela kwengqondo kungadala izikhathi ezinzima?

Ingabe ukucindezela kwengqondo kungadala izikhathi ezinzima? I-

Ukuya esikhathini kuyinqubo yemvelo eyenzeka emzimbeni wesifazane njengengxenye yomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini uyinqubo eyinkimbinkimbi ye-hormonal eyenzeka ohlelweni lokuzala lwabesifazane. Kubandakanya ukulungiswa kwanyanga zonke kwesibeletho sokukhulelwa okungenzeka, kulandelwe ukuchitheka kwe-sitene lining uma umanyolo engenzeki. Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungaba nemiphumela emibi kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Nazi izindlela ezithile lapho ukucindezelwa kwengqondo kungasiza ngazo ezikhathini ezinzima:

1. I-Hormonal Imbabance Ingcindezi ye-

ingaphazamisa ukukhiqizwa okujwayelekile kanye nokulawulwa kwama-hormone okuzala, njenge-estrogen ne-progesterone. Ama-Hormonal ukungalingani kungaholela ekungalweni okungahambi kahle kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, kufaka phakathi isikhathi esindayo. Amazinga aphakanyisiwe ama-hormone acindezelekile, anjenge-cortisol, angathinta ukusebenza kwe-axis ye-hypothalamic-pitaitary-ovari, elawula ukukhishwa kwama-hormone okuzala.

2. I-Ovulation Dysfunction I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungathinta futhi i-ovulation, inqubo lapho kukhululwa khona iqanda elivuthiwe kwi-ovary. Ukuxineka kungaphazamisa ukusayina okujwayelekile kwama-hormonal okudingekayo e-ovulation, okuholela emijikelezweni engajwayelekile noma ethobelayo. Imijikelezo ye-Anvulatory yenzeka lapho i-ovulation ingenzeki, okuholela ekungabizi kwama-hormonal kanye nethuba lezikhathi ezinzima ngesikhathi semijikelezo elandelayo.

3. Ukwanda kokukhiqizwa kwe-Prostaglandin I- Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungakhuphula ukukhiqizwa kwama-prostaglandins, okuholela ekugqekelweni okujulile nokuhlala isikhathi eside. Lokhu kungaholela ezikhathini ezisindayo ngokunwetshwa kokugeleza kokuya esikhathini.

4. Ukugeleza kwegazi okuvaliwe Ingcindezi ye-

ingathonya inqubo yokufaka igazi, okuholela ezikhathini ezisindayo. Ama-hormone acindezelwe angathinta ukukhiqizwa kanye nokulinganisela kwezinto ezivalekile ngegazi, engakhuphula amathuba okusho ukopha okunzima nokuhlala isikhathi eside ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

5. Ukukhathala kwe-adrenal I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo okungamahlalakhona noma isikhathi eside kungaholela ekukhathaleni kwe-adrenal, isimo esibonakaliswa ngomsebenzi we-adrenal gland ancishisiwe. Izindlala ze-adrenal zidlala indima ekukhiqizeni ama-hormone okucindezela, kanye nama-hormone okuzala. Ukukhathala kwe-Adrenal kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal ebucayi edingekayo emsebenzini wokuya esikhathini okujwayelekile futhi kufaka isandla ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni nezisindayo. I-

Ukuphatha ukucindezelwa ukusekela ukuya esikhathini okunempilo

Ukubona nokuphatha ukucindezela kwengqondo kubalulekile ukuze kugcinwe umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini enempilo. Nawa amanye amasu angasiza ekunciphiseni ukucindezelwa nokukhuthaza ukuya esikhathini okujwayelekile:

1. Amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela I-

yenza imisebenzi enciphisa ukucindezelwa efana ne-yoga, ukuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, nemikhuba yokucabanga. Lawa masu angasiza ukuphumula ingqondo nomzimba, amazinga aphansi we-hormone, futhi abuyisele ibhalansi ye-hormonal.

2. Ukuzivocavoca njalo I-

Ukusebenza ngokomzimba okujwayelekile kukhonjisiwe ukunciphisa amazinga okucindezela futhi kuthuthukise imizwa. Thola inqubo yokuzivocavoca oyithandayo, noma ngabe ukuhamba, ukudansa, ukuhamba ngamabhayisekili, noma ukwenza umdlalo. Inhloso okungenani imizuzu eyi-150 yokulinganisela kokuqina komsebenzi we-aerobic ngeviki.

3. Ukubeka phambili ukuzinakekela I-

Zinike isikhathi semisebenzi yokuzinakekela oyithola ijabulisa futhi uyiphumule. Lokhu kungafaka imisebenzi efana nokugeza, ukufunda incwadi, ukulalela umculo, ukuchitha isikhathi emvelweni, noma ukuheha izinto zokuzilibazisa. Ukuzinakekela kuqala kusiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela futhi kukhuthaza inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo.

4. Ukudla okulinganiselayo I-

idle ukudla okulinganiselayo okuhlanganisa ukudla okuhlukahlukene okumsulwa. Qinisekisa ukuthi uthola ama-vithamini anele, amaminerali, nama-antioxidants. Gwema ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kwe-caffeine, ukudla okunoshukela, nokudla okucutshunguliwe, njengoba kungaba nomthelela ekungalinganisweni kwama-hormonal nezimpawu zokucindezela ezimbi kakhulu.

5. Ukulala ngokwanele I-

yabeka phambili ukulala kwekhwalithi ukusekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nenhlala-kahle. Ihlose amahora angama-7-9 wokulala okungaphazamiseki ubusuku ngabunye. Sungula inqubo ejwayelekile yokulala, dala imvelo yokulala enethezekile, futhi uzijwayeze amasu wokuphumula ngaphambi kokulala.

6. Ukuxhaswa Komphakathi I-

funa ukwesekwa okuvela kubangani, umndeni, noma iqembu lokusekelwa. Ukwabelana ngemizwa yakho kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwakho kunganikeza impumuzo engokomzwelo futhi kusiza ukudambisa ukucindezela. Ukwakha inethiwekhi yokusekelwa eqinile kunganikeza nomqondo wokuba yilungu nokuxhumeka.

7. Usizo Lobungcweti

uma ingcindezi iqhubeka noma iba nzima, cabanga ukufuna usizo lochwepheshe ku-Therapist noma komeluleki. Banganikeza ukuholwa, ukusekela, namasu okuphatha ukucindezela ngempumelelo.

Isiphetho I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungafaka isandla ezindabeni ezinzima ngokusebenzisa izindlela ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, okuphazamisekile kwe-ovulation, ukukhiqizwa kwe-ProstaZlandin, nokukhathala okuguquliwe kwegazi. Ukubona umthelela wengcindezi kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kubalulekile ukuze ulondoloze ukuya esikhathini. Ngokusebenzisa amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela, ukuzibandakanya ekuzivocavoca njalo, kubeka phambili ukuzinakekela, kulandela ukulala okulinganiselayo, ukufuna ukusekelwa komphakathi, futhi ucabangele usizo lochwepheshe lapho kunesidingo, abantu abangaphatha khona umsebenzi ojwayelekile wokuya esikhathini. I- Bangasiza ekuboneni noma yiziphi izimbangela eziyisisekelo futhi banikeze ukuholwa okwenziwe umuntu ngesimo sakho esithile.

data.heading: Ngabe ukudana kungavimba isikhathi sakho?
data.title: Ukuphatha Izikhathi Ezicindezelayo
data.body:
ingamisa ukucindezelwa isikhathi sakho? I-

Ukudana kuyisimo sempilo yengqondo esithinta izigidi zabantu emhlabeni wonke. Ingaba nemiphumela ehlukahlukene emzimbeni nasenhlalakahleni yonke. Umbuzo owodwa ovame ukuba kuphakame ukuthi ukudangala kungamisa isikhathi sakho. Kulesi sihloko, sizohlola ubudlelwano phakathi kokudangala nokuya esikhathini ukuze siqonde kangcono umthelela ongaba khona wokudangala kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini.

Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini nokuya esikhathini I-

umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini uyinqubo eyinkimbinkimbi yezomzimba eyenzeka ohlelweni lokuzala lwabesifazane. Kubandakanya ukulungiswa kwanyanga zonke kwesibeletho sokukhulelwa okungenzeka nokuchithwa kwesiteji sesibeletho uma ukukhiqizwa kwenzeke. Ngokwesilinganiso, umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini uthatha izinsuku ezingama-28, yize kungahlukahluka kuye kumuntu.

umthelela wokudangala kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini

Ukudana komoya kungathonya umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ngezindlela eziningi. Ngenkathi kungenzeka ingayeki ngokuphelele isikhathi sakho, kungadala ushintsho nokungahambi kahle. Nazi izindlela lapho ukudangala kungathinta khona ukuya esikhathini:

1. I-Hormonal Imbabance I- Ama-Hormonal ukungalingani kungaholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni noma ezingekho. Impendulo yokucindezela ehambisana nokudangala ingathinta futhi i-axis ye-hypothalic-pitaitary-potarian (HPO), elawula ukukhishwa kwama-hormone okuzala.

2. Izinguquko esikhathini sobude bokuya esikhathini I-

Ukudangala kungadala ukuguqulwa ngobude bomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Abanye abantu abanokudangala bangathola imijikelezo emifushane, kanti abanye bangaba nemijikelezo emide emide. Lezi zinguquko zingavela ekuguquguqukineni kwama-hormonal kanye nomthelela wokuxineka kwi-HPO axis.

3. I-ANONOVANTION I-

ANOVOVENT isho umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini lapho i-ovulation ingenzeki khona. Ukudana komoya kungaphazamisa ukusayina kwama-hormonal kuyadingeka e-ovulation, okuholela emijikelezweni yokuthola amandla. Emijikelezweni yokuthonga, i-sitene lining kungenzeka ingakhuli futhi ichithe njalo, okuholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni noma ezingekho.

4. I-Amenorrhea I-

Amenorrhea ukungabikho kwezikhathi zokuya esikhathini kwezinyanga ezintathu noma ngaphezulu ezilandelanayo. Ngenkathi ukucindezelwa kuphela kukodwa kungenzeka kungabingeli ngokuqondile i-amenorrhea, ukucindezelwa okukhulu noma okungamahlalakhona kungafaka isandla ekuthuthukisweni kwe-amenorrhea. Ukuxineka isikhathi eside kanye nezinguquko emazingeni e-hormone ahambisana nokudangala kungaholela ekucindezelweni komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini.

5. Izimpawu ze-PMS ezengeziwe I-

I-Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) ibhekisela kusethi yezimpawu zomzimba nezingokomzwelo ezenzeka ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini. Ukudana komoya kungandisa izimpawu ze-PMS, kufaka phakathi ukushintshwa kwemizwelo, ukungacasuki, ukukhathala, kanye nezinguquko ekudleni. Inhlanganisela yokudangala kanye nezimpawu eziqinile ze-PMS kungathinta kakhulu ukuba ngumthombo womuntu ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

6. Umthelela ekuhambeni kokuya esikhathini I-

Ukudana kungathinta nokugeleza kwegazi lokuya esikhathini. Abanye abantu abanokudangala bangase babone isikhathi esinzima noma esikhanyayo kunokujwayelekile. Izinguquko ekuhambeni kwegazi zingabikwa ngokungalingani kwe-hormonal, kuguqulwe izici ezivalekile ngegazi, kanye nokushintshashintshashintshashintshashintshashintshashintsha ekukhiqizeni i-Prostaglandin. I-

Ukuphatha ukudangala kanye nokusekela impilo yempilo yokuya esikhathini I-

Uma ubhekene nokudangala futhi ubonise ushintsho kumjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, kubalulekile ukufuna ukwesekwa kanye nokwelashwa okufanele. Nawa amanye amasu angasiza ekuphatheni ukudana nokusekela impilo yokuya esikhathini:

1. Funa usizo lochwepheshe

Uma usola ukuthi ubhekene nokudangala, kubalulekile ukufinyelela kuchwepheshe wezempilo yezengqondo. Banganikeza ukuxilongwa okunembile, bathuthukise uhlelo lokwelashwa, futhi banikeze ukungenelela kokwelapha, njengokungenelela noma ukwelulekwa noma umuthi, ukuphatha ukudana ngempumelelo.

2. Ukuzijwayeza ukuzikhathalela I-

ihlanganyele emisebenzini yokuzinakekela ekhuthaza inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo futhi inciphise ukucindezela. Lokhu kungafaka imisebenzi efana nokuvivinya umzimba njalo, ukuthola ukulala ngokwanele, ukwenza amasu wokuphumula (isb., Ukuzindla noma ukuphefumula okujulile), futhi ukuphishekela izinto zokuzilibazisa noma ukugcwaliseka.

3. Yakha inethiwekhi yokusekelwa I-

Zungeze nenethiwekhi yokusekela yabangane, umndeni, noma amaqembu okusekelana. Ukwabelana ngemizwa yakho kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwakho nabantu abathembekile kunganikeza impumuzo engokomzwelo futhi kusiza ukudambisa umthwalo wokudangala. Ubudlelwano bokusekela bunganikezela ngomqondo wokuba yilungu nokuxhumeka.

4. Amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela I-

Funda futhi usebenzise amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela ukuze anciphise umthelela wokuxineka kokuphila kwakho kwengqondo nangokomzimba. Amasu anjengokucabanga, i-Yoga, ukuphepha, kanye nokuzibandakanya ezitolo zokudala kungakusiza ubhekane nengcindezi futhi ukhuthaze ibhalansi ye-hormonal.

5. Gcina indlela yokuphila enokulinganisela I-

yathatha indlela yokuphila enempilo nenokulinganisela ehlanganisa nokudla okunempilo, ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, nokulala ngokwanele. Ukudla okufanele nokuzivocavoca okufanele kungasekela inhlala-kahle futhi kube nomthelela ekulinganiseni kwe-hormonal. Ngokwengeziwe, ukubeka phambili inhlanzeko yokulala ukuqinisekisa ukuphumula okwanele nokululama.

6. Cabanga ngokuhlola i-hormonal I- Bangakwazi ukuhlola isimo sakho se-hormonal futhi banikeze ukuholwa okufanele noma izinketho zokwelashwa ukuze ubuyisele umsebenzi wokuya esikhathini njalo.

Isiphetho I-

Ukudangala kungathinta umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi kufaka isandla ezinguquko, ngokungahambi kahle, kanye namathuba ezikhathi ezingekho. Ngenkathi ukudanya kwengcindezi kungahle kungakuyeki ngokuphelele isikhathi sakho, kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal, ubude bomjikelezo wokuthonya, kuholele ekutholeni i-annovation noma i-amenorrhea, kukhulisa izimpawu ze-PMS, kanye nomthelela wokugeleza kokuya esikhathini. Ukufuna usizo lochwepheshe, ukuzinakekela, ukwakha inethiwekhi yokusekelwa, ukuphatha ukucindezela, ukugcina impilo enokulinganisela, nokubheka ukuhlolwa kwe-hormonal lapho kunesidingo kungasiza ukuphatha ukudana nokusekela impilo yempilo. I- Bangasiza ekubhekaneni nezinkinga zakho ezithile futhi bathuthukise uhlelo oluphelele lokuxhasa inhlala-kahle yakho yengqondo nokuzala.

data.heading: Hlobo luni lwengcindezi luthinta izikhathi?
data.title: Ukubambezeleka kwengcindezi kanye ne-ovulation
data.body:
Izinhlobo zengcindezi ezithinta izikhathi I-

Ukuxineka kuyindlela yemvelo yomzimba ezinseleleni ezahlukahlukene zomzimba, ezingokomzimba, noma zengqondo. Kungathinta izici ezahlukahlukene zempilo yethu, kufaka phakathi umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Nazi ezinye izinhlobo zengcindezi ezingathinta izinkathi:

1. Ukuxineka kwengqondo I- Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal ebucayi edingekayo emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini njalo. Kungaholela ekungabizisweni kwama-hormonal, kuthinta ukusebenza kwe-axis ye-hypothalamic-pitaitary-ovaring (HPO), futhi kuthonye isikhathi kanye nokuvama kwezikhathi.

2. Ukucindezela ngokomzimba I-

Ukucindezela ngokomzimba kungavela ekuzivocavoca okukhulu, ukuqeqeshwa okuqinile, noma ukwenza imisebenzi ebeka izinto ezibalulekile emzimbeni. Ngenkathi ukuvivinya umzimba njalo kuzuzisa impilo yonke, ukucindezelwa ngokweqile noma okukhulu kakhulu kungathinta imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Kungaholela ekuphazanyisweni kwama-hormonal, njengokuncipha kwamazinga e-estrogen, angathinta njalo nokuvela kwezikhathi. Ukuxineka ngokomzimba nakho kungafaka futhi ezimweni ezinjenge-hypothalamic amenorrhea, lapho umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini uyeka khona ngenxa yokuphendula komzimba ekucindezelekeni ngokweqile komzimba.

3. Ukucindezelwa okunempilo

Ukucindezelwa okunempilo kwenzeka lapho umzimba ungatholi izakhi zanele ezidingekayo ukuze usebenze kahle. Ukudla okungekuhle, amaphethini wokudla okuvinjelwe, noma ukudla okwedlulele kungaba nomthelela ekucindezelekeni okunempilo. Ukunganele kokudla kwezakhi zomzimba ezibalulekile, ezinjengamavithamini, amaminerali namafutha, kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Ukucindezelwa okunempilo kungaholela ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni, izikhathi zeqa, noma i-amenorrhea (ukungabikho kwezikhathi).

4. Ukuxineka kwezemvelo I-

Ukuxineka kwezemvelo kubhekisele ethonyeni lezici zangaphandle ekuphenduleni kwengcindezi yomzimba. Izici ezinjengokuchayeka ekungcoleni, ubuthi, noma amazinga okushisa aphezulu angaba nomthelela ekucindezelekeni kwemvelo. Lezi zingcindezi zingathinta ukusebenza kohlelo lwe-endocrine futhi ziphazamise ibhalansi ye-hormonal edingekayo emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini njalo. Ngokwengeziwe, izinguquko ezicini zezemvelo, ezinjengezokuvakasha noma amashifu ngezikhathi zesikhathi, nazo zingathinta impendulo yokucindezela komzimba futhi kamuva zithinta izikhathi.

5. Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona I-

Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona kuyingcindezi yesikhathi eside ephikelela isikhathi eside. Kungavela ezinseleleni eziqhubekayo zokuphila, okuhlangenwe nakho okuhlukumezekile, noma ukuvezwa okuqhubekayo kwabacindezeli. Ukucindezelwa okungapheli kungaba nomthelela omkhulu emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini. Ukwenza kusebenze isikhathi eside sohlelo lokuphendula kwengcindezi yomzimba kungaholela ekudleni kwe-axis ye-HPO futhi kuphazamise amaphethini ajwayelekile we-hormonal adingekayo ezikhathini ezijwayelekile. Kungaba nomthelela ekulweni okungahambi kahle esikhathini, njengezikhathi ezedlule, isikhathi eside noma emifushane noma izinguquko ekuhambeni kokuya esikhathini.

Ukuphatha ukucindezela kokuya esikhathini okunempilo I-P> Ukulawula ukucindezela kubalulekile ukuze kugcinwe umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini enempilo. Nawa amanye amasu angasiza ekunciphiseni ukucindezelwa nokuxhasa izikhathi ezijwayelekile:

1. Amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela I-

esebenzisana namasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela njengokuzindla kokucabanga, izivivinyo zokuphefumula ezijulile, i-yoga, noma ukuphepha. Le mikhuba ingasiza ukuzola ingqondo, ngiphumule umzimba, futhi unciphise umthelela wokuxineka kubhalansi ye-hormonal.

2. Ukuzivocavoca njalo I-

ihlanganyele ekusebenzeni njalo ngokomzimba ukukhuthaza inhlala-kahle kanye nokuncishiswa kwengcindezi. Thola imisebenzi oyithandayo bese uyifaka kwinqubo yakho. Kodwa-ke, gwema ukuzivocavoca ngokweqile noma okukhulu okungaholela ekucindezelweni ngokomzimba nasekuphazamiseka kwe-hormonal.

3. Ukuphumula okwanele nokulala I-

Qinisekisa ukuthi ubeka ukulala okuphumuzayo futhi usungule uhlelo lokulala olungaguquki. Ukulala okwanele kusekela ibhalansi ye-hormonal ephelele futhi kusiza umzimba ukuthi ululame ekucindezelekeni. Ihlose amahora angama-7-9 wokulala kwekhwalithi ubusuku ngabunye.

4. Ukudla okulinganiselayo I-

yamukela ukudla okulinganiselayo nokunempilo okubandakanya izithelo ezahlukahlukene, imifino, okusanhlamvu okuphelele, amaprotheni anciphile namafutha anempilo. Ukudla okufanele kusekela impilo ye-hormonal futhi kusiza ukunciphisa imiphumela yokuxineka okunempilo kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini.

5. Ukuzinakekela nokuphumula I-

isikhathi semisebenzi yokuzinakekela ekhuthaza ukuphumula kanye nenhlala-kahle engokomzwelo. Bamba iqhaza kokuzilibazisa, uchithe isikhathi nabathandekayo, Prakthiza amasu wokuphumula, noma ukuphishekela imisebenzi eletha injabulo futhi yehlise amazinga okucindezela.

6. Funa ukwesekwa I- Banganikeza umhlahlandlela, ukusekela, kanye nezinsizakusebenza ukukusiza uzulazule ukucindezelwa kanye nomthelela wawo empilweni yakho yokuya esikhathini.

Isiphetho

Izinhlobo ezahlukahlukene zokucindezela zingathinta imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Ukuxineka kwengqondo, ukucindezelwa ngokomzimba, ukucindezelwa kokudla okunempilo, ukucindezelwa kwemvelo kanye nokucindezela okungamahlalakhona kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal, kuthinte ukusebenza kwe-axis ye-HPO, futhi kuholele ezikhathini ezingekho emthethweni noma ezingekho. Ukuphatha ukucindezela ngezinsu zokunciphisa ukucindezela, ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, ukuphumula okwanele nokulala, ukondleka okulinganiselayo, ukuzinakekela nokufuna ukusekelwa kungasiza ukukhuthaza ukuya esikhathini. Uma ubhekene nokungaqondani kokuya esikhathini okuqhubekayo noma ukhathazekile ngomthelela wengcindezi ngezikhathi zakho, thintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuqondiswa komuntu uqobo nokusekelwa.

data.heading: Yisiphi isikhathi esicindezelayo kunazo zonke?
data.title: Izimpawu zesikhathi sokucindezela
data.body:
isikhathi esicindezela kakhulu sezikhathi zowesifazane I-

Yonke into yomuntu ecindezelekile ngesikhathi somjikelezo wazo wokuya esikhathini ingahluka. Kodwa-ke, izikhathi ezithile noma izinto zingaba negalelo emazingeni andayo wokucindezela kwabantu abathile. Nazi ezinye izikhathi ezicindezelayo ngesikhathi somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini:

1. Isigaba se-Preminstrual (PMS) I- Ngalesi sigaba, amazinga we-hormone aguquguqukayo, angathinta imizwa, imizwa, kanye nenhlala-kahle emzimbeni. Abanye abantu bathola ukucindezelwa okwengeziwe, ukungacasuki, ukukhathazeka kanye nokushintshana kwemizwelo ngalesi sikhathi, okwenza kube sengathi kungenzeka kube nokucindezela.

2. Ukuya esikhathini I- Izimpawu zomzimba ezinjengemikhuba, ukukhathala, kanye nobuhlungu bekhanda, ezihlanganiswe nezinguquko ze-hormonal, zinganikela emazingeni andayo wokucindezela ngalesi sikhathi.

3. Imicimbi Yempilo Nezinto Zangaphandle

Izici zangaphandle nemicimbi yempilo nazo zingathonya amazinga okuxineka ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Isibonelo, imicimbi ebalulekile yempilo efana nesikhathi sokugcina somsebenzi, izivivinyo, ubunzima obunobudlelwano, noma izinselelo zomuntu siqu zingangeza amazinga okucindezela jikelele. Lezi zingcindezi zingahle zihambisane nezigaba ezahlukahlukene zomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, ziqinisa ukucindezela okucatshangelwe ngalezo zikhathi. I-

Ukulawula ukucindezela ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini I- Nawa amanye amasu okuphatha ukucindezela ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini:

1. Ukuzinakekela nokuphumula I-

yenza imisebenzi yokuzinakekela okukhuthaza ukuphumula nenhlala-kahle. Lokhu kungafaka imikhuba efana nokuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, ukwelula okumnene, ukuthatha amabhati afudumele, noma ukuhlanganyela kokuzilibazisa okuletha injabulo nokuzola.

2. Ukuzivocavoca I-

Ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezelwa nokukhuthaza inhlala-kahle yonke. Ukuzibandakanya emisebenzini efana ne-yoga, ukuhamba, ukudansa, noma noma yiluphi uhlobo lokuzivocavoca olukujabulelayo kungaba nemiphumela emihle namazinga wokuxineka.

3. Imikhuba Yokuphila Enempilo I- Le mikhuba yokusekela inhlala-kahle futhi ingasiza ukuphatha ukucindezela ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

4. Amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela

amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela njengokuzindla kwengqondo, ukuphepha ngokuthengisa, noma ukwenza imisebenzi ekusiza ukuthi ungaqedi futhi unciphise ukungezwani. Zama amasu ahlukene ukuthola okusebenzayo kuwe.

5. Inethiwekhi yokusekela I-

yafinyelela kubangani, umndeni, noma amaqembu okusekela ngezikhathi zokucindezela okwengeziwe. Ukwabelana ngemizwa yakho nokukhathazeka kwakho nabantu abathembekile kunganikeza ukusekelwa okungokomzwelo futhi kusiza ukudambisa ukucindezela. Funa usizo lochwepheshe uma ludingeka, njengokululeka noma ukwelashwa.

6. Ukuphathwa Kwesikhathi I-

Ukuphathwa kwesikhathi okusebenzayo kungasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Beka imisebenzi ebeka phambili imisebenzi, ubeke imigomo enengqondo, futhi udlulise izibopho zomthwalo wemfanelo lapho kungenzeka. Phula imisebenzi ibe yizinyathelo ezincane, ezilawulekayo ukuze ugweme ukuzizwa ukhungathekile.

Isiphetho

Izikhathi ezicindezelayo kakhulu ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini zingahlukahluka kuye kumuntu. Kwabanye abantu, isigaba sokubabaza kanye nokuya esikhathini ngokwaso singaba negalelo emazingeni andayo wokucindezela. Ngaphezu kwalokho, izinto zangaphandle nemicimbi yempilo kungaqinisa ukucindezela kulezi zikhathi. Kodwa-ke, ukusebenzisa amasu wokuphatha ingcindezi, ukuzinakekela, ukulondolozela indlela yokuphila enempilo, futhi ukufuna ukusekelwa kungasiza abantu abakwazi ukuhamba ngengcindezi futhi balondoloze kahle kuwo wonke umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini.

data.heading: Kwenzekani ngemuva kwesikhathi esicindezelayo?
data.title: Ukubhekana Nezikhathi Ezicindezelayo
data.body:
Kwenzekani ngemuva kwesikhathi esicindezelayo? I-

Ukuthola isikhathi esicindezelayo kungaba nemiphumela ehlukahlukene engqondweni nasemzimbeni. Ngemuva kokudlula esikhathini esicindezelayo, kunezinguquko eziningana ezingokomzimba, ezingokomzwelo, nokuziphatha ezingenzeka. Nakhu umbono walokho okwenzekayo ngemuva kwesikhathi esicindezelayo:

1. Ukubuyiselwa Kwemvelo

Ngesikhathi esicindezelayo, umzimba ushintsha ushintsho ngokomzimba njengoba uphendula ngokucindezela. Ngemuva kwalokho, umzimba ungena esigabeni sokutakula lapho uzama ukubuyela esimweni sokulinganisela. Izimpawu zomzimba ezakhushulwa ngesikhathi sokucindezela, njengokungezwani kwemisipha, ikhanda, noma izingqinamba zokugaya ukudla, kungahle kunciphise kancane kancane njengoba umzimba uphumule futhi uphinde ungene.

2. Ukulawulwa ngokomzwelo I-P> Izikhathi ezicindezelayo zingathinta inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo. Ngemuva kwalokho, isimo esingokomzwelo singashintshashintsha njengoba nomzimba nengqondo kuvuse kabusha. Abanye abantu bangathola umuzwa wokukhululeka noma ukukhululwa njengoba ingcindezi inyamandla, okuholela ekuthuthukisweni kwezimo. Kodwa-ke, abanye bangase baqhubeke nokuthola isikhathi eside okuthinta imizwa ngokomzwelo, njengokungacasuki, ukudabuka, noma ukukhathazeka, ngisho nangemva kokuba isikhathi esicindezelayo siphela. Amasu wokulawula ngokomzwelo, ukuzinakekela, nokusekelwa kwabanye kungasiza ekubuyiselweni ngokomzwelo.

3. Izinguquko zeHormonal Ingcindezi ye-

ingathinta ukulingana okubucayi kwama-hormone emzimbeni. Ngemuva kwesikhathi esicindezelayo, uhlelo lwe-hormonal lulwela ukuphinda lube nguyelwe. Ukushintshashintsha kwe-Hormonal okwenzeka ngesikhathi sokuphendula kwengcindezi, njengamazinga aphakeme e-cortisol ne-adrenaline, kungahle kubuye kancane kancane. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ukucindezelwa okungapheli noma okuphindaphindiwe kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal esikhathini eside, okuholela emiphumeleni yesikhathi eside emzimbeni.

4. Ukubuyiselwa Kwesistimu Yokuvikelwa Kwamasosha Ingcindezi ye-

ingaba nemiphumela yesikhashana neyesikhathi eside kumasosha omzimba. Ngesikhathi esicindezelayo, ukusabela kwamasosha omzimba kungahlekaliswa okwesikhashana, okwenza abantu bathambekele ekuguleni nasekuthelelekeni. Ngemuva kokucindezela kwengcindezi, amasosha omzimba aqala ukubuyisela ukusebenza kwawo okujwayelekile. Kodwa-ke, uma ingcindezi iqhubeka noma iphindaphindwa, amasosha omzimba angahlala ancishiswe, okwenza abantu babe sengozini enkulu yezinkinga zezempilo.

5. Ukusebenza kwengqondo Ingcindezi ye-

ingaba nomthelela ekusebenzeni kwengqondo, okubandakanya inkumbulo, ukugxila, kanye namakhono okwenza izinqumo. Ngemuva kwesikhathi esicindezelayo, abantu bangathola ngcono kancane kancane ekusebenzeni kwengqondo njengoba umzimba nengqondo kululama. Ukucaciswa kwengqondo nokugxila kwengqondo kungathuthuka, futhi abantu bathola amandla abo okucabanga ngokucacile futhi benze izinqumo ngempumelelo. Ukuzibandakanya emisebenzini evuselela ubuchopho, njengokufunda, iphazili, noma izivivinyo zokuqonda, kungasiza ukuthuthukisa ukululama kwengqondo.

6. Ukuziphatha kanye namaphethini wokubhekana Izikhathi ezicindezelayo zingathonya amaphethini okuziphatha kanye nezinqubo zokubhekana. Ngemuva kokuncipha kwengcindezi, abantu bangazithola belungisa indlela abaziphatha ngayo futhi bafuna amasu okubhekana nawo kakhulu. Kujwayelekile ukucabanga ngokuthi isikhathi esicindezelayo saphathwa kanjani futhi sikhombe izindlela zokuphatha ukucindezela okuzayo ngempumelelo. Lokhu kungafaka ukusebenzisa amasu wokuphatha kwengcindezi, ukufuna ukwesekwa, noma ukwenza izinguquko zendlela yokuphila ukunciphisa umthelela wengcindezi enhlalakahleni yonke.

7. Imiphumela yesikhathi eside I-

Ngenkathi imiphumela esheshayo yesikhathi esicindezelayo ingaphela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, kubalulekile ukubona ukuthi ukucindezelwa okungapheli noma okuphindaphindiwe kungaba nemiphumela yesikhathi eside. Ukuchayeka isikhathi eside ama-hormone okucindezela kungaholela ezinkingeni zezempilo ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi izinkinga zenhliziyo, umsebenzi wokuvikelwa komzimba, ukuphazamiseka kwempilo yengqondo, nokungafani kwempilo yengqondo, nokungafani kwempilo ye-hormonal. Ngakho-ke, kubalulekile ukubeka phambili ukuphathwa kwengcindezi futhi kuthuthukise amasu wokukopisha anempilo ukunciphisa ubungozi emiphumeleni yesikhathi eside.

Isiphetho I-

ngemuva kwesikhathi esicindezelayo, umzimba nengqondo kudlula inqubo yokubuyiselwa nokubuyiselwa. Izimpawu zomzimba ziyancipha, imizwa kancane kancane iyazinza, ibhalansi ye-hormonal ibuyiselwe, umsebenzi wokuzivikela uthuthuka, ukusebenza kwengqondo kubuyiselwa kokujwayelekile, nokuziphatha kanye namaphethini wokubhekana nakho kungahle kuphinde kuhlolwe. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ukucindezela okungapheli noma okuphindaphindiwe kungaba nemiphumela yesikhathi eside ezicini ezahlukahlukene zempilo. Amasu wokuphatha abeka phambili ukucindezela, ukuzinakekela, nokufuna ukusekelwa kungasiza kwinqubo yokutakula futhi akusize ukunciphisa ingozi yemiphumela yesikhathi eside.

data.heading: Ingabe ukucindezela kwengqondo kungathinta ukuzala?
