Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukucindezelwa kungawuthinta nobude nemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Abesifazane ababhekene nengcindezi yezengqondo bangathola imijikelezo emifushane noma ende, ukopha okungajwayelekile, noma izinguquko ekujuleni nasesikhathini sokugeleza kokuya esikhathini.

3. Ikhwalithi yesidoda eyehlisiwe nenani I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungathinta nokuzala kwabesilisa ngokuthonya ikhwalithi yesidoda nenani. Ukuxineka kungaholela ekunciphiseni ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda, motility ophansi wesidoda, kanye nesidoda esingajwayelekile se-morphology. Amazinga aphakanyisiwe ama-hormone acindezelekile angathinta amandla okuhlola okukhiqiza isidoda esinempilo, okungenzeka ukunciphisa amathuba okuzala.

4. Umsebenzi wezocansi ne-libido I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungathonya ukusebenza kwezocansi ne-libbido, okungathinta ukuzala. Ukucindezelwa kungaholela ekunciphiseni isifiso socansi noma ukuvuvukala, okufaka isandla ezinseleleni zokukhulelwa. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukucindezela kungathinta ikhwalithi yobudlelwano bezocansi nokusondelana, okuthinta imiphumela yokuzala.

5. Ubuchwepheshe bokuzala (ubuciko) I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungathinta futhi ukusebenza ngempumelelo kobuchwepheshe obusizile bokuzalelwa (ubuciko), njengakumanyolo we-vitro (IVF) kanye nokufakwa kwe-intrauterine (IUI). Ucwaningo luphakamise ukuthi amazinga aphezulu okucindezela anganciphisa amanani empumelelo yezinqubo zobuciko. Ukucindezela kungathinta imvelo ye-hormonal, ukubonwa kwesibeletho, kanye nokufakwa kwe-embumbo, okungenzeka kunciphise amathuba okukhulelwa okuphumelelayo.

6. Ukubhekana namasu nokuxhaswa I- Ukuphatha ukucindezela ngezinhlelo zokunciphisa ukucindezelwa, ukuguqulwa kwendlela yokuphila, kanye nokungenelela kwengqondo kungasiza ukunciphisa umthelela wayo ekuvumeni. Amasu anjengokucabanga, izivivinyo zokuphumula, ukwelulekwa, kanye namaqembu okusekela anganikeza abantu ngamathuluzi okuphatha ukucindezelwa nokukhuthaza inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo ngesikhathi sohambo lokuzala.

Isiphetho I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungathinta ukuzala ngokuphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal, ukuphazamisa ama-ovulation kanye nokuya esikhathini, okunciphisa ukusebenza kwezocansi kanye ne-libido, futhi kungathonya amanani empumelelo wezobuchwepheshe osizwayo. Ukuqonda ubudlelwano phakathi kwengcindezi yengqondo nokuzala kwenzalo kugcizelela ukubaluleka kokubeka phambili inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo nokwamukela izindlela zokuphatha izingcindezi njengengxenye yokunakekelwa kokuzala. Ngokuphatha ukucindezelwa kwengqondo nokufuna ukwesekwa okufanele, abantu bangathuthukisa amathuba abo okufeza imiphumela yabo yokuzala.

data.heading: Ingabe ukucindezela kwengqondo kwengqondo kungabambezeleka?
data.title: Ukubambezeleka kwe-Ovulation kanye ne-Ovulation
data.body:
I-

ingakwazi ukucindezela kwengqondo okubambezeleka kwengqondo? I-

i-ovulation, ukukhishwa kweqanda kusuka kuma-ovari, kuwumcimbi obalulekile kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi kuyadingeka ukuze ukhulelwe. Ngenkathi i-ovulation ilawulwa ngokuyinhloko yizici ze-hormonal, ukucindezelwa kwengqondo kungathonya isikhathi nokuvela kwe-ovulation. Nakhu ukubhekisisa okuseduze nalokho ukucindezelwa kwengqondo kungathinta kanjani i-ovulation:

1. I-Hypothalamic-Putary-Adrenal (HPA) Axis I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kubangela ukusebenza kwempendulo yokuxineka komzimba, okubandakanya ukukhishwa kwama-hormone okucindezela njenge-cortisol. I-HPA axis, edlala indima enkulu ekuphenduleni kwengcindezi, nayo ingasebenzisana nohlelo lokuzala kanye ne-ovulation yethonya. Amazinga aphakanyisiwe e-cortisol ngenxa yokucindezela okungapheli noma okukhulu kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal ebucayi edingekayo e-ovulation. I-Axis ye-HPA ingathinta ukukhiqizwa kanye nokulawulwa kwe-gonadotropin-ukukhulula ama-hormone (GNRH), okubalulekile ekukhishweni kwe-hormone evuselelayo ye-follicle (FSH) kanye nokuvuselela ama-hormone (LH). Ukuphazamiseka ekukhishwe kwe-GNRH kungathinta isikhathi nesikhathi sokuvela kwe-ovulation, okuholela ekutholeni i-ovulation ebambezelekile noma ukungabi khona kwe-ovulation.

2. I-Hormonal Imbabancences I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungaphazamisa i-cascade eyinkimbinkimbi ye-hormonal edingekayo e-ovulation. Ukungalingani kwe-hormonal okuveziwe kungathinta ukuthuthukiswa kwe-follicular, ukuvuthwa nokukhishwa kwamaqanda. Amazinga aphakeme e-cortisol angaphazamisa ukukhiqizwa kanye nokulawulwa kwama-hormone okuzala, okuholela ekubambeni okubambezelekile noma okungajwayelekile.

Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukucindezelwa kungathinta namanye ama-hormone abandakanyeka kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, njenge-estrogen ne-progesterone. Ukungalingani kule homone kungaphazamisa iphethini evamile ukukhula kanye nentuthuko, okuthinta isikhathi nokuvela kwe-ovulation.

3. Ukubambezeleka komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini Ingcindezi ye- Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungaphazamisa isikhathi esijwayelekile somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, okubangela ukwehlukana ngobude bomjikelezo. Uma umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ubambezelekile, i-ovulation kungenzeka ibambezelekile futhi. I-

i-ovulation ebambezelekile ingathinta isikhathi semizamo yokuqamba, njengoba iwindi elivundile lingashintsha. Lokhu kungabeka izinselelo zabantu abazama ukukhulelwa futhi bancike ekubikezelweni okunembile kwe-ovulation ukuze bandise amathuba abo okukhulelwa.

4. Umthelela kuma-hormone wokuzala I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungathonya ukukhiqizwa kanye nokulawulwa kwama-hormone okuzala, okuthinta i-ovulation. Ukuxineka kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ebucayi phakathi kwe-FSH ne-LH, okubaluleke kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni kwe-Follucular, ukuvuthwa kanye ne-ovulation. Ukuphazamiseka emazingeni kanye nesikhathi salawa ama-hormone kungaholela e-ovulation ebambezelekile. I-

Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukucindezelwa kungathinta namanye ama-hormone abandakanyeka kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, njenge-prolactin nama-hormone e-thyroid. Ukungalingani kula ma-hormone kungafaka isandla e-ovulation ebambezelekile kanye nokungahambi kahle esikhathini.

5. Ukubhekana namasu nokuxhaswa

Ukubona umthelela ongaba khona wokuxineka kwengqondo ku-ovulation ugcizelela ukubaluleka kokuphatha ukucindezela nokufuna ukwesekwa. Ukusebenzisa amasu okubhekana nawo ngempumelelo njengamasu okunciphisa ukucindezela, izivivinyo zokuphumula, nokucabanga kungasiza ukunciphisa imiphumela yomzimba yengcindezi yohlelo lokuzala.

Ukwakha inethiwekhi yokusekelwa, funa ukwelulekwa noma ukwelashwa, kanye nokuzinakekela ngokuzinakekela kunganikeza abantu ngamathuluzi okuphatha ukucindezela nokukhuthaza inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo. Ngokubeka phambili impilo yezengqondo nokwamukela amasu wokukopisha okunempilo, abantu bangahle banciphise imiphumela yengcindezi ku-ovulation futhi bathuthukise amathuba abo okukhulelwa.

Isiphetho I-

Ukuxineka kwengqondo kungabambezela ngempela i-ovulation ngokuphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal ebucayi kanye nokusebenzisana okuyinkimbinkimbi okubandakanyeka kwinqubo yombumbulu. Ukwenza kusebenze ukuphendula kwengcindezi, ukungalingani kwama-hormone okuzala, nokuphazamiseka ku-axis ye-HPA kungaba nomthelela ekubambeni okubambezelekile kanye nokungahambi kahle esikhathini. I-

Ukuqonda ubudlelwano phakathi kwengcindezi yengqondo kanye ne-ovulation kuqokomisa ukubaluleka kokuphathwa kwengcindezi, ukuzinakekela, nokufuna ukwesekwa okufanele. Ngokubeka phambili inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo futhi wamukela amasu wokukopisha aphilile, abantu bangahle banciphise umthelela wokuxineka kwengqondo ku-ovulation, bathuthukise inzalo yabo, futhi bandise amathuba abo okukhulelwa.

data.heading: Yisiphi isikhathi esingobungozi bobulili?
data.title: Isikhathi sobulili obunobungozi
data.body:
Yisiphi isikhathi esiyingozi sobulili? I-

Umsebenzi wezocansi ingathwala ubungozi obuthile, kufaka phakathi ubungozi bokukhulelwa okungahlosiwe kanye nezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI). Ukuqonda umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kanye nomqondo wezinsuku ezivundile nezingavundile ungasiza abantu ukuthi basebenzise izinqumo ezinolwazi mayelana nesikhathi sokuya ocansini. Nakhu ukubhekisisa izigaba ezahlukahlukene zomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini lapho izingozi ezihambisana nocansi zingahluka:

1. Isigaba Sokuya esikhathini

Isigaba sokuya esikhathini, esiphawula ukuqala komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, ngokuvamile kubhekwa njengenkathi enobungozi obuphansi bokukhulelwa. Ngalesi sigaba, isibeletho sichitha i-lining yaso, okuphumela ekujuleni kokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ubungozi bama-STI buhlala njengamanje kungakhathalekile ukuthi isigaba sokuya esikhathini. Uma abantu bebodwa bengazibandakanyi ebudlelwaneni obumnandi noma bekhathazekile nge-STI, kufanele baqhubeke nokuvikela ukuvikelwa okufanele ngesikhathi sokwenza ucansi.

2. Isigaba sangaphambi kombombo

Isigaba sangaphambi kombombo, esaziwa nangokuthi isigaba se-Follular, kwenzeka ngaphambi kwe-ovulation. Lesi sigaba sibonakaliswa ukuvuthwa kweqanda kwi-ovary kanye nokuqina kokufakwa ngaphakathi kwesibeletho. Ingozi yokukhulelwa ngesikhathi salesi sigaba ngokuvamile iphansi, ikakhulukazi ezinsukwini zangaphambili. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi isidoda singasinda endaweni yokuzala yabesifazane izinsuku eziningana, kanti i-ovulation ingenzeka ekuqaleni noma ngemuva kwesikhathi lapho kulindeleke khona, ngokwengeziwe ukukhulisa ubungozi bokukhulelwa.

3. Isigaba se-ovulation I-

isigaba se-ovulation isikhathi esivundile kunazo zonke somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi siveza ubungozi obukhulu bokukhulelwa. I-ovulation ibhekisela ekukhishweni kweqanda kusuka ku-ovary, eseyatholakala ukuze umanyolo ngesidoda. I-ovulation imvamisa yenzeka maphakathi nomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, kepha isikhathi singahlukahluka kuye ngomuntu. Iqanda liyasebenza cishe amahora angama-12-24 ngemuva kwe-ovulation, futhi isidoda singasinda epheshana elizenzekayo kuze kube izinsuku ezinhlanu. Ngakho-ke, ukuya ocansini ezinsukwini eziholela e-ovulation futhi ngosuku lwe-ovulator uqobo lubeka engcupheni enkulu yokukhulelwa.

4. Isigaba se-Post-Ombolulatolika I- Ngalesi sigaba, i-follicle evuthiwe iguqula ibe yisakhiwo esibizwa ngokuthi yi-corpus luteum, esikhiqiza i-progesterone ukulungiselela isibeletho sokufakwa kweqanda elikhulisiwe. Ingozi yokukhulelwa ngesikhathi sesigaba se-post-over-over-ancipha kancane njengoba iqanda elingenazithelo eliqhekezeke futhi i-sitene lining lilungiselela ukuchitha umjikelezo olandelayo wokuya esikhathini. I-

Ukuqonda izindlela zokuqwashisa ngenzalo I- Izindlela Zokuqwashisa Ngezilo Zokuzala (FAMS) zingasiza abantu balandelele imijikelezo yabo yokuya esikhathini, baqaphe izinguquko ku-mucus yesibeletho, bese belinganisa izinga lokushisa lomzimba eliyisisekelo ukukhomba izinsuku ezivundile nezingavundile ngokwengeziwe. I-

yabantu abazama ukukhulelwa, ukukhomba iwindi elivundile libalulekile, ngoba yileso sikhathi lapho ukuya ocansini kungenzeka kuholele ekukhulelweni. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, kubantu abafisa ukugwema ukukhulelwa, kubalulekile ukuze bagweme ukuya ocansini noma basebenzise izindlela ezifanele zokuvimbela inzalo ngesikhathi sewindows evundile.

Isiphetho I-

ubungozi obuhambisana nocansi luyahlukahluka ngokuya ngesigaba somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ngenkathi isigaba sesigaba sokuya esikhathini kanye nesigaba se-post-wolatory ngokuvamile kubhekwa njengezikhathi zobungozi eziphansi zokukhulelwa, kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi ubungozi bama-STI bukhona ngaphandle kwesigaba sokuya esikhathini. Isigaba sangaphambi kombombole sibeka engcupheni ephansi yokukhulelwa, kepha kubalulekile ukucubungula ukuhlukahluka okungaba khona ku-ovulation isikhathi se-ovulation. Isigaba se-Ovulation isikhathi esivundile kakhulu somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi sibeka engcupheni ephakeme kakhulu yokukhulelwa. I- p>

data.heading: Ngabe ubulili buzwela kakhulu esikhathini?
data.title: Ucansi ngesikhathi
data.body:
Ngabe ubulili buzwela kakhulu esikhathini? I-

Ukuhlangenwe nakho ngokobulili kungahlukahluka kuye kumuntu kuya kumuntu, futhi okuthandayo kanye nemizwa engahluka ngezigaba ezahlukahlukene zomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Nakhu ukubhekisisa okuseduze ukuthi ubulili bungabonakala kanjani ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini:

1. Imizwa nenduduzo

Abanye abantu bangathola ukuzwela okuphakeme endaweni yabo yangasese ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Ukwanda kwegazi kwegazi esifundeni se-pelvic kungasiza ekukeni okuthuthukile futhi kuvuselelwa. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi imizwa namazinga okududuza kungahluka phakathi kwabantu. Abanye bangathola ubulili bujabulisa futhi kujabulise ngesikhathi sabo, kanti abanye bangazizwa bengakhululekile noma bakhetha ukugwema umsebenzi wobulili ngokuphelele.

2. Izinguquko zeHormonal I-

ngesikhathi sokujikeleza kokuya esikhathini, ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal kungathonya i-libido nesifiso sobulili. Kwabanye abantu, izinguquko ze-hormonal ezihambisana nokuya esikhathini zingaholela ekwandiseni i-drive yezocansi futhi zakhulisa ukuzwela ngokobulili. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, abanye abantu bangathola ukuguquguquka kwama-hormonal okuholela ekunciphiseni i-libido futhi kunciphise inzalo emisebenzini yezocansi ngesikhathi sabo.

3. Izici zengqondo

Izici zengqondo zengqondo nazo zingadlala indima ngendlela abantu ababona ngayo ubulili ngesikhathi sabo. Abanye abantu bangazizwa bazibona ngokwengeziwe noma bathambekele kancane ekuhlanganyeleni ngokocansi ngenxa yezici ezinjengokugeleza kokuya esikhathini, ukungakhululeki, noma okuthandayo. Ngokuphambene nalokho, abanye bangazizwa bekhululekile futhi bavulekele ekuhloleni ubulili babo ngalesi sikhathi.

4. Izinzuzo Nokucatshangelwa

ukuzibandakanya kokusebenza ngokocansi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kungaba nezinzuzo ezithile kanye nokucatshangelwa:

Izinzuzo:
  • Ukwanda kokuzwela kwalo lwangasese: Abanye abantu bangathola ukuzwela okuphakeme kanye nenjabulo ngesikhathi sabo.
  • Ukukhululeka kobuhlungu I-
  • Ukukhishwa Kwezomzwelo: Ukuzibandakanya emsebenzini wezocansi kungakhipha ama-endorphin, angafaka isandla ekuphumeni komoya nokuthola ukucindezela.

    Ukucatshangelwa:
      I-
    • Hygiene: Abanye abantu bangase bakhethe ukuvikelwa okwengeziwe, okufana nokuvikelwa kokuya esikhathini, ama-tampon, noma amathawula, ukuphatha ukuhamba kokuya esikhathini ngesikhathi socansi.
    • Induduzo: Ukugeleza kokuya esikhathini, izinguquko ze-hormonal, noma ukungaphatheki kahle komzimba kungathinta amazinga okududuza ngesikhathi sex. Imvume yokuxhumana ne-mutual ibalulekile ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bobabili abalingani bakhululekile. I-
    • STI RNSSING: Ngenkathi ubungozi bokukhulelwa buvame ukwehla ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, ingozi yezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI) isamanje ikhona. Imikhuba yocansi ephephile, njengokusebenzisa amakhondomu, kubalulekile ukuvikela.
    • Okuncamelayo komuntu siqu: okuthandwa ngumuntu ngamunye kanye namazinga okududuza kuyahlukahluka, futhi kubalulekile ukuhlonipha imingcele yomuntu siqu nezinqumo maqondana nokusebenza kwezocansi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

      Ukuxhumana nemvume I-

      Ukuxhumana okuvulekile nemvume kubalulekile kunoma yikuphi ukuhlangana ngokocansi, kufaka phakathi lezo ezenzeka ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukuthi abalingani badingida amazinga abo okududuza, okuncamelayo, kanye nanoma yikuphi ukukhathazeka okungenzeka banakho. Ukuhloniphana, ukuqonda, kanye nemvume kubalulekile ekuqinisekiseni okuhlangenwe nakho okuhle ngokobulili.

      Isiphetho I- Ukwanda kokuzwela kofuzo, ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal, izici zengqondo, kanye nokuzikhethela komuntu siqu konke kungaba nomthelela kokuhlangenwe nakho komuntu ngamunye. Abanye abantu bangathola ubulili bujabulisa futhi kujabulise ngesikhathi sabo, kanti abanye bangaba nezintandokazi ezihlukile noma bazizwe bengakhululekile. I-

      ukuqonda nokuhlonipha imingcele yomuntu ngamunye, ukwenza ukuxhumana okuvulekile, futhi imvume ebeka phambili ibalulekile kunoma yimuphi umsebenzi wezocansi, kungakhathalekile ukuthi isigaba sokuya esikhathini, kungakhathalekile ukuthi isigaba sokuya esikhathini, kungakhathalekile ukuthi kunesigaba sokuya esikhathini. Ngokubeka phambili ukuxhumana, imvume, nenduduzo yomuntu siqu, abantu bangakwazi ukuzulazula ngokobulili ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini ngendlela ezwakala ngayo.

data.heading: Ingabe igazi lesikhathi lingathinta umfana?
data.title: Isikhathi igazi namadoda
data.body:
isikhathi segazi singathinta umfana? I-

Ukuya esikhathini kuyinqubo yemvelo eyenzeka kubantu abanesibeletho futhi iyingxenye evamile yomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukubhekana nemibono eyiphutha nokukhathazeka okuphathelene nemiphumela engaba khona yegazi lesikhathi kubantu abangaya esikhathini. Nakhu ukubhekisisa esihlokweni:

1. I-Bloodboarne Pathogens I-

isikhathi igazi ayibangeli engcupheni enkulu yokudlulisela ama-pathogen abalwa yigazi, njenge-HIV noma i-hepatitis, kumlingani phakathi kokusebenza ngocansi. Ama-pathogen azalwa ngegazi athathwa ngokujwayelekile ngokuxhumana okuqondile kwegazi kuya kwegazi noma eminye imisebenzi enobungozi obukhulu, njengokuhlanganyela izinaliti noma ukuzibandakanya ocansini olungavikelekile nomuntu onegciwane. Igazi lokuya esikhathini lodwa aliqukethe ukuhlushwa okwanele kwalawa ma-pathogen ukwenza ukudluliselwa.

2. Ukutheleleka kwamagciwane I-

Ngenkathi ubungozi bamagciwane wegazi buphansi, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi igazi lokuya esikhathini lingaphatha amagciwane. Kodwa-ke, ukuba khona kwamagciwane egazini lokuya esikhathini akuholeli ngokuzenzakalelayo ekuthelelekeni noma kube yingozi enkulu kwabalingani besilisa. Imvelo yangasese yangasese igcina ukulingana okubucayi kwamagciwane, futhi izivikelo zemvelo zomzimba zivame ukuvikela ezifweni.

3. Ukuhlanzeka komuntu siqu I-

Ukugcina izindlela ezinhle zokuhlanzeka komuntu siqu kubalulekile kubo bobabili abalingani ngesikhathi sokwenza ucansi, kungakhathalekile ukuba khona kwegazi lokuya esikhathini. Abantu abaya esikhathini kungenzeka bakhethe ukusebenzisa imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini, njengamathayi, izinkomishi zokuya esikhathini, noma amaphini, ukuphatha ukugeleza kwazo futhi kunciphise noma yikuphi ukuxhumana nabantu ngegazi. Ukulahlwa okufanele kwemikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini kanye nokugeza okujwayelekile kwezandla kungasiza ekuqinisekiseni inhlanzeko.

4. Ukuxhumana nemvume I-

Ukuxhumana okuvulekile nemvume kubalulekile kunoma yikuphi ukuhlangana ngokocansi. Uma umlingani othile ezwa engakhululekile noma ekhathazekile ngegazi lokuya esikhathini, kubalulekile ukuxoxa ngale mizwa obala nangokweqiniso. Ukuhlonipha imingcele yomuntu siqu kanye nezinto ezincamelayo kubalulekile ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi isipiliyoni sobulili esivumelana futhi esijabulisayo kubo bobabili abalingani.

Isiphetho

I- Kubalulekile ukuthembela olwazini olunembile, ukhiphe imibono eyiphutha, futhi ubeke phezulu indlela esekelayo nenolwazi yezempilo yezocansi.

data.heading: Yini okufanele yenziwe indoda lapho intombazane isesikhathini sayo?
data.title: Indima kaGuy ngezikhathi
data.body:
Yini okufanele yenze umfana lapho intombazane isesikhathini sayo? I-

Ukuya esikhathini kuyinqubo yemvelo abantu abanesipiliyoni sesibeletho njengengxenye yomjikelezo wabo wokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukusondela kulesi sihloko ngenhlonipho, uzwela, nokuqonda. Nazi izinto okufanele zicabange ngazo ukuthi zizosekela kanjani umuntu oya esikhathini:

1. Gwema ukucwaswa noma ukuhlukumeza ulimi I-

Kubalulekile ukusebenzisa ulimi olubandakanyayo nonhlonipho lapho uxoxa nokuya esikhathini. Gwema ukusebenzisa imigomo yokudelela noma amahlaya angahle abize noma ahlaze abantu abangaya esikhathini. Ukusebenzisa isigama esifanele nesinenhlonipho kudala indawo esekelayo nephephile yezingxoxo ezivulekile ngezikhathi ezithile.

2. Ungenzi ukucatshangelwa noma ama-stereotypes I-

Wonke amava athile athile ngokuhlukile. Gwema ukwenza imibono noma ama-stereotypes ngokuthi umuntu angazizwa kanjani noma aziphathe kanjani ngesikhathi sawo. Ukuhlangenwe nakho komuntu ngamunye kungahluka, futhi kubalulekile ukusondela emqondweni ovulekile futhi ngaphandle kwemibono eqondile.

3. Musa ukunciphisa noma ukuchitha imizwa yabo

Ukuya esikhathini kungafika nezinselelo zomzimba nangokomzwelo. Kubalulekile ukuqinisekisa nokwamukela imizwa yomuntu ngaphandle kokunciphisa noma ukuyixosha. Yiba Usizo Futhi Uzwela, Futhi Unikeze Indlebe Elalele Uma Bafuna Ukukhuluma Ngokuhlangenwe Nabo Noma Yikuphi Ukungakhululeki Bangase Bazizwe.

4. Gwema amahlaya ahlobene nesikhathi noma ukungenelela I- Yini engabonakala inenhliziyo enhle kumuntu oyedwa ingaba nzima noma ihlabenye. Hlonipha imingcele yomuntu nemizwa ephathelene nesihloko.

5. Ungacabangi ukuthi badinga ukwelashwa okukhethekile

Ngenkathi abanye abantu bangadinga ukwesekwa okwengeziwe noma indawo yokuhlala ngesikhathi sabo, kubalulekile ukuthi ungacabangi ukuthi wonke umuntu owezo esikhathini adinga ukwelashwa okukhethekile. Izidingo zawo wonke umuntu nezintandokazi zihlukile, ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuxhumana nokubuza ukuthi ngabe kukhona yini okuqondile abangathanda noma abakudinga ngalesi sikhathi.

6. Ungayinaki imvume I-

Imvume ibalulekile kunoma yikuphi ukuhlangana ngokocansi noma obuseduze, kungakhathalekile ukuthi umuntu uya esikhathini noma cha. Ukuya esikhathini akufanele kusetshenziswe njengezaba zokungazinaki noma zokuhlanganisa imingcele yomunye umuntu noma imvume. Hlala uhlonipha izifiso zabo futhi ukhulumisane ngokukhululekile ngamazinga wokududuza kanye nezinketho.

7. Gwema Ukucindezela noma Ukulindela I-

Ukuya esikhathini kungaletha ukungaphatheki kahle ngokomzimba nokushintshashintsha kwe-hormonal. Kubalulekile ukugwema ukucindezela umuntu ukuthi ahlanganyele emisebenzini okungenzeka angazizwa ekhululekile ngayo noma anawo amandla ngesikhathi sawo. Hlonipha isidingo sabo sokuphumula, ukuzinakekela kanye nemingcele yomuntu siqu.

8. Ungazinaki izidingo zabo ezingokomzwelo I-

Ukusekelwa okungokomzwelo kubalulekile ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Qaphela futhi uzwela ngakunye ushintsho olungokomzwelo noma imizwa yokushintshana umuntu angaba nakho. Nikela ngendlebe elalelayo, hlinzeka induduzo, futhi ubekezele futhi uxhase njengoba zizulazula inhlala-kahle yazo ngokomzwelo.

Isiphetho I-

lapho umuntu eya esikhathini, kubalulekile ukusondela esihlokweni ngenhlonipho, uzwela, nokuqonda. Gwema ulimi oluhlukanisa ulimi, ama-stereotypes, namahlaya angazwakali. Qinisekisa imizwa yabo, hlonipha imingcele yabo, futhi uxhumane ngokukhululekile ngezidingo zabo nokuncamelayo. Ukuvuma, ukusekelwa ngokomzwelo, nokuzwela kubalulekile ekuqinisekiseni indawo esekelayo nenakekelayo yomuntu uya esikhathini.

data.heading: Yini indoda okufanele yenziwe ngezikhathi ezithile?
data.title: Ukusekelwa kwendoda ngezikhathi ezithile
data.body:
Yini okufanele yenziwe indoda ngesikhathi somlingani wakhe?

Ukusekela umlingani ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kuyisici esibalulekile sobuhlobo bokunakekela nokuqonda. Ukuya esikhathini kungaletha ushintsho ngokomzimba nangokomzwelo, futhi ukuba nomlingani wakho kungenza umehluko omkhulu. Nazi ezinye izindlela amadoda anganikeza ngazo ukwesekwa ngesikhathi somlingani wazo:

1. Ube nokuqonda nokuzwela

Ukuya esikhathini kungahambisana nokungaphatheki kahle ngokomzimba kanye nezinguquko ze-hormonal ezingathinta inhlala-kahle yomlingani wakho kanye nenhlala-kahle. Kubalulekile ukuba qotho futhi uzwela kunoma yiziphi izinselelo noma ubunzima abangase babone. Lalelani, niqinisekise imizwa yabo, futhi bazise ukuthi ukhona ukuze ubasekele.

2. Zifundise I-

zinike isikhathi ukuze uzifundise ukuya esikhathini. Funda ngomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, izimpawu ezijwayelekile, nezindlela zokuzilawula. Lolu lwazi luzokusiza ukuthi uqonde kangcono ukuthi umlingani wakho ubhekene nalokhu futhi akunikeze amandla okunikeza ukwesekwa okufanele. Ngokwengeziwe, kukhombisa ukuzimisela kwakho ukubandakanyeka futhi kukhombisa ukuthi uyayikhathalela inhlala-kahle yabo.

3. Nikeza ukwesekwa okusebenzayo I-

isize umlingani wakho ngezindaba ezingokoqobo ezihlobene nesikhathi sazo. Lokhu kungafaka ukuthenga imikhiqizo yokuya esikhathini, ukulandela umkhondo womjikelezo wabo wokuya esikhathini, noma ukunikela lapho uthatha izinto zokudla noma ukuqhuba uhambo lapho bezizwa bengakhululekile noma bekhathazekile. Ukunikeza ukwesekwa okusebenzayo kukhombisa ukuzibophezela kwakho ekwenzeni isikhathi sabo siphatheke kakhulu.

4. Hlinzeka ukwesekwa okungokomzwelo

Ngesikhathi sabo, umlingani wakho angathola imizwa ehlukahlukene. Kubalulekile ukuba yisineke nokuqonda. Yiba isilaleli esihle futhi unikeze isikhala esiphephile sokuthi baveze imizwa yabo. Nikeza amazwi induduzo nesikhuthazo futhi ubaqinisekise ukuthi imizwa yabo isebenza.

5. Ukunaka izidingo zabo I-

Yonke isipiliyoni somuntu ngamunye nokuya esikhathini ihlukile. Naka izidingo zozakwethu kanye nezintandokazi ngesikhathi sabo. Abanye bangadinga ukuphumula okuningi nokuphumula, kanti abanye bangathola umsebenzi wokukhanya ngokomzimba okulula. Khulumisana ngokukhululekile bese ubuza ukuthi ungabasekela kanjani kangcono.

6. Usizo ngemisebenzi yasendlini

Uma umlingani wakho ebhekene nokungaphatheki kahle noma ukukhathala ngesikhathi sawo, ukuthatha eminye imisebenzi yasendlini eyengeziwe ingasiza kakhulu. Nikela ukupheka ukudla, ukugeza izingubo, noma ukunakekela izibopho zokuhlanza. Ngokukhanyisa umthwalo wabo, ubanikeza ithuba lokuphumula futhi uzinakekele.

7. Nikeza izinketho zokusiza izinhlungu I-

8. Ube nengqondo yokusondelana

Ngesikhathi sabo, amazinga okududuza umlingani wakho maqondana nokusondelana kungahluka. Hlonipha imingcele yabo futhi ukhulumisana ngokukhululeka ngalokho okuzwayo kini nobabili. Kubalulekile ukuba qotho futhi uxhase izidingo zabo nezifiso zabo ngalesi sikhathi.

9. Khombisa uthando nothando

Ukushukumisela okuncane kothando nothando kungahamba ibanga elide ekunikezeni ukusekelwa okungokomzwelo ngesikhathi somlingani wakho. Nikeza ukuvalwa, ama-cuddles, noma ukuthinta okumnene ukukhombisa ukuthi uyakhathalela. Ukubonisa uthando nothando kusiza ukudala umuzwa wokuphepha nokuqinisekiswa.

10. Ukuzijwayeza ukuzinakekela ndawonye

Khuthaza umlingani wakho ukuthi abeke phambili ukuzinakekela ngesikhathi sawo, futhi uhlanganyele nabo ekuzibambiseleni imisebenzi yokuzinakekela. Lokhu kungafaka ukuthatha ukugeza okuphumuzayo, ukubuka ama-movie awo awathandayo noma kuboniswa ndawonye, ​​noma ukujabulela kusihlwa ethule ekhaya. Ngokubamba iqhaza emisebenzini yokuzinakekela ndawonye, ​​ukhombisa ukuzibophezela kwakho enhlalakahleni yabo.

11. Yiba nezimo nokuqonda I-

Ukuya esikhathini kwesinye isikhathi kungenzeka kungalindeleki, futhi izidingo zozakwethu zingashintsha usuku nosuku. Yiba nezimo nokuqonda ekuhlaseleni izimo zazo eziguqukayo. Hlela noma yiziphi izinguquko ezingalindelekile futhi unikeze ukusekelwa kwakho ngokufanele.

12. Gwema ukuhlukanisa ulimi noma izimo zengqondo I- Phatha isihloko ngenhlonipho nokuzwela. Ngokukhuthaza isimo sengqondo esivulekile nesihle ekuya esikhathini, usiza ukudala indawo lapho umlingani wakho ezwa khona ekhululekile futhi esekelwa.

Isiphetho

Ukusekela umlingani wakho ngesikhathi sesikhathi sabo kuyingxenye ebalulekile yokugcina ubuhlobo obunothando nolunakekelayo. Ngokuqonda, ukuhlinzeka ngokusekelwa okusebenzayo nangokomzwelo, ukuzifundisa, ukunakekelwa izidingo zabo, ukusiza izindlela zokuthola izinhlungu, ukuzinakekela, ukuzinakekela ndawonye, ​​nokugwema Ulimi noma izimo zengqondo, ungakha indawo yokukhulisa nokusekela umlingani wakho ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

data.heading: Ngabe ubulili ngesikhathi se-ovulation bazizwa behlukile?
data.title: I-ovulation kanye nomuzwa wezocansi
data.body:
Ngabe ubulili ngesikhathi se-ovulation bazizwa behlukile? I-

Ukuhlangenwe nakho kobulili kungahluka ngokuya ngezinto ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi izinguquko ze-hormonal emzimbeni. I-ovulation, ukukhishwa kweqanda kusuka ku-ovary, kuwumcimbi obalulekile kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kowesifazane. Abantu abaningi bayazibuza ukuthi ubulili ngesikhathi se-ovulation buzizwa buhlukile noma bunezici ezithile. Ake sihlole isihloko: I-

Ukuqonda i-ovulation I-

i-ovulation imvamisa yenzeka maphakathi nomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, cishe ezinsukwini eziyi-14 ngaphambi kokuqala kwesikhathi esilandelayo. Ngalesi sikhathi, elinye lamaqanda likhipha iqanda elihamba ngamashubhu e-Fallopian, okwenza litholakale ukuze umanyolo ngesidoda. I-ovulation ithonywa izinguquko ze-hormonal, ikakhulukazi ukwanda kwe-hormone (LH) ne-estrogen.

izinguquko ezenziwa emzimbeni we-ovulation I-

i-ovulation ingaletha izinguquko ezithile zomzimba emzimbeni wowesifazane ezingathinta isipiliyoni sobulili. Lezi zinguquko zifaka:

    I-
  1. IsiCervical Mucus: Ngesikhathi sokuwohloka, i-marvical mucus iba nto ecacile, icwebezele, nokushelelayo kakhulu. Le mucus isiza ukudlula kwesidoda ngokusebenzisa isibeletho nasepheshana lokuzala. I-
  2. yandise i-libyido: Abanye besifazane bathola idrayivu ekhuphukile yocansi ngesikhathi sokuvulwa kovuli ngenxa yoshintsho lwe-hormonal lwenzeka emzimbeni. Le mpilo eyandayo ingenza ucansi lube lumnandi futhi lujabulise. I-
  3. I-Pelvic Discomfort: Abanye besifazane bangathola ukungakhululeki kwe-pelvic emnene noma umuzwa wokugcwala ngesikhathi sokugcwala. Lokhu kungaphatheki kahle kuvame ukubizwa ngokuthi yiMittelschmerz futhi kucatshangwa ukuthi kubangelwa ukwelula kodonga lwe-ovarian njengoba kukhishwa iqanda. I-

    Iphrojekthi emizweni nentokozo I- Abanye abantu bangabika ukuzwela okukhuphukile noma bakhuphuke kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi ngenxa yokwenyuswa kwegazi ukugeleza endaweni ye-pelvic kanye nokukhishwa kwama-hormone athile. I-libIdo eyandayo etholwa ngabesifazane abathile ngesikhathi sokuvulwa kwe-ovulation nayo ingaba nomthelela kokuhlangenwe nakho okumnandi ngokwengeziwe. I- Ngakho-ke, kanti abanye abantu bangabona umehluko emizweni noma enjabulweni ngesikhathi sokubopha, abanye bangase bangazitholi izinguquko ezibalulekile.

    isikhathi sokuzala I- Uma ukukhulelwa kufiswa, ukuya ocansini ngalesi sikhathi kwandisa amathuba okukhulelwa. Iqanda lisebenza kuphela ngokufaka umanyolo cishe amahora angama-12 kuya kwangama-12 emva kwe-ovulation, kanti isidoda singasinda kwipheshana lokuzala labesifazane kuze kube kwezinsuku ezinhlanu. Ngakho-ke, ukuhlangana nesikhathi esiseduze kwe-ovulation kwandisa amathuba wesidoda okukhona lapho kukhishwa iqanda.

    Isiphetho I-

    okuhlangenwe nakho ngokobulili ngesikhathi sokuvulwa kwe-ovulation kungahluka kuye umuntu kuya kumuntu. Abanye abantu bangase babone ukuzwela okukhulayo, injabulo eyandayo, noma i-drive yezocansi enamandla ngalesi sikhathi ngenxa yezinguquko ze-hormonal emzimbeni. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi injabulo yezocansi iyabonakala futhi ingathonywa yizinto ezahlukahlukene. Isici esibaluleke kakhulu sokusondelana ngokobulili ukuxhumana okuvulekile, ukuqonda, nokuhlonipha phakathi kwabalingani.

data.heading: Ingabe ukuba nobulili obuningi kuthinta inzalo?
data.title: Imvamisa yocansi nokuzala
data.body:
Ingabe ukuba nobulili obuningi kuthinta inzalo? I- Imvamisa yokuya ocansini imvamisa isihloko esinentshisekelo uma kuziwa ekuthayizeleni. Ake sihlole ubudlelwano phakathi kokuya ocansini obuningi nomthelela wayo ongaba nomthelela ekuthweni:

Ukubaluleka kwesikhathi I-

isikhathi ibalulekile uma kukhulunywa ngokuzala. Kwabashadikazi abazama ukukhulelwa, ukuba nobudlelwano obujwayelekile ngesikhathi sewindows evundile sowesifazane kwandisa amathuba okukhulelwa. Iwindi elivundile libhekisela ezinsukwini eziholela futhi lifaka phakathi i-ovulation lapho iqanda likhishwa kwi-ovary futhi liyatholakala ngokufaka umanyolo ngesidoda. Isidoda singasinda ngepheshana lokuzala labesifazane kuze kube kwezinsuku ezinhlanu, kanti iqanda lisebenza cishe amahora angama-12- 24 ngemuva kwe-ovulation. I- Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ubulili obujwayelekile obuvame ukungaqinisekisi amanani aphezulu wokuzala. I-

Umthelela ekubalweni kwesidoda kanye nekhwalithi I- Umzimba wesilisa uhlala ukhiqiza isidoda esisha, futhi i-ejaculation ejwayelekile isiza ukugcina ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda okunempilo. Kodwa-ke, kufanelekile ukubheka ukuthi izici ezithile, ezinjengemibandela yezokwelapha noma izinqumo zendlela yokuphila, kungathinta ukubalwa kwesidoda nekhwalithi.

Kwezinye izimo, ukuya ocansini kaningi ngosuku noma ukuhlanganyela ekusebenzeni kahle kwezocansi esikhathini esifushane kungahle kube nokuncipha kwesikhashana kokubala kwesidoda noma kwikhwalithi. Kodwa-ke, lokhu kuvame ukuba nomphumela wesikhashana, futhi ukukhiqizwa kwesidoda kuvame ukubuyela kokujwayelekile esikhathini esifushane.

umthelela wezengqondo

Uhambo oluya ekukhulelweni kwesinye isikhathi luyacindezela imibhangqwana, ikakhulukazi uma bebelokhu bezama ukukhulelwa isikhathi eside. Le ngcindezi nengcindezi ingaba nomthelela wengqondo kubo bobabili abalingani futhi kungathinta ukufisa nokusebenza ngokobulili. Kubalulekile ukugcina ukuxhumana okuvulekile, ukuphatha amazinga okuxineka, futhi ufune ukwesekwa lapho kudingeka ukunciphisa umthelela ongemuhle ngokwengqondo ekuvundeni.

izici ngazinye I-

Wonke umuntu ngamunye uyingqayizivele, futhi ukuzala kungathonywa yizinto ezahlukahlukene ngaphezu imvamisa yokuya ocansini. Izici ezinjengobudala, impilo yonke, izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi, kanye nokukhetha kwendlela yokuphila kungadlala indima enkulu ekuvumeni. Kubalulekile ukuthi imibhangqwana ebhekene nobunzima ukukhulelwa ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa ukukhomba nokubhekana nanoma yiziphi izingqinamba ezingaba khona.

ibhalansi kanye nokuxhumana

lapho uzama ukukhulelwa, kubalulekile ukuthi imibhangqwana ithole ibhalansi esebenza ngayo maqondana nokuvama kokuya ocansini. Kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi inzalo ayincike kuphela ngenani lezikhathi umbhangqwana ocansini kodwa nasesikhathini nangezinye izinto ngazinye. I-

Ukuxhumana okuvulekile phakathi kwabalingani kubalulekile ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi bobabili abantu bazizwa bekhululekile futhi besekelwa. Ukuxoxa ngezinhloso zokuzala, ukukhathazeka, kanye nanoma yiziphi izinselelo ezivelayo kungasiza ukuqinisa ukuxhumeka okungokomzwelo futhi kunciphise amazinga okucindezela.

Isiphetho I-

imvamisa yokuya ocansini ingadlala indima ethandeni, kepha kungenye nje kuphela phakathi kwabaningi. I-Timetiontion youlcourse ukuze ihambisane newindi le-Woman evundile libaluleke kakhulu kunokuya ocansini inani elithile lezikhathi. Ukugcina impilo enempilo, ekhuluma nanoma yiziphi izimo zezokwelapha eziphansi, futhi ngifuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa lapho zidingeka izinyathelo ezibalulekile zokuba imibhangqwana ezama ukukhulelwa. Ekugcineni, ukuthola ibhalansi esebenza kubo bobabili abalingani kanye nokugcina ukuxhumana okuvulekile kubalulekile ukuzulazula ohambweni olubheke ukuba ngumzali.

data.heading: Ingabe ubulili bezinsuku zonke buhle ngokukhulelwa?

Uma kukhulunywa ngokuzama ukukhulelwa, imibhangqwana ivame ukuzibuza ngemvamisa efanelekile yokuya ocansini. Abanye bangase bazibuze ukuthi ngabe ucansi lwansuku zonke luthuthukisa amathuba okukhulelwa. Ake sihlole lesi sihloko ngemininingwane eminingi: I-
