isikhathi sobuhlungu ngokuyinhloko ibangelwa ukukhishwa kwesibeletho njengoba iveza ukufakwa kwayo ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Kwezinye izimo, izimo ezingaphansi ezinjenge-endometriosis noma ama-fibroids e-Uterine angaba nesandla ebuhlungwini obukhulu kakhulu. Ukuqonda imbangela ethile yobuhlungu besikhathi sakho kungasiza ukuqondisa izinketho zokwelashwa nokungenelela.

2. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal:

Izindlela zokulawula zokuzalwa ze-Hormonal, ezinjengezindlela zokuvimbela inzalo ezihlangene, noma iziqu zokuvimbela inzalo, amadivayisi we-hitauterive (iDS), kungasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi kuncishiswe izinhlungu zesikhathi sabesifazane abaningi. Lezi zindlela zisebenza ngokucindezela i-ovulation futhi zinciphisa ukukhiqizwa kwama-prostaglandins, okungamakhemikhali abhekele ukuvusa izivumelwano zokuvuvukala nokuvuvukala.

3. Izidakamizwa ezilwa nokuvuvukala (NSAIDS): I- Ukuthatha ama-NSAIDS ekuqaleni kwesikhathi sakho nokuqhubeka njengoba kudingeka kunganikeza impumuzo. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukulandela umthamo onconyiwe futhi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo uma kukhona okukhathazayo noma ukukhathazeka ngempilo.

4. Ukwelashwa kokushisa: I- Ukwelashwa okushisa kwandisa ukuhamba kwegazi endaweni ye-pelvic, okunganciphisa izinhlungu nokungaphatheki kahle. Zama ngemithombo ehlukene yokushisa futhi uthole okusebenzayo kuwe, noma ngabe kuyibhodlela lamanzi ashisayo, i-face efudumele ye-microwaable yokushisa, noma ukugeza okufudumele.

5. Izinguquko zokudla:

Ukulungiswa okuthile kokudla kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zesikhathi. Ukwandisa ukudla kwakho okugcwele e-Omega-3 Fatty Acids, njengezinhlanzi ezinamafutha, amafilakisi, nama-walnuts, kungaba nemiphumela yokulwa nokuvuvukala bese kunciphisa izinhlungu. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukunciphisa noma ukugwema ukudla okuphezulu ngosawoti, i-caffeine, noshukela osetshenzwe kungasiza ukwehlisa ukuqhakaza nokuvuvukala, ngaleyo ndlela kunciphise ukungaphatheki kahle ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

6. Ukuzivocavoca nokuzivocavoca umzimba:

Ukuzibandakanya kokuzivocavoca umzimba njalo nangokomzimba kungasiza ekunciphiseni izinhlungu zesikhathi ngokuthuthukisa ukujikeleza kwegazi, ukukhulula ama-endorphin (ama-hormone abuhlungu bemvelo), kanye nokwenza ngcono inhlala-kahle. Ukuzivocavoca ngomusa njengokuhamba, i-yoga, noma ukubhukuda kungazuzisa ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, lalela umzimba wakho futhi uguqule imisebenzi yakho uma kudingeka.

7. Ukuphathwa Kokuphazamiseka: I-P> Ukuxineka kungandisa izinhlungu zesikhathi, ngakho-ke ukuthola izindlela ezisebenzayo zokuphathwa kwengcindezi zibalulekile. Ukuzibandakanya ekuzivocavoca kokuphumula, njengokuphefumula okujulile, ukuzindla, noma ukucabanga, kungasiza ukunciphisa amazinga okucindezela futhi kunciphise umthelela kumjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini. Ngokwengeziwe, kufaka phakathi imisebenzi eyehlisa izingcindezi enkambisweni yakho yansuku zonke, njengokuchitha isikhathi emvelweni, ukwenza izinto zokuzilibazisa, noma ukufuna ukwesekwa ngokomzwelo, kungaba nomthelela ekuphathweni kwenhlala-kahle kanye nobuhlungu.

8. Izindlela zokwelapha ezihlukile:

Abanye besifazane bathola impumuzo ebuhlungu besikhathi ngokusebenzisa ezinye izindlela zokwelapha. Lokhu kungafaka i-acupuncture, i-acupressure, amakhambi amakhambi, noma ama-aromatherapy. Ngenkathi ukusebenza kwalezi zindlela zingahlukahluka kuye kumuntu, zingakufanelekela ukuhlola njengezinketho ezihambisanayo kanye nokungenelela kwendabuko kwendabuko. Kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe abaqeqeshiwe futhi baxoxe nganoma yikuphi ukusebenzisana noma ukuphikisana nezinye izindlela zokwelashwa noma zemithi.

9. Ukubonisana Kwezokwelapha:

Uma izinhlungu zesikhathi sakho zinzima, zithinta kakhulu impilo yakho yansuku zonke, noma zihambisana nezinye eziphathelene nezimpawu, kubalulekile ukuxhumana nomuntu ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Bangahlola isimo sakho esithile, basebenzise izivivinyo noma izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi banikeze izeluleko ezifanele zezokwelapha kanye nezinketho zokwelashwa. Bangancoma uphenyo oluqhubekayo ukuze balawule noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi ezifaka isandla ebuhlungwini bakho.

10. Ukulandelela Nokuphatha:

Ukulandela umkhondo womjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini nezimpawu kunganikeza ukuqonda okubalulekile kumaphethini akho ahlukile futhi kukusize ulindele futhi uphathe izinhlungu zesikhathi. Usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza lokulandela esikhathini noma ikhalenda kungakusiza ekuboneni izitayela, ukubikezela lapho izinhlungu zingavela khona, futhi zihlele ngokufanele ngamasu nokungenelela okufanele.

Isiphetho: I- Ukuqonda imbangela yobuhlungu bakho, ukuhlola izinketho ezahlukene zokwelashwa, kanye nokusebenzisa izinguquko zendlela yokuphila kungasiza ekuphumuleni isikhathi eside. Khumbula ukuthi konke okuhlangenwe nakho kwabesifazane nobuhlungu besikhathi kuhlukile, futhi kungathatha isikhathi ukuthola indlela ephumelela kakhulu kuwe. Xhumana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuholwa okwenziwe ngezifiso nokusekelwa ekuphatheni izinhlungu zesikhathi sakho.

data.heading: Kungani isikhathi sami sibuhlungu kangaka?
data.title: Ubuhlungu bokuya esikhathini
data.body:
Ukuqonda izikhathi ezibuhlungu: izimbangela kanye nezixazululo

Ukuthola isikhathi esibuhlungu, esaziwa nangokuthi i-dysmenorrhea, ukukhathazeka okuvamile phakathi kwabesifazane abaningi. Ama-cramps wokuya esikhathini angahluka kusuka ekungaphathekiseni okuncane kubuhlungu obukhulu, okuthinta kakhulu imisebenzi yansuku zonke kanye nekhwalithi yempilo. Nazi ezinye izimbangela nezixazululo ukukusiza uqonde ukuthi kungani isikhathi sakho singaba buhlungu:

1. Prostaglandins:

Ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, i-lining yesibeletho iyachithwa. Le nqubo ifaka ukukhululwa kwamakhemikhali athile abizwa ngokuthi ama-prostaglandins, adala ukuthi izicubu zesibeletho ziye kwinkontileka. Amazinga aphezulu e-Prostaglandins angaholela ezinkontekeni eziqine ngokwengeziwe kanye nobuhlungu obukhulayo ngesikhathi sakho.

2. I-Endometriosis: I- Lokhu kukhula okungajwayelekile kungadala ukuvuvukala, izinhlungu, nokwakheka kwezicubu zesilonda, okuholela ezinkathini ezibuhlungu nakwezinye izimpawu. Uma usola ukuthi une-endometriosis, kubalulekile ukubonana nobuchwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo yokuxilongwa kanye nezinketho zokuphatha ezifanele.

3. I-AdenomYosis: I-

i-AdenomYosis yisimo lapho izicubu ze-endometrial zikhula zingene odongeni lwemisipha yesibeletho. Lokhu kungadala ukuthi isibeletho sikhuliswe, okubangelwa ukukhuphuka kokuma kokuya esikhathini nokopha kakhulu. Uma uhlangabezana nobuhlungu obukhulu nobude ngesikhathi sezikhathi zakho, i-adenomyosis ingaba imbangela engenzeka, futhi kunconywa ukuhlolwa kwezokwelapha.

4. Ama-Fibroids: I-

Uterine Fibroids ingabe amagagasi angezona akhulayo akhula ngaphakathi kodonga lwesibeletho noma ebusweni bayo. Ngokuya ngosayizi wabo nendawo yabo, ama-fibroids angadala ubuhlungu, ukopha ukuya esikhathini, kanye nengcindezi yezitho ezizungezile. Uma usola ama-fibroids kungenzeka kube nomthelela ezikhathini zakho zobuhlungu, kubalulekile ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukutholakala kahle kanye nezinketho zokwelashwa.

5. Isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic (PID): I-

pelvic ukuvuvukala yisifo sokuvuvukala kwezitho zokuzala, okuvame ukubangelwa izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi (ama-STI). I-PID ingaholela ekuvuvukeni nasekuhlotshiseni, okuholela ebuhlungwini obungapheli be-pelvic kanye nezikhathi zobuhlungu. Uma unezimpawu ezifana nobuhlungu obukhulu be-pelvic, umkhuhlane, noma ukukhishwa kwesitho sangasese sowesifazane, funa ukunakekelwa kwezokwelashwa ngokushesha kokuxilongwa kanye nokwelashwa okufanele.

6. I-Cervical Stenosis: I-

i-cervical stenosis yisimo lapho ukuvulwa kwesibeletho kuncane noma kuvinjelwe ngokwengxenye. Lokhu kungaphazamisa ukuhamba kwegazi lokuya esikhathini, kubangele ingcindezi nobuhlungu obukhulayo. I-Cervical Stenosis ayivamile kodwa ingadinga ukungenelela kwezokwelapha uma kuthinta kakhulu impilo yakho yokuya esikhathini.

7. Ezinye izinto: I- Izici zendlela yokuphila njengokubhema, indlela yokuphila yokuhlala phansi, nokudla okungekuhle kungandisa nobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini.

izixazululo zokulawula izikhathi ezibuhlungu:

Ngenkathi izinketho ezithile zokwelashwa zingahluka ngokuya ngembangela eyisisekelo yezikhathi zakho zobuhlungu, nazi ezinye amasu ajwayelekile angasiza ukudambisa ukungaphatheki kahle:

1. Ukukhululeka Okungaphezulu Kwezinhlungu Zokulwa: I- Le mishanguzo iyatholakala ngaphezulu kwekhawunta futhi inganikeza impumuzo ephumelelayo kwabesifazane abaningi.

2. Ukwelashwa kokushisa: I-

Ukufaka ukushisa esiswini sakho esingezansi noma emuva kungasiza ukuphumula izicubu zesibeletho futhi kudambise ukuhlasela kokuya esikhathini. Ungasebenzisa i-Heating Pad, ithawula elifudumele, noma ugeze ngokugeza okufudumele ukuzwa imiphumela ethokozisayo yokwelashwa kokushisa.

3. Ukuzivocavoca nokuzivocavoca umzimba: I-

yokuzibandakanya njalo ngokomzimba, njengokuhamba, ukubhukuda, noma i-yoga, kungasiza ukususa izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini ngokwandisa ukugeleza kwegazi futhi kuthuthukiswe ukukhishwa kwama-endorphin, okuyi-hormone yemvelo ekhipha izinhlungu.

4. Amasu wokuphumula: I-

5. Ukulungiswa kokudla:

Abanye besifazane bathola ukuthi ukwenza ukulungiswa kokudla kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zesikhathi. Ukwandisa ukudla kwakho kokudla okulwa nokuvuvukala, njengezithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okugcwele kanye nama-acid ama-omega-amafutha, ngenkathi kunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kokudla okucutshungulwe, i-caffeine, kungahle kube nomthelela ekunciphiseni ukuvuvukala kanye nezimpawu zokuya esikhathini.

6. Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kweHormonal: I- Lezi zindlela zisebenza ngokucindezela i-ovulation futhi zinciphise i-sitene lining.

7. Izindlela zokwelapha ezihlukile: I- Kodwa-ke, ukusebenza kwalezi zindlela kungahlukahluka, futhi kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe abaqeqeshiwe futhi baxoxe nganoma yikuphi ukusebenzisana noma ukuphikisana nezinye izindlela zokwelashwa noma imithi.

8. Ukubonisana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo:

Uma izinhlungu zesikhathi sakho zinzima, zithinta kakhulu impilo yakho yansuku zonke, noma zihambisana nezinye eziphathelene nezimpawu, kubalulekile ukuxhumana nomuntu ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Bangahlola isimo sakho esithile, basebenzise izivivinyo noma izivivinyo ezidingekayo, futhi banikeze izeluleko ezifanele zezokwelapha kanye nezinketho zokwelashwa. Bangancoma uphenyo oluqhubekayo ukuze balawule noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi ezifaka isandla ebuhlungwini bakho.

Isiphetho: I-ph> Izikhathi zobuhlungu zingaba nezimbangela ezahlukahlukene, futhi ukuthola isisombululo esisebenza kahle kunazo zonke kungadinga inhlanganisela yezindlela. Ngokuqonda izizathu ezingenzeka ngemuva kobuhlungu besikhathi sakho kanye nokuhlola amasu ahlukene okuphatha, ungasebenzela ekunikezeleni ukungaphatheki kahle nasekuthuthukiseni inhlala-kahle yakho yonke. Khumbula ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze uthole ukuqondiswa komuntu uqobo nokusekelwa ekuphatheni izikhathi zakho zobuhlungu.

data.heading: Ingabe izinkathi zesikhathi zifana nezinhlungu zabasebenzi?
data.title: Isikhathi sokuqhathaniswa kobuhlungu besikhathi nokusebenza kwabasebenzi
data.body:
I-

Ukuqonda isikhathi sobuhlungu vs izinhlungu zabasebenzi I-

izinkathi zesikhathi, eyaziwa nangokuthi i-dysmenorrhea, nezinhlungu zezabasebenzi ziyizinhlobo ezimbili ezihlukile zobuhlungu obuhlangabezana nabesifazane. Ngenkathi kungahle kube nokufana okuthile okusemizweni nasekujuleni, kubalulekile ukuqonda umehluko phakathi kobuhlungu besikhathi nobuhlungu bezabasebenzi. Nakhu ukubhekisisa okusondele:

1. Izimbangela: I-

isikhathi sobuhlungu ibangelwa ukukhishwa kwemisipha yesibeletho njenge-lining of the uters sheeps ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Ukukhishwa kwama-prostaglandins, amakhemikhali amakhemikhali akhuthaza izivumelwano zesibeletho, zinomthelela ebuhlotsheni obuhlangabezana nazo ngezikhathi ezithile. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izinhlungu zabasebenzi zenzeka ngenxa yezivumelwano zesibeletho ezisiza ukuthuthuka kwengane. Ukuqina nokuvama kwezivumelwano ngesikhathi sabasebenzi kuqina kakhulu futhi kuhlelwe kakhulu uma kuqhathaniswa nokuma kokuya esikhathini.

2. Indawo yezinhlungu: I-

isikhathi sesikhathi imvamisa zizwakala esiswini esingezansi nangemuva. Ubuhlungu bungakhanyisa emathangeni futhi bungahluka ngokuqina kulo lonke umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ngokuphambene, izinhlungu zabasebenzi zizwakala ikakhulu esiswini esingezansi nangemuva, kepha njengoba kuqhubeka iziqu zabasebenzi, izinhlungu ziyaqina futhi zigxile kakhulu esibelethweni nasePelvis.

3. Isikhathi: I-

Isikhathi sobuhlungu imvamisa ivame ukutholakala ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, ngokuqina okuphezulu ngosuku lokuqala noma lwesibili futhi kuncipha kancane kancane. Isikhathi nobukhulu bobuhlungu bezabasebenzi buyehlukahluka kuye ngowesifazane kuya kowesifazane kodwa ngokuvamile kuhlale isikhathi eside kunokuxinana kokuya esikhathini. Ukusebenza Kwasekuqaleni kungahlala amahora amaningi, ngenkathi umsebenzi osebenzayo ungasukela emahoreni ambalwa kuye ngaphezulu kosuku.

4. Ukuqina: I- Izivumelwano ngesikhathi sokusebenza zinamandla futhi zinesigqi, ngokwenyuka kancane kancane ngokuqina njengoba abasebenzi baqhubeka. Ngokuphambene, izinhlungu zesikhathi zivame ukuba mncane futhi zingalawulwa ngama-real-counter izinhlungu zokunciphisa izinhlungu noma amakhambi asekhaya abesifazane abaningi.

5. Injongo nomphumela: I-

isikhathi sobuhlungu isebenza njengengxenye yemvelo yomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, isiza ukuchitha i-sitene lining. Kuvela njalo ngenyanga futhi akuholeli ekuzalweni kwengane. Ubuhlungu bezabasebenzi, nokho, kuyingxenye edingekayo yenqubo yokubeletha, ukusayina inqubekela phambili yabasebenzi futhi ekugcineni okuholela ekulethweni kwengane.

6. Izici ezingokomzwelo nezengqondo: I- Ubuhlungu obuzwayo ngesikhathi sokusebenza buhlotshaniswa nenjabulo nokulindelwa kokwamukela impilo entsha, okungathonya umbono wobuhlungu. I-

Ukuphatha Ubuhlungu besikhathi nobuhlungu bezabasebenzi: I- I-

Isikhathi sobuhlungu:
  • Ukukhohlisa okuphezulu kwe-the the
  • ukusebenzisa ukushisa esiswini esingezansi nangemuva kunganikeza impumuzo.
  • Ukuzibandakanya ekuzivocavoca okujwayelekile kanye namasu wokuphumula, njenge-yoga noma ukuzindla, kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu.
  • Ukusebenzisa izindlela zokulawula ukuzalwa kwama-hormonal kungasiza ukulalela imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini futhi kunciphise ubulukhuni bemigodi.
  • Ukuxoxa ngezimpawu zakho nokukhathazeka nge-Healthcare Professional yezeluleko ezenzelwe wena kanye nezinketho zokwelashwa. I-

    Ubuhlungu bezabasebenzi:
    • Ngesikhathi sokubeletha, amasu wokuphatha izinhlungu njengokuzivocavoca okuphefumulayo, amasu wokuphumula, nezinguquko zesikhundla kungasiza ukubhekana nokuqina kwezivumelwano zabasebenzi.
    • Ukungenelela kwezokwelapha, njenge-anesthesia ye-epidural, kungahle kube khona ukuphatha izinhlungu ngesikhathi sokusebenza.
    • Ukusekelwa okuqhubekayo okuvela kumlingani wokuzalwa, i-Doula, noma umhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwempilo kunganikeza ukusekelwa okungokomzwelo nangokomzimba ngesikhathi sokusebenza.
    • Ukuxoxa ngezinketho zokuphathwa kwezinhlungu futhi kwakha uhlelo lokuzalwa nomhlinzeki wezokunakekelwa kwempilo kungasiza ekuqinisekiseni ukunakekelwa okwenziwe ngezifiso nokukhululeka kobuhlungu ngesikhathi sokusebenza.

      Isiphetho:

      Ngenkathi zombili izinhlungu zesikhathi nobuhlungu bezabasebenzi zibandakanya ukungaphatheki kahle ezindaweni ezinesisu nangasemuva, zihlukile ngokwemibangela, isikhathi, ukuqina kanye nenhloso. Ubuhlungu besikhathi yingxenye yemvelo yomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi ngokuvamile umncane, ngenkathi ubuhlungu bezabasebenzi kwenzeka ngesikhathi sokubeletha futhi bukhulu kakhulu. Ukuqonda umehluko phakathi kwalaba bobabili kungasiza abesifazane ukuba bakwazi ukuzulazula okuhlangenwe nakho kwabo futhi bafune amasu afanele okulawulwa kobuhlungu lapho edingeka.

data.heading: Ngabe izikhathi ezibuhlungu zisho ukungazali?
data.title: Ubuhlungu nokuxhumana kokuzala
data.body:
isikhathi esibuhlungu nokuzala: ukuhlola ukuxhumana

Izikhathi zobuhlungu, ezaziwa nangokuthi i-dysmenorrhea, ingaba yinto ecindezelayo futhi engakhululeki yabesifazane abaningi. Kubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi ukuba nezikhathi ezibuhlungu akusho ukuthi ukungazali. Ngenkathi izikhathi ezibuhlungu kwesinye isikhathi zingahlotshaniswa nezimo eziyisisekelo ezingathinta ukuzala, akuyona inkomba echazayo yokuzala inzalo. Nakhu ukubhekisisa okusondele ebudlelwaneni phakathi kwezikhathi zobuhlungu nokuzala:

Ukuqonda izikhathi ezibuhlungu: Ama-v> izikhathi ezibuhlungu zibonakaliswa ngokumiswa nokungathandeki esiswini esingezansi esenzeka ngokujwayelekile ngaphambi noma ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Ubuhlungu bungasukela kusuka kubulule kuya kunzima futhi kungahle kuhambisane nezinye izimpawu ezifana ne-backache, ikhanda, isicanucanu, nokukhathala. I-dysmenorrhea eyisisekelo isho izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini ngaphandle kwezimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi, kanti ama-Dysmenorrhea wesibili ahambisana nezimo ezingaphansi njenge-endometriosis, i-uterine fibroids, noma isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic.

Umthelela ekuthathweni:

Izikhathi zobuhlungu zodwa azibangeli ngokuqondile ukuzala. Kodwa-ke, izimo ezingaphansi ezingadala izikhathi ezibuhlungu zinganisene nezinkinga zokuzala. Izimo ezifana ne-endometriosis, i-uterine fibroids, noma isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic kungathinta izitho zokuyalela, ziphazamise umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, futhi kungaholela ebunzimeni bokukhulelwa.

Ukuhlonza izimo eziyisisekelo: I- Bangakwazi ukuhlola okuphelele, okungafaka ukuhlolwa ngokomzimba, ukubuyekezwa komlando wezokwelapha, futhi okungenzeka ukuthi kuhlolwe ukuhlolwa okufana nama-ultrasounds noma i-laparoscopy, ukuthola imbangela yezikhathi zakho zobuhlungu.

Ukwelashwa nokuphatha:

Ukuphatha izikhathi ezibuhlungu kubandakanya ukubhekana nembangela yobuhlungu. Izinketho zokwelashwa zingase zihluka ngokuya ngesimo esithile, ubukhulu bezimpawu, kanye nezimo zakho. Ezinye izindlela ezivamile zifaka:

    I-
  • Ukuphindaphindeka okuphezulu kwe-The-counter
  • Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kwe-hormonal: izindlela ezithile ze-hormonal zokuvimbela inzalo, njengokuvimbela inzalo ezihlangene noma ama-hormonal iids, kungasiza ukulawula umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi kunciphise ubulukhuni bezinhlungu zokuya esikhathini.
  • Izinguquko zendlela yokuphila: Ukuzibandakanya ekuzivocavoca njalo, ukugcina ukudla okunempilo, ukuphatha amazinga okucindezela, futhi ukusebenzisa amasu okuphumula kungasiza ukuphatha izinhlungu nokukhuthaza inhlala-kahle.
  • ezinye izindlela zokwelapha: Abanye besifazane bathola impumuzo ezinsukwini ezibuhlungu ngokusebenzisa i-acupuncture, amakhambi amakhambi, noma ekwelashweni okuhambisanayo. Kubalulekile ukuxoxa ngalezi zinketho nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.
  • Ukungenelela kokuhlinzwa: Ezimweni lapho izimo ezingaphansi zinjenge-endometriosis noma ama-fibroids e-Uterine abangela ubuhlungu obukhulu noma izinkinga zokuzala, ukungenelela kokudla, kungabhekwa ukubhekana nesimo esithile. I-

    Ukufuna ukuhlolwa kokuzala: I- Uchwepheshe wokuzala angahlola izici ezahlukahlukene ezingaba nomthelela ekuzalweni, okubandakanya nokuba khona kwanoma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi ezihambisana nezikhathi zobuhlungu. Bangancoma izivivinyo ezifanele zokuxilonga, xoxa ngezinketho zokwelashwa ezingaba khona, futhi zinikeze umhlahlandlela osuselwa ezimweni zakho ngazinye.

    Isiphetho:

    Izikhathi zobuhlungu azikhombisi ngokuqondile ukuzala. Kodwa-ke, izimo eziyisisekelo ezingadala izikhathi ezibuhlungu zingathinte ukuzala. Uma uhlangabezana nobuhlungu bokuya esikhathini obunzima noma obuwohlokayo, kubalulekile ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukukhomba nokuphatha noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi. Ukufuna ukunakekelwa kwezokwelapha okufanelekile kungasiza ekubhekaneni nobuhlungu bobabili futhi noma yikuphi ukukhathazeka okungahle kube khona.

data.heading: Ingabe inhlonipho yesikhathi iyanda ngemuva komshado?
data.title: Umphumela Womshado Ngobuhlungu Besikhathi
data.body:
Ukuqonda izinkathi zesikhathi ngemuva komshado

abesifazane abaningi bayazibuza ukuthi inkathi yabo inhlonipho iyashintsha ngemuva komshado. Ngenkathi konke okuhlangenwe nakho kwabesifazane kuhlukile, akukho ukuxhumana okuqondile phakathi komshado nokwanda kwezinhlungu zesikhathi. Ubuhlungu besikhathi, owaziwa nangokuthi i-dysmenorrhea, ithonywa yizici ezahlukahlukene ezinjengomzimba ngamanye, ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal, indlela yokuphila, kanye nezimo zokwelashwa ezingaphansi. Nakhu ukubhekisisa okusondele ebudlelwaneni phakathi komshado nobuhlungu besikhathi:

umthelela wokushintsha kwendlela yokuphila: I-

Umshado uvame ukuletha izinguquko endleleni yokuphila, kufaka phakathi izici ezinjengamazinga okuxineka, umsebenzi womzimba, ukudla, kanye nenhlala-kahle. Lokhu kuguqulwa kwendlela yokuphila kungahle kube nomthelela empilweni yezempilo yokuya esikhathini kanye nesipiliyoni sobuhlungu besikhathi. Isibonelo, amazinga andayo okucindezela noma izinguquko emikhubeni yokudla zinganikela ekukhuphukeni kokungathandeki kokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi lezi zinto aziboshelwe kuphela emshadweni kepha zenzeka ngenxa yezimo ezahlukahlukene zokuphila. I-

Izinguquko ze-H2>

Ukushintshashintsha kwe-hormonal kudlala indima enkulu ezinhlwini zokuya esikhathini. Ngesikhathi sokujikeleza kokuya esikhathini, izinkontileka ze-Uterus zokuchitha i-lining yayo, okuholela ekuboneni kwemizwa. Izinguquko ze-Hormonal zingathinta ukuqina kwalezi zinkontileka bese kuthonya ubulukhuni bezinhlungu zesikhathi. Ngenkathi umshado ngokwayo akabangeli izinguquko ze-hormonal, ezinye izinto ezifana nengcindezi, izinguquko zendlela yokuphila, noma izimo ezithile zezokwelapha zingase zithinte ngokungaqondile ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kungenzeka zifake isandla ekushintsheni kwezinhlungu zesikhathi.

izimo zokwelashwa ezingaphansi kwazo: I- Izimo ezifana ne-endometriosis, i-uterine fibroids, i-adenomysis, noma isifo sokuvuvukala kwe-pelvic kungaholela ekutheni kukhuphuke izinhlungu zokuya esikhathini. Lezi zimo zingaba khona ngaphambi noma ngemuva komshado futhi azithonywa ngokuqondile ngesimo somshado. Kubalulekile ukufuna ukuhlolwa kwezokwelashwa nokuxilongwa uma ubukhulu bezinsuku zesikhathi bukhuphuka noma uma kukhona okunye mayelana nezimpawu. I-

Ukuphatha Ubuhlungu besikhathi: I-

Kungakhathalekile ukuthi isimo somshado, kunamasu ambalwa nokwelashwa okutholakalayo ukuphatha izinhlungu zesikhathi. Lokhu kufaka phakathi:

  • Ukuphindaphindeka okuphezulu kwe-the-the-counter I-
  • Ukwelashwa okushisa: Ukusebenzisa i-Heating Pad noma ukuthatha ukugeza okufudumele kunganikeza impumuzo futhi kusize ukuphumula izicubu zesibeletho.
  • Amasu wokuzivocavoca nokuphumula: Ukuzibandakanya ekusebenzeni njalo ngokomzimba kanye nezindlela zokuphumula ezinjenge-yoga noma izivivinyo zokuphefumula ezijulile kungasiza ukunciphisa izinhlungu zesikhathi.
  • Ukulawulwa kokuzalwa kwe-hormonal: Izindlela ezithile zokuvimbela inzalo ze-hormonal zingalawula ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal, zinciphise ukulimala kokuya esikhathini, futhi zinikeze impumuzo ebuhlungu besikhathi.
  • ezinye izindlela zokwelapha: Abanye besifazane bathola impumuzo ezinhlwini zesikhathi ngokusebenzisa i-acupuncture, amakhambi amakhambi, noma ekwelashweni okuhambisanayo. Kubalulekile ukubonisana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ngaphambi kokuzama noma yikuphi ukwelashwa okuhlukile. I-

    Nini Ukufuna Ukunakekelwa Kwezokwelapha: I- Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bangahlola izimpawu zakho, benze ukuhlolwa ngokuphelele, futhi bancome izinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele.

    Isiphetho: I- Ubuhlungu besikhathi bungahlukahluka kowesifazane kuya kowesifazane futhi buthonywe yizici ezinjengomzimba ngamanye, ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal, indlela yokuphila, kanye nezimo zempilo eziphansi. Kubalulekile ukulalela umzimba wakho, ukuzinakekela, futhi ufune ukwelashwa uma uhlangabezana nobuhlungu besikhathi esinzima noma esanda. Khumbula ukuthi ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bahlomele kangcono ukuhlola izimpawu zakho, bahlinzeke ngokuxilonga okunembile, futhi banikeze izinketho ezifanele zokwelashwa.

data.heading: Kungani izikhathi zamantombazane ezingashadile zifike sekwephuzile?
data.title: Ukubambezeleka ezikhathini ze-UMARRIED
data.body:
Ukuqonda imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini sekwephuzile emantombazaneni angashadile

Amantombazane amaningi angashadile angathola ukuhlukahluka emijikelezweni yabo yokuya esikhathini, kubandakanya nezikhathi ezibambezelekile. Kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ukungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini kungenzeka kwabesifazane bayo yonke iminyaka futhi akugcini kumantombazane angashadile. Kunezici eziningana ezingaba nesandla esikhathini sekwephuzile, futhi nakhu ukubhekisisa ezinye izizathu ezingenzeka: I-

Izinguquko ze-H2> I-

umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ulawulwa yimali entekenteke yama-hormone. Ngesikhathi sokukhula kobusha, imizimba yamantombazane ibhekana nokuguquguquka okukhulu kwama-hormonal njengoba ifinyelela ekuvuthweni kokuzala. Lezi zinguquko ze-hormonal zingadala ukungahambi kahle kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, kubandakanya nezikhathi ezibambezelekile. Njengoba umzimba usungula iphethini ejwayelekile ye-hormonal, imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini ithambekele ekubeni njalo ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

ingcindezi nezinto ezingokomzwelo: I-P> Ukuxineka, okungokomzimba nangokomzwelo, kungathinta umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Amantombazane angashadile angathola izingcindezi ezahlukahlukene, njengezingcindezi zezemfundo, okulindelwe emphakathini, noma izinselelo zomuntu siqu. Izinga eliphakeme lokucindezela lingaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kuholele ezikhathini ezibambezelekile. Izici ezingokomzwelo, njengokukhathazeka noma injabulo, nazo zingathinta njalo ukuhambisa imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. I-

Ukudla nokuzivocavoca: I-

Imikhuba yokudla engenampilo noma izinguquko ezedlulele kwesisindo zingathinta ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone futhi kamuva ukubambezela izikhathi. Ukudla okunempilo noma ukuzivocavoca ngokweqile kungaphazamisa ukulinganisela kwe-hormonal kudingekile emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini njalo. Kubalulekile ukuthi amantombazane angashadile alondoloze ukudla okulinganiselayo futhi ahlanganyele ekuzivocavoca okulinganiselayo ukusekela impilo yawo ephelele nokuya esikhathini. I-

Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS): I-

PCOS isifo samahomoni esingathinta njalo phakathi kwemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Kubonakala ngokuthuthukiswa kwama-cyst amancane kuma-ovari, ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, kanye nokumelana nokungalingani kwe-insulin. I-PCOS ingadala ukubambezeleka noma izikhathi ezingekho emthethweni, kanye nezinye izimpawu ezinjengokukhula kwezinwele ngokweqile, izinduna kanye nokuzuza kwesisindo. Uma intombazane ihlangabezana nezikhathi ezingekho emthethweni, kungakuhle ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuhlola ukuthi kungenzeka yini ama-PCOs.

izimo zokwelashwa ezingaphansi kwazo: I- Uma intombazane ihlala ihlangabezana nezikhathi zesikhathi sekwephuzile noma ngokungajwayelekile, kubalulekile ukubheka ubuchwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze kuhlolwe kahle nokuxilongwa. I-

Ukukhulelwa: I-

ngenkathi amantombazane angashadile kungenzeka angasebenzi ngocansi, kubalulekile ukucabanga ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi ukhulelwe uma kukhona umsebenzi wezocansi. Ezimweni ezinjalo, izinkathi ezibambezelekile zingaba yinkomba yokukhulelwa. Uma kunokukhathazeka ngokukhulelwa, kubalulekile ukufuna izeluleko zezokwelapha ezifanele futhi zihlolwe ukukhulelwa.

Isiphetho:

Izikhathi ezibambezelekile emantombazaneni angashadile zingavela ezicini ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi izinguquko ze-hormonal, ukucindezela, ukudla kanye nemikhuba yokuzivocavoca, izimo zezokwelapha ezingaphansi, futhi, kwezinye izikhathi, ezimweni ezithile. Kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi ukungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini kuvamile, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi sobusha, futhi zivame ukulawula isikhathi lapho umzimba uvumelana nezinguquko ze-hormonal. Kodwa-ke, uma ukungahambi kahle kuqhubeka noma kuhambisana nokuphathelene nezimpawu, kungakuhle ukuthi kufune ukuhlolwa kwezokwelashwa ukuze kukhiphe noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi noma ukukhulelwa. Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bahlomele kangcono ukuhlinzeka ngokuxilongwa okunembile kanye nesiqondiso esifanele sokuphatha ukungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini.

data.heading: Ngabe ezothando zithinta izikhathi?
data.title: Umthelela wezothando
data.body:
ubudlelwano phakathi kwezothando nokuya esikhathini I- Kodwa-ke, kunobufakazi besayensi obulinganiselwe bokuphakamisa ubudlelwane obuqondile be-causal phakathi kothando kanye nemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Imijikelezo yokuya esikhathini ilawulwa ngokuyinhloko izinguquko ze-hormonal ngaphakathi komzimba nohlelo lokuzala, futhi zilandela isigqi semvelo yemvelo. I- I-

inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo: I-

Ukuba sobudlelwaneni obunothando noyisekelayo kungaba nomthelela ekuthambekeni okungokomzwelo futhi kunciphise amazinga okucindezela. Ukuxineka okungokomzwelo kuhlobene nokungahambi kahle esikhathini kanye nezinguquko kumjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ngakho-ke, ubuhlobo obuhle nobuso bezothando bungasiza ekuphatheni ingcindezi nokukhuthaza impilo yonke yokuya esikhathini.

ingcindezi ne-hormonal ibhalansi:

Ukuxineka, noma kuhlobene nobudlelwano bezothando noma ezinye izinto zempilo, kungathinta ibhalansi ye-hormonal futhi kungaphazamisa njalo ukuvama kwemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi ubudlelwano phakathi kwengcindezi nokuya esikhathini kungahlukahluka kumuntu nomuntu, futhi akubona bonke abesifazane abazothola imiphumela efanayo. Ukuphatha ukucindezela ngokusebenzisa izindlela ezinempilo zokukopisha, ukuxhumana kanye nokusekelwa okungokomzwelo ngaphakathi kobudlelwano bezothando kungazuzisa inhlala-kahle futhi kungasiza ekugcinweni kokujwayelekile kokuya esikhathini.

Ukusondelana nokusebenza ngokocansi: I-

Ukusondelana nokusebenza ngokocansi ngaphakathi kobudlelwano bezothando kungakhipha ama-endorphin futhi kukhuthaze umuzwa wokuxhuma nenhlala-kahle. Ukusebenza ngokocansi nakho kungashukumisa ukugeleza kwegazi endaweni ye-pelvic, okungenzeka kube nokungenisa amandla okuya esikhathini kwabesifazane abanye besifazane. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi umsebenzi wokuya ocansini ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini uwukuzikhethela komuntu siqu futhi kufanele kususelwe kumazinga okududuza ngakunye kanye nezinketho.

Ukuxhumana nokusekelwa: I-

ubudlelwano bezothando obuqinile nobusekelayo bunganikeza isikhala esiphephile sokuxhumana okuvulekile nokusekelwa okungokomzwelo. Lokhu kungazuzisa ikakhulukazi ngezikhathi zokungabikho kokuya esikhathini noma izinguquko ezingokomzwelo. Ukuba nomlingani oqondayo nokweseka izinselelo ezihambisana nokuya esikhathini kungaba nomthelela enhlalakahleni yowesifazane sonke ngesikhathi somjikelezo wakhe wokuya esikhathini.

Isiphetho: I-

ngenkathi ezothando ngokwayo zingatholi ngokuqondile umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo, ukuphathwa kwengcindezi kanye nokusekelwa ngaphakathi kobudlelwano bezothando kungathonya ngokungaqondile kwempilo yokuya esikhathini kowesifazane. Ukugcina ubuhlobo obunothando nokwesekayo, ukuphatha amazinga okucindezela, nokuzinakekela kube ngcono ukuzinakekela kuyizinto ezibalulekile ekuthuthukiseni inhlala-kahle, kufaka phakathi njalo kokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu balalele imizimba yabo, bafuna izeluleko zezokwelashwa uma bebhekene nokungahambi kahle kokuya esikhathini noma ukungakhululeki, futhi baxhumana ngokukhululekile nabalingani babo ngezidingo zabo kanye nezinto ezincamelayo.

data.heading: Ingabe i-ovulation ibangele ukudana?
data.title: Ukucindezelwa kwe-ovulation
data.body:
ubudlelwano phakathi kwe-ovulation nokucindezelwa I-

Ukudana kuyisimo esiyinkimbinkimbi sempilo yengqondo engathonywa yizinto ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal. Ngenkathi i-ovulation uqobo iyinqubo yemvelo emjikelezweni wokuya esikhathini, kunobufakazi obuthile bokuphakamisa ukuxhumana okungaba khona phakathi kwe-ovulation kanye nezinguquko zemizwa, kubandakanya nezimpawu ezicindezelayo. Kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi lobu budlelwano abukho emhlabeni wonke futhi bangahlukahluka kuye ngomuntu. I-

Izinguquko ze-H2> I-

i-ovulation ibangelwa ukuhlinzwa ku-tulunizing hormone (LH) ne-follicle-evusa ama-hormone (FSH), okuvuselela ukukhishwa kweqanda kusuka ku-ovary. Lezi zinguquko ze-hormonal nazo zingathinta amanye ama-hormone emzimbeni, njenge-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone, okube yinto emthethweni. Abanye besifazane bangathola izinguquko zemood, kufaka phakathi imizwa yokudabuka, ukungacasuki, noma ukuguquka kwemizwa, ngesikhathi sesigaba se-ovulation somjikelezo wabo wokuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, akubona bonke abesifazane abazokuthola lezi zinguquko zemizwa, futhi ubukhulu kanye nesikhathi sezimpawu ezinjalo zingahluka. I-

I-Pre-Pre-Conferent Health Izimo: I-

Kubalulekile ukucubungula izimo zezempilo ezenzeka kwangaphambili lapho zihlola ubudlelwano phakathi kwe-ovulation nokudangala. Abesifazane abavele banomlando wokudangala noma okunye ukuphazamiseka kwemizwa kungahle kube nokuthambekela ngokwengeziwe ekutholeni izinguquko zemood ngesikhathi sokubopha. Ukushintshashintsha kwe-hormonal ngalesi sigaba somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kungandisa izimpawu ezikhona. Kubalulekile kubantu abanezimo zezempilo ezikhona ngaphambi kokusebenza ngokubambisana nabachwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuphatha izimpawu zabo ngempumelelo.

izinto ze-psychosocial: I- Imicimbi yokuphila ecindezelayo, ubunzima obunobudlelwano, ukucindezelwa okuhlobene nomsebenzi, noma ezinye izinto zengqondo, noma ezinye izinto zengqondo kungaba nomthelela kulokho okuhlangenwe nakho kokudangala noma izinguquko zemizwa nganoma yisiphi isigaba somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Kubalulekile ukubhekana nalezi zinto ngokuqondile futhi ufune ukwesekwa okufanele uma kudingeka. I-

Ukuzinakekela kanye namasu wokukopisha:

Uma uhlangabezana nezimpawu ezicindezelayo ngesikhathi sokuwohloka noma yisiphi isigaba somjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, kunamasu ahlukahlukene wokuzinakekela angasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu. Lawa masu afaka:

  • Ukuzibandakanya ekuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, okungafukula imizwa futhi kunciphise amazinga okucindezela.
  • ebeka phambili ukulala okwanele nokwenza inhlanzeko enhle yokulala.
  • Ukudla ukudla okulinganiselayo okubandakanya ukudla okunothile okunothile ukusekela inhlala-kahle.
  • Ukuhlanganyela amasu wokuphathwa kwengcindezi njengokucabanga, ukuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, noma i-yoga.
  • Ukufuna ukusekelwa komphakathi kusuka kubangani, umndeni, noma amaqembu okusekelana ukuze wabelane ngolwazi nemizwa.
  • Ngokucabanga ngezokwelapha noma ukwelulekwa ukuthuthukisa izindlela zokukopisha futhi uhlole izinto ezingaphansi ezinikela ngezimpawu ezicindezelayo.

    Ukubonisana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo:

    Uma ubhekene nezimpawu eziphikelelayo ezicindezelayo ezithinta kakhulu impilo yakho yansuku zonke, kubalulekile ukubonana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo. Bangakwazi ukuhlola izimpawu zakho, banikeze ukuxilongwa okufanele, futhi bathuthukise uhlelo lokwelashwa olufanele olwenzelwe izidingo zakho ngazinye. Lokhu kungafaka ukwelashwa, umuthi, noma inhlanganisela yazo zombili.

    Isiphetho: I- Isipiliyoni somuntu ngamunye sihlukile, futhi izici ezahlukahlukene zingathonya izinguquko zemoloy kanye nempilo yengqondo phakathi kwe-ovulation. Ukuzinakekela kubeke phambili ukunakekela, ukufuna ukwesekwa lapho kudingeka, futhi ukubonisana nabachwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo kungasiza ukuphatha izimpawu ezicindezelayo futhi kukhuthaze inhlala-kahle yonke.

data.heading: Kungani ngikhala kakhulu ngesikhathi se-ovulation?
data.title: Ekhala e-ovulation
data.body:
ubudlelwano phakathi kokukhala kanye ne-ovulation I-

Ukukhala kuyindlela yemvelo engokomzwelo engenzeka ezimweni ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi phakathi ne-ovulation. Ngenkathi izizathu eziqondile zokwanda kombuso ezingokomzwelo nokukhala ngesikhathi se-ovulation zingahlukahluka kuye kumuntu, kunezici eziningana ezingaba nomthelela kule nto. I-

Izinguquko ze-H2> I-

i-ovulation ibangelwa izinguquko ze-hormonal emzimbeni, ikakhulukazi ukuhlinzwa ku-tuluinizing hormone (LH) ne-follicle-evusa ama-hormone (FSH). Lawa mashifu ama-hormonal nawo angathinta amanye ama-hormone, anjenge-estrogen kanye ne-progesterone, edlala indima ekuqondisweni kwemizwa. ukukhuphuka kokuzwela:

Uma uzithola ukhala kaningi ngesikhathi sokubopha futhi kubangela usizi, kunamasu wokuzinakekela angasiza:

umthelela wokuya esikhathini ngempilo yengqondo

data.heading: Kungani abesifazane bathola imizwa ngezikhathi ezithile?
data.title: Izikhathi nokushintsha okungokomzwelo
data.body:
Ukushintsha okungokomzwelo ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini

Izinsikazi eziningi zithola izinguquko ezingokomzwelo ngesikhathi somjikelezo wazo wokuya esikhathini, futhi lezi zinguquko zivame ukubangelwa ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal okwenzeka ngokwemvelo ngalesi sikhathi. Umjikelezo wokuya esikhathini ubandakanya ukuxhumeka okuyinkimbinkimbi kwama-hormone, kufaka phakathi i-estrogen ne-progesterone, okungathonya imizwa nemizwa. Ake sihlole ezinye zezizathu zokuthi kungani abesifazane besifazane bangathola imizwa ngesikhathi sabo. I-

Ukushintshashintsha kwe-H2 I-

ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini, amazinga we-hormone aguquguqukayo njengoba nomzimba ulungiselela i-ovulation nokuya esikhathini. Amazinga e-Estrogen akhuphuka engxenyeni yokuqala yomjikelezo, kanti amazinga e-progesterone akhuphuka engxenyeni yesibili. Lezi zinguquko ze-hormonal zingathinta ama-neurotransmitters angobuchopho, anjenge-serotonin, edlala indima ebalulekile ekulawuleni imizwa. I-

i-estrogen ixhunyaniswe nemizwa yenhlala-kahle futhi yandise umsebenzi we-serotonin. Njengoba amazinga e-estrogen enqaba ngaphambi kokuya esikhathini, amazinga e-serotonin angancipha futhi. Lokhu kwehla e-serotonin kungafaka isandla ezinguquko ezingokomzwelo, kufaka phakathi imizwa yokudabuka, ukungacasuli, noma ukuguquka kwemizwelo.

ukungathandeki ngokomzimba: I- Ukubhekana nobuhlungu obungokomzimba noma ukungakhululeki kungathinta ngokwemvelo isimo somuntu kanye nenhlala-kahle ngokomzwelo. Inhlanganisela yezimpawu zomzimba kanye namashifu we-hormonal ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini kungadala isimo esingokomzwelo esinzima sabantu besifazane abathile. I-

Lezi zimpawu zingahluka ngobukhulu kanye nobude, futhi kukholakala ukuthi zithonywe ukuguquguquka kwezimo ze-hormonal nezinye izinto. I- Izici ezifana nezakhi zofuzo, i-chemistry yobuchopho ngazinye, namazinga wokuxineka komuntu siqu kungathonya nobulukhuni kanye nomthelela wezimpawu ezingokomzwelo.

Izici zengqondo:

Izici zengqondo zengqondo nazo zingasiza ekushintsheni ngokomzwelo ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini. Izinkolelo zabantu, amasiko, ama-taboos, kanye nama-stigmas azungeze ukuya esikhathini angadala izingcindezi ezengeziwe noma imizwa engemihle, engakhulisa izimpendulo ezingokomzwelo. Umthelela wengqondo wokuhlangenwe nakho kokuya esikhathini kanye nezimo zengqondo zenhlalo ezibheke esikhathini zingahlukahluka kakhulu phakathi kwabantu namasiko.

Amasu wokuzinakekela:

Uma uthola ukuthi izinguquko ezingokomzwelo ngesikhathi sakho zithinta kakhulu inhlala-kahle yakho, kunamasu ambalwa wokuzinakekela angasiza:

  • Yamukela futhi wamukele: Vuma ukuthi izinguquko ezingokomzwelo ngesikhathi sakho ziyingxenye evamile yomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Ukuqonda ukuthi lokhu kuguquguquka kuthonywa izinguquko ze-hormonal kungakusiza wenze ngokwejwayelekile futhi wamukele imizwa yakho.
  • Ukuzibonakalisa Lokhu kungakusiza ekuboneni noma yiziphi izingqikithi zemizwa ephindaphindekayo futhi uzilungiselele kangcono.
  • Imisebenzi yokuzinakekela: Yenza imisebenzi ekhuthaza ukuphumula nenhlala-kahle engokomzwelo, njengokuzivocavoca, ukuzivocavoca okujulile, ukugeza okujulile, ukuchitha isikhathi semvelo, noma ukuzibandakanya kokuzilibazisa okujabulelayo.
  • ubudlelwane obusekelayo: Funa ukusekelwa okuvela kubathandekayo abaqonda futhi abanokuzwela okuhlangenwe nakho kwakho. Ukwabelana ngemizwa yakho nabangane abathembekile noma amalungu omndeni anganikeza induduzo nokuqinisekiswa.

Ochwepheshe bezempilo yezengqondo banganikeza ukuqondiswa, ukusekela kanye nokungenelela okuhambisana nezidingo zakho ezithile. I- Uma unomuzwa wokuthi izimpawu zakho ezingokomzwelo zinzima, ziphikelele ngaphezu komjikelezo wakho wokuya esikhathini, noma zithinta kakhulu impilo yakho, kuyalulekwa ukuthi uthintane nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze alawule noma yiziphi izimo ezingaphansi futhi athole ukwesekwa okufanele.

data.heading: Ingabe ukudangala kubi kakhulu esikhathini sakho?

Ukudana kuyisimo esiyinkimbinkimbi sempilo yengqondo engathinta abantu nganoma yisiphi isikhathi, kufaka phakathi phakathi nomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Premenstrual Dysphoric Directioble (PMDD) iyindlela enzima ye-Preminstrual Syndrome (PMS) ebonakaliswa ukuphazamiseka okukhulu kwemizwa, kufaka phakathi ukucindezeleka, ukukhathazeka, nokungaziphathi kahle. Ngokungafani ne-PMS ejwayelekile, engadala izimpawu zomzwelo ezimzwelo, izimpawu ze-PMDD zinzima kakhulu futhi zingathinta kakhulu ikhwalithi yempilo yomuntu. Ukudana yisimo esihlangene esithonywe yizinto ezahlukahlukene, kufaka phakathi i-genetic Predisition, okuhlangenwe nakho kwempilo, kanye nezici zengqondo. Ingcindezi, izinkinga zokuzithemba, ubunzima obunobudlelwano, kanye namaphethini wokucabanga amabi kunabo bonke ababambe iqhaza ekubuseni nasekubekezelweni kwezimpawu zokudangala. I-

Isimo sokujikeleza komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini kanye nokulindela kwezimpawu eziphindaphindayo nakho kungaholela ekucindezelekeni nasekulimazekeni ngokomzwelo ngalesi sikhathi.

data.heading: Kuyini ukucindezelwa kwe-PMS?
data.title: Ukudangala kwe-PMS
data.body:
Ukudangala kwe-PMS: Ukuqonda i-Premionstrual Syndrome nokucindezelwa I-

I-Premenstrual Syndrome (PMS) ibhekisela eqenjini lezimpawu ezingokomzimba, ezingokomzwelo nezengqondo ezenzeka ezinsukwini noma amasonto aholela esikhathini sokuya esikhathini. Ngenkathi iningi labesifazane lihlangabezana nezimpawu ezithambile ezinquma uma kuqala ukuya esikhathini, abanye abantu bangathola izimpawu ezinzima kakhulu, kufaka phakathi ukucindezelwa. Le nhlanganisela yezimpawu zokugcina ukucindezelwa kanye nokudangala kuvame ukubizwa ngokuthi ukudangala kwe-PMS. Masikwazi ukwenza imininingwane yokudangala kwe-PMS kanye nomthelela wayo.

Ukuqonda PMS: I-

PMS yisimo esivamile esithinta abesifazane abaningi ngesikhathi seminyaka yabo yokuzala. Imvamisa kwenzeka esigabeni seLuteal somjikelezo wokuya esikhathini, okuyiso isikhathi phakathi kwe-ovulation nokuya esikhathini. Izimpawu zingahlukahluka kakhulu kepha zivame ukufaka ukushintshwa kwemizwelo, ukungacasuki, ukukhathala, ukuqhakaza, ubumnene bebele kanye nezifiso zokudla. I-

PMS nokudangala: I-

kwabanye abantu, izimpawu ze-PMS zingahambisana nezimpawu ezicindezelayo. Lezi zimpawu zingafaka imizwa yokudabuka, ukuphelelwa yithemba, kwehlise inzalo noma injabulo yemisebenzi, izinguquko ekuthandeni noma amaphethini okulala, ukugxila kokuqina, nokucasuka. I- Ukudangala kwe-PMS kuyisimo sesikhashana esenzeka maqondana nomjikelezo wokuya esikhathini futhi ngokuvamile sithuthuka uma kuqala ukuya esikhathini. Kodwa-ke, ubukhulu bezimpawu bungahluka kusuka kumuntu nomuntu, futhi kwabanye abantu, ukucindezelwa kwe-PM kungathinta kakhulu inhlala-kahle yabo kanye nekhwalithi yempilo.

izimbangela zokucindezelwa kwe-PMS:

Izimbangela eziqondile zokucindezelwa kwe-PMS aziqondakali ngokuphelele, kepha izici eziningana zingaba nomthelela ekukhuleni kwayo:

Izinguquko zeHormonal: I- Lezi zinguquko ze-hormonal zingaholela ekungalingani futhi futhi zinikele ezimpawu ezicindezelayo. I-Serotonin, i-neurotransmitter ehambisana nokulawulwa kwemizwa, ithonywa kakhulu ukuguquguquka kwe-hormonal futhi ingadlala indima ekucindezelekeni kwe-PMS.

Izici zofuzo kanye nezemvelo: I- Ukuhlukahluka okuthile ezinhlotsheni ezibandakanyeka ku-serotonin Regulation kanye nokuqondiswa kwemizwa kungaba nomthelela ekwakhiweni kwezimpawu ezicindezelayo ngesikhathi sokuya esikhathini.

Izici zezemvelo nezemvelo:

Izici zengqondo zengqondo ezifana nengcindezi, izindlela ezingezinhle zokukopisha, nezindlela zokucabanga ezingezinhle zingathonya ubulukhuni kanye nomthelela wokudangala kwe-PMS. Izici zezemvelo ezifana nokusekelwa kwezenhlalo, indlela yokuphila, kanye nenhlala-kahle yengqondo yonke ingadlala indima ekubonisweni kwezimpawu. I-

Ukuphatha Ukudangala kwe-PMS:

Uma uthola ukucindezelwa kwe-PMS, kunamasu ahlukahlukene angasiza ukunciphisa izimpawu futhi athuthukise inhlala-kahle yakho:

  • Ukuzinakekela: Phambili imisebenzi yokuzinakekela okukhuthaza ukuphumula, ukuncishiswa kwengcindezi kanye nenhlala-kahle engokomzwelo. Lokhu kungafaka ukuzivocavoca umzimba njalo, ukwenza amasu wokuphumula njengokuzindla noma ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, ukulala ngokwanele, nokugcina ukudla okunempilo.
  • ubudlelwane obusekelayo: funa ukwesekwa okuvela kubathandekayo abanganikeza ukusekelwa nokusekelwa okungokomzwelo ngezikhathi ezinzima. Ukukhuluma ngokuhlangenwe nakho kwakho nemizwa yakho nabantu abathembekile kungasiza ukunciphisa umthwalo ongokomzwelo futhi kwakha umuzwa wokuxhuma.
  • I-Psychotherapy: Bheka izinketho zokwelapha ezifana nokwelashwa kwengqondo-zokuziphatha (CBT), ezingasiza ekuboneni nasekutholeni inselelo amaphethini okucabanga angezinhle futhi athuthukise amasu okubhekana nawo asebenzayo okuphatha izimpawu ezicindezelayo. Ukwelapha futhi lunganikeza indawo ephephile yokuhlola izici zengqondo ezingaphansi kokufakazela ukucindezelwa kwe-PMS.
  • umuthi: Kwezinye izimo, ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo bangancoma imithi efana nokukhetha i-Serotonin Reaptake inhibitors (SSRIS) ukunciphisa izimpawu zokudangala kwe-PMS. Le mithi ingasiza ukulalela amazinga e-serotonin ebuchosheni futhi athuthukise imizwa.
  • Ukuguqulwa kwendlela yokuphila: Ukuguqulwa okuthile kwendlela yokuphila kungasiza ukunciphisa ubulukhuni bokudangala kwe-PMS. Lokhu kungafaka ukwamukela ukudla okunempilo okucebile ngezithelo, imifino, okusanhlamvu okugcwele kanye namaprotheni anciphile, ukunciphisa i-caffeine kanye nokugwema ukubhema.

    lapho ukufuna usizo lochwepheshe:

    Uma izimpawu zakho zokudangala kwe-PMS zithinta kakhulu ukusebenza kwakho kwansuku zonke, ubudlelwano, noma inhlala-kahle, kubalulekile ukufuna usizo lochwepheshe. Ochwepheshe bezokunakekelwa kwempilo, njengodokotela we-gynecologist noma uchwepheshe wezempilo yengqondo, anganikeza ukuxilongwa okunembile, ahlole ubukhulu bezimpawu zakho, futhi ancome izinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele ezenzelwe izidingo zakho ezithile. I-

    khumbula, ukucindezelwa kwe-PMS kuyinto evamile kubantu abaningi, futhi kukhona amasu nokwelashwa okusebenzayo okutholakele ukusiza ukuphatha nokudambisa izimpawu. Ngokufuna ukusekelwa, ukuzinakekela nokuhlola izinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele, ungazulazula ezinseleleni zokudangala kwe-PMS futhi uthuthukise inhlala-kahle yokomoya.

data.heading: Ingabe ukukhathazeka kuthinta ukuzala?
data.title: Ukukhathazeka nokuzala
data.body:
ukukhathazeka kanye nokuzala: ukuhlola ukuxhumana I- Ukukhathazeka, isimo sempilo esivamile esibonakaliswa ukukhathazeka ngokweqile nokwesaba, kube yisihloko esithakazelayo uma kukhulunywa ngomthelela wawo ongaba khona ekuvumeni. Ake sihlole ukuxhumana phakathi kokukhathazeka nokuzala ngemininingwane eminingi.

ukukhathazeka-ukukhathazeka - isixhumanisi sokuzala: I-

ingcindezi nokukhathazeka kuhlobene kakhulu, futhi zombili zingaba nomthelela ezinhlelweni zomzimba zomzimba, kufaka phakathi umsebenzi wokuzala. Lapho umzimba ungaphansi kwengcindezi, ukhipha ama-hormone okucindezela anjenge-cortisol, engaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal ethambile edingekayo ngezinqubo zokuzala.

Amazinga aphezulu okukhathazeka okungamahlalakhona nokucindezela kungathinta ukuzala ngezinqubo ezahlukahlukene: I-

ukungalingani kwe-hormonal:

Ukukhathazeka kungaphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal edingekayo e-ovulation ejwayelekile kanye nemijikelezo yokuya esikhathini. Ama-hormone acindezelayo, njenge-cortisol, angaphazamisa ukukhiqizwa kanye nokulawulwa kwama-hormone okuzala afana ne-estrogen ne-progesterone. Ukungalingani kule homone kungathinta i-ovulation, ukuvalelwa kokuya esikhathini, kanye nokuzala okuphelele.

I-ovulation ephazamisekile: I- Ukuphazamiseka ngesikhathi noma ukulawulwa kwalawa ama-hormone kungaholela ekuwoleni okungajwayelekile noma okungahambi kahle, okwenza kube yinselele ngokwengeziwe ukukhulelwa.

Izinguquko emjikelezweni wokuya esikhathini:

Ukukhathazeka okungapheli nokucindezela kungathinta ubude kanye nokuvama komjikelezo wokuya esikhathini. Abanye abantu bangathola imijikelezo emifushane noma ende, yokuphamba okungajwayelekile, noma i-amenorrhea (ukungabikho kokuya esikhathini), okungenza kube nzima ngokwengeziwe ukubikezela izinsuku ezivundile nokwenza kahle isikhathi sokukhulelwa.

umthelela emsebenzini wezocansi: I- Ubunzima bokugcina ubuhlobo obunempilo kwezocansi bungafaka isandla ekucindezelweni nasezinseleleni ezihlobene nokuzala.

umthelela wezengqondo:

eceleni kwezinto zomzimba, ukukhathazeka nakho kungaba nemiphumela yengqondo enomthelela ngokungaqondile ukuzala:

ukukhuphuka kwengxabano nokukhathazeka: I-

Ukuphila nokukhathazeka okungamahlalakhona kungadala isimo sokungezwani, ukukhathazeka namaphethini wokucabanga amabi. Lo mthwalo ongokomzwelo ungathinta inhlala-kahle ephelele, kufaka phakathi ubudlelwano, ukuzethemba, kanye nekhono lokubhekana nezinselelo zokuzama ukukhulelwa.

ubunzima bobudlelwano: I-

ukukhathazeka kungabeka ubunzima ebudlelwaneni, ikakhulukazi uma kuziwa ezindabeni ezihlobene nokuzala. Imibhangqwana ingahle ibe nokwanda kwengxabano, izingxabano, kanye nobunzima bokuxhumana njengoba zizulazula ezinselele ezingokomzwelo nangokomzimba zokuzama ukukhulelwa. I-

inciphise ukunamathela ekwelashweni: I- Ukukhathazeka nokucindezelwa okuhambisana nokwelashwa kungakhulisa izimpawu ezikhona zokukhathazeka futhi kwenze kube nzima ukulandela izinkambiso ezinconyiwe.

Ukuphatha ukukhathazeka kanye nokuzala:

Ngenkathi ukukhathazeka kungathinta ukuzala, kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi isipiliyoni somuntu ngamunye sihlukile, futhi akubona bonke abantu abakhathazekile abazobhekana nezinselelo zokuzala. Kubalulekile futhi ukuthi uqaphele ukuthi ukukhathazeka kukodwa kungenzeka kungabi imbangela yokuzala.

Uma ubhekene nokukhathazeka futhi uzama ukukhulelwa, kunamasu angasiza ukuphatha ukukhathazeka nokusekela uhambo lwakho lokuzala: I-

Funa ukwesekwa okungokomzwelo: I-

Finyelela kuchwepheshe wezempilo yezengqondo noma inethiwekhi yokusekela ukukusiza ekuzuleni izimpawu zokukhathazeka nezinselelo ezingokomzwelo zokuzama ukukhulelwa. Izindlela zokwelapha ezinjengokwelashwa kwengqondo-zokuziphatha zinganikeza amathuluzi aphumelelayo wokuphatha ukukhathazeka nokukhuthaza inhlala-kahle.

Amasu wokuphatha ukucindezela: I-

esebenzisana namasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela njengokuzindla, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, imikhuba yokucabanga, i-yoga, noma amanye amasu wokuphumula. Le misebenzi ingasiza amazinga aphansi okukhathazeka futhi athuthukise umuzwa wokuzola nenhlala-kahle. I-

Gcina impilo enempilo: I-

Ukuthola indlela yokuphila enempilo kungaba nomthelela enhlalakahleni yonke futhi kungenzeka anciphise ukukhathazeka. Ukuvivinya umzimba njalo, ukudla okulinganiselayo, ukulala okwanele, kanye nezindlela zokukopisha ezinempilo ezinjengezinto zokuzilibazisa noma izitolo zokudala.

xhumana nomlingani wakho: I-

Ukuxhumana okuvulekile nomlingani wakho mayelana nokwesaba, ukukhathazeka, kanye nemizwa yakho kungasiza ukunciphisa ukukhathazeka futhi kuqinise isibopho sakho. Ukwabelana ngohambo lokuzala ndawonye futhi ukusekelana kungadambisa eminye yemithwalo engokomzwelo ehambisana nokukhathazeka. I-

cabanga ngamaqembu okusekela: I-

ejoyina amaqembu okusekela ukuzala noma imiphakathi eku-inthanethi inganikeza umuzwa wokuba yilungu, ukuqonda, nokusekelwa. Ukuxhuma nabanye ababhekene nakho okufanayo kungasiza ukunciphisa imizwa yokukhathazeka nokuhlinzeka ngemininingwane ebalulekile kanye namasu okubhekana nawo.

lapho ukufuna usizo lochwepheshe:

Uma ukukhathazeka kuthonya kakhulu ukusebenza kwakho kwansuku zonke, ubudlelwano, noma inhlala-kahle, kubalulekile ukufuna usizo lochwepheshe. Ochwepheshe bezempilo yengqondo, njengodokotela noma udokotela wezengqondo, anganikeza ukuhlolwa okuphelele, ukuxilongwa okunembile, futhi ancome izinketho zokwelashwa ezifanele ezenzelwe izidingo zakho. I- Ngokwesekwa okulungile nokuphatha amasu, kungenzeka ukuzulazula ekukhathazekeni ngenkathi usohambweni lwakho lokuzala futhi wandise amathuba akho okukhulelwa.

data.heading: Ngingaphumuza kanjani ukukhulelwa?
data.title: Ukuphumula ukuze ukhulelwe
data.body:
Amasu wokuphumula wokwanda kokuzala I-

Ukuzama ukukhulelwa kungaba uhambo olujabulisayo kodwa futhi olucindezelayo kubantu abaningi. Ukuxineka nokukhathazeka kungawuthinta ukuzala ngokuphazamisa ibhalansi ye-hormonal kanye nokuthinta izinqubo zokuzala. Ukuqalisa amasu okuphumula kungasiza ukunciphisa amazinga okucindezela, kukhuthaze inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo, futhi kwandise amathuba okukhulelwa. Ake sihlole amasu athile wokuphumula asebenzayo angasekela uhambo lwakho lokuzala.

1. Ukuzindla kwengqondo: I-

Ukuzindla kokuzindla kuwumkhuba ohlanganisa ukugxila ekunakekeleni kwakho ngalesi sikhathi samanje, ngaphandle kokwahlulela. Kungasiza ukwehlisa ingqondo, ukunciphisa ukukhathazeka, nokukhuthaza umuzwa wokuphumula. Thola isikhala esithule nesinethezekile, vala amehlo akho, bese uletha ukunaka kwakho emoyeni wakho. Phawula imizwa yokudonsa ngakunye futhi ikhipha, ivumela noma yimiphi imicabango noma izinkathazo ukuthi zidlule ngaphandle kokubanjwa kuzo. Ukuzindla okujwayelekile kokucabanga kungasiza ekuhlakuleleni isimo sokuphumula futhi kunciphise amazinga okucindezela.

2. Ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula: I-

izivivinyo zokuphefumula ezijulile zingamasu alula kodwa anamandla okuvuselela ukuphumula. Hlala noma ulale endaweni ekhululekile futhi uthathe umoya omncane, ojulile. Inhale ngokujulile ekhaleni lakho, uvumele isisu sakho ukuba bandise, futhi bakhiphe kancane ngomlomo wakho, ukuyeka ukungezwani noma ukucindezelwa. Ukuphefumula okujulile kungasebenzisa impendulo yokuphumula yomzimba, izinga lokushaya kwenhliziyo eliphansi, bese unciphisa ukukhathazeka.

3. Ukuphumula Kwemisipha Okuqhubekayo: I-

Ukuphumula kwemisipha okuqhubekayo kuyindlela ehilela ukungenisa bese ukhulula amaqembu emisipha ehlukene emzimbeni. Qala ngezinzwane zakho bese usebenza ngendlela yakho, uthuthuke kancane futhi uphumule iqembu ngalinye lemisipha. Le ndlela isiza ukukhipha ukungezwani ngokomzimba, ukukhuthaza ukuphumula, futhi kwandise ukuqwashisa ngomzimba. Prakthiza ukuphumula kwemisipha okuqhubekayo njalo ukuze ungaqedi futhi kudambise ukucindezela.

4. I-Yoga: I- Ukunyakaza okumnene nokwelulwa kwe-yoga kukusiza ukudedela ukungezwani komzimba, kuyilapho ingqondo ngesikhathi sokuzilolonga ingathulisa ingqondo. Ama-yoga athile abeka, njengemilenze phezulu odongeni pose (viparita karani) noma i-esekelwa ibhuloho esekelwa (i-setunasana), ingaba yinzuzo ekuthuthukiseni ukugeleza kwegazi ezithweni zokuzala. Ukujoyina isigaba se-yoga noma ukulandela tutorials online kunganikeza ukuqondiswa kokulandelanisa kwe-yoga okugxile kakhulu.

5. Izithombe Eziqondisiwe: I-

Izithombe eziqondisiwe zibandakanya ukusebenzisa umcabango wakho ukudala izithombe zengqondo ezivusa umuzwa wokuzola nokuphumula. Thola indawo ethule, vala amehlo akho, futhi uzicabange usesimweni esinokuthula nesi-serene, njengobhishi noma i-meadow. Hlangana nezinzwa zakho ngokubona imininingwane, imisindo, kanye nemizwa yaleyo ndawo. Izithombe eziqondisiwe zingasiza ukuqondisa kabusha ukugxila kwakho kude nezingcindezi futhi kudale isimo esihle sengqondo esisekela ukuzala.

6. I-Acupuncture: I- Kukholakala ukuthi ukubuyisela ukugeleza kwamandla (qi) nokukhuthaza ukubhalansi emzimbeni. Izikhathi ze-acupuncture zingasiza ukunciphisa ukucindezela, zilawule amazinga we-hormone, futhi athuthukise ukugeleza kwegazi ezithweni zokuzala. Thintana no-Acupuncturist oqeqeshiwe obhekene nokuzala ukuze ahlole lokhu kwelashwa okuhambisanayo.

7. Imisebenzi yokuzinakekela kanye nokuphumula: I-

Ukuhlanganyela emisebenzini yokuzinakekela ingafaka isandla kakhulu ekuphumuleni nasekuthandeni okungokomzwelo. Nikeza isikhathi emisebenzini ekulethela injabulo futhi ikusize ungayi. Lokhu kungafaka ukuthatha amabhati afudumele, ukwenza i-aromatherapy ngokuthulisa uwoyela obalulekile, ukuhambisa izincwadi, ukufunda incwadi, ukulalela umculo opholisayo, noma ukuchitha isikhathi emvelweni. Ukuthola Imisebenzi evumelana nawe futhi ikuvumele ukuba uphumule kungaba nomthelela omuhle ohambweni lwakho lokuzala.

8. Inethiwekhi yokusekela: I- Yabelana ngemizwa yakho, ukukhathazeka, kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwakho nabantu abathembekile abanganikeza isikhuthazo nokuqonda. Ukuxhuma nabanye ohambweni olufanayo kungasiza ukudambisa ukucindezela futhi kwakha isikhala sezingxoxo ezivulekile mayelana nokuzala kanye namasu wokuphumula.

lapho ukufuna usizo lochwepheshe: I- Uchwepheshe wezengqondo wezengqondo noma ucwaningo lokuzala lunganikeza ukwesekwa okwengeziwe, ukuholwa, kanye namasu aqondene nomuntu uqobo ukuphatha ukucindezela nokwenza ngcono ukuzala. I-

khumbula ukuthi amasu wokuphumula akuyona indlela eqinisekisiwe yokukhulelwa, kepha angafaka isandla ekuqhubekeni kahle futhi asekele uhambo lwakho lokuzala. Yiba nesineke futhi unomusa ngokwakho kuyo yonke inqubo, futhi ukhumbule ukuthi uhambo lomuntu ngamunye luhlukile.

data.heading: Ngabe ukucindezela kuthinta ikhwalithi yeqanda?
data.title: Ukucindezela nekhwalithi yeqanda
data.body:
umthelela wengcindezi kwikhwalithi yeqanda I-

Ukuxineka kuyinto evamile empilweni yanamuhla futhi kungathinta izici ezahlukahlukene zempilo yethu, kufaka phakathi impilo yokuzala. Uma kukhulunywa ngokuzala, ukucindezelwa kungathinta ikhwalithi yeqanda, edlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu emathubeni okukhulelwa okuphumelelayo. Ake sihlole ukuthi ukucindezela kungathinta kanjani ikhwalithi yeqanda nokuthi yiziphi izinyathelo ongazithatha ukuze unciphise umthelela wazo.

impendulo yokucindezela nemiphumela yayo emzimbeni

Lapho sithola ukucindezelwa, uhlelo lwethu lokuphendula lomzimba lusebenze, okuholela ekukhisheni ama-hormone okucindezela anjenge-cortisol ne-adrenaline. Lawa ma-hormone angaba nemiphumela ebanzi ebanzi ku-physiology yethu, kufaka phakathi uhlelo lokuzala. I-

Ukucindezela okungapheli noma okuhlala isikhathi eside kungaphazamisa ukulingana okubucayi kwama-hormone abandakanyeka kwinqubo yokuzala. Kungaphazamisa njalo nge-combles yokuya esikhathini, i-ovulation, kanye nokusayina kwe-hormonal kuyadingeka ukuze kuthuthukiswe amaqanda afanele.

imiphumela yengcindezi kwikhwalithi yeqanda I-

Ikhwalithi yeqanda ibhekisa ebuqothweni bezempilo nobubanzi bezakhi zofuzo kwamaqanda akhiqizwa ama-ovari. Amaqanda asezingeni eliphakeme anethuba elingcono lokuvundiswa, ukufakwa, kanye nokukhulelwa okuphumelelayo. Kodwa-ke, ukucindezela kungathinta ikhwalithi yeqanda ngezindlela ezilandelayo:

1. I-Hormonal Imbance: Ingcindezi ye-

ingaphazamisa ibhalansi ejwayelekile ye-hormonal emzimbeni, kufaka phakathi ama-hormone abandakanyeka ekuthuthukisweni kwamaqanda nase-ovulation. Lokhu kungaholela emijikelezweni yokuya esikhathini engajwayelekile noma ephazamisekile kanye nokuvuthwa kweqanda le-suffimal.

2. Ukuncipha kwegazi okuncishisiwe:

Ngesikhathi sokuxineka, umzimba uqondisa ukugeleza kwegazi kude nemisebenzi engeyona ebalulekile, kufaka phakathi izitho zokuzala. Lokhu kungaholela ekunciphisweni kwegazi okunciphisiwe kumaqanda, okuthinta ikhwalithi yamaqanda akhiqizwayo.

3. Ukuxineka kwe-oxidative: Ingcindezi ye-

ingakhuphula ukukhiqizwa kwama-molecule ayingozi abizwa ngokuthi ama-radicals wamahhala emzimbeni. Lawa ma-molekyuli angadala ukucindezelwa okuyi-oxidative, okungalimaza amaseli, kufaka phakathi amaqanda. Ukuxineka nge-oxidative kuhlotshaniswe nekhwalithi yeqanda encishisiwe kanye nezinkinga zokuzala.

4. Ukuvuvukala: Ingcindezi ye- Ukuvuvukala okungapheli kungathinta kabi ikhwalithi yeqanda kanye nokuphazamiseka kokuzala.

5. Ubuqotho be-DNA obuguquliwe: I-

Izinguquko ezihlobene nomqondo ezihlobene nokuxineka zingathinta ubuqotho bezakhi zofuzo zamaqanda. Izinga eliphakeme lama-hormone okucindezela kanye nokucindezelwa kwe-oxidative kungaholela ekulimaleni kwe-DNA kumaqanda, okungakhulisa ubungozi bokuphazamiseka kwe-chromosomal kanye nokuzala. I-

Ukulawula ukucindezela kwekhwalithi yeqanda ethuthukisiwe I-

1. Amasu wokunciphisa ukucindezela: I-

esebenzisana namasu wokuphumula njengokuzindla kokucabanga, ukuzivocavoca okujulile kokuphefumula, i-yoga, nokuphumula kwemisipha okuqhubekayo. Le mikhuba ingasiza amazinga okucindezela aphansi, athuthukise inhlala-kahle engokomzwelo, kanye nokusekelwa kwempilo yokuzala.

2. Ukuzivocavoca njalo: I-

Umsebenzi Womzimba ukhipha ama-endorphins, okungokwemvelo izikhunzi zemvelo. Ukuzivocavoca njalo kungasiza ekunciphiseni ukucindezelwa nokwenza ngcono inhlala-kahle yonke. Khetha imisebenzi oyithandayo, njengokuhamba, ukugijima, ukubhukuda, noma ukudansa.

3. Ukulala okwanele: I- Ihlose amahora angama-7-8 wokulala kwekhwalithi endaweni ezolile nentofontofo.

4. Ukudla okunempilo: I- Ukudla okunenhlandlo okubunyene kunikeza amabhlokhi wokwakha adingekayo entuthuko yeqanda efanelekile kanye nempilo yokuzala.

5. Ubudlelwano bokusekela: I-

Zungeze nenethiwekhi yokusekela yomndeni, abangane, noma iqembu lokusekela inzalo. Ukwabelana ngemizwa yakho, ukukhathazeka, kanye nokuhlangenwe nakho kwakho nabanye kunganikeza ukusekelwa okungokomzwelo futhi kudambise ukucindezela okungokomzwelo.

6. Imikhuba Yomzimba Wengqondo: I- Le mikhuba ibonisiwe ukukhuthaza ukuphumula, ukunciphisa ukucindezela, nokusekelwa kwempilo yokuzala.

7. Ukuxhaswa kobungcweti: I- Uchwepheshe wokuzala noma ochwepheshe bezempilo yezengqondo onolwazi olunolwazi lwezempilo yokuzala lunganikeza ukuholwa, ukwelulekwa, kanye namasu aqondene nomuntu wokusiza ukuphatha ukucindezela nokwenza ngcono inhlala-kahle. I- Kubalulekile ukuthintana nochwepheshe wezokunakekelwa kwempilo ukuze kuhlaziyelwe ukuhlola kanye nezeluleko ezenziwe ngezifiso ezisuselwa esimweni sakho esithile.

data.heading: Yini umonakalo ikhwalithi yeqanda?
data.title: Ukulimaza ikhwalithi yeqanda
data.body:
Izici ezingalimaza ikhwalithi yeqanda Ikhwalithi yeqanda ikhwalithi yeqanda iyisici esibalulekile ekuvundiseni kwabesifazane namathuba okukhulelwa okuphumelelayo. Izici eziningana zingalimaza ikhwalithi yeqanda, imiphumela yokuzala. Ake sihlole ezinye zezinto ezibalulekile ezingasiza ekunciphiseni ikhwalithi yeqanda:

1. Ubudala: I-

yobudala ingenye yezinto ezibaluleke kakhulu ezithinta ikhwalithi yeqanda. Njengabesifazane ubudala, inombolo nekhwalithi yamaqanda ehle ngokwemvelo. Ngemuva kweminyaka engu-35, ukwehla kwekhwalithi yeqanda kukhulunywa ngokwengeziwe, kube nengozi ephezulu yokuhlukunyezwa kwe-chromosomal, njenge-Down syndrome. Amaqanda amadala futhi athambekele ekulimaleni kwe-DNA, okungathinta ukuvunza kanye nokufakwa.

2. Izici zezemvelo:

Ukuchayeka ezintweni ezithile zemvelo kungalimaza ikhwalithi yeqanda. Lokhu kungafaka:

a. Ukuvezwa Kwamakhemikhali: I-

Ukuchayeka kuma-Texins Ezemvelo, njenge-Pesticides, izinsimbi ezisindayo, namakhemikhali atholakala emikhiqizweni ethile yasendlini, angathinta ikhwalithi yeqanda. Lawabuthi obuthi angadala ukucindezela okuxakile kanye nomonakalo we-DNA kumaqanda, okuholela ekukhiqizweni okuncishisiwe.

b. Imisebe: I-

Ukuchayeka ngokweqile kwemisebe e-ionizing, njengokulashwa kwemisebe yezokwelapha noma ukuvezwa isikhathi eside kwimithombo yemisebe, kungaba nemiphumela elimazayo kwikhwalithi yeqanda. Kungadala ukulimala kwe-DNA kanye nokuhlukunyezwa kwe-chromosomal.

c. Ukubhema kanye nokusebenzisa kabi izidakamizwa: I-

ukubhema ugwayi noma ukusebenzisa izidakamizwa ezingekho emthethweni kungathinta kakhulu ikhwalithi yeqanda. Lezi zinto zangenisa amakhemikhali ayingozi emzimbeni, okuholela ekucindezelekeni okuyi-oxidative, ukulimala kwe-DNA, kanye nokungalingani kwe-hormonal okungaba nomthelela ekuzalweni.

3. Ukungalingani kwe-Hormonal: I-

ukungalingani emazingeni e-hormone kungathinta ukuthuthukiswa kanye nokuvuthwa kwamaqanda. Izimo ezinjenge-polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) kanye nezinkinga ze-thyroid zingathinta ukukhiqizwa kwama-hormone futhi ziphazamise ukuvama kwe-ovulation. Ama-Hormonal ukungalingani kungaholela kwikhwalithi yeqanda empofu futhi anciphise ukuzala.

4. Izici zofuzo: I-

Izici zofuzo ingadlala indima kwikhwalithi yeqanda. Imibandela ethile yofuzo noma ukuguqulwa okuzuzwa njengefa kungathinta ubuqotho bamaqanda, okuholela ekulimaleni kwe-chromosomal futhi kuncishiswe ukuzala.

5. Izici zendlela yokuphila:

Izici eziningana zendlela yokuphila zingasiza ekunciphiseni ikhwalithi yeqanda:

a. Ukudla okunempilo: I-

Ukudla okuntuleka kwezakhi zomzimba ezibalulekile kungathinta kabi ikhwalithi yeqanda. Ukudla okwanele kwamavithamini, amaminerali, ama-antioxidants, nama-omega-3 fatty acids kubalulekile ekukhuleni kwamaqanda okunempilo.

b. Ukukhuluphala: I-

Ukukhuluphala kungaphazamisa amazinga we-hormone futhi iphazamise i-ovulation, okuholela kwikhwalithi yeqanda empofu. Kungaba nomthelela futhi ekucindezelekeni okuvuvukala kanye nokuxineka kwe-oxidative, ukuyekethisa okwengeziwe kokuyekethisa.

c. Ukuxineka okungamahlalakhona: I-P> Ukucindezela okungamahlalakhona kungathinta izici ezahlukahlukene zempilo yokuzala, kufaka phakathi ikhwalithi yeqanda. Ukuxineka isikhathi eside kungaphazamisa amazinga we-hormone, kwandise ukucindezelwa kwe-oxidative, futhi kunciphise ukuzala okuphelele.

d. Indlela yokuphila yokuhlala phansi: I-

Ukuntuleka kokuzivocavoca umzimba njalo kungathinta kabi impilo yonke, kufaka phakathi ikhwalithi yeqanda. Ukuzivocavoca kukhuthaza ukuhamba kwegazi okufanele, i-oksigeration, kanye nebhalansi ye-hormonal, konke okunomthelela ekuthuthukisweni kwamaqanda okulungile.

e. Ukusetshenziswa ngokweqile kotshwala: I-

Ukuphuza kakhulu utshwala kungalimaza ukuzala nokunciphisa ikhwalithi yeqanda. Kungaphazamisa amazinga we-hormone, kuthinte umsebenzi we-ovarian, futhi wandise ubungozi bokulimala kofuzo kumaqanda.

6. Izimo Zokwelashwa Nokwelashwa:

Izimo ezithile zokwelashwa nokwelashwa kungathinta ikhwalithi yeqanda:

a. I-Endometriosis: I-

endometriosis, isimo lapho izicubu zilayini khona isibeletho isibeletho ngaphandle kwaso, kungaholela ekuvuvukeni nasekuhlotshiseni. Lezi zinto zingathinta kabi ikhwalithi yeqanda nokuzala.

b. Izindlela zokwelapha umdlavuza:

Ukwelashwa okuthile komdlavuza, njengokulashwa kwemisebe kanye ne-chemotherapy, kungaba nemiphumela elimazayo kwikhwalithi yeqanda. Lezi zindlela zokwelapha zingalimaza i-DNA yamaqanda, okuholela ezindabeni zokuzala.

c. Ukuphazamiseka kwe-Autoimmuneune: I-

Iziphazamiso ze-Autoimmuneune, njenge-rupus noma i-rheumatoid arthritis, ingadala ukuvuvukala kanye nokuvikela amasosha omzimba. Lezi zinto zingathinta ikhwalithi yeqanda nokuzala.

Isiphetho: Ikhwalithi yeqanda ikhwalithi yeqanda yinto ebucayi ukuzala kwabesifazane kanye namathuba okukhulelwa okuphumelelayo. Kunezici eziningana ezingaba nomthelela ekunciphiseni ikhwalithi yeqanda, okubandakanya ubudala, izici zezemvelo, ukungalingani kwe-hormonal, izici zezakhi zofuzo, izici zendlela yokuphila kanye nezimo ezithile zokwelapha. Ukuqonda lezi zinto kungasiza abantu ukuthi basebenzise izinqumo ezinolwazi mayelana nempilo yabo yokuzala futhi bafune ukuholwa okufanele kwezokwelapha uma kudingeka.
